Name: The Central House Barcelona Gracia
Description:
TCH Barcelona Grácia is within 100 metres of Diagonal Metro Station and Passeig de Gràcia, next to Palau Robert Gardens.

Set in a 19th-century building, TCH Barcelona Grácia offers simple, modern décor and includes a communal lounge area and kitchen. Rooms and dorms have free Wi-Fi, bunk beds, heating and either a private or shared bathroom.

There is also a pretty terrace with sofas, plants and a pergola.

La Pedrera and the Egyptian Museum are within 5 minutes’ walk of the Rodamón. Cafés, bars and restaurants can be found in the Gràcia district, less than 10 minutes’ walk away.

Plaza de Catalunya and Las Ramblas are just 2 stops from Diagonal Metro Station.

Name: Sonder Paseo de Gracia
Description:
Well situated in Barcelona, Sonder Paseo de Gracia offers a buffet breakfast and free WiFi. This 5-star hotel offers a restaurant. The property is non-smoking and is set a few steps from Passeig de Gracia.

The units come with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a coffee machine, a bath or shower, free toiletries and a wardrobe. Rooms are complete with a private bathroom equipped with a hairdryer, while certain units at the hotel also have a terrace.

Popular points of interest near Sonder Paseo de Gracia include Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Tivoli Theatre and Casa Batllo. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km away.

Name: Four Points by Sheraton Barcelona Airport
Description:
Situated in Barcelona, 16 km from Magic Fountain of Montjuic, Four Points by Sheraton Barcelona Airport features accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a fitness centre and a terrace. The property is around 16 km from Palau Sant Jordi, 16 km from Camp Nou and 18 km from Sants Railway Station. Guests can grab a bite to eat in the restaurant or a drink at the bar and free WiFi is available.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. The rooms have a wardrobe.

Guests at Four Points by Sheraton Barcelona Airport can enjoy a buffet breakfast.

Speaking Catalan, English, Spanish and French at the 24-hour front desk, staff are willing to help at any time of the day.

Montjuïc is 18 km from the accommodation, while Casa Batllo is 18 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 5 km away.

Name: Hotel SB Icaria
Description:
Located 300 metres from Barcelona’s Nova Icaria Beach, Hotel SB Icaria offers a gym, sauna and outdoor pool with sun terrace and hot tub. Rooms include free Wi-Fi and flat-screen satellite TV.

The Hotel SB Icaria’s stylish modern rooms feature wooden floors and adjustable lighting. Each room has a minibar, safe and private bathroom with a hairdryer.

The hotel’s elegant restaurant serves Mediterranean market cuisine. There is also a bar and a garden terrace.

Hotel SB Icaria is located in the Olympic Port area, a 10-minute walk from Ciutadella Park and Barcelona Zoo. Ciutadella Metro Station is 800 metres away, and is just 2 stops from Barcelona Cathedral and the historic Gothic Quarter.

Name: Hotel Glòries
Description:
This modern hotel is located 200 metres from Barcelona’s Monumental Bull Ring and 12 minutes from the Sagrada Familia. The rooms all have air conditioning and heating, satellite TV and free Wi-Fi.

Monumental Metro Station is just 3 minutes’ walk away from Hotel Glòries, and offers a direct service to Plaza Catalunya in around 5 minutes.

The hotel is well located for the 22@ high-tech area, as well as the Agbar Tower. The National Theatre of Catalunya and the Auditori Concert Hall are just 400 metres away.

The Hotel Glòries’s 24-hour front desk offers car and bike hire. They can also reserve tickets.

Name: Casa Lit Barcelona
Description:
Situated 400 metres from Las Ramblas, Casa Lit Barcelona offers a rooftop terrace with city and sea views. The rooms include free Wi-Fi and flat-screen satellite TV.

The hotel has a courtyard, where you can enjoy a buffet breakfast. Each open-plan room has air conditioning.

Casa Lit Barcelona have a 24-hour reception, where staff can arrange restaurant bookings, tickets for shows or guided tours of Barcelona. Free city maps are also available.

The hotel is located at the bottom of the lively Raval district, just 700 metres from Barcelona Port. Drassanes and Paral•lel Metro Stations are both within 300 metres.

Name: Stay U-nique Apartment Creu Coberta
Description:
Stay U-nique Apartment Creu Coberta is situated in the Sants-Montjuïc district of Barcelona, 1.8 km from Palau Sant Jordi, 2.7 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and 3 km from Plaça Catalunya. It is located less than 1 km from Sants Railway Station and provides a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Magic Fountain of Montjuic is 800 metres away.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 1 bedroom, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Dining options are available close to the apartment.

Casa Batllo is 3.1 km from Stay U-nique Apartment Creu Coberta, while Boqueria Market is 3.3 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 10 km from the accommodation.

Name: Hostal Barcelona
Description:
Located 15 minutes' walk from Las Ramblas and Plaça Espanya, Hostal Barcelona has rooms with air conditioning, TV and free Wi-Fi. Famous for its theatres, Parallel Avenue is 100 metres away.

Hostal Barcelona can provide tourist information, assist with ticket reservations including the Barcelona Tourist Bus, and help arrange car/bike rental. There is an internet terminal in reception. A luggage storage service is available and all rooms have a safe. Reception is available 24 hours.

A continental breakfast buffet is served from 07:30 to 10:30 It offers different kinds of bread, butter, jams, cornflakes, yogurt, cheese, ham, salami, croissants, chocolate croissants, muffins, biscuits, gaufres, Nutella, fruit, juice, coffee, milk and tea. Cold and hot drinks and pastries are available 24 hours a day. Guests also have access to a microwave. There is a supermarket in the same building, restaurants and bars in the surroundings.

Parallel Metro Station and many bus routes are 100 metres from Hostal Barcelona. The Fira Convention Centre is 12 minutes away by public transport. Montjuïc is a 5-minute walk from the guest house, and the Old Harbour can be reached in 20 minutes on foot.

Name: ibis Styles Barcelona City Bogatell
Description:
Located in Barcelona, 900 metres from Port Olympic, ibis Styles Barcelona City Bogatell features private parking and free WiFi access. The hotel has an outdoor pool and children's playground, and guests can enjoy a drink at the bar.

A TV is available.

You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property.

You can play table tennis at the hotel. The hotel also offers bike hire. Picasso Museum is 1.5 km from ibis Styles Barcelona City Bogatell, while La Seu, Cathedral of Barcelona is 1.8 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from ibis Styles Barcelona City Bogatell.

Name: Tembo Barcelona
Description:
Situated in Barcelona, 1.4 km from Llevant, Tembo Barcelona features accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a fitness centre and a shared lounge. 1.4 km from Forum Beach and 1.9 km from Platja del Litoral, the property offers a terrace and a bar. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property.

All rooms at the hotel are fitted with a seating area, a flat-screen TV and a safety deposit box. Featuring a private bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer, some units at Tembo Barcelona also feature a city view. All guest rooms will provide guests with a fridge.

A buffet breakfast is available at the accommodation. At Tembo Barcelona you will find a restaurant serving international cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and vegan options can also be requested.

There is an in-house snack bar and guests can also make use of the business area.

Port Olimpic is 4.6 km from the hotel, while Sagrada Familia is 4.8 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 17 km away.

Name: Hotel Rialto
Description:
Situated just off famous La Rambla Boulevard in central Barcelona, Hotel Rialto occupies a historic building where the artist Joan Miró was born. It offers air-conditioned rooms with flat-screen TV.

Each room at the Rialto Hotel Barcelona has wooden floors and a simple, functional design. The modern bathrooms include basic toiletries. Safes are available to rent.

Guests can enjoy a varied buffet breakfast and delicious Mediterranean meals at the Rialto’s Miró restaurant. There are also many restaurants and lively bars in the surrounding streets. 

Hotel Rialto’s 24-hour reception offers information about the city. The Boquería Market and Barcelona Cathedral are both within 400 metres. Liceu Metro Station is only 300 metres away, and Plaza Catalunya is a 10-minute walk from the hotel.

Name: Occidental Barcelona 1929
Description:
Occidental Barcelona 1929 features a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, fitness centre, a terrace and bar in Barcelona. Each accommodation at the 3-star hotel has city views and free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is set 600 metres from Magic Fountain of Montjuic.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a wardrobe, a kettle, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower.

Guests at Occidental Barcelona 1929 can enjoy a buffet breakfast.

Speaking Catalan, English, Spanish and French, staff are willing to help at the 24-hour front desk.

Sants Railway Station is 1 km from the accommodation, while Palau Sant Jordi is 1.7 km away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 10 km from the property.

Name: Barceló Raval
Description:
Set in Barcelona’s vibrant Raval district, this design hotel offers free Wi-Fi, a gym and a roof terrace with pool and panoramic views. Some rooms include a Nespresso coffee machine.

Each bright, air-conditioned room at the Barceló Raval features a large plasma-screen TV with more than 70 channels. Rooms have a minibar and a modern bathroom.

Hotel Barceló Raval’s B-Lounge serves creative Mediterranean food, tapas and cocktails in stylish surroundings. You can also enjoy a drink on the outdoor terrace.

The Raval Barceló is only a 5-minute walk from the MACBA Modern Art Gallery. Liceu Metro Station, Las Ramblas and the famous Boqueria Market are all just 400 metres away.

Name: Sant Antoni 3 - Downtown Barcelona. Modern
Description:
Located in the centre of Barcelona, 1.3 km from Plaça Catalunya and 1.3 km from Portal de l'Angel, Sant Antoni 3 - Downtown Barcelona. Modern offers free WiFi and air conditioning. Guests staying at this apartment have access to a balcony. The property is non-smoking and is situated 1.5 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station.

The 1-bedroom apartment is equipped with a living room with a TV with cable channels, a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave and a toaster, and 1 bathroom with a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Tivoli Theatre, Passeig de Gracia and Boqueria Market. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km away.

Name: Hesperia Barcelona Barri Gòtic
Description:
Conveniently set in Barcelona, Hesperia Barcelona Barri Gòtic provides air-conditioned rooms, a fitness centre, free WiFi and a shared lounge. The property is close to Santa Maria del Mar, Picasso Museum and Passeig de Gracia. The property is allergy-free and is located 1.4 km from Sant Miquel Beach.

All units are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a kettle, a shower, free toiletries and a desk. Every room is equipped with a private bathroom with a hairdryer, while selected rooms have a balcony and others also provide guests with city views. The units include a safety deposit box.

A continental breakfast is available at the hotel.

A business centre and vending machines with snacks and drinks are available on site at Hesperia Barcelona Barri Gòtic. Languages spoken at the reception include Catalan, English and Spanish, and guests are invited to request guidance on the area when needed.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Sant Sebastian Beach, Barceloneta Beach and Plaça Reial. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km away.

Name: Hotel Ronda Lesseps
Description:
The Hotel Ronda Lesseps is a quiet and familiar establishment, with two beautiful interior terraces full of plants that allow our guests to relax during their stay in our city.

The Hotel is located in the metropolitan heart of Barcelona, with very good communication by public transport, very close to the historic district of Gràcia and just at a ten minutes’ walk from Antoni Gaudí's Park Güell.

License number: HB-004338

Name: Pensión 45
Description:
This establishment is housed in a building of great artistic interest, built at the beginning of the 19th century.

The building is tranquil and comfortable and has conserved part of its original decoration. On offer here is simple accommodation combined with a warm and cosy atmosphere.

Pension 45 is perfectly positioned in the centre of the old town, with good connections to the public transport network, enabling you to move within and around the city. The Renfe train station is only metres away from the accommodation. This is the ideal place from which to see the heart of Barcelona and benefit to the maximum from its culture, shopping and nightlife. Nearby are also the MACBA, Las Ramblas, Plaça Catalunya and the central University building.

Name: Alojamiento Diputacion
Description:
Situated less than 1 km from Magic Fountain of Montjuic, Alojamiento Diputacion offers air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. It is located 1.3 km from Sants Railway Station and features a shared kitchen. Guests can enjoy city views.

At the homestay, units include a desk, a flat-screen TV, a shared bathroom, bed linen and towels. A toaster, a fridge and stovetop are also offered, as well as a kettle. The units are equipped with heating facilities.

Passeig de Gracia is 2.2 km from the homestay, while Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 2 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 11 km away.

Name: Ibis Barcelona Plaza Glòries 22@
Description:
Ibis Barcelona Plaza Glòries 22@ is located in Barcelona’s Glòries district, 500 metres from Torre Agbar. It offers a fitness centre, 24-hour bar and soundproofed rooms with a flat-screen TV.

All rooms at the Ibis Plaza Glòries have air conditioning and heating. They also have a private bathroom with a hairdryer. Free Wi-Fi is offered throughout.

The Hotel Ibis Plaza Glòries has a restaurant which serves a buffet breakfast. Rates with breakfast included does not include breakfast for children. Children under 12 can enjoy breakfast for 4 euros per person

Llacuna and Glòries Metro Stations are within 5 minutes’ walk from the hotel. From here you can reach Plaza Catalunya or Barceloneta Beach in under 10 minutes.

Name: Ohla Barcelona
Description:
Featuring a rootop pool, this boutique hotel is located in Barcelona’s historic centre, close to Palau de la Música Concert Hall, the Cathedral and the Ramblas.

Ohla Barcelona features rooms with contemporary décor and large windows. They all include a flat-screen TV and free WiFi. The modern bathrooms come with bathrobes and slippers. Some rooms have views over the historic Gothic Quarter.

Romain Fornell is currently the head chef for all the culinary spaces at hotel Ohla Barcelona: Caelis restaurant, Vistro49, and La Plassohla. This last restaurant is specialised in catalan cuisine, offers tapas and small dishes. Guests can also have a cocktail in the famous Ohla rooftop bar.

The rooftop swimming pool offers fantastic city views with a chill out terrace. Other facilities at this hotel include a gym and a wellness area with a sauna.

The Ohla Barcelona is 300 metres from Plaza Catalunya Square while Urquinaona Metro Station is only 200 metres away. Passeig de Gracia Avenue and Gaudi’s modernist buildings are 10 minutes’ walk of the hotel.

Name: Ohla Eixample
Description:
Offering a year-round outdoor pool with city views, Ohla Eixample is a stylish boutique hotel located 10 minutes’ walk from two of Gaudi’s major works, La Pedrera and Casa Batlló. There is free high-speed WiFi available throughout and a Clef d’Or Concierge service.

Each well-designed room comes with a large bed and a private bathroom with bath or a rainfall shower. There is a 55-inch flat-screen satellite TV with eRoom Cast, a minibar with local delicatessen and a free safe for laptops. A turndown service is also available.

The on-site Michelin-starred Xerta Restaurant serves traditional recipes from the Ebro Region; and a complete breakfast is also served every morning including a huge selection of local products. The hotel also has the Lobby Bar, a meeting point for both locals and hotel guests; and the Sky Bar, a creative cocktail bar.

Guests can enjoy a selection of high-tech fitness equipment at the on-site gym; and beauty treatments and fashion services such as personal shopper are available on prior request.

Ohla Eixample is conveniently located in the Eixample District, in the modernist area locally known as Quadrat d’Or - Golden Square; within 5 minutes’ walk of the emblematic Diagonal Avenue, Rambla de Catalunya and Paseo de Gracia shopping boulevards. This urban building has an eye-catching ceramic façade, made from over 1000 carved pieces that represent Vivaldi’s Four Seasons.

Name: Axel TWO Barcelona 4 Sup - Adults Only
Description:
Offering a rooftop pool with a large sun terrace, TWO Hotel Barcelona by Axel is located in the heart of the gay district of Barcelona, 2 km from Barceloneta Beach.

The hetero-friendly hotel offers on-site private parking. There is also a  24-hour reception and guests can get information on the gay scene and the city at the on-site tour desk. On the rooftop guests will also find the Sky bar, gym, steam bath and a massage room.

Each room here will provide you with air conditioning and a minibar. Featuring a shower, private bathroom also comes with a hairdryer. A safety deposit box and a universal phone charger are also provided.

Guests can sample a drink at the rooftop bar, whilst taking in stunning city views or enjoy the delicious cocktails served in the Lounge Bar. A buffet breakfast is available and free high-speed WiFi access is provided throughout.

Staff can give information about the surrounding area, which is known as "Gayxample" because of its lively gay nightlife.

The hotel is 2 minutes' walk from Rocafort Metro Station and Plaça d'Espanya, with direct buses to Barcelona Airport, is a 10-minute walk away. Paral·lel, with bars, restaurants, clubs and theatres is 1.3 km from TWO Hotel Barcelona by Axel.

Name: Hotel Paxton Barcelona
Description:
Located in Barcelona, 1 km from Bogatell Beach, Hotel Paxton Barcelona provides accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a fitness centre and a shared lounge. Each accommodation at the 4-star hotel has city views, and guests can enjoy access to a terrace and to a bar. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Hotel Paxton Barcelona features certain rooms with pool views, and each room comes with a kettle. Guest rooms include a wardrobe.

Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a buffet breakfast. At Hotel Paxton Barcelona you will find a restaurant serving Italian and Spanish cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and gluten-free options can also be requested.

Popular points of interest near the hotel include Mar Bella Beach, Nova Icaria Beach and Port Olimpic. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 16 km away.

Name: htop BCN City #htopEnjoy
Description:
htop BCN City is located next to the impressive Hospital Sant Pau and 10 minutes’ walk from the Sagrada Familia. It offers air-conditioned rooms with a TV.

The rooms at htop BCN City feature simple décor and a work desk. Each one has a private bathroom, and many offer views of the Hospital de Sant Pau.

The htop BCN City has a 24-hour reception, allowing you greater flexibility during your stay. Free Wi-Fi throughout the hotel.

The hotel has vending machines for snacks and drinks. There is a variety of restaurants and bars within 10 minutes’ walk.

Sant Pau-Dos de Maig Metro Station is just 200 metres away from the htop BCN City, connecting you with the rest of the city with ease.

Name: Sixtytwo Hotel
Description:
Situated next to Barcelona’s Passeig de Gracia Station, this boutique hotel offers a stylish lounge. Rooms include a flat-screen TV and free WiFi.

The Sixtytwo Hotel is set in a typical 19th-century building. Each elegant room comes with a Nespresso coffee machine and a minibar. Some overlook Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard, while others overlook the hotel´s charming Japanese-style garden.

A continental breakfast is served daily at a cafe nearby. Staff at the 24-hour reception can help arrange car hire.

This boutique hotel offers 45 spacious and stylish rooms. It is situated in Barcelona's famous Passeig de Gràcia, next to Diagonal Avenue, the city’s best shopping area, where you can also find a wide variety of restaurants and tapas bars.

Hotel Sixtytwo is across the road from Gaudí’s Casa Batlló, and La Pedrera is just 3 minutes' walk away. It is just a 10-minute walk from Plaza Catalunya. Nearby Passeig de Gràcia Station offers Metro services and direct airport trains.

Name: VIU BARCELONA BERTRAN
Description:
In the Sarrià-St. Gervasi district of Barcelona, close to Park Güell, VIU BARCELONA BERTRAN features free WiFi and a washing machine. The property has quiet street views and is 3.2 km from Passeig de Gracia and 3.4 km from La Pedrera. The accommodation provides a lift and a tour desk for guests.

Accommodation is fitted with air conditioning, a fully equipped kitchen with a dining area, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with shower, a hair dryer and free toiletries. Some units include a terrace and/or a balcony with mountain or garden views. At the apartment complex, each unit is equipped with bed linen and towels.

Casa Batllo is 3.6 km from the apartment, while Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 4.1 km away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 15 km from the property.

Name: Uma Suites Sagrada Familia
Description:
Located within 2.7 km of Nova Icaria Beach and 3 km of Somorrostro Beach, Uma Suites Sagrada Familia provides rooms with air conditioning and a private bathroom in Barcelona. It is set 300 metres from Sagrada Familia and offers a lift. Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 1.9 km away and Tivoli Theatre is 2.6 km from the apartment.

Each unit is equipped with a fully equipped kitchen with an oven, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a washing machine, and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. Every unit includes a safety deposit box and free WiFi, while selected rooms are equipped with a balcony. The units are equipped with heating facilities.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Casa Batllo, Passeig de Gracia and La Pedrera. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 15 km away.

Name: Residencia Universitaria Campus del Mar
Description:
Residencia Campus del Mar has an excellent location in Barcelona's Barceloneta neighbourhood, 200 metres from the beach. It features a fitness centre and free internet in rooms and public areas.

Each room at Residencia Campus del Mar has a kitchen area with a microwave and tea/coffee facilities. Most also have a TV.

Guests can make use of the library area and games room with snooker and table tennis at the Residencia. Private parking, a laundrette and 24-hour reception are available on site. Bicycles are available to rent, upon prior request.

There is also a range of vending machines.

Ciutadella Park and the Paseo Marítimo are within a 2-minute walk of Residencia Campus del Mar. Barceloneta Metro Station is 250 metres away.

The residence is open to the university community, including students, professors, researchers and administrative staff all year round.

Name: Hostal Marenostrum
Description:
This guest house boasts an unbeatable location right on the iconic La Rambla, opposite the Liceu opera house, and includes free internet and a buffet breakfast.

The Marenostrum’s front desk can help you plan your day. On and around La Rambla, you will find many of the city’s highlights, including the lively Boquería market and the Cathedral.

Wander up the Rambla, past street performers and market stalls, to the city’s heart of Plaça Catalunya. Alternatively, stroll down to Barcelona’s beaches, a short walk away.

The Hostal Marenostrum’s en suite accommodation is functional and comfortable, including air conditioning, heating and soundproofing, for a restful stay. All bathrooms include a hairdryer. You can also make the most of 24-hour reception to explore the nightlife.

Name: H Regas Adults Only
Description:
Situated within 1 km of La Pedrera and 1.5 km of Casa Batllo, H Regas Adults Only features rooms with air conditioning and a private bathroom in Barcelona. Featuring free private parking, the 2-star guest house is 500 metres from Passeig de Gracia. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, a lift and luggage storage for guests.

All units in the guest house are fitted with a flat-screen TV. Featuring a private bathroom with a bath and slippers, units at the guest house also boast free WiFi. At the guest house, every unit is fitted with bed linen and towels.

Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 1.8 km from the guest house, while Plaça Catalunya is 2.3 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 14 km away.

Name: H La Paloma Boutique
Description:
The H La Paloma Boutique is located in the Raval neighborhood, just 200 meters from the Sant Antoni market.
 The rooms at H La Paloma Boutique feature modern and elegant decoration.
They feature a king-size bed, free Wi-Fi, Smart TV and a private bathroom with a hairdryer and free toiletries. It also has private parking and 24-hour room service.
The H La Paloma Boutique has the ideal location to visit the major centers of interest on foot, being 600 meters from the MACBA Museum of Modern Art and just a 5-minute walk from Paseo de Gracia, Plaza de Catalunya and Las Ramblas.
The Sant Antoni and Universidad metro stations are just a few meters away.

Name: B Hotel
Description:
This design hotel is just 150 metres from Plaça Espanya and opposite Las Arenas Shopping Centre. It has an 8th-floor swimming pool and sun terrace with spectacular views of Montjuic.

The air-conditioned rooms at B Hotel are spacious and soundproofed. All rooms have free WiFi, and are decorated with contemporary art. Each room comes with an electric kettle and a pillow-menu.

The room service menu is also available at the bar and by the swimming pool.

Plaza Espanya Metro Station is within 200 metres of the hotel, while Barcelona Fira Exhibition Centre is just 250 metres away. The Magic Fountains of Montjuic are about 5 minutes’ walk away.

Name: Numa I Brio
Description:
A 5-minute walk from Diagonal and Fontana Metro stations, Numa I Brio is set in Barcelona’s bohemian Gràcia district. It features modern rooms with rain-effect showers.

Numa I Brio's simply decorated, air-conditioned rooms are soundproofed. Each room has a TV and private bathroom. A safe is available.

Restaurants and bars can be found in the surrounding streets. Popular Plaza del Sol is just 500 metres away.

There is a garden patio and guests can also enjoy a working space with high-speed free WiFi.

Gaudí’s La Pedrera and Casa Batlló are within 15 minutes’ walk of the hotel. Las Ramblas and Plaza de Catalunya are just 2 Metro stops from Diagonal station.

Name: Hotel Via Augusta
Description:
Situated next to Gràcia FGC Train Station, Hotel Via Augusta has a rooftop terrace with views of Barcelona. It offers functional, air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi and flat-screen satellite TV.

The Via Augusta is a historic building with a beautiful original foyer. Rooms have simple, modern décor and wooden floors. They include a work desk, a safe and a bathroom with a hairdryer.

A varied breakfast buffet is served in the hotel, and drinks are available from the vending machine. A wide range of bars and restaurants can be found in the popular Gràcia district, within a 5-minute walk.

Hotel Via Augusta is 400 metres from Fontana Metro Station, and Parc Güell is just 1 Metro stop away. Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas are a 5-minute journey from nearby Gracia Station.

Name: Royal Ramblas
Description:
Royal Ramblas is located on Barcelona's famous Ramblas, 100 meters from Plaza de Catalunya. It offers elegant and modern rooms with air conditioning, plasma TV, free Wi-Fi, and private parking. Some  rooms provide magnificent views of the Ramblas.

The Hotel has a meeting room with magnificent views of the Ramblas.

It offers a buffet breakfast with various regional products and homemade pastries in the La Poma restaurant with impressive views of Las Ramblas where you can also taste Mediterranean food.

The Royal Ramblas Hotel is ideally located with access to all public transport and a 5-minute walk from the elegant Passeig de Gràcia, where you will find numerous restaurants and exclusive shops. The old town is within walking distance, as well as the Mercat de la Boqueria and the MACBA. The beach is 20 minutes away.

The Royal Ramblas Barcelona's tour desk offers useful information about the city and car rental services. It also manages the airport transfer service.

Name: Barcelona Hotel Colonial
Description:
This elegant hotel is set in Barcelona’s Gothic Quarter, in an impressive, colonial, stone building with a clock tower. It is a 10-minute walk from Barcelona Cathedral and Barceloneta Beach.

Hotel Colonial’s bright, air-conditioned rooms feature wooden floors. They are soundproofed and have a flat-screen TV and minibar. You can hire the safe, and the private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and amenities.

A buffet breakfast is served in the Colonial Hotel café. Guests can relax with a free newspaper in the stylish lounge, with its white leather sofas, where Wi-Fi is free of charge.

Barcelona Hotel Colonial has a tour desk. Barcelona Marina and the boutiques of the trendy Born district are 5 minutes’ walk away. Parking is also available within a 5-minute walk of the property.

Name: TSA Gran Via
Description:
Set 500 metres from Plaza España, No 439 - The Streets Apartments Barcelona features accommodation with modern design and free WiFi. All apartments are located within a 10-minute walk of Fira of Barcelona.

Each air-conditioned apartment is fitted with wooden flooring and provides a pleasant seating area with sofa, flat-screen TV and DVD player. It features a well-equipped kitchen including a dishwasher, microwave and coffee machine. The bathroom comes with shower and hairdryer.

The property is surrounded by a wide range of bars, shops and restaurant with traditional Spanish dishes.  Las Arenas Shopping Centre is also a 5-minute walk from the complex.

Rocafort Metro Station is just outside the door. There is also a bus stop just in front of the property which let you reach Plaza Cataluña and Las Ramblas within 5 minutes.

Barcelona El Prat Airport is 14 km away.

Name: Alojamiento Nuevo Valenci
Description:
Alojamiento Nuevo Valenci is located in the Eixample district of Barcelona, less than 1 km from Sants Railway Station, a 15-minute walk from Magic Fountain of Montjuic and 2.2 km from Casa Batllo. The property is situated 2.6 km from Plaça Catalunya, 2.6 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and 2.7 km from Passeig de Gracia. The accommodation provides a lift and a shared kitchen for guests.

The units are equipped with a microwave, toaster, a coffee machine, a shower, a hair dryer and a wardrobe. All units are fitted with a kettle and a shared bathroom, while selected rooms include a balcony. At the bed and breakfast, units include bed linen and towels.

La Pedrera is 2.8 km from the bed and breakfast, while Boqueria Market is 3.1 km away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 11 km from the property.

Name: The Moods Catedral Hostal Boutique
Description:
Set in Barcelona's Gothic Quarter beside the city's old Roman walls, The Moods Catedral is an Adult Only hotel, just 100 metres from Barcelona Cathedral and 100 metres from Jaume I Metro Station. It offers bright, modern rooms with free WiFi.

Set on the first floor of a Modernist-style building, the stylish, air-conditioned rooms feature unique ceilings and include a private bathroom with a hairdryer. We don't guarantee the view of the exterior rooms as we have Cathedral, Via Laietana and Plaza Ramon Berenguer views.

Plaza Catalunya Square and the Ramblas can be reached in 10 minutes' walk. In the area you will find a wide selection of shops, restaurants and bars.

The Picasso Museum and beautiful Santa Maria del Mar Church are a 5-minute walk away. You can walk to the city’s beaches in 20 minutes or take a bus from just outside.

Name: Travelodge Barcelona Poblenou
Description:
This modern hotel has 250 spacious and fully equipped rooms, a Snack-Bar open 24 hours where clients can enjoy a buffet breakfast, as well as light meals for lunch and dinner. It also has vending machines and private paid parking. All its facilities are perfectly adapted and accessible for people with reduced mobility.
It is a hotel with free and unlimited high-speed Wi-Fi in the common areas. Wi-Fi internet is available in the rooms at an extra cost.
Travelodge Barcelona Poblenou is a pet-friendly hotel that will be happy to offer you and your pet the best experience.
It is located in the traditional Poblenou neighborhood, within streets full of restaurants, bars and shops. One of the most charming neighborhoods in the city, and 600 meters from the Bogatell beach. Barcelona city center can be reached in 10 minutes by metro and Barcelona’s Port Olímpic, with its vibrant night life, is just a 20-minute walk away.
This is considered the most innovative neighborhood in the city. It´s in the heart of the 22@ District and concentrates a multitude of technology and R+D companies. Therefore, thanks to its location and facilities, it is also a perfect accommodation for business trips.
Travelodge Barcelona Poblenou offers all you need to have the best experience in Barcelona city.

Name: HG City Suites Barcelona
Description:
HG City Suites Barcelona is situated on the edge of Barcelona’s popular Gràcia district, 300 metres from Fontana Metro Station. Its spacious, modern rooms feature climate control, minibar and flat-screen satellite TV.

All accommodation at HG City Suites Barcelona includes a safe and a private bathroom with a hairdryer and toiletries. The hotel offers free Wi-Fi in all rooms and public areas.

Gràcia FGC Train Station is just 200 metres from the HG City Suites Barcelona and the number 24 bus also stops nearby. Both connect guests to Plaza de Catalunya in less than 20 minutes. Passeig de Gràcia is within a 15-minute walk of the HG City Suites Barcelona.

Public parking is available near the hotel, with special discounts available for guests.

Name: Leonardo Hotel Barcelona Gran Via
Description:
This spacious and modern hotel is located in Eixample district, built in 2004, the Leonardo Hotel Barcelona Gran Via, features wide-open public spaces covered in marble.

Rooms include flat-screen TV, Wifi, safebox, desk, minibar, private bathrooms with toiletries.

A good location for tourism, you can easily walk to the Gothic Quarter and Ramblas, or up to the attractions of Montjuic. The city’s major business districts are also nearby.

Rooms include satellite TV, free Wi-Fi access, air conditioning and a bathroom with free toiletries.

Parking is available on site at an additional cost.

Name: The Hotel 592 - Adults Only
Description:
Just metres from Universitat Metro in Barcelona, the adults-only The Hotel 592 offers a restaurant and colourful modern rooms with a balcony. WiFi is free throughout.

All air conditioned, rooms here come with a flat-screen TV and parquet floors. The private bathroom includes a hairdryer and free toiletries.

Plaça Catalunya is 500 metres from The Hotel 592. La Pedrera can be reached on foot in 15 minutes.

Name: Hotel Everest
Description:
The Hotel Everest is located 10 minutes’ walk from the impressive Sagrada Familia Cathedral and features a roof terrace and free Wi-Fi.

All spacious rooms at the Hotel Everest have air conditioning and come with satellite TV. They feature a modern bathroom and some rooms include a balcony.

A transport service to and from the airport, as well as other areas of the city, can be arranged for a surcharge. The hotel includes a drinks vending machine serving coffee and soft drinks.

The hotel can be found next to the Hospital de Sant Pau, an impressive Modernist building. The city center is less than 15 minutes away by Metro. Sant Pau Metro Station is 200 meters away. A private parking is available nearby at an extra cost; staff at reception will provide more information.

Name: Alojamiento Calabria
Description:
In the Eixample district of Barcelona, close to Magic Fountain of Montjuic, Alojamiento Calabria has free WiFi and a washing machine. The property is around 1.8 km from Passeig de Gracia, 1.8 km from Tivoli Theatre and 1.7 km from Plaça Catalunya. The accommodation features a lift and a shared kitchen for guests.

All units are fitted with air conditioning, a microwave, a fridge, a coffee machine, a shower, a hair dryer and a wardrobe. There is also a stovetop, kitchenware and a kettle. The units have a shared bathroom, free toiletries and bed linen.

Dining options are available close to the bed and breakfast.

Popular points of interest near Alojamiento Calabria include Sants Railway Station, Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and Casa Batllo. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 11 km from the property.

Name: Sant Pau Terraces Apartments
Description:
These bright modern apartments each have a furnished terrace with excellent views over the sea or Barcelona’s Hospital de Sant Pau, a UNESCO World Heritage Site. Sant Pau Terraces Apartments also come with free Wi-Fi.

Apartments have an integrated heating and cooling system. The living room includes a sofa, flat-screen TV and DVD player. There is a dining table and a kitchenette with a washing machine, fridge, microwave and coffee maker. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and shower.

You will find lots of shops and restaurants along Avenida Gaudi, which starts next to the apartments. You can stroll along this avenue to the Sagrada Familia in 10 minutes. From Sant Pau/Dos de Maig Metro Station, 2 minutes’ walk away, you can reach central Barcelona in 10 minutes.

Name: Hotel Gótico
Description:
Hotel Gótico is 50 metres from Barcelona’s Jaume I Metro Station and a 2-minute walk from Barcelona Cathedral. It offers a rooftop terrace, and stylish, air-conditioned rooms with satellite TV.

Soundproofed rooms are heated and feature beautiful tiled floors. They have a safe and work desk, and the private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and amenities.

Guests can enjoy a buffet breakfast in the Gótico hotel café-bar, which features impressive stone arches. Packed lunches can be requested and there are vending machines for drinks and snacks.

There is a 24-hour reception, and you can hire a car from the tour desk. Parking is available nearby for an extra charge. The hotel is just 5 minutes’ walk from La Rambla.

Name: HOTEL FORNOS - Barcelona
Description:
Free Wi-Fi and functional, air-conditioned rooms with flat-screen satellite TV are offered at HOTEL FORNOS - Barcelona. It is situated on Barcelona’s famous Las Ramblas, next to Plaça Reial Square.

The Fornos Hotel is located on the edge of the Gothic District, 500 metres from Barcelona Cathedral. Liceu Metro Station and the colourful Boquería Food Market are a 3-minute walk away.

The hotel’s bright rooms have simple, modern décor and tiled floors. Each room has a private bathroom and a safe. Many rooms also have a small balcony with views of the Ramblas or Plaza Real. Single rooms are interior, only 2 exterior single rooms if available.

A light continental breakfast is offered at the hotel. Drinks and snacks are also available from the vending machines. The 24-hour reception offers information about Barcelona. Public parking is available nearby for an extra charge.

Name: Ofelias Hotel 4Sup by Bondia Hotel Group
Description:
Set just off Gran Vía and a 2-minute walk from Plaza Espanya Metro Station and the Fira Exhibition Centre, Ofelias Hotel offers stylish rooms with free Wi-Fi. It features a roof terrace with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool.

Each bright, air-conditioned room at Ofelias Hotel has a flat-screen TV. Each one comes with a private bathroom. A free bottle of water is provided upon arrival.

The hotel has an on-site bar where you can get a drink. There is a range of cafes and bars around Plaza Espanya. Restaurants can be found on Las Ramblas and in the Gothic Quarter, just 4 Metro stops away.

Staff at the reception can give you information about different Slow Travel activities .These include free bicycles on request, allowing you to discover hidden places and enjoy local cultures. .

The Magic Fountains and Montjuïc Park are less than 1 km from the Ofelias, and Las Arenas Shopping centre is just opposite the hotel. The airport bus stops just 200 metres from the hotel. Bicycle rental is available on request from reception.

Name: Sweet BCN Sagrada Familia
Description:
Located within 2.7 km of Nova Icaria Beach and 3 km of Bogatell Beach, Sweet BCN Sagrada Familia provides rooms with air conditioning and a private bathroom in Barcelona. All rooms feature a kitchen and a private bathroom. Somorrostro Beach is 3 km away and Passeig de Gracia is 2.5 km from the apartment.

Featuring free WiFi, the units have a washing machine and a flat-screen TV.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Sagrada Familia, La Pedrera and Casa Batllo. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from Sweet BCN Sagrada Familia.

Name: Alojamiento Gran Vi
Description:
Alojamiento Gran Vi is located in the Eixample district of Barcelona, less than 1 km from Magic Fountain of Montjuic, a 17-minute walk from Sants Railway Station and 1.9 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. The property is around 1.9 km from Plaça Catalunya, 2.6 km from Casa Batllo and 2.6 km from Passeig de Gracia. The accommodation provides a lift and a shared kitchen for guests.

The units are equipped with air conditioning, a microwave, a toaster, a coffee machine, a shower, a hair dryer and a wardrobe. Each unit is equipped with a kettle and a shared bathroom, while certain rooms include a balcony. At the bed and breakfast, every unit comes with bed linen and towels.

Portal de l'Angel is 2.6 km from the bed and breakfast, while Boqueria Market is 2.8 km away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 11 km from the property.

Name: Praktik Bakery
Description:
Featuring a quality bakery within the hotel, Praktik Bakery hotel is located in Barcelona, 5 minutes' walk from Diagonal Metro. Free Wi-Fi is available.

This modern hotel offers air-conditioned double/twin rooms including a flat-screen TV and private bathroom. Towels and bed linen are provided free.

Guests can enjoy breakfast in the hotel and try the breads and pastries from the hotel's traditional bakery. Other services include provision of beach towels, ticket service for tourist bus, laundry, and airport transfers.

Praktik Bakery hotel is within a short walk of many bars, restaurants and shops. Paseo De Gracia Avenue and Gaudi's La Pedrera are just 250 metres away, and La Sagrada Familia is a 15-minute walk away. Plaza Catalunya Sqaure and Las Ramblas Boulevard is 1.3 km from the hotel.

Name: Napoles · Modernist flat close to Sagrada Familia
Description:
Situated in Barcelona, 2.8 km from Somorrostro Beach and 2.8 km from Nova Icaria Beach, Napoles · Modernist flat close to Sagrada Familia features air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. The property is located 1.4 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, 1.3 km from Passeig de Gracia and 1.5 km from Tivoli Theatre. The property is non-smoking and is set less than 1 km from Sagrada Familia.

The spacious apartment has 3 bedrooms, a TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Casa Batllo, La Pedrera and Palau de la Musica Catalana. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 14 km from the property.

Name: Casa Consell Gran Via, Guest House
Description:
Casa Consell Gran Via, Guest House offers value-for-money and free Wi-Fi on Gran Vía, in Barcelona’s famous Eixample district. It is set 700 metres from Plaça Catalunya and Passeig de Gràcia.

The guesthouse is only 500 metres from Nord Bus Station. There is easy access to Tetuán and Girona Metro Stations.

The guesthouse is set in a historic building it has elegant décor and original features. Guests can enjoy a full equipped shared kitchen and complimentary coffee and tea during the stay.

Casa Consell Gran Via, Guest House is near many famous Modernista buildings. These include Gaudí’s Casa Batlló and the Sagrada Família. The Gothic Quarter and the Cathedral are also nearby.

Some rooms have a balcony or terrace with street views. They have an en suite bathroom, with typical ceramic tiles.

Name: Hotel California
Description:
Set in the heart of Barcelona’s Gothic District, Hotel California is only 2 minutes’ walk from La Rambla. The hotel offers rooms with a balcony, air conditioning and free Wi-Fi.

Each soundproofed room includes a flat-screen TV and wardrobe.The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and free toiletries. Towels and bed linen are provided.

A breakfast buffet is available at Hotel Califorina, which also offers a bar and room service. Guests can enjoy a shared lounge.

La Boqueria Market is located 300 metres from the property, while Plaça Catalunya is 10 minutes’ walk away. La Barceloneta Beach can be reached in 20 minutes on foot. Liceu Metro Station is 200 metres from the hotel

Name: Hotel Indigo Barcelona Plaza Espana, an IHG Hotel
Description:
Hotel Indigo Barcelona Plaza Espana, an IHG Hotel is a modern design hotel with a bright central courtyard. It offers free Wi-Fi and a convenient location, next to Barcelona’s Plaça Espanya.

The modern rooms at the Hotel Indigo Barcelona Plaza Espana, an IHG Hotel feature a private bathroom, and free mineral water for the first night. They are all soundproofed, with flat-screen TVs and air conditioning.

Hotel Indigo Barcelona Plaza Espana, an IHG Hotel is set next to the Fira Exhibition Centre, at the bottom of Montjuic. This hill is home to a castle, the National Art Museum and the Magic Fountain.

Espanya Metro Station is 150 metres from the hotel. The historic centre of Barcelona and the famous Ramblas are just a few stops away. A direct bus service to the airport stops in Plaça Espanya, near the hotel.

Breakfast is available at an additional cost.

Name: Design 1 Bedroom Apartment near Plaza España
Description:
Located in Barcelona in the Catalonia region, Design 1 Bedroom Apartment near Plaza España features a balcony. It is set 1.1 km from Magic Fountain of Montjuic and provides a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Sants Railway Station is 1.1 km away.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 1 bedroom, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Casa Batllo is 2.4 km from the apartment, while Plaça Catalunya is 2.8 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 11 km from Design 1 Bedroom Apartment near Plaza España.

Name: Casa Elliot by Bondia Hotel Group
Description:
The Casa Elliot by Bondia Hotel Group is located in the centre of Barcelona, less than 10 minutes’ walk from Plaça de Catalunya and Las Ramblas. This stylish hotel features free Wi-Fi access.

Rooms at the Casa Elliot by Bondia Hotel Group feature contemporary décor and balconies or windows, while some also have large private terraces. Each room has a flat-screen TV and air conditioning.

Breakfast is served in the hotel’s buffet-style restaurant. Guests can make use of the Casa Elliot by Bondia Hotel Group’s library, lounge and tour desk.

The Casa Elliot by Bondia Hotel Group is under 200 metres from Universitat Metro Station and is a 10-minute walk from Passeig de Gràcia. El Prat Airport can be reached in 30 minutes, by bus.

Name: TSA La Rosa
Description:
TSA La Rosa is located in the Gràcia district of Barcelona, 600 metres from La Pedrera, 1.1 km from Casa Batllo and 1.4 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. It is set 200 metres from Passeig de Gracia and offers a lift. All rooms are fitted with a patio with inner courtyard views and free WiFi.

Every unit is fitted with air conditioning, a TV, washing machine, coffee machine and kitchen. Featuring a private bathroom with a shower and free toiletries, some units at the apartment complex also have a terrace. At the apartment complex, the units have bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Tivoli Theatre, Plaça Catalunya and Sagrada Familia. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 14 km from the property.

Name: Casa Bella Gracia by Aspasios
Description:
Casa Bella Gracia by Aspasios is less than 5 minutes’ walk from Passeig de Gràcia and Diagonal Avenue. This boutique hotel features 11 attractive rooms.

Our accommodation has been completely renewed in December 2023. The modern furnishings of the rooms, designed by interior design experts, and every detail have been carefully selected to offer you a unique experience during your stay in Barcelona.

Each room at Casa Bella Gracia by Aspasios has contemporary décor finished in sand colours. All rooms have air conditioning, a flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi, as well as a kettle, a coffee machine and a safety box, and there is a shared terrace available for all guests.


A range of cafés, bars and restaurants can be found in the surrounding Gràcia district. The charming squares at Plaza del Sol and Plaza de la Vila de Gràcia can be reached in 10 minutes by foot.

Diagonal Metro Station is just 400 metres away and is 3 stops from Plaza de Catalunya and Las Ramblas. Gaudí’s La Pedrera is less than 10 minutes’ walk from the Bella Gracia.

Name: Hotel 1898
Description:
Situated on Barcelona’s famous La Rambla, this restored 19th-century building features a rooftop pool with a sun terrace. The elegant rooms include free Wi-Fi and a marble bathroom.

The colonial-style Hotel 1898 has unique architectural and historical heritage which gives it the Speciality Monument status.

It features a stylish restaurant serving Mediterranean cuisine. It also offers a bar-restaurant with a terrace where guests can enjoy traditional tapas.

Plaza Catalunya is just 200 metres from 1898 Hotel. Guests can also walk to the Gothic Quarter with its cathedral in 10 minutes.

Name: Hotel Brick Barcelona
Description:
Located in Barcelona, 1.6 km from Palau Sant Jordi, Hotel Brick Barcelona features views of the city. Among the facilities at this property are a business centre and a concierge service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is non-smoking and is set 600 metres from Magic Fountain of Montjuic.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. All guest rooms feature a wardrobe.

Speaking Catalan, English, Spanish and French at the 24-hour front desk, staff are always on hand to help.

Sants Railway Station is 1.2 km from Hotel Brick Barcelona, while Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 2.8 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 10 km away.

Name: BCN Urbaness Hotels Bonavista
Description:
BCN Urbaness Hotels Bonavista is set in Barcelona, 400 metres from La Pedrera and less than 1 km from Casa Batllo. Among the facilities at this property are a 24-hour front desk and a tour desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The guest house has family rooms.

All rooms have a private bathroom, while some rooms also offer a balcony ( subject to availability) and others also have a city view.

Popular points of interest near the guest house include Passeig de Gracia, Sagrada Familia and Tivoli Theatre. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from BCN Urbaness Hotels Bonavista.

Name: Hotel Viladomat
Description:
Conveniently located less than 10 minutes’ walk from Hospital Clinic Metro Station, Hotel Viladomat is located in Barcelona. This property features free WiFi and an on-site bar.

Each room at this property is air conditioned and has satellite TV, safe, desk, and minibar. The private bathroom includes a bath, shower, hairdryer, and free toiletries.

Hotel Viladomat has a 24-hour front desk and offers a ticket service. A shuttle to the airport is available for an extra charge, and there is luggage storage on site.

Plaza Catalunya and Barcelona’s famous Las Ramblas are 20 minutes away by foot. The friendly staff are happy to provide information on the city and its main points of interest. Sants Station is 1 km away from Hotel Viladomat, with direct links to Barcelona Airport.

Name: Sant Antoni 4 · Downtown Barcelona. Modern
Description:
Situated in the centre of Barcelona, 1.3 km from Plaça Catalunya and 1.3 km from Portal de l'Angel, Sant Antoni 4 · Downtown Barcelona. Modern offers free WiFi and air conditioning. It is set 1.6 km from Tivoli Theatre and features a lift. The property is non-smoking and is located 1.6 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station.

The 1-bedroom apartment features a living room with a TV with cable channels, a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave and a toaster, and 1 bathroom with a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment.

There is a supermarket within the vicinity of the apartment.

Popular points of interest near Sant Antoni 4 · Downtown Barcelona. Modern include Passeig de Gracia, Boqueria Market and Magic Fountain of Montjuic. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km from the property.

Name: Leevin Student Barcelona
Description:
Leevin Student Barcelona in Barcelona provides adults-only accommodation with a garden, a shared lounge and a terrace. The property is around 2.8 km from Camp Nou, 3.2 km from Passeig de Gracia and 3.3 km from La Pedrera. The accommodation features a shared kitchen and free WiFi throughout the property.

At the hostel, rooms are equipped with a desk. At Leevin Student Barcelona the rooms have air conditioning and a private bathroom.

Sants Railway Station is 3.4 km from the accommodation, while Casa Batllo is 3.6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from Leevin Student Barcelona.

Name: Mercedes Heritage Apartments
Description:
Set in l’Eixample, Mercedes Heritage Apartments offers self-catering apartments in the centre of Barcelona, 2 km from Plaça de Catalunya. The Metro Stop Hospital Clinic is a 2-minute walk away.

Offering free Wi-Fi and a private bathroom with a bath or shower, apartments are spacious and modernly furnished. A fully equipped kitchenette with dishwasher and microwave is available, while superior apartments feature air conditioning.

La Rambla is a 25-minute bus ride from Mercedes Heritage Apartments, while Sagrada Familia is 4 Metro stops away.

Name: Garbi Millenni
Description:
Hotel Millenni is a boutique hotel set 50 metres from Paral.lel Metro Station. It features a small roof terrace with a hot tub and impressive city views. All rooms are stylish and offer free Wi-Fi.

Accommodation at the Millenni is brightly decorated. The climate-controlled rooms feature satellite TV and a fully equipped bathroom.

A buffet breakfast is served daily and there are several traditional bars and restaurants in the surrounding Raval district.

Guests can have access to the gym, the hot tub and the sauna. There are 2 computers which have internet access, as well as a small library with daily newspapers. There is also a lounge area where guests can watch the TV.

The famous Las Ramblas are just 10 minutes’ walk from the hotel. The funicular train to Montjuïc Castle leaves from the nearby Metro station.

Name: Pensión Casa Blanca
Description:
Pension Casa Blanca is centrally located beside Barcelona’s Jaume I Metro Station. Featuring basic décor, this guest house is 5 minutes’ walk from the Picasso Museum and the Cathedral.

Rooms offer flat-screen TV, air conditioning and private bathroom. Some of them have a seating area and a balcony. A paid private parking is available a few metres far from the property.

The central location means there are lots of restaurants, bars and shops nearby. The Ramblas is 5 minutes’ walk away. Barcelona Aquarium and Barceloneta Beach are 1km away and can be reached in 10 minutes by bus.

Name: Hostal Sans
Description:
Set on Plaza de Sants, Hostal Sans is a 5-minute walk from Sants Railway Station and just over 1 km from Plaza de Espanya. It offers rooms with TVs, and a 24-hour reception.

Each simply decorated room at Hostal Sans has air conditioning and heating.

Free WiFi is available in public areas, where there are vending machines. Restaurants, bars and cafés can be found in the surrounding Sants district.

Las Ramblas and Barcelona’s Gothic Quarter can be reached in just 10 minutes by Metro. The nearest beaches are a 30-minute bus journey away.

Name: Catalonia Sagrada Familia
Description:
A 15-minute walk from Gaudí's Sagrada Família, Catalonia Sagrada Familia is just 300 metres from Clot Metro and Train Station. It features a restaurant, a seasonal outdoor pool and a gym.

The Catalonia Sagrada Familia features traditional, bright décor and its rooms are have a desk, a mini fridge with complimentary water and a safety deposit box. Free Wi-Fi access is available.
All hotel rooms have smart TVs, which are equipped with Chromecast app.

The restaurant serves a range of Catalan and Mediterranean cuisine, as well as a buffet breakfast. The café-bar offers a selection of drinks and snacks throughout the day and there is also a bar.

Car hire is available on site, and staff at the Catalonia Sagrada Familia’s 24-hour reception can provide information on Barcelona and its many attractions. The hotel is 200 metres from the Torre Agbar Tower.

Clot Metro Station connects guests to the city centre in 4 stops and the airport train also stops here.

Name: Apart céntrico con terraza en Gracia
Description:
Apart céntrico con terraza en Gracia features a terrace and is located in Barcelona, within just 1.1 km of La Pedrera and 1.7 km of Casa Batllo. Guests staying at this apartment have access to a balcony. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Passeig de Gracia is less than 1 km away.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 1 bedroom, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. The property has an outdoor dining area.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Sagrada Familia and Park Güell. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from Apart céntrico con terraza en Gracia.

Name: Private room By El Born
Description:
Attractively located in the Ciutat Vella district of Barcelona, Private room By El Born is situated 1.3 km from Barceloneta Beach, 1.4 km from Sant Miquel Beach and 300 metres from Santa Maria del Mar. The property is set less than 1 km from Palau de la Musica Catalana, a 17-minute walk from Tivoli Theatre and less than 1 km from Cathedral of Barcelona. The property is 1.1 km from the city centre and 1.3 km from Somorrostro Beach.

All rooms have a shared bathroom, a hairdryer and bed linen.

Popular points of interest near the hostel include Picasso Museum, Plaça Reial and Passeig de Gracia. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from Private room By El Born.

Name: Abba Sants
Description:
Abba Sants Hotel is conveniently located a 5-minute walk from Barcelona’s main train station and Sants Estació Metro Station. It offers modern, soundproofed rooms with air conditioning and satellite TV.

The high-speed AVE Train leaves from the main Sants Train Station, and there are direct trains to Barcelona Airport. The tourist bus stops there, and you can take the Metro into the centre in 10 minutes.

Mediterranean specialties are included in the cuisine served at the Abba Sants’s restaurant. There is also a bar, and packed lunches can be requested.

The Abba Sants has a 24-hour front desk and offers free WiFi in rooms and public areas. You can hire a car at the tour desk, and parking is available nearby for an additional charge.

Name: Gaudi Hotel
Description:
Just 50 metres from Barcelona's famous Las Ramblas, Gaudi Hotel features a Rooftop Terrace with views of Palau Güell and the city. Free WiFi is available.

This hotel is 300 metres from Liceu Metro Station, and many of the city's attractions can be reached on foot. Boqueria Market is 450 metres away, while the Port and Gothic Quartier are a 10-minute walk away.

All rooms at Gaudi Hotel have free Wi-Fi, air conditioning, a private bathroom and a TV. They also have wooden floor and some have excellent views of the city or Palau Güell.

The Gaudi Hotel's restaurant serves American Buffet breakfast. There is also a Bar on site.

This hotel has a 24-hour Reception and Parking is available next to the hotel.

Name: BBarcelona Gràcia Nova Flat
Description:
Set in Barcelona, 1.4 km from Sagrada Familia and 1.5 km from Passeig de Gracia, BBarcelona Gràcia Nova Flat offers air conditioning. It is situated 2.4 km from Casa Batllo and provides a lift. The property is non-smoking and is located 1.8 km from La Pedrera.

With free WiFi, this 2-bedroom apartment offers a flat-screen TV, a washing machine and a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and microwave. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment.

Park Güell is 1.6 km from the apartment, while Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 2.9 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from BBarcelona Gràcia Nova Flat.

Name: Hotel Alguer Camp Nou
Description:
Hotel L’Alguer Nou is situated just 500 metres from FC Barcelona’s Camp Nou Stadium and 220 metres from Collblanc Metro Station. This family-run hotel offers a bar, lounge and 24-hour reception.

Rooms at the L’Alguer Nou Hotel are simple and functional, with tiled floors. Each room comes with a TV and a private bathroom. The rooms have air conditioning in summer and central heating in winter.

Hotel L’Alguer Nou serves a daily breakfast consisting of a buffet of cold and hot dishes.

Collblanc Metro Station takes you to Barcelona Aiport in 30 minutes. L'Alguer Nou is a 20-minute walk from the campus of Barcelona University. Sants Train Station is a 10-minute bus ride away, and regular bus services stop within 200 metres of the hotel.

Name: Hotel Balmoral
Description:
Hotel Balmoral is within 5 minutes' walk of Barcelona’s Diagonal Metro Station and Passeig de Gràcia boulevard. This boutique hotel offers free access to its wellness area and free Wi-Fi.

Each modern, air-conditioned room at the Balmoral Hotel Barcelona features elegant, functional design. All rooms come with a flat-screen TV and a minibar.

The hotel has a small wellness area with a sauna, experience shower and fitness machines. It also includes massage cabins and a sun terrace.

Guests receive a free welcome drink between 12:00 and 18:00. You can enjoy a drink in the hotel’s bar, or try bars and restaurants in the popular Gràcia district, a 5-minute walk away. In the morning, a breakfast buffet is served in the hotel.

Hotel Balmoral Barcelona has a TV lounge where you can enjoy sports events on the big screen. There are also 2 computers with internet access.

Gaudí's famous La Pedrera is just a 5-minute walk from the hotel, and the iconic Sagrada Família is 2 km away. Nearby bus and metro connections offer direct access to Plaça Catalunya, the historic city centre and to FC Barcelona's Camp Nou Stadium. Private parking is available in the hotel at an extra cost.

Name: Castro Exclusive Residences Sant Pau
Description:
Located in Horta-Guinardó, a quiet residential neighbourhood just 15 minutes’ walk from Sagrada Família, Castro Exclusive Residences Sant Pau offers fully-equipped accommodation with free Wi-Fi. An ecological car rental service is also available.

All bright, air-conditioned apartments feature a modern décor with parquet floors, modern furnishings and LED lighting. Each is equipped with a flat-screen satellite TV, an iPod dock and a washing machine. They overlook the street or an interior patio.

You will find plenty of small shops and restaurants within less than 5 minutes walk of Castro Exclusive Residences Sant Pau.

You can borrow films and music from the apartment complex’s multimedia library. Here you will also find 2 flat-screen TVs with a surround sound system.

Guinardó Park is just a 10-minute walk away and Park Güell can be reached in 30 minutes on foot. Hospital de Sant Pau metro station is just 100 metres away

A parking place is available upon request .

Name: Nordic Apartment II Sagrada Familia
Description:
Offering inner courtyard views, Nordic Apartment II Sagrada Familia is an accommodation situated in Barcelona, 1 km from Sagrada Familia and 2.5 km from La Pedrera. Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the property and private parking is available on site. The accommodation features a lift, and organising tours for guests.

The 2-bedroom apartment has a living room with a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. This apartment is allergy-free and non-smoking.

Passeig de Gracia is 2.7 km from the apartment, while Casa Batllo is 3 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 16 km from Nordic Apartment II Sagrada Familia.

Name: Praktik Rambla
Description:
Situated on the central, tree-lined Rambla Catalunya, this boutique hotel is set in a stunning 19th-century palace. It maintains authentic features such as Baroque-style columns and colourful ceramic floors.

The chic rooms at the Praktik Rambla feature a minimalist design and come with air conditioning. They also include free Wi-Fi and a private bathroom, decorated with striking green tiles.

The hotel offers a terrace with comfortable sofas where guests can relax. From June to September, free fruit juice is served on the terrace from 16:00 to 20:00 every day.

Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 200 metres away from the Praktik Rambla. Barcelona’s famous Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas are a 5-minute walk away. The hotel is surrounded by restaurants, bars and shops.

Name: Apartamento al lado de Sagrada Familia
Description:
Apartamento al lado de Sagrada Familia features a balcony and is located in Barcelona, within just 400 metres of Sagrada Familia and 1.9 km of La Pedrera. It is situated 2.6 km from Casa Batllo and provides a lift. This pet-friendly apartment also has free WiFi.

This apartment comes with 2 bedrooms, a kitchen with an oven and a microwave, a flat-screen TV, a seating area and 1 bathroom equipped with a shower. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Passeig de Gracia is 2.8 km from the apartment, while Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 3.1 km away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 15 km from the property.

Name: Catalonia Albeniz
Description:
Catalonia Albeniz offers spacious, air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi and satellite TV. It is situated 150 metres from Clot Train Station, and a 15-minute walk from Gaudí’s Sagrada Familia Church.

The property has a gym and an outdoor pool. You can also use the luggage storage facility on site at the Albeniz.

The varied buffet breakfast at the Catalonia Albeniz includes typical local dishes, such as potato omelette and bread with tomato.

The Albeniz offers bright, modern rooms with simple décor and wooden floors. Each room includes a minibar and a marble bathroom with a hair dryer, plus a safe. All hotel rooms have smart TVs, which are equipped with Chromecast app.

Catalonia Albeniz is just 700 metres from the shops and restaurants of Glòries Shopping Centre, while Encants Flea Market is a 5-minute walk away. Metro services and direct airport trains are available from nearby Clot Station.

Name: Holiday Inn Express Barcelona City 22@, an IHG Hotel
Description:
Friendly Barcelona Hotel with free WiFi, free Continental Buffet Breakfast and easy access to the beach and city sights.

Holiday Inn Express® Barcelona City 22@ hotel is located in the hip 22@Barcelona business zone, formerly an industrial district of Poblenou. Llacuna Metro Station is four minutes walk from the hotel. The B-10, also known as Ronda Litoral, Coastal Ring Road is minutes away by car and on-site parking is available. It’s a 25-minute drive to Barcelona El Prat Airport (BCN). Unwind on Mar Bella Beach, a short stroll from the hotel. On the nearby Rambla del Poblenou, restaurants offering catalan and international food are popular.

Barcelona attractions, like Sagrada Familia and Park Guell, are within easy reach by public transportation. Westfield Glories Mall is only 10 minutes walking from our door and Diagonal Mar Mall less than 10 minutes away by taxi.

Bright, colourful guest rooms offer free WiFi to keep you connected.
Enjoy our family rooms with double bed and sofa bed available for a max. of 2 adults and 2 children.
Get set for the day with an Express Start Breakfast buffet free to all our guests.
In the evening, simply step outside the door to experience Barcelona's lively night out.

Name: Barcelona Central Apartments
Description:
Barcelona Central Apartments is set in the Eixample district of Barcelona, 700 metres from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, 1 km from Casa Batllo and 800 metres from Tivoli Theatre. The air-conditioned accommodation is 2.8 km from Somorrostro Beach. The property is 2.7 km from Barceloneta Beach, and within less than 1 km of the city centre.

Featuring a private bathroom, units at the apartment complex also have free WiFi, while selected rooms will provide you with a balcony.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Passeig de Gracia, Palau de la Musica Catalana and La Pedrera. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from Barcelona Central Apartments.

Name: Cosmo Apartments Rambla Catalunya
Description:
Featuring soundproofed rooms and free WiFi, Cosmo Apartments Rambla Catalunya is located in central Barcelona, only 6 minutes on foot from Plaça Catalunya Square.

These modern and bright apartments come with 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms. The kitchenette includes oven, dishwasher, a microwave and a coffee machine and the living area has a sofa and a flat-screen TV.  Bed linen and towels are provided.

Guests can order gourmet food baskets upon arrival.
Guests will find many bars, restaurants and shops in the lively and central Rambla de Catalunya. The closest supermarket is just 500 metres away.

Barcelona’s La Rambla Street is 600 metres from the property and Gaudi’s Casa Batlló building is a 3-minute walk away. The apartment is just 200 metres from Paseo de Gracia Boulevard and its metro and train station, with direct connection with El Prat Airport.

Name: Hola Hostal Eixample
Description:
Located a 15-minute walk from Plaza Catalunya, Hola Hostal Eixample offers a sun terrace, a private bar, a 24-hour reception and stylish air-conditioned dormitories with free Wi-Fi. Barcelona Nord Bus Station is 500 metres away.

Each spacious dormitory at the Hola Eixample hostel features bright modern décor and individual storage lockers. Sheets and blankets are included, while towels are available to rent. Some rooms have a private bathroom.

Hola Hostal Eixample is just a 10-minute walk from the Born district, where you can find charming shops, bars and restaurants. Sagrada Familia Church and Ciutadella Park are within a 15-minute walk.

Tetuan and Girona Metro Stations are both a 5-minute walk from the hostel, and offer direct connections to the city centre and beach. Nearby Barcelona Nord Bus Station offers airport buses and international services.

Name: Inside Barcelona Apartments Mercat
Description:
Situated next to Ciutadella Park, Inside Barcelona Apartments Mercat are a 15-minute walk from Las Ramblas and a 15-minute stroll from the city’s beaches. Barceloneta and Jaume I Metro Stations are both 650 metres away.

Each Inside Barcelona Apartments Mercat apartment has wooden flooring and elegant, functional design. They all include a kitchen with an oven, dishwasher, washer-dryer and n´espresso machine.

The streets around the Apartments Mercat are full of shops and bars, while the popular seafood restaurants of Barceloneta are just a 10-minute walk away.

Inside Barcelona Apartments Mercat are a 15-minute walk from Las Ramblas and a 15-minute stroll from the city’s beaches. Barceloneta and Jaume I Metro Stations are both 650 metres away.

Staff at reception can help organice your trip to Barcelona.

Name: Best House Best Place
Description:
Situated in central Barcelona, a 3-minute walk from Jaume I Metro Station, Best House Best Place offers apartments with air conditioning, heating, and free WiFi.

These modern apartments include a living area with a flat-screen TV. The adjoining kitchen is equipped with an oven, dishwasher, and washing machine. Some apartments have a small balcony.

Each apartment has a private bathroom with a shower, hairdryer, and free toiletries. Towels and bed linen are provided.

The property is situated in the lively Borne area, famous for its restaurants, bars, and artisan shops. La Rambla is 900 metres away and a 15-minute walk takes you to Barceloneta Beach.

Name: Hostal Las Flores Ramblas
Description:
This central guest house is on Barcelona’s Las Ramblas, beside Liceu Metro Station, and 50 metres from La Boqueria Market. It offers air-conditioned rooms, with free Wi-Fi and flat-screen TVs.

Public parking is available near the Hostal Las Flores Ramblas, but the great location means the city’s main tourist sites can be visited on foot.

Barcelona Cathedral is a 5-minute walk away, and Gaudi’s Sagrada Familia can be reached in 10 minutes by Metro or bus.

Las Flores has a 24-hour front desk, allowing you to make the most of central Barcelona’s lively night life. There is also a tour desk, and luggage storage is possible.

Name: TSA La Rambla
Description:
TSA La Rambla is a recently renovated apartment in the centre of Barcelona, 2 km from Barceloneta Beach and 2.1 km from Sant Sebastian Beach. The property features city views and is 2.1 km from Sant Miquel Beach and 1.1 km from Plaça Catalunya. The accommodation provides a lift, private check-in and check-out and organising tours for guests.

Accommodation is fitted with air conditioning, a fully equipped kitchen, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with shower, a hair dryer and free toiletries. Free WiFi is available to all guests, while selected rooms include a terrace. At the apartment complex, all units have bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Portal de l'Angel, Tivoli Theatre and Palau de la Musica Catalana. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from TSA La Rambla.

Name: Suite Home Sagrada Familia
Description:
Situated on tree-lined Gaudí Avenue, Suite Home Barcelona is just 250 metres from the Sagrada Familia cathedral. Some apartments offer views of Barcelona’s famous monument. Free WiFi is available.

All air-conditioned apartments have parquet flooring. The living and dining area is equipped with a flat-screen TV.  A safe is also provided. All apartments are different, there may be 2 complete bathrooms or 1 complete bathroom + 1 extra shower + 1 extra toilet. Classic apartment is the only one that has 1 complete bathroom + 1 extra shower.

The kitchen features a stovetop, an oven, a dishwasher and a microwave. A washing machine and ironing facilities are also included.

Suite Home Sagrada Familia is within walking distance to several cafés, restaurants and supermarkets.

Name: ME Barcelona
Description:
Conveniently located in the centre of Barcelona, ME Barcelona offers air-conditioned rooms, a terrace, free WiFi and a restaurant. This 5-star hotel offers a bar. The hotel provides an outdoor swimming pool, nightclub and room service.

All guest rooms at the hotel come with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a safety deposit box. All rooms are fitted with a private bathroom with free toiletries, while some boast city views. All units will provide guests with a wardrobe and a coffee machine.

ME Barcelona offers a buffet or continental breakfast.

Speaking Catalan, German, English and Spanish at the 24-hour front desk, staff are willing to help at any time of the day.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Tivoli Theatre, Palau de la Musica Catalana and Passeig de Gracia. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km from the property, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: Fisa Rentals Les Corts Apartments
Description:
These stylish modern apartments offer free Wi-Fi and well-equipped kitchens. Sants Train Station is just a 10-minute walk away, while Entença Metro Station is 450 metres away.

Offering minimalist décor, each bright, air-conditioned Fisa Rentals apartment has a living room with flat-screen cable TV. Kitchens include a washing machine, microwave and coffee maker. Some apartments have terraces with city views, available on request and subject to availability.

A range of bars and supermarkets can be found in the streets around the Fisa Rentals Les Corts Apartments. L’Illa Diagonal Shopping Centre is around 600 metres away.

Buses to the city centre stop within a 5-minute walk of the apartments. FC Barcelona’s Camp Nou Stadium can be reached in 20 minutes on foot, or in 5 minutes by bus or Metro.

Name: Hotel Sant Pau
Description:
The Hotel Sant Pau has an ideal setting overlooking the UNESCO World Heritage Site of Hotel Sant Pau Hospital. This hotel offers comfortable rooms with free Wi-Fi access.

The Amrey's rooms are spacious and well-equipped. Each air-conditioned room has satellite TV and a hairdryer in the bathroom. Some rooms offer views of Hotel Sant Pau.

A buffet breakfast is served in the hotel’s dining room. Guests can enjoy a drink or snack in the café-bar.

The Amrey is just 10 minutes’ walk from Gaudí’s Sagrada Familia church. The nearest Metro station, just 300 metres away, connects guests to the centre of Barcelona and Las Ramblas in 15 minutes.

Name: Hotel Vilamarí
Description:
