Hotel Vilamarí is set 250 metres from Plaza de Espanya Metro Station and the Fira de Barcelona Exhibition Centre. This hotel features a terrace and a small gym with Turkish Bath.

The Vilamarí’s rooms have simple, elegant décor and dark wood furniture. Each room includes flat-screen satellite TV. The stylish bathrooms come with amenities and a hairdryer. The hotel features centrally controlled air conditioned or heating depending on the season.

Barcelona’s MNAC Art Museum and the Magic Fountains are within a 10-minute walk of the hotel. Las Arenas Shopping Centre is just 200 metres away. Barcelona Port is a 15-minute metro ride away and Barcelona Beach can be reached in 35 minutes.

Name: Oriente Atiram
Description:
The Atiram Oriente is located on Las Ramblas, between the Liceu Theatre and the Columbus Monument. Set in a 19th-century building, this hotel features a restaurant, terrace and free Wi-Fi.

All rooms have satellite TV and an en suite bathroom with a hairdryer. Each has simple, contemporary décor with heating and air conditioning.

The hotel’s pretty restaurant serves buffet cuisine and a daily continental breakfast. There is a 24-hour reception and a tour desk. The Atiram Oriente Barcelona also has a café on the Ramblas, close to many shops and restaurants.

The famous Boquería Market and Gothic Quarter are just a few minutes’ walk from the Hotel Atiram Oriente. Barcelona’s Port Vell is less than 500 metres away and Liceu Metro Station is 1 minute walk from the hotel.

Name: Musik Boutique Hotel
Description:
This modern hotel is centrally located 5 minutes’ walk from Barcelona’s Urquinaona Metro Station and 400 metres from the Palau de la Musica. It offers 24-hour reception and free Wi-Fi.

The air-conditioned rooms at Musik Boutique Hotel feature an iPod docking station, flat-screen satellite TV and a safe. They are sound-proofed and have a private bathroom with a hairdryer and free toiletries. Some rooms have a balcony.

Breakfast is available and you will find many shops, bars and restaurants within a short walk. The Ramblas is a 10-minute walk away and you can reach Barceloneta Beach in 10 minutes by bus or metro.

Name: Hotel Lyon
Description:
Set in the traditional, fishing district of Barceloneta, next to the central city beach. This hotel provides value and practical accommodation, ideal for those travelling on a budget.

After a hearty breakfast, head out along the impressive Barcelona beachfront. Stop for a morning coffee or a bite to eat, next to the waterfront. Here you can spend the day strolling around this charming neighbourhood, or you can walk into the Gothic Quarter, or the popular Born neighbourhood – 5 minutes’ walk away.

This hotel has a small social lounge, where you can sit and read, or chat with friends or fellow guests.

Name: BcnStop Sant Pau Suites
Description:
Situated within 3 km of Nova Icaria Beach and less than 1 km of Sagrada Familia, BcnStop Sant Pau Suites features rooms with air conditioning and a private bathroom in Barcelona. Among the facilities at this property are a lift and private check-in and check-out, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The aparthotel has family rooms.

All units include a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a fully equipped kitchen, a dining area, and a private bathroom fiitted with a hair dryer, while some units feature a terrace or a balcony. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also offered, as well as a coffee machine. At the aparthotel, units have bed linen and towels.

Sightseeing tours are available in the vicinity of the property.

La Pedrera is 2.7 km from the aparthotel, while Casa Batllo is 2.9 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 16 km away.

Name: Penthouse Pza España - 4th Floor
Description:
Set in Barcelona, 1 km from Magic Fountain of Montjuic and 800 metres from Sants Railway Station, Penthouse Pza España - 4th Floor offers air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. This recently renovated apartment is located 2.9 km from Casa Batllo and 3.2 km from Palau Sant Jordi. Camp Nou is 3.3 km from the apartment and Plaça Catalunya is 3.3 km away.

The apartment with a terrace and mountain views features 1 bedroom, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a microwave and a toaster, and 1 bathroom with a bath. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. The property has an outdoor dining area.

Guests can also relax in the garden.

Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 3.4 km from the apartment, while Passeig de Gracia is 3.4 km away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 10 km from the property.

Name: Evenia Rossello
Description:
Evenia Rossello is conveniently situated 5 minutes’ walk from the stylish Paseo de Gracia Boulevard and includes a gym. The modern rooms feature wooden floors and free internet connection.

The contemporary L'Illa del Rosselló restaurant serves Mediterranean cuisine. Guests can also enjoy tapas on the terrace, set in small gardens called Placeta Joan Brossa.

Evenia Rossello’s tour desk can provide useful information on the city and arrange car rental. A luggage storage service is also available.

Diagonal Metro Station is 400 metres away and offers direct access to Barcelona city centre. Barcelona Airport is 12 km away.

Name: Hostal Balmes Centro
Description:
Hostal Balmes Centro offers 24-hour reception with tourist information service, free WiFi and free luggage storage. It is located 5 minutes’ walk from Barcelona’s Paseo de Gracia Boulevard and from one of Gaudi's masterpieces, la Pedrera.

All rooms at Hostal Balmes Centro have a flat-screen TV, a wardrobe and a fridge. Rooms come with double or twin beds, and a private or shared bathroom with bath or shower. Free toiletries and a hairdryer are provided.

 You can find numerous restaurants and bars with traditional tapas in the surrounding area.

Car hire, bicycle rental and tours can be organized at Hostal Balmes Centro’s tour desk. Plaza Catalunya Square and Ramblas can be reached in 10 minutes’ walk and Casa Batlló House and Museum is 500 metres away.

Barcelona El Prat Airport is 17 minutes’ drive away. Regular airport trains leave from a train station located just 550 metres away.

Name: GORGEOUS APARTMENT IN DOWNTOWN
Description:
In the Eixample district of Barcelona, close to Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, GORGEOUS APARTMENT IN DOWNTOWN has free WiFi and a washing machine. The property is close to several well-known attractions, 1.4 km from Plaça Catalunya, 1.6 km from Boqueria Market and 1.8 km from Sants Railway Station. The property is non-smoking and is situated 1.6 km from Tivoli Theatre.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 1 bedroom, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Guests at the apartment will be able to enjoy activities in and around Barcelona, like windsurfing.

Popular points of interest near GORGEOUS APARTMENT IN DOWNTOWN include Casa Batllo, Passeig de Gracia and Portal de l'Angel. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km from the property.

Name: Catalonia Diagonal Centro
Description:
Catalonia Diagonal Centro is set in the heart of Barcelona’s Eixample district, 300 metres from Diagonal Metro Station. It features a seasonal outdoor pool and free Wi-Fi throughout the hotel.

At the Catalonia Diagonal Centro, you can enjoy modern, comfortable accommodation next to some of Barcelona’s most popular sights. All hotel rooms have smart TVs, which are equipped with Chromecast app

Only 300 metres away on Passeig de Gràcia is La Pedrera, one of Gaudi’s famous creations. Take a stroll past the Modernista buildings to reach Plaça Catalunya and the lively Ramblas area.

Back at the hotel, relax in your stylish bedroom with contemporary wooden furniture and marble en suite bathroom. Watch satellite television or take advantage of the free wireless internet connection.

A short stroll from the hotel takes you to trendy Gràcia, with its bohemian shops and leafy squares, and a huge selection of bars and restaurants. Nearby metro and bus lines make it easy to see the whole of this cosmopolitan city.

Name: Hotel Brummell
Description:
Hotel Brummell is a 20-room boutique hotel located a few steps from the Miró Foundation and The Grec theatre. Guests will benefit from free and unlimited yoga classes. A running club, for both guests and locals, is organized regularly.

The hotel features an outdoor pool, a garden and a sauna. T-training and boxing session are hosted at the well-being center The Loft.

All rooms boast modern furniture and artwork by young European designers. Each one is equipped with a safe, coffee and tea facilities and a yoga mat. The private bathroom has a rain shower, a high-powered hairdryer and free toiletries by MMLL. Suites have a private, furnished terrace with an outdoor bath.

FUNKY, Hotel Brummell’s new restaurant, offers a delightful eatery concept. An in-house bakery prepares a daily breakfast with a selection of oven-baked croissant and breads, local cheeses, olives, charcuteries, mató and honeycomb, Funky’s granola, whipped butter and house jam, seasonal fresh fruits and veggies, accompanied by a soft boiled egg. Pair your treats with their Nomad Filter Coffee, and experience the perfect harmony of flavors in a cozy, inviting atmosphere.

Hotel Brummell is just a 15-minute walk from La Rambla and the closest metro station is Parallel Metro Station, 250 m away.

For guests who wish to explore the sights of Barcelona, Montjuïc is known for its parks and gardens and is within 10 minutes' walk. There is free WiFi available throughout.

Name: Hotel del Mar
Description:
Hotel del Mar is set in a listed building just 800 metres from the seafront and Barceloneta Metro Station. It is a 5-minute walk from the trendy Born neighbourhood and Ciutadella Park.

The air-conditioned rooms at Hotel del Mar have flat-screen satellite TV. There is a private bathroom with a hairdryer and amenities, and some rooms have a private balcony. A safe is also available with a surcharge.

Hotel del Mar has a 24-hour front desk. Barcelona’s França Train Station is a 5-minute walk away, and you can walk to Barcelona Cathedral and Maremagnum Shopping Centre in 10 minutes. Parking is available 5 minutes' walk from the property.

Name: catapor habitaciones para familias
Description:
Situated in Barcelona, 2.4 km from Sant Miquel Beach and 200 metres from the centre, catapor habitaciones para familias features air-conditioned accommodation with free WiFi, and a garden. This recently renovated guest house is located 2.5 km from Somorrostro Beach and 2.5 km from Barceloneta Beach. Rooms include a terrace with garden views.

At the guest house, every unit is fitted with a patio. A microwave and fridge are also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. All units have a private bathroom, a hair dryer and bed linen.

Popular points of interest near the guest house include Plaça Catalunya, Portal de l'Angel and Passeig de Gracia. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km from the property.

Name: Apartment Eixample Dret Sagrada Familia by Interhome
Description:
Located in Barcelona, 500 metres from Sagrada Familia and 2.3 km from Casa Batllo, Apartment Eixample Dret Sagrada Familia by Interhome offers air conditioning. This 3-star apartment offers a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Nova Icaria Beach is 2.7 km away.

The apartment features 1 bedroom, a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower.

La Pedrera is 2 km from the apartment, while Passeig de Gracia is 2.8 km away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 15 km from the property.

Name: Bonanova Park
Description:
This family-run hotel is located 700 metres from the Politècnica de Catalunya University and Palau Reial Gardens. Bonanova Park offers air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi and flat-screen satellite TV.

Each room at the Bonanova Park has a simple, functional design. Rooms come with a CD player, minibar (drinks and snacks not included) and private bathroom with a hairdryer.

A varied buffet breakfast served in the Bonanova Park’s breakfast room. There are also numerous bars and restaurants in the charming Sarria neighbourhood, a 10-minute walk away.

Hotel Bonanova Park is around 1 km from L’Illa Diagonal Shopping Centre, and a 15-minute walk from FC Barcelona’s Camp Nou Stadium. Maria Cristina Metro Station is 500 metres away, and offers direct links to the city centre and to the Palau de Congressos Conference Centre, 2 stops away.

Private parking can be found near the hotel.

Name: Hotel Best Auto Hogar
Description:
Set on Parallel Avenue, Hotel Auto Hogar is just opposite Parallel Metro Station and 10 minutes’ walk from the Ramblas. It offers air-conditioned rooms with private bathrooms.

All rooms include a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and vanity mirror.

Some of Barcelona’s most popular theatres can be found within 5 minutes’ walk, while Montjuïc hill is 15 minutes' walk from the hotel. The Fira Exhibition Centre is just over 1 km away.

The Auto Hogar Hotel’s restaurant serves Mediterranean dishes, and is open 7 days a week. The hotel also has a café.

The hotel reception offers free newspapers, and can arrange bicycle and car hire.

Name: Abba Garden
Description:
This modern hotel is situated on the northern edge of the city of Barcelona, near Avinguda Diagonal and Barcelona FC's famous stadium, Camp Nou. Guests have free access to the seasonal outdoor pool and the gym . Free WiFi is offered throughout the property.

The exterior facing rooms feature a flat-screen TV, minibar, and a safe. The bathroom comes with free toiletries, bath, and hairdryer.

Stroll around the gardens of the Abba Garden Hotel. There is also a paddle court, so you can play a quick game.

Grab a bite to eat in the snack bar in the evening - complete with terrace.

Zona Universitaria Metro Station that takes you to the Barcelona city centre is a 10-minute walk away. Metro Line 9 is a 13-minute walk away and it takes you to the airport within 15 minutes and to La Fira within 30 minutes.

Name: NH Barcelona Diagonal Center
Description:
This design hotel is situated 15 minutes’ from the beach, in the 22@ business area of Barcelona’s Poble Nou district. Bogatell Metro Station, 350 metres away, connects with central Barcelona in 25 minutes.

The modern rooms at NH Barcelona Diagonal Center feature a flat-screen satellite TV, desk, minibar and safe. The private bathroom comes with free toiletries and a hairdryer.

The hotel serves a buffet breakfast.

You will find cafés and restaurants on Poblenou Rambla, 10 minutes’ walk away. Glòries Shopping Centre is also within a 10-minute walk.

This NH hotel features a 24-hour reception desk and a business centre. Rooms and facilities are adapted for disabled guests. There is free Wi-Fi throughout.

Barcelona Airport is about 18 km away, while CCIB Convention Centre is 3km away. Car rental is available at the hotel and private parking is available at an additional cost.

Name: Super Balmes Guest House
Description:
Super Balmes Guest House is located in Barcelona city center, 2 minutes' walk from Plaza Catalunya Square. Free Wi-Fi access is available.

The Guest House offers private rooms in shared apartments located in different building of the same central area.

They all come with a flat-screen TV and have a shared or private bathroom. Bed linen and towels are included. All apartments have a fully equipped kitchen for guests’ use and a shared lounge with sofas.

There are plenty of bars and restaurants within walking distances. Regular airport buses leave from a bus stop located within 10-minute walk.

The pictures at the top of this page are a selection of the different rooms and apartments located in the Barcelona City Center area. Please select a date and click on the room type to see the pictures of the individual apartments.

Name: Catalonia Castellnou
Description:
Catalonia Castellnou offers free Wi-Fi, a 24-hour reception and bright, air-conditioned rooms with satellite TV. It is located 250 metres from Tres Torres Underground Station, in a quiet residential area.

There are many cafés, bars and restaurants within a 10-minute walk, in the centre of Sarrià.

Hotel Catalonia Castellnou is close to some of Barcelona’s most important medical centres, including Clínica IVI, Clínica Corachan and Fertilab.

The Castellnou offers easy access to the C32 Ring Road and Vallvidrera Tunnel. It is within a 15-minute train journey of central Barcelona, and less than 2 km from FC Barcelona’s Camp Nou Stadium.Diagonal Avenue, with El Corte Ingles Department Store and two shopping centres, is a 10-minute walk away. Real Club de Tenis Barcelona is 15-minute walk away.

Name: Hostal Mont Thabor
Description:
This comfortable guest house is set on Las Ramblas, 50 metres from the Boqueria Market. It offers free Wi-Fi and, 24-hour reception and cosy rooms with a TV, 1 minutes’ walk from Liceu Metro Station.

Hostal Mont Thabor’s bright rooms feature modern décor and some include a balcony, in some cases, overlooking Las Ramblas. Bathrooms are shared or private.

The property offers free passes to nightclubs and has a comfortable TV lounge and computer. There is a gift shop on the ground floor and several bars, restaurants and shops within 5 minutes’ walk.

The property is within 5 minutes’ walk of Barcelona Cathedral and Plaza Real. The MACBA Contemporary Art Museum is 600 metres away and chic Passeig de Gracia is 10 minutes’ walk away.

The Mont Thabor is 10 minutes’ walk from the port. You can catch a direct bus to Barcelona El Prat Airport from plaza Catalunya, 500 metres away.

Name: Hostal Benidorm
Description:
Situated on Barcelona’s famous Las Ramblas, Hostal Benidorm offers free Wi-Fi, 24-hour reception and air-conditioned rooms with satellite TV. Liceu Metro Station is just 200 metres away.

Each room at the Benidorm Hostal features simple décor and tiled floors. All rooms have central heating and a private bathroom.

Drinks and snacks are available from vending machines in the Benidorm’s reception area. Staff at the front desk can provide information about the city and arrange car or bicycle rental.

Hostal Benidorm is located just outside the historic Gothic Quarter. Gaudi’s Palau Güell is 100 metres away, while the Boqueria Market is within 400 metres. Barceloneta Beach can be reached in 25 minutes’ walk or a 10-minute bus.

Name: Catalonia Mikado
Description:
This elegant hotel is situated in the exclusive Sarrià area and has a garden terrace with an outdoor pool and hot tub. It offers functional, air-conditioned rooms with satellite TV, a mini fridge with complimentary water and free Wi-Fi.

The Catalonia Mikado's restaurant serves breakfast and evening meals, specializing in international dishes. There is also a bar. Only 500 metres away, the charming centre of Sarrià is famous for its cake shops.

The Catalonia Mikado is within a 10-minute walk of Ramon Llull University and the International University of Catalonia. It is also well located for some of Barcelona's most important medical centres, including the Teknon Centre and IMO and the Institut Catalá de la Retina.

Sarrià Train Station is just 10 minutes’ walk away. From here you can get to central Barcelona in 5 minutes.

Name: ClassBedroom Barcelona Beach Apartments
Description:
These apartments without elevator access are located in the district of Barceloneta, surrounded by seafood restaurants and set beside the city’s sandy beaches.

ClassBedroom Barcelona Beach Apartments can accommodate 2 people per apartment.  They allow families and groups of friends to enjoy independent accommodation in the heart of The Catalan capital.

The apartment's location is near to train, metro and bus services, meaning that you can easily visit the many cultural sights of this inspiring city. Las Ramblas and the lively district of El Born are only a few minutes walk away.

This historic fishing district is also a short distance from the Olympic Port.

Name: Terrace Duplex at SAGRADA FAMILIA-GRACIA
Description:
Situated in Barcelona, 1.1 km from Sagrada Familia and 1.5 km from Passeig de Gracia, Terrace Duplex at SAGRADA FAMILIA-GRACIA features air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. The property is located 2.4 km from Casa Batllo, 1.7 km from Park Güell and 2.9 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. The property is non-smoking and is set 1.8 km from La Pedrera.

The spacious apartment with a terrace and city views has 1 bedroom, a living room, a TV, an equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, and 1 bathroom with a shower. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. The property has an outdoor dining area.

Tivoli Theatre is 3 km from the apartment, while Palau de la Musica Catalana is 3.2 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 15 km away.

Name: Habitacion privada en PISO COMPARTIDO Lepanto
Description:
Attractively located in the Eixample district of Barcelona, Habitacion privada en PISO COMPARTIDO Lepanto is located 2.3 km from Casa Batllo, 1.8 km from La Pedrera and 1.9 km from Passeig de Gracia. The property is around 2.8 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, 2.9 km from Tivoli Theatre and 3.1 km from Palau de la Musica Catalana. The property is non-smoking and is situated 300 metres from Sagrada Familia.

At the hostel, each room is equipped with a desk. Featuring a shared bathroom with a shower and free toiletries, rooms at Habitacion privada en PISO COMPARTIDO Lepanto also feature free WiFi, while some rooms have a city view. At the accommodation the rooms include bed linen and towels.

Plaça Catalunya is 3.4 km from Habitacion privada en PISO COMPARTIDO Lepanto, while Portal de l'Angel is 3.7 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 15 km away.

Name: BBarcelona Urban Apartments
Description:
Located in the centre of Barcelona, 1.4 km from Casa Batllo and less than 1 km from Passeig de Gracia, BBarcelona Urban Apartments offers free WiFi and air conditioning. This recently renovated apartment is located 1 km from La Pedrera and 1.9 km from Plaça Catalunya. Staff on-site can arrange a shuttle service.

Each unit is equipped with a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a washing machine, and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. All units are equipped with a coffee machine, while selected rooms are fitted with a terrace and others also offer city views. At the apartment complex, every unit includes bed linen and towels.

Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 1.7 km from the apartment, while Tivoli Theatre is 1.9 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km away, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: Golden Hotel Barcelona
Description:
Situated in Barcelona, 1.4 km from Sagrada Familia, Golden Hotel Barcelona provides a rooftop terrace with outdoor swimming pool, jacuzzi and bar. 1.5 km from Port Olympic, the property is also 1.7 km from Sagarda Familia and 1.9 km away from Picasso Museum. There is a gym, a restaurant and a shared lounge.
 All guests staying at the Golden Hotel Barcelona get 1 free entry for person and stay to the spa at Hotel & Spa Villa Olimpic@ Suites complex (subject to availability and with prior reservation), located 450 meters away.
A buffet breakfast is available each morning at the property.
Speaking Spanish, Catalan, German and English at the reception, staff are ready to help around the clock.
Barcelona El Prat Airport is 15 km from the property.

Name: Creu Fira Hostafrancs
Description:
Creu Fira Hostafrancs is situated in the Sants-Montjuïc district of Barcelona, less than 1 km from Sants Railway Station, 3 km from Casa Batllo and 3 km from Palau Sant Jordi. The property is located 3 km from Camp Nou, 3 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and 3.4 km from Plaça Catalunya. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Magic Fountain of Montjuic is 1.1 km away.

The air-conditioned apartment is composed of 1 separate bedroom, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen, and 1 bathroom. A flat-screen TV is available. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Passeig de Gracia is 3.5 km from the apartment, while Boqueria Market is 3.7 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 10 km away.

Name: Stay Barcelona Gran Via
Description:
Located in Barcelona, 1.2 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and 1.1 km from Plaça Catalunya, Stay Barcelona Gran Via provides air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. The property is around 1.5 km from Casa Batllo, 1.6 km from Magic Fountain of Montjuic and 1.7 km from Cathedral of Barcelona. The property is non-smoking and is situated 1.4 km from Portal de l'Angel.

The spacious apartment features 3 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a washing machine, and 2 bathrooms with a bath. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Tivoli Theatre, Passeig de Gracia and Boqueria Market. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 12 km from Stay Barcelona Gran Via.

Name: Barrio Gotico Apartments Ferran
Description:
Barrio Gotico Apartments Ferran offers accommodation within 700 metres of the centre of Barcelona, with free WiFi, and a kitchen with a fridge, a stovetop and kitchenware. There is a private entrance at the apartment for the convenience of those who stay. The apartment has family rooms.

The apartment complex will provide guests with air-conditioned units with a wardrobe, a coffee machine, a microwave, a toaster, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a shower. There is a seating and a dining area in all units. At the apartment complex, the units have bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Plaça Reial, Plaça Catalunya and Portal de l'Angel. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km from the property.

Name: C211 Barcelona Apartments
Description:
Stylish, modern apartments include free Wi-Fi, air conditioning and views of Barcelona. Located just off Diagonal Avenue, C211 Barcelona is 15 minutes’ walk from Passeig de Gracia.

Each apartment includes a lounge with sofas, a flat-screen TV, DVD player and an iPad docking station. Their kitchens are equipped with an oven, microwave and washing machine; bed linen and towels are provided. Some also feature a balcony or terrace.

Many shops, restaurants and bars can be found in the surrounding streets. The local Galvany Market is a 5-minute walk from the apartments.

Both Hospital Clinic and Diagonal metro stations are under 15 minutes’ walk away and connect with Sants Train Station and the rest of the city.

Name: Aparthotel Bcn Montjuic
Description:
Set at the foot of Montjuic Hill, this design aparthotel is a 10-minute walk from Plaza Espanya Metro Station and the Airport Bus Stop. It offers free WiFi and a rooftop terrace with a solarium and a seasonal swimming pool.

The BCN Montjuic is a 5-minute walk from Las Arenas Shopping Centre and a short walk from the Olympic Stadium. Barcelona city centre can be reached in 15 minutes by bus or Metro.

All modern rooms at the Montjuic have air conditioning and heating. They include a flat-screen TV, a seating area and a kitchen with a fridge and microwave.

The apartments also include a living area with a sofa bed, a private bathroom and an equipped kitchen with a washing machine. Bed linen and towels are provided.

The Aparthotel Bcn Montjuic has a TV room, as well as a 24-hour front desk and a tour desk, where guests can arrange to visit local attractions. Laundry service is also available.

Name: Catalonia Born
Description:
Set in a 19th-century building in Barcelona’s El Born district, Catalonia Born offers a rooftop pool, an attractive central courtyard and free Wi-Fi. Arc de Triomf Metro Station is 250 metres away.

The classic rooms at Catalonia Born Hotel come with an elegant marble bathroom. They also include a satellite TV and centrally controlled heating or air conditioning, depending on the season.

A buffet breakfast is served, and the snack bar is open for lunch and dinner. There is also a bar in the lobby.

Located minutes from França Train Station, the hotel is well-connected to the rest of the city and its surroundings. Car rental is also available from the tour desk.

Name: Alojamiento Flor
Description:
Alojamiento Flor is located in the Eixample district of Barcelona, 1.1 km from La Pedrera, 1.2 km from Passeig de Gracia and 1.3 km from Casa Batllo. The property is around 1.9 km from Palau de la Musica Catalana, 2.4 km from Cathedral of Barcelona and 2.5 km from Plaça Catalunya. The accommodation provides a lift and a shared kitchen for guests.

The units are equipped with a microwave, toaster, a coffee machine, a shower, a hair dryer and a wardrobe. A fridge and kitchenware are also provided, as well as a kettle. All units include a shared bathroom, free toiletries and bed linen.

Dining options are available close to the bed and breakfast.

Popular points of interest near Alojamiento Flor include Sagrada Familia, Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and Tivoli Theatre. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 14 km away.

Name: Rooms Balmes
Description:
Rooms Balmes is located in the Eixample district of Barcelona, 1.1 km from Plaça Catalunya, less than 1 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and a 7-minute walk from La Pedrera. It is situated less than 1 km from Passeig de Gracia and features a lift. The property is 500 metres from Casa Batllo, and within 1 km of the city centre.

All units in the bed and breakfast are fitted with a kettle. Featuring a shared bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer, units at the bed and breakfast also boast free WiFi, while certain rooms are fitted with a balcony. At the bed and breakfast, every unit comes with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the bed and breakfast include Boqueria Market, Tivoli Theatre and Palau de la Musica Catalana. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km from the property.

Name: Praktik Garden
Description:
Featuring a charming garden terrace, Praktik Garden is located 400 metres from Barcelona’s fashionable Passeig de Gracia Boulevard. Fully reburbished in 2015, its chic rooms feature colourful mosaic floors, a flat-screen TV and free WiFi.

Girona Metro Station is just around the corner from the hotel. From there guests can reach the city’s Barceloneta Beach in 15 minutes. Plaça Catalunya is 10 minutes’ walk from the hotel.

All rooms at the Praktik Garden are equipped with air conditioning and some rooms have balconies. The modern bathroom includes a shower.

Guests can relax in the hotel lounge or on the furnished garden terrace. The hotel provides vending machines for drinks 24-hours a day.

Name: El Alma de las Ramblas
Description:
Offering city views, El Alma de las Ramblas is an accommodation located in Barcelona, 2.5 km from Somorrostro Beach and 2.5 km from Barceloneta Beach. Among the facilities at this property are a lift and private check-in and check-out, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is 200 metres from the city centre and 2.4 km from Sant Miquel Beach.

At the apartment complex, all units are fitted with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a kitchen, a dining area and a private bathroom with a hair dryer, a bath and free toiletries. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, units are fitted with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Plaça Catalunya, Portal de l'Angel and Passeig de Gracia. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from El Alma de las Ramblas.

Name: Inside Barcelona Apartments Sants
Description:
Located in Sants neighborhood, close to Joan Miro Park and Arenas de Barcelona, are these one- to three-bedroom apartments. A perfect jumping-off point for exploring the city, a short walk from the metro and train station.

All guestrooms at Inside Barcelona Apartments Sants offer perks such as air conditioning and separate sitting areas, as well as amenities like free WiFi, set of towels, and safe. In the kitchen you will find a n`espresso machine.

Our priority is to adapt to the needs and requirements of our guests, whether travelling for work or leisure, alone or as a couple, with or without children.

Name: Housalia Sagrada Familia
Description:
Featuring free Wi-Fi and roof fans, there is NO AIR CONDITIONING.
It is on the first floor and there is NO LIFT.

Housalia Sagrada Familia is located within 5 minutes’ walk of Sagrada Familia and Plaza Gaudí Park. Set in Barcelona’s centre, these modern apartments offer a ticket service and tour desk.

Offering stylish and colourful décor, the apartments include a living-dining room with a flat-screen TV. The kitchenette is equipped with a washing machine and oven, and the bathroom comes with a bathtub. Towels as well as bed linen are provided.

Please check the excluded costs for cleaning fee and tourist tax: they are separate from the total rent amount, but clearly displayed before confirming the final payment. Housalia Sagrada Familia is centrally located and there is a wide range of shops, bars and Catalan restaurants within a 10-minute walk. Sagrada Familia and Sant Pau metro stations are within the same distance.

Arc de Triomf Train Station is 3 km from the property, as well as Port Olimpic and the Mediterranean beaches. Barcelona Airport is 15 km away.

Name: BCN Urbaness Hotels Del Comte
Description:
Hotel Del Comte is 100 metres from Barcelona's Urgell Metro Station and 15 minutes walk from the Rambla and Plaza Espanya. It offers modern rooms with free Wi-Fi and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels.

The air-conditioned rooms at Del Comte feature parquet floors and smart design. Each one comes with a work desk and a private bathroom with a hairdryer.

Staff at the Del Comte Hotel’s 24-hour reception can provide information about what to see and do in Barcelona.

There is a bus stop just 3 minutes’ walk from the Del Comte which provides transport connections to Barcelona El Prat Airport. It is only 2 stops on the Metro to Plaza Catalunya, Barcelona’s main square.

Name: Apartment Eixample Esq Rocafort Diputacio by Interhome
Description:
Situated in Barcelona, 1.2 km from Magic Fountain of Montjuic and 1.5 km from Sants Railway Station, Apartment Eixample Esq Rocafort Diputacio by Interhome features air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. This 3-star apartment offers a lift. Tivoli Theatre is 2.6 km from the apartment and Passeig de Gracia is 2.6 km away.

The spacious apartment has 3 bedrooms, a TV with satellite channels, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, a washing machine, and 2 bathrooms with a bidet.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Casa Batllo and Plaça Catalunya. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 11 km from the property.

Name: Sagrada familia Private rooms
Description:
Located within less than 1 km of La Pedrera and a 11-minute walk of Sagrada Familia, Sagrada familia Private rooms provides rooms with air conditioning and a shared bathroom in Barcelona. The property is situated 2 km from Palau de la Musica Catalana, 2.5 km from Cathedral of Barcelona and 2.6 km from Plaça Catalunya. The property is less than 1 km from Passeig de Gracia, and within 1.6 km of the city centre.

All units include a shared bathroom, a hairdryer and bed linen.

Popular points of interest near the hostel include Casa Batllo, Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and Tivoli Theatre. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 14 km away.

Name: Eric Vökel Boutique Apartments - Sagrada Familia Suites
Description:
These stylish, functional Nordic design apartments were designed by Danish architect Eric Vökel. The Eric Vökel Boutique Apartments - Sagrada Familia Suites are set in a restored Modernist building, just 200 metres from the Sagrada Familia and 100 metres from Sant Pau Dos de Maig Metro Station.

Other facilities include free WiFi and a flat-screen TV in every apartment. Each apartment has a fully equipped kitchen with a washer-dryer and a dishwasher.

The property offers a 24-hour check-in service and luggage storage. Our on site Reception team is at your disposal every day from 9am to 5pm.

The beautiful Modernista Hospital Sant Pau is set 5 minutes’ walk from the apartments. There is a selection of shops, restaurants and cafés in the surrounding Sagrada Família district.

The centre of Barcelona and Las Ramblas can be reached in 20 minutes, by Metro, or by bus.

The elevator reaches intermediate levels. You have to climb a few steps to get to the apartment.

Name: Leonardo Boutique Hotel Barcelona Sagrada Familia
Description:
Leonardo Boutique Hotel Barcelona Sagrada Familia is located just 15 minutes’ walk from Gaudí’s famous Sagrada Familia. It has a rooftop sun terrace with panoramic views of Barcelona and rooms with free Wi-Fi.

All modern, outward-facing rooms at theLeonardo Boutique Hotel Barcelona Sagrada Familia are equipped with air conditioning and heating. They have a flat-screen TV and the private bathrooms come with a hairdryer.

Leonardo Boutique Hotel Barcelona Sagrada Familia serves a daily buffet breakfast, and gluten-free meals are available on prior request. In summer, breakfast can be enjoyed on the terrace. There are also vending machines with snacks and drinks.

Staff at the hotel’s 24-hour reception can provide information about what to see and do in Barcelona. Clot Metro Station is 200 metres away, allowing you to reach the city centre in 10 minutes.

Name: Catalonia Eixample 1864
Description:
Located in Barcelona’s Eixample district, this 19th-century building offers stylish modern interiors and free WiFi. It is just 300 metres from the designer shops and Gaudí buildings of Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard.

The Catalonia Eixample 1864 is housed in one of the Eixample’s oldest buildings, and its painted façade gives it the Speciality Monument status.

All soundproofed en-suite rooms sleek wooden floors and furniture, air conditioning and all rooms have smart TVs, which are equipped with Chromecast app.. Some rooms have a private terrace and pool.

A buffet breakfast with show cooking is offered every morning at the Sala Minerva; while the hotel's Les Finestres de Llúria restaurant serves traditional Catalan food with a creative twist. Room service is also available.

Catalonia Eixample 1864 boasts a rooftop swimming pool, sundeck and bar; as well as a gym.

The Catalonia Eixample 1864 is ideally located just a 5-minute walk from Passeig de Gracia Station. Plaza Catalunya Square is a 10-minute walk away.

The hotel offers private parking on-site for an extra cost and an electric vehicle charging station.

Name: Leonardo Hotel Barcelona Las Ramblas
Description:
Leonardo Hotel Barcelona Las Ramblas is situated in the centre of Barcelona’s Old Town, just 200 metres from Las Ramblas. It features a rooftop terrace with a seasonal swimming pool.

The hotel offers simple, attractive décor and rooms are spacious. Each has air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, as well as tea and coffee making facilities.

The Leonardo Hotel Barcelona Las Ramblas serves a daily, buffet breakfast. There are several bars, cafés and restaurants within walking distance of the property.

Guests can make use of computers with internet access, available in the hotel reception area. Staff at the tour desk can provide information on Barcelona’s tourist attractions and arrange car rental.

The hotel is 10 minutes’ walk from Barcelona Cathedral and the city’s Gothic Quarter. The Old Port is around 700 metres from the hotel, whilst Liceu Metro is a 10-minute walk away.

Name: Leonardo Royal Hotel Barcelona Fira
Description:
Situated in Barcelona, 1.5 km from Palau Sant Jordi, Leonardo Royal Hotel Barcelona Fira features air-conditioned accommodation and a bar. Boasting a 24-hour front desk, this property also welcomes guests with a restaurant and an outdoor pool. Camp Nou is 2.9 km away and Boqueria Market is 4 km from the hotel.

At Leonardo Royal Hotel Barcelona Fira rooms come with a desk, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom.

Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a buffet breakfast.

Leonardo Royal Hotel Barcelona Fira offers a terrace.

Magic Fountain of Montjuic is 2 km from the hotel, while Montjuïc is 2.1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 8 km from Leonardo Royal Hotel Barcelona Fira.

Name: Hotel SB Diagonal Zero 4 Sup
Description:
Hotel SB Diagonal Zero Barcelona is opposite Barcelona’s International Convention Centre and Barcelona's Forum Auditorium. It has a spa, a gym, a seasonal panoramic pool and a solarium on the hotel rooftop.

There is free access to the hotel gym. The spa is only for guests over 14, and includes a Turkish bath and Finnish sauna. Beauty and massage treatments are available at a surcharge.

All air-conditioned rooms at the Hotel SB Diagonal Zero Barcelona have flat-screen satellite TV, free WiFi and a laptop safe. The soundproofed rooms have facilities to connect iPods.

All rooms have ironing facilities, tea and coffee making facilities, and a kettle. There is a touch-screen control for lights and temperature. The private bathroom is equipped with a hairdryer, and bathrobes and slippers can be provided upon request.

Name: Brummell Apartments Eixample Derecha/Ballroom
Description:
Ideally located, Brummell Apartments Eixample offers modern décor apartments in the Eixample District, within walking distance of Plaza Catalunya. There is free WiFi available throughout.

Apartments at Brummell boasts original elements including high ceilings and traditional mosaic flooring. All have a fully equipped kitchen completed with a washing machine and a living-dining room with a flat-screen TV. The bathroom comes with a walk-in shower and hairdryer, and bed linen and towels are provided.

Numerous bars and restaurants serving local and international cuisine can be found nearby.

The apartments are also well connected by bus and metro to all main tourist attractions in Barcelona.

Please note that this property offers apartments in different locations around Barcelona, near the Eixample District. Please see the individual apartment descriptions for the address and more details.

Name: Alojamiento Viladomat
Description:
Alojamiento Viladomat is situated in the Eixample district of Barcelona, 1.2 km from Sants Railway Station, 1.8 km from Casa Batllo and 2 km from Magic Fountain of Montjuic. The property is set 2.2 km from Plaça Catalunya, 2.3 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and 1.8 km from Passeig de Gracia. The accommodation features a lift and a shared kitchen for guests.

All units are fitted with a microwave, toaster, a coffee machine, a fridge and kettle. With a shared bathroom fitted with a shower and a hair dryer, units at the bed and breakfast also boast free WiFi. At the bed and breakfast, each unit includes bed linen and towels.

Tivoli Theatre is 2.4 km from the bed and breakfast, while La Pedrera is 1.5 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km away.

Name: Channing Apartment
Description:
Well situated in the centre of Barcelona, Channing Apartment offers a balcony, air conditioning, free WiFi and flat-screen TV. The property features city views and is less than 1 km from Casa Batllo and a 16-minute walk from Plaça Catalunya. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, a lift and organising tours for guests.

Featuring a PS2, the spacious apartment has a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, an oven and a microwave, a living room with a seating area and a dining area, 2 bedrooms, and 2 bathrooms with a walk-in shower and a bath. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Tivoli Theatre and La Pedrera. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km away.

Name: Hotel Well and Come Barcelona
Description:
Featuring a rooftop terrace with a seasonal swimming pool and city views, Well and Come Hotel is located right beside Verdaguer Metro Station and 10 minutes’ walk from Sagrada Familia.

This boutique hotel offers soundproofed rooms with free WiFi, a flat-screen TV and laptop safe. There is also a Nespresso coffee machine, kettle and minibar with free water in all rooms.

Rooms have individually controlled air conditioning and heating. They also come with a private bathroom which includes a rain shower, free toiletries, hairdryer and vanity mirror.

Some rooms come with a balcony, terrace or city views.

Hotel Well and Come Barcelona features a 24-hour reception, a lounge area with a fireplace, an on-site bar and a fitness area.

The famous Passeig de Gracia Boulevard is 5 minutes’ walk from Well and Come hotel. Gaudí’s La Pedrera and Casa Batlló houses can be reached within a 15-minute walk.

Name: Chic & Basic Lemon Boutique Hotel
Description:
Set between the 2 main squares at the centre of Barcelona – Catalunya and Universitat – this small, modern hotel is ideally located for exploring the city’s cultural heart.

Chic & Basic Lemon is just off the top of the vibrant La Rambla and a short walk from the Gothic Quarter. It is only 100 metres from Plaça Catalunya and the start of the elegant boulevard of Passeig de Gràcia – site of Modernist marvels such as Casa Batlló.

Here you can take advantage of the great family service offered in this small property.

After seeing the sights, spend a restful night’s sleep in your own spacious bedroom. In it you will find amenities such as a digital TV, free safe and en suite bathroom with full bathtub. In addition, climate control allows you to stay in comfort all year round.

Name: Catalonia Park Güell
Description:
Free Wi-Fi and a rooftop swimming pool are offered at Catalonia Park Güell. It is set in a residential area just outside Barcelona’s historic centre, 600 metres from Parc Güell.

Rooms at the hotel are simple and comfortable, with air conditioning or heated and satellite TV. There is also a restaurant, bar.

The Catalonia Park Güell is just 300 metres from Vallcarca Metro Station. This gives access to the city centre within 10 minutes. Stops for buses V19 and 22 are nearby. The sun terrace offers views over the city.

The hotel is close to some of Barcelona’s most famous medical centres. These include the Delfos and Quiron Clinics.

There are many sports clubs and parks around the hotel. The popular Gràcia district is also a short walk away. It has lively squares with bars and restaurants.

Name: Grand Hotel Central, Small Luxury Hotels
Description:
Grand Central Hotel Barcelona is a design hotel offering fantastic views of the Gothic Quarter and Barcelona Cathedral from its rooftop infinity pool. It has stylish rooms and free high-speed WiFi.

The elegantly refurbished hotel is housed in an early 20th-century building and it is a clear example of the Catalan Noucentisme.

The air-conditioned rooms at the Grand Hotel Barcelona have a modern design. They are equipped with a 4K high-definition TV´s with Chromecast . Each one has a bathroom with a large, rain-effect shower and luxury toiletries.

The restaurant offers an authentic Spanish-style dining experience with small "platillos" to be shared, as well as a selection of over 150 local and national wines. An excellent culinary proposal that will make you feel like a local. La Terraza del Central, in the rooftop, is the perfect place to enjoy a dinner, a cocktail or both overlooking the city lights of Barcelona.

The hotel has a fitness centre and massage services are also offered. Staff at the 24-hour reception can provide information about what to see and do in Barcelona, and you can also hire a car or a bicycle.

The Born district, full of stylish shops and restaurants, is just 3 minutes’ walk from the Grand Central Hotel.

Name: SM Hotel Teatre Auditori
Description:
SM Hotel Teatre Auditori is located opposite the Catalan National Theatre, close to Glòries and Monumental Metro Stations. This stylish hotel features rooms with satellite TV.

The Auditori has bright, attractive décor. Each air-conditioned room has a desk and a safety deposit box.

Breakfast is served in the hotel café.

Staff at the 24-hour reception can provide information on Barcelona’s attractions, as well as arrange bicycle and car rental.

Gaudí’s Sagrada Familia is just 15 minutes’ walk from the hotel, while Glòries Metro is just 4 stops from Plaza de Catalunya and Las Ramblas.

Name: Catalonia Roma
Description:
Catalonia Roma is 600 metres from Sants AVE Train and Metro Station. It offers free Wi-Fi, and you can reach Barcelona city centre in 10 minutes by Metro or bus.

There are direct train links to Barcelona Airport from Sants Station and the Airport Bus also stops outside it.

The modern, air-conditioned rooms have wooden floors, a mini fridge with complimentary water and satellite TV. There is a safe and minibar, and a private bathroom with a hairdryer.

A buffet breakfast is served at the hotel restaurant. Room service is available and there is also a bar.

Plaza Espanya, Montjuic’s Magic Fountain and the Fira Conference Centre are all within 15 minutes’ walk of the hotel.

The 24-hour front desk at Catalonia Roma boasts a large stained-glass skylight. You can rent a car and currency exchange is offered.

Pets: Only one dog or cat less than 20 kg is allowed per room (on request). Supplement of 22€ night/animal and deposit of 200€.

Name: Catalonia Barcelona 505
Description:
Catalonia Barcelona 505 offers spacious rooms with free Wi-Fi and an outdoor swimming pool in Barcelona’s Sant Gervasi area. From El Putxet Train Station, 400 metres away, you can reach the centre in 15 minutes.

The hotel is close to important medical centres, such as the Teknon Clinic, Sant Jordi Clinic, Dexeus and Barraquer. It is also next to the Blue Tram, which takes you to the cable car for Tibidabo.

Air-conditioned rooms have a satellite TV, a safe and minibar. There is a work desk, and the private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and amenities.

The restaurant C50&5 offers international cuisine. There is a bar and room service is available.

You can hire a car from the 24-hour front desk. On-site parking is offered for an additional charge, and the hotel has easy access to the B20 Motorway.

Name: Unite Hostel Barcelona
Description:
Set in Barcelona, 400 metres from Nova Icaria, Unite Hostel Barcelona offers accommodation with a restaurant, private parking, a bar and a shared lounge. Among the facilities at this property are a 24-hour front desk and a shared kitchen, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The hostel features family rooms.

At the hostel, all rooms are fitted with air conditioning and a private bathroom.

The accommodation offers a terrace.

Popular points of interest near Unite Hostel Barcelona include Somorrostro, Bogatell and Port Olimpic. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 18 km from the hostel.

Name: Green House Hotel
Description:
This modern hotel is located directly across from the Auditori and 50 metres from the National Theatre. It offers bright, air-conditioned rooms, 250 metres from Monumental Bull Ring.

Rooms at Green House Hotel Diagonal feature stylish, contemporary décor. Each includes a smart TV, safe box, desk and private bathroom with hairdryer.

Glories Shopping Centre is 500 metres away and Ciutadella Park and the Born district are 10 minutes’ walk away.

Other facilities include Airport Shuttle at an extra charge.

Green House Hotel is close to the Barcelona Encants Market and only 10 minutes’ walk from the iconic Sagrada Familia Basilica. Marina Metro Station is 400 metres away, 3 stops from Plaza Catalunya. Estacio del Nord Bus Station is 5 minutes’ walk away.

Name: Hostal Europa
Description:
This guest house is 100 metres from Liceu Metro Station and Barcelona’s famous Ramblas. Hostal Europa offers basic rooms in a central location, and has free Wi-Fi in public areas.

Most rooms at the Europa have shared bathroom facilities. Rooms with a private ensuite bathroom are available.

Barcelona’s main tourist attractions are within a short walk. The Boqueria Market is 200 metres from the Europa, and Barcelona Cathedral and Plaza Catalunya are a 5-minute walk away.

The Hostal Europa has a 24-hour front desk, and you can hire a car or bicycle at the tour desk.

A continental breakfast is served at a neighbouring restaurant.

Name: Catalonia Park Putxet
Description:
Featuring a sunroof terrace with a pool and views over Barcelona, Catalonia Park Putxet offers tranquil rooms and a modern fitness centre onsite. There is free WiFi available throughout.

The Park Putxet has simple, bright décor. Each air-conditioned room comes with a mini fridge with complimentary water, a satellite TV and a fully equipped bathroom with a hairdryer.

You can enjoy a varied buffet breakfast with Show Cooking. Light meals are prepared at the hotel snack bar; and room service, including sushi room service, is available.

The hotel is located in a residential area. There is a wide selection of cafés, bars and restaurants in the neighbouring district of Gràcia, which is just 15 minutes’ walk from the hotel. Gaudi's famous Park Guell is just 600 metres away. The closest metro station is Lesseps, 600 metres away.

Name: Catalonia Portal de l'Angel
Description:
Housed in a traditional 19th-century building, this hotel is located between Plaza de Catalunya and Barcelona’s Gothic Quarter. It offers free Wi-Fi and an outdoor pool surrounded by painted murals.

The Catalonia Portal de l'Angel maintains much of its original design. It features comfortable rooms with air conditioning, satellite TV and coffee and tea facilities. The private bathrooms come with a hairdryer.

A buffet breakfast is served daily from 07:30 to 11:00 at Catalonia Portal de l'Angel.

The famous Las Ramblas is less than 200 metres away, while Barcelona Cathedral is 100 metres from the hotel. The Portal de l'Angel is just a 5-minute walk from Catalunya Metro and Railway Station.

Name: Aspasios Charming Flats
Description:
Aspasios Charming Flats offers accommodation in Barcelona. Montjuïc is 900 metres from the property. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property.

All units are air conditioned and have a seating and dining area. Some units feature a terrace and/or balcony. There is also a kitchen, equipped with a dishwasher and oven. A microwave is also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. There is a private bathroom with free toiletries and a hairdryer in every unit. Towels and bed linen are available.

Plaza Reial is 1.4 km from Aspasios Charming Flats, while Plaça Catalunya is 1.5 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 11 km from Aspasios Charming Flats.

Name: Praktik Vinoteca
Description:
Located in the heart of Barcelona, just 700 metres from Plaza Catalunya, Praktik Vinoteca hotel offers air-conditioned rooms and free WiFi in public areas. Universitat Metro Station is 7 minutes’ walk away.

The bright and soundproofed rooms at Praktik Vinoteca feature wooden floors, a flat-screen satellite TV, telephone and a wardrobe. The private bathroom comes with free toiletries and a hairdryer.

The property has a terrace where you can enjoy a glass of wine served by the on-site wine expert, who can tell you about local wines and their history.

You will find bars, restaurants and supermarkets in the surrounding streets. Paseo de Gracia, with its shops and impressive architecture, is just 600 metres away.

Barcelona Airport is a 45-minute bus ride away from Plaza Catalunya and Barceloneta Beach is 3 km from Praktik Vinoteca.

Name: Classbedroom Born Apartments
Description:
These stylish, modern apartments are located in El Born. Ideal for two guests, these apartments  provide a clean, bright, and airy atmosphere.
With convenient public transport links, including local metro stations, exploring the city’s attractions is a breeze. Plus, you’ll be within walking distance of trendy shops, cozy cafes, and vibrant nightlife.

Name: Atico con Terraza Plz. España / Fira Barcelona
Description:
Located in Barcelona, 1.3 km from Palau Sant Jordi and 1.4 km from Sants Railway Station, Atico con Terraza Plz. España / Fira Barcelona offers air conditioning. It is set 3.5 km from Plaça Catalunya and provides a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Magic Fountain of Montjuic is 500 metres away.

The apartment with a terrace and city views features 1 bedroom, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a microwave, and 1 bathroom with a shower. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Passeig de Gracia is 3.6 km from the apartment, while Portal de l'Angel is 3.6 km away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 10 km from the property.

Name: Hotel Sant Agustí
Description:
Open since 1840, Sant Agustí is set in a restored convent just 150 metres from Barcelona’s famous Las Ramblas. It offers free Wi-Fi and functional air-conditioned rooms with flat-screen satellite TV.

Each room at Hotel Sant Agustí has simple, modern design and wooden flooring. Rooms come with a safe and a bathroom with toiletries and a hairdryer. Some rooms have a private balcony.

The Sant Agustí serves a daily continental buffet breakfast.

Downstairs there are computers which guests can use for free. Reception is also open 24 hours a day.

Set in a quiet square, the hotel is a 2-minute walk from Liceu Metro Station and La Boqueria Market. Plaza Catalunya is within 700 metres and offers various bus and train connections, including direct airport buses.

Name: The Haus Sagrada Familia
Description:
A recently renovated apartment situated in the Gràcia district of Barcelona, The Haus Sagrada Familia offers accommodation with with a terrace, private parking and free WiFi. This apartment features air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony. The property is non-smoking and is set 600 metres from Sagrada Familia.

The spacious apartment features 3 separate bedrooms, 1 bathroom, a fully equipped kitchen with a dining area and dishwasher, and a living room with a flat-screen TV. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. The property has an outdoor dining area.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include La Pedrera, Passeig de Gracia and Casa Batllo. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat, 15 km from The Haus Sagrada Familia, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: Hotel SB Glow 4 Sup
Description:
Situated in Barcelona, 1.8 km from Bogatell Beach, Hotel SB Glow 4 Sup features accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a fitness centre and a shared lounge. Featuring a terrace, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. Guests can use the sauna and the hammam, or enjoy city views.

All units at the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a safety deposit box. The rooms will provide guests with a desk and a coffee machine.

Guests at Hotel SB Glow 4 Sup can enjoy a buffet breakfast. At the accommodation you will find a restaurant serving Mediterranean and Grill BBQ cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and vegan options can also be requested.

The area is popular for cycling, and bike hire is available at Hotel SB Glow 4 Sup.

Speaking Catalan, English, Spanish and French at the reception, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical advice on the area.

Nova Icaria Beach is 1.8 km from the hotel, while Mar Bella Beach is 2.1 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 15 km away.

Name: Casp Green House
Description:
Situated in the centre of Barcelona, Casp Green House features air-conditioning. Plaza Catalunya is a 10-minute walk from the house.

The bedrooms have a safe and a private bathroom with free toiletries and hairdryer. Towels and bed linen are provided. Some rooms come with city view.

Passeig de Gracia shopping street is 650 meters from the property. Arco del Triunfo is an 8-minute walk away. Urquinaona metro station is within 4 minutes’ walk.

RECEPTION and KEY COLLECTION are in situated at street Via Laietana 71, 2º, which is just 7 min walk.

Name: SERHS Carlit Boutique Hotel
Description:
SERHS Carlit Boutique Hotel is located in Barcelona, 900 metres from the iconic Sagrada Família Basilica and Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard. It offers a 24-hour reception and air-conditioned rooms, all with free WiFi and a flat-screen satellite TV.

The Serhs Carlit is a 10-minute walk from Arc de Triomf, with Ciutadella Park and the trendy Born district just beyond. You can walk to the Agbar Tower in 15 minutes.

Tetuan Metro Station is just 200 metres away, just 1 stop away from Passeig de Gràcia. Estació del Nord Bus Station is 750 metres away.

The hotel has a café-bar serving a daily buffet breakfast, as well as snacks and drinks throughout the day. Staff at reception can provide information about what to see and do in Barcelona, as well as offering restaurant recommendations.

Name: Catalonia Gracia
Description:
This hotel is located next to Avinguda Diagonal and Passeig de Gràcia, ideal for shopping. Guests can easily access Plaza Cataluña and the city’s historic gothic quarter. Free Wi-Fi is available.

Situated along the modernist route, Hotel Catalonia Gracia is surrounded by much of the interesting architecture that Barcelona is famous for, such as Gaudí and Domenech i Muntaner's key buildings, including La Pedrera.

A buffet breakfast is available at the on-site restaurant; room service is also available.

Guests can easily enjoy this cosmopolitan city as Hotel Catalonia Gracia is within walking distance of Barcelona’s many attractions. As well as the excellent public transport links providing swift access to the entire city and the surrounding area, the hotel offers great value for money. The hotel also includes meeting amenities and conference rooms available for business events and banquets.

Name: Alojamiento Rambla
Description:
In the Eixample district of Barcelona, close to Tivoli Theatre, Alojamiento Rambla features free WiFi and a washing machine. It is located less than 1 km from Plaça Catalunya and provides a lift. The property is less than 1 km from the city centre and a 7-minute walk from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station.

The units are equipped with air conditioning, a microwave, a toaster, a coffee machine, a shower, a hair dryer and a wardrobe. All units include a kettle and a shared bathroom, while some rooms will provide you with a balcony. At the bed and breakfast, every unit has bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the bed and breakfast include Passeig de Gracia, Portal de l'Angel and Palau de la Musica Catalana. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km away.

Name: La Fira - Paralelo 1
Description:
Situated in Barcelona, 700 metres from Magic Fountain of Montjuic and 2.7 km from Sants Railway Station, La Fira - Paralelo 1 offers air conditioning. Among the facilities at this property are a lift and private check-in and check-out, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is non-smoking and is located 2.7 km from Plaça Catalunya.

The 2-bedroom apartment features a living room with a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 2 bathrooms with a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Palau Sant Jordi, Boqueria Market and Montjuïc. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 11 km from the property.

Name: Andante Hotel
Description:
With a small rooftop pool offering great views over Barcelona, Andante Hotel is centrally located 350 metres from Drassanes Metro Station and La Rambla. It offers free Wi-Fi and a gym.

Modern air-conditioned rooms feature parquet floors, a laptop safe and flat-screen satellite TV. The bathroom comes with a full-length mirror and a high-powered hairdryer.

A buffet breakfast with show cooking is available. A gluten-free breakfast is available upon request. There is a self-service area with a microwave and vending machines for drinks, sandwiches and snacks, as well as a large terrace.

You can hire a car from the tour desk and a private shuttle from and to Barcelona El Prat Airport is available on prior request at an extra cost. There is a luggage storage room and a laundry and ironing service are offered.

The rooftop terrace will be closed for maintenance from January 15, 2024, to January 25, 2024.

Name: Hotel Villa Emilia
Description:
This stylish design hotel is located 150 metres from Rocafort Metro Station in Barcelona. It offers a trendy rooftop bar and air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi and plasma satellite TV.

The soundproofed rooms at Hotel Villa Emilia feature parquet floors and modern décor. Each one has a minibar and a private bathroom with a hairdryer.

Hotel Villa Emilia Barcelona’s restaurant serves creative Catalan food, and there is a weekly barbecue. The Villa Emilia Bistrot offers live music.

Staff at the hotel’s 24-hour reception can provide information about what to see and do in Barcelona. There are also car and bicycle rental services at the front desk.

Hotel Villa Emilia is just 10 minutes’ walk from Plaza Espanya, where you can find the Fira Convention Centre. Sants Station is 15 minutes’ walk away.

Name: Yomo Hostal BCN Port
Description:
This guest house offers free Wi-Fi in a location by Barcelona Port. Yomo Hostal BCN Port is just 100 metres from Las Ramblas and 400 metres from the Gothic Quarter.

Paral•lel Metro is a short walk away. This offers direct access to Plaça Catalunya, Plaça Espanya and the Sagrada Familia. The funicular to Montjuic also leaves from here.

The guest house is set opposite the Cruise Terminals, 10 minutes from Barcelona Beach. There are many buses and bicycle lanes nearby.

All rooms at the Yomo Hostal BCN Port have a TV, heating and air conditioning. Standard rooms are en suite and economy rooms have a shared bathroom.

Family rooms and rooms for disabled guests are available. Daily cleaning is provided.

Name: Hostal Rio De Castro
Description:
Hostal Rio De Castro offers free WiFi and is centrally located on Barcelona’s Parallel Avenue, next to Poble Sec Metro Station. It is 10 minutes’ walk from Plaza Espanya’s Magic Fountain.

All air-conditioned rooms feature flat-screen TV and tiled floors. Each has a work desk and some have a private bathroom with a hairdryer and amenities.

There is a communal area with a TV lounge, microwave and coffee maker. Many shops, bars and restaurants can be found in the immediate area.

Luggage storage is offered at the Rio de Castro. You can walk to the Rambla in 15 minutes through the Raval district.

Name: Moxy Barcelona
Description:
Moxy Barcelona features a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, fitness centre, a restaurant and bar in Barcelona. This 4-star hotel offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. The accommodation provides a business centre, a concierge service and currency exchange for guests.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a shower.

The breakfast offers buffet, continental or gluten-free options.

Sants Railway Station is 500 metres from Moxy Barcelona, while Magic Fountain of Montjuic is 1.3 km away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 11 km from the property.

Name: La França Travellers Adults Only
Description:
Offering free private parking and free WiFi, La França Travellers is located next to Montjiuic, 10-minute walk from Plaza de España and Fira de Barcelona. 24-hour reception is available.

This adults-only guesthouse boasts modern décor and air-conditioned rooms with a flat-screen satellite TV. All have a private bathroom with a hairdryer and free toiletries. All suites have a spa bath and some have a round bed.

Bars, restaurants and several dining options can be found in the surrounding streets.

Regular airport buses leave from a bus stop located just 500 metres away.

Name: Best Western Premier Hotel Dante
Description:
The Best Western Premier Dante is located in the Eixample district of Barcelona, a few minutes walking from the elegant Paseo de Gracia, Plaza de Catalunya and the famous Pedrera and Casa Batlló. With a functional design, the Hotel has a Lobby Bar, meeting rooms, internet corner and private parking.

The rooms are spacious and daylight. They have free WI-FI connection, coffee maker, electronic safe, LCD satellite TV and air conditioning, as well as a complete bathroom. The Suites are located on the 7th floor and have a large terrace with views of Barcelona.

The Buffet Breakfast offers a wide variety of milk and vegetable drinks, juices, coffees, infusions, pastries and salty. Many of the products served are gluten free. The Hotel's Lobby Bar, serves Mediterranean cuisine, both for lunch and dinner. It is also possible to taste an aperitif.
The Hotel also has 4 fully equipped meeting rooms and private parking, as well as free Wi-Fi in rooms and common areas.

It is about 20 minutes away by car from Barcelona airport and 10 from the AVE station.

Name: Mesón Castilla Atiram Hotels
Description:
Mesón Castilla is set just 100 metres from Las Ramblas and Plaça Catalunya Square in central Barcelona. The hotel offers free Wi-Fi and an attractive garden terrace where guests can enjoy breakfast.

Rooms at the Mesón Castilla include ornate beds, and some have a private balcony. They come with air conditioning and a private bathroom with a hairdryer.

The hotel operates a 24-hour reception, allowing guests flexibility during their stay. The tour desk can organise excursions and car rental. There are safes available at the reception for an extra charge.

Barcelona’s Modern Art Museum is a 5-minute walk from the hotel. The historic Gothic Quarter, with its cathedral and many bars, can be reached in 10 minutes’ by foot.

Name: Hostal Alogar
Description:
Hostal Alogar is located in the elegant Sant Gervasi neighborhood, near Diagonal Avenue. Our rooms have air conditioning and free Wi-Fi. It offers comfortable, good-value rooms and a car rental service.

Guests at the Alogar can make use of the communal kitchen with a hob, microwave and TV. Each room is allocated a different cupboard. Free Wi-Fi is available in public areas and rooms.

Staff at reception can provide information about what to see and do in Barcelona.

Muntaner Metro Station is 5 minutes’ walk away and from here you can get to Plaza Catalunya in 10 minutes. There are also several bus stops within a 5-minute walk.

Name: Casa Balmes
Description:
Casa Balmes is a bed and breakfast located in the very centre of Barcelona, 400 metres from the well-known Passeig de Gràcia Avenue and monuments like Casa Batlló. Free WiFi access is available.

Each air-conditioned room at Casa Balmes is soundproof and has elegant décor, as well as a full HD flat-screen TV and a minibar. There is also a free safe and a private bathroom with hairdryer and free toiletries. Bed linen and towels are included. Some rooms have street views.

At Casa Balmes you will find a terrace and a shared lounge with vending machines. A daily breakfast consisting of fruit juices, coffee, tea, toast, jams, cereals and a selection of pastries is included.

Other services offered at the property include tourist information, luggage storage and laundry. Guests can find a sports centre with gym and spa just 80 metres away from the b&b.

Casa Balmes is 8 minutes' walk from Plaza Catalunya. Barcelona El Prat Airport is less than 20 minutes by car.

Name: GuestReady - Central Barcelona Getaway
Description:
In the centre of Barcelona, located within a short distance of Casa Batllo and Passeig de Gracia, GuestReady - Central Barcelona Getaway offers free WiFi, air conditioning and household amenities such as a microwave and coffee machine. This apartment provides accommodation with a balcony. The property is non-smoking and is set 300 metres from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station.

The spacious apartment features 2 bedrooms, a TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Tivoli Theatre, Palau de la Musica Catalana and La Pedrera. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km away.

Name: Nordic apartment Sagrada Familia
Description:
Nordic apartment Sagrada Familia is set in the Sant Martí district of Barcelona, 2.5 km from La Pedrera, 2.6 km from Passeig de Gracia and 3 km from Casa Batllo. It is situated 1 km from Sagrada Familia and features a lift. Free WiFi is available and private parking can be arranged at an extra charge.

The apartment with a patio and inner courtyard views has 2 bedrooms, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with a walk-in shower. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Sightseeing tours are available within a reachable distance of the property.

Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 3.5 km from the apartment, while Tivoli Theatre is 3.6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 16 km from Nordic apartment Sagrada Familia.

Name: Apartments BCN Central-Montjuic
Description:
A recently renovated property, Apartments BCN Central-Montjuic is located in Barcelona near Santa Maria del Mar, Picasso Museum and Plaça Catalunya. Among the facilities at this property are a lift and private check-in and check-out, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is non-smoking and is situated 2.4 km from Barceloneta Beach.

The spacious apartment features 2 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Portal de l'Angel, Passeig de Gracia and Boqueria Market. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 11 km away.

Name: Sunotel Central
Description:
Featuring a rooftop swimming pool and hot tub with views of Barcelona, Sunotel Central is set in the centre of Barcelona, just 10 minutes' walk from Plaza Catalunya.

Modern rooms at Sunotel Central include free high-speed WiFi, satellite TV and a private bathroom with a hairdryer and amenities.

Universitat Metro Station is just 200 metres from the hotel. The Ramblas, famous for its street performers, can be reached in 10 minutes by foot.

In the morning guests can enjoy a varied, fresh and healthy full buffet breakfast.

The hotel’s 24-hour reception offers a ticket booking service and luggage storage. There are computers in the lobby which guests can use for free. Meeting rooms are also available.

Name: Ibis Barcelona Meridiana
Description:
Located next to Fabra i Puig Station, Ibis Barcelona Meridiana is a 10-minute Metro journey from Plaza Catalunya. It offers a 24-hour bar and air-conditioned rooms with flat-screen satellite TV.

Barcelona Meridiana’s bar serves a wide range of snacks and drinks.

Hotel Ibis Barcelona Meridiana is set next to the Heron City Shopping Centre, where you can find restaurants, cinemas and a gym. Indoor public parking is available at an extra cost.

Name: Catalonia Avinyo
Description:
Situated 200 metres from Las Ramblas in central Barcelona, Catalonia Avinyo features a rooftop pool and gym. It offers chic, air-conditioned rooms with satellite TV and free Wi-Fi.

Rooms are decorated in a modern, minimalist style with large wall photos. They include a minibar, safe and telephone. All hotel rooms have smart TVs, which are equipped with Chromecast app. The modern bathrooms have a shower and a hairdryer.

Barceloneta Beach is a 15-minute walk from Hotel Catalonia Avinyo. The Liceu and Jaume I Metro Stations are just 300 metres away and Barcelona Cathedral is 4 minutes' walk away.

The Avinyo’s central location means there are many shops, bars and restaurants close to the hotel. Bicycle and car hire can be arranged at the tour desk.

Name: NEW! Amazing 2 bedroom apartment in Rambla del Poblenou
Description:
NEW! Amazing 2 bedroom apartment in Rambla del Poblenou is a beachfront property situated in Barcelona, 1.6 km from Mar Bella Beach and 1.6 km from Bogatell Beach. Among the facilities at this property are a 24-hour front desk and a lift, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is non-smoking and is located 1.9 km from Nova Mar Bella Beach.

The spacious apartment with a balcony and city views has 2 bedrooms, a living room, a TV, an equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, and 1 bathroom with a bath. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment.

Sagrada Familia is 2.4 km from the apartment, while Passeig de Gracia is 2.9 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 16 km away.

Name: SmartRoom Barcelona
Description:
SmartRoom Barcelona is an economy hotel located in central Barcelona, 1 km from Sants Train Station. Decorated in a modern style, each room here will provide guests with a flat-screen Smart TV with satellite channels. The air-conditioned rooms have free WiFi access. Featuring a shower, the private bathroom also comes with free toiletries. Extras include a desk and bed linen.
A buffet breakfast is available daily. Other facilities offered at the property include a vending machine with drinks and snacks. At SmartRoom Barcelona, guests will find a 24-hour front desk.
Plaza de Sants is 450 metres from SmartRoom Barcelona and Sants Train Station is 15 minutes' walk away. The hotel is 1.5 km from Camp Nou and Magic Fountain of Montjuïc. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 20 minutes' drive away.

Name: Hotel Coronado
Description:
Hotel Coronado is conveniently situated 200 metres from Paral•lel Metro Station and 15 minutes’ from Barcelona’s famous Ramblas. It offers free Wi-Fi throughout and reception is open 24 hours a day.

Rooms at Hotel Coronado feature a simple design and come with a private bathroom. They also include air conditioning and heating.

Guests can enjoy drinks and snacks at the bar-cafeteria in the lobby area. There are also many bars and restaurants within a 5-minute walk of the hotel.

The Magic Fountains in the Montjuic area are 15 minutes’ walk from Hotel Coronado while Barcelona’s port is 10 minutes away.

Name: Apartamentos Express by Gaiarooms
Description:
Set in Barcelona, 300 metres from Passeig de Gracia and 1.2 km from Casa Batllo, Apartamentos Express by Gaiarooms offers air conditioning. The property is around 2.8 km from Palau de la Musica Catalana, 2.9 km from Park Güell and 3.2 km from Sagrada Familia. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and La Pedrera is 800 metres away.
