This apartment is fitted with 3 bedrooms, a kitchen with a microwave and a toaster, a flat-screen TV, a seating area and 2 bathrooms. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Tivoli Theatre and Plaça Catalunya. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 15 km away.

Name: Flateli Navas D02
Description:
Situated in Barcelona, 3.6 km from La Pedrera and 3.9 km from Passeig de Gracia, Flateli Navas D02 offers air conditioning. It is set 4 km from Casa Batllo and features a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Sagrada Familia is 2.3 km away.

The apartment features 2 bedrooms, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a washing machine and 1 bathroom with a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 4.5 km from Flateli Navas D02, while Tivoli Theatre is 4.6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 17 km from the accommodation.

Name: Chic & Basic Velvet
Description:
Boasting 1950s décor, this modern hotel offers air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi and flat-screen satellite TV. Barcelona’s Plaza Espanya is 8 minutes’ walk away.

The rooms at the Chic & Basic Velvet have parquet floors and smart décor. Each one has a private bathroom with a hairdryer and free toiletries.

The hotel serves a daily buffet breakfast in the dining room; and guests can enjoy a drink at the honesty bar which has direct access to terrace.

There is a variety of restaurants within 10 minutes’ walk.

Chic & Basic Velvet is just 10 minutes’ walk from the Fira Convention Centre and the airport bus stop. Montjüic, with the Joan Miró Museum and Magic Fountain, is also a 10-minute walk away

Name: Hostal Central Barcelona
Description:
This classically decorated guest house is set in the late 19th-century modernist district of Eixample, in the centre of Barcelona. There is free WiFi available throughout.

Refurbished in 2018, all air-conditioned rooms boast wooden floors, and includes a  smart TV and a free safe. They all have a private bathroom completed with a professional hairdryer.

From Hostal Central Barcelona you can walk into the city centre to explore Gaudi's Modernist monuments, including Casa Batllò, and La Pedrera.

Hostal Central Barcelona is a pleasant place to stay, providing an attractive and artistic interior decor.

Name: Nuevo apartamento zona Paseo de Gracia
Description:
Situated in Barcelona, 200 metres from Passeig de Gracia and 600 metres from La Pedrera, Nuevo apartamento zona Paseo de Gracia offers free WiFi and air conditioning. The property is around 2.5 km from Palau de la Musica Catalana, 1.7 km from Sagrada Familia and 2 km from Portal de l'Angel. The property is non-smoking and is located 1.1 km from Casa Batllo.

The apartment has 1 bedroom, a living room with a TV, an equipped kitchen, and 1 bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Tivoli Theatre and Plaça Catalunya. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 14 km from the property.

Name: Anais Apartments by Gaiarooms
Description:
Located in Barcelona centre, 3 km from Somorrostro Beach and 3 km from Sant Miquel Beach, Anais Apartments by Gaiarooms provides accommodation with free WiFi and a balcony. It is set 300 metres from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and offers a lift. Featuring a private entrance, the apartment allows guests to maintain their privacy.

At the apartment complex, every unit has air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a kitchen, a dining area and a private bathroom with a hair dryer, a shower and free toiletries. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, the units are equipped with bed linen and towels.

Sightseeing tours are available nearby.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Casa Batllo, Passeig de Gracia and Tivoli Theatre. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km away.

Name: Hotel Best Aranea
Description:
The modern Hotel Aranea is a 5-minute walk from Gaudi’s Sagrada Familia. It offers free Wi-Fi, and a roof terrace with sun loungers and Barcelona city centre views.

Monumental Metro Station and Bullring are just 400 metres from Hotel Aranea. You can reach Plaça Catalunya and La Rambla in 10 minutes by bus or Metro.

Modern, air-conditioned rooms feature parquet floors and satellite TV. Windows are double-glazed, and there is a safe and minibar. The bathroom comes with a hairdryer and amenities, as well as a bath or shower.

The Aranea restaurant serves a buffet breakfast and Mediterranean buffet lunch. Staff at the 24-hour reception can provide information about what to see and do in Barcelona.

Name: Casa Vaganto
Description:
In a prime location in the Sants-Montjuïc district of Barcelona, Casa Vaganto is located 1.6 km from Magic Fountain of Montjuic, 1.6 km from Plaça Catalunya and 1.8 km from Santa Maria del Mar. This 3-star hotel offers a concierge service, luggage storage space and free WiFi. The property is allergy-free and is set 2.9 km from Sant Miquel Beach.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a wardrobe, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower.

Popular points of interest near Casa Vaganto include Portal de l'Angel, Passeig de Gracia and Boqueria Market. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 11 km away.

Name: Vibrant and modern apartment
Description:
Set in Barcelona, 1.3 km from Magic Fountain of Montjuic and 3.1 km from Plaça Catalunya, Vibrant and modern apartment offers air conditioning. Among the facilities at this property are a lift and a concierge service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is non-smoking and is situated 1.9 km from Portal de l'Angel.

The spacious apartment is fitted with 2 bedrooms, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a fully equipped kitchen, and a balcony with inner courtyard views.

Sightseeing tours are available close by.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Palau Sant Jordi, Boqueria Market and Montjuïc. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km away.

Name: Hotel Acta Azul Barcelona
Description:
Set just off Plaça d’Espanya and at the foot of Montjuïc, Hotel Acta Azul Barcelona offers stylish accommodation in central Barcelona. It features a roof terrace, 24-hour reception and free Wi-Fi.

Las Ramblas and the city’s Gothic Quarter can be reached in less than 10 minutes, by Metro and here you will find where a selection of bars and restaurants.

Each of the Azul’s spacious rooms has bright décor and wooden flooring. All rooms have air conditioning, satellite TV and a desk.

The hotel is a 5-minute walk from Barcelona’s Fira Conference Centre and Plaça d’Espanya’s Magic Fountains. Montjuïc Park and the MNAC Gallery are within 1 km of the hotel. The bullring-turned-shopping centre of Las Arenas is next door.

Name: Ola Living Consell De Cent
Description:
Ideally located in the Eixample district of Barcelona, Ola Living Consell De Cent is situated less than 1 km from Sagrada Familia, a 15-minute walk from Casa Batllo and 1.5 km from La Pedrera. It is set 2.8 km from Nova Icaria Beach and offers a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Somorrostro Beach is 2.7 km away.

Each unit is fitted with air conditioning, a private bathroom and a well-fitted kitchen including an oven, microwave, toaster and a fridge. Kitchenware is also offered, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, units are equipped with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Passeig de Gracia, Palau de la Musica Catalana and Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 14 km from the property.

Name: Ola Living St Antoni
Description:
Ola Living St Antoni is situated in the Eixample district of Barcelona, 1.2 km from Portal de l'Angel, 1.3 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and 1.2 km from Passeig de Gracia. It is set 1.1 km from Plaça Catalunya and offers a lift. Palau de la Musica Catalana is 1.5 km from the apartment and Cathedral of Barcelona is 1.3 km away.

Each unit is fitted with air conditioning, a private bathroom and a well-fitted kitchen including a dishwasher, oven, microwave and a toaster. Free WiFi is accessible to all guests, while some rooms also feature a terrace. At the apartment complex, units come with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Tivoli Theatre, Boqueria Market and Casa Batllo. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km from the property.

Name: Hotel SERHS Del Port
Description:
Set on Paral-lel Avenue, this modern design hotel is just a 5-minute walk from the famous Las Ramblas and Barcelona Port. Its stylish, air-conditioned rooms feature free WiFi and a satellite TV.

Hotel SERHS Del Port´s modern rooms offer a safe. The private bathrooms come with a hairdryer and free toiletries.

Montjuïc Hill is within a 10-minute walk of Hotel SERHS Del Port. A funicular train connects Montjuïc with Paral-lel Metro Station, located 500 metres from the hotel.

Direct Metro services also connect Paral-lel to Plaça Catalunya Square, Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard and Gaudí’s famous Parc Guëll. Hotel SERHS Del Port´s tour desk can provide information about the city.

Name: Atenea Rekord Suites
Description:
Located in Barcelona's Sarria District, Atenea Rekord Suites is a 10-minute train ride from Plaza Catalunya. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property

Spacious and comfortable rooms with modern décor come with satellite TV, a safe and Nespresso coffee machine. Each one has a private bathroom with free toiletries and a hairdryer.

The Rekord Café offers a buffet breakfast.

Staff at the 24-hour reception can provide information about what to see and do in Barcelona.

The surrounding area offers a selection of restaurants, shops and lounge bars. Muntaner Train Station is just 50 metres from the hotel.

Name: Lindo apartamento Vila de Gracia
Description:
Located in Barcelona, 600 metres from La Pedrera and 1.1 km from Casa Batllo, Lindo apartamento Vila de Gracia offers air conditioning. It is set 1.4 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and provides a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Passeig de Gracia is 200 metres away.

The 1-bedroom apartment comes with a living room with a TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. The property has an outdoor dining area.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Tivoli Theatre, Plaça Catalunya and Sagrada Familia. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 14 km away.

Name: P2PAR1002 - Super Bright & New Apartment in the city center
Description:
Situated in Barcelona, 700 metres from Magic Fountain of Montjuic and 1.9 km from Plaça Catalunya, P2PAR1002 - Super Bright & New Apartment in the city center features air-conditioned accommodation with a terrace and free WiFi. This apartment provides accommodation with a balcony. The property is non-smoking and is located 2.6 km from Passeig de Gracia.

The apartment has 2 bedrooms, a TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Boqueria Market, Sants Railway Station and Palau Sant Jordi. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km from the property.

Name: Apartments Hotel Sant Pau
Description:
Set 250 metres from Sant Pau Hospital, a UNESCO World Heritage Site, Apartments Hotel Sant Pau offers stylish air-conditioned apartments with free Wi-Fi. Kitchens feature a dishwasher, washing machine and tumble dryer.

The modern apartments are located in a building with a lift and have 1 or 2 bedrooms. The living room offers a 40-inch flat-screen TV, dining table and a sofa bed. An oven and microwave are included in the kitchen area. The bathroom has a bath tub and hairdryer. Bed linen and towels are provided.

You can find a wide variety of bars and restaurants in the fashionable Gracia neighbourhood, a 20-minute walk from the apartments. There is a supermarket within a 5-minute walk.

Passeig de Gracia Boulevard, with its designer stores and Gaudi monuments, is 2 km from Apartments Hotel Sant Pau. Camp de l’Arpa Metro Station is 150 metres from the apartments and the Sagrada Familia is a 15-minute walk away.

Name: Hostal Balkonis
Description:
Located in central Barcelona, Hostal Balkonis guest house offers a terrace, free Wi-Fi throughout. Sant Antoni Metro Station is just 80 metres away.

This property offers functional and modern rooms with a private bathroom with a hairdryer and free toiletries each. They all feature heating, air conditioning, flat-screen TV and a radio. Some have a balcony with garden and city views.

You can hire bicycles on site, allowing you to explore more of the city.

You will find bars and restaurants in the surrounding streets and the closest supermarket is just 30 metres away.

A 12-minute walk will take you to Barcelona’s La Rambla and Barceloneta Beach is 3 km away. Plaza de España, with direct buses to Barcelona Airport is 20 minutes’ walk from Hostal Balkonis.

Name: Alojamiento Nuevo Balmes
Description:
Alojamiento Nuevo Balmes is situated in the Eixample district of Barcelona, 500 metres from Passeig de Gracia, 1 km from Plaça Catalunya and less than 1 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. Among the facilities at this property are a lift and a shared kitchen, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is 500 metres from Casa Batllo, and within less than 1 km of the city centre.

At the bed and breakfast, units are fitted with a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a shared bathroom, bed linen and towels. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also offered, as well as a kettle. The units are equipped with heating facilities.

Popular points of interest near the bed and breakfast include Tivoli Theatre, La Pedrera and Portal de l'Angel. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km from the property.

Name: Apartments Gaudi Barcelona
Description:
Featuring stylish accommodation, Apartments Gaudi Barcelona are set in the charming Gràcia district, just a 10-minute walk to Gaudi´s Sagrada Familia.

Each studio and apartment at the Gaudi Barcelona has charming décor. There is either a kitchen or a kitchenette with a fridge, microwave and coffee maker. Seating areas come with a flat-screen TV.

There is a selection of shops in the streets around Apartments Gaudi Barcelona. Gràcia has a range of cafés, bars and restaurants.

Passeig de Gràcia is a 10-minute walk away, while Gaudí’s La Pedrera and Casa Batlló are both within 1.5 km of the apartments. Las Ramblas can be reached in 10 minutes by Metro.


Please note that this property offers apartments in different locations around Barcelona, near the Gracia district. Check-in takes place directly at your apartment. Please see the individual apartment descriptions for the address and more details.

Name: Brummell Apartments Eixample Izquierda/Valeris
Description:
Located within less than 1 km of Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and a 12-minute walk of Plaça Catalunya, Brummell Apartments Eixample Izquierda/Valeris provides rooms with air conditioning and a private bathroom in Barcelona. Among the facilities at this property are a lift and luggage storage space, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The accommodation features airport transfers, while a bicycle rental service is also available.

Each unit is equipped with a balcony, a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a washing machine, and a private bathroom with walk-in shower and a hair dryer. A toaster, a fridge and stovetop are also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, all units are equipped with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Tivoli Theatre, Portal de l'Angel and Boqueria Market. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km away.

Name: Express by Gaiarooms
Description:
Set in a renovated classical building, Express by Gaiarooms is centrally located in Barcelona’s Gracia district. It is 5 minutes’ walk from Passeig de Gracia Boulevard and offers free Wi-Fi throughout.

Featuring minimalist, elegant design, rooms at the Express by Gaiarooms have central air conditioning and a flat-screen TV. They are also heated and have a safe. Most feature a private bathroom and some have shared bathroom facilities.

Many bars and restaurants in the trendy Gracia district are within a 5-minute walk of the Express guest house.

Express by Gaiarooms is just 150 metres from Gracia FGC Train Station, while Fontana Metro Station is 500 metres away. You can reach La Rambla in 5 minutes by train.

Name: E2mai1047- Fantastic apartment next to Sagrada Familia
Description:
E2mai1047- Fantastic apartment next to Sagrada Familia is situated in the Eixample district of Barcelona, 1.5 km from La Pedrera, 1.6 km from Casa Batllo and 1.6 km from Passeig de Gracia. It is located 400 metres from Sagrada Familia and provides a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Nova Icaria Beach is 2.9 km away.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 1 bedroom, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 1.8 km from the apartment, while Palau de la Musica Catalana is 2.6 km away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 15 km from the property.

Name: 31PAR1008 - Mediterranean style apartment
Description:
Situated in Barcelona, 700 metres from Magic Fountain of Montjuic and 1.9 km from Plaça Catalunya, 31PAR1008 - Mediterranean style apartment features air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. It is set 2.6 km from Portal de l'Angel and provides a lift. The property is non-smoking and is located 2.6 km from Passeig de Gracia.

The apartment has 3 bedrooms, a TV, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Boqueria Market, Sants Railway Station and Palau Sant Jordi. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km from the property.

Name: chic&basic Reding
Description:
Situated 100 metres from Universitat Metro Station, this boutique hotel offers stylish rooms with free tea and coffee making facilities. Plaza Catalunya is just 400 metres away.

Each air-conditioned room at chic&basic Reding has flat-screen satellite TV and a safe. Rooms come with a minibar, a trouser press and a modern bathroom with a hairdryer, a magnifying mirror and toiletries.

chic&basic Reding has a business centre with a computer and printer. The hotel has free internet connection points. Staff at the 24-hour reception can provide visitor information and help to arrange restaurant reservations or car rental.

chic&basic Reding is a 5-minute walk from the famous Las Ramblas. Direct buses to Barcelona Airport stop just 450 metres away, in Plaza Catalunya.

Name: Flat San Antoni Villaroel/Apartment
Description:
Flat San Antoni Villaroel/Apartment features a balcony and is located in Barcelona, within just 1.1 km of Plaça Catalunya and 1.2 km of Portal de l'Angel. Popular points of interest nearby include Casa Batllo, Palau de la Musica Catalana and Cathedral of Barcelona. The property is non-smoking and is situated 1.2 km from Passeig de Gracia.

The spacious apartment has 2 bedrooms, a TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a microwave, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Tivoli Theatre and Boqueria Market. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km from the property.

Name: Apartaments Independencia
Description:
Suites Independencia offers stylish apartments set just 10 minutes’ walk from Gaudí’s Sagrada Familia and 150 metres from Encants Metro Station. It features apartments with cable TV.

The Indepencia’s bright, air-conditioned accommodation has simple, modern décor. Each apartment has a spacious seating area and a well-equipped kitchenette with an oven. Some apartments have a balcony.

The area surrounding the apartments has a varied selection of shops, cafés and restaurants. Sagrada Familia Market is a 10-minute walk away.

Barcelona’s old town and Las Ramblas are just 4 Metro stops from Encants. The beaches at Poblenou are less than 2 km from the Suites Independencia.

Name: Hostal Delfos
Description:
Hostal Delfos is located in the centre of Barcelona, just 3 minutes’ walk from the famous Ramblas and Plaza Catalunya. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the guesthouse.

Delfos offers rooms with a private or shared bathroom. Rooms are also equipped with a fan and heating.

The Gothic Quarter and cathedral are 5 minutes’ walk from the guesthouse, while the Picasso Museum is 15 minutes away. Guests can request tourist information on the surrounding area from the tour desk.

Barcelona Airport is 30 minutes away by bus from Plaza Catalunya.

Name: Alojamiento Paris
Description:
Alojamiento Paris is located in the Eixample district of Barcelona, less than 1 km from Passeig de Gracia, a 13-minute walk from La Pedrera and 1.6 km from Casa Batllo. The property is set 2.1 km from Plaça Catalunya, 1.9 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and 2.2 km from Tivoli Theatre. The accommodation provides a lift and a shared kitchen for guests.

The units are equipped with a microwave, toaster, a coffee machine, a shower, a hair dryer and a wardrobe. At the bed and breakfast, all units include bed linen and towels.

Portal de l'Angel is 2.4 km from the bed and breakfast, while Boqueria Market is 2.6 km away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km from the property.

Name: Barceló Sants
Description:
Situated above Barcelona Sants Train Station, Barceló Sants offers a subtle outer space theme throughout. Minimalist rooms feature free Wi-Fi, rain showers, and large windows with city views.

Air-conditioned rooms feature modern décor and designer furniture. Each has an iPod dock, flat-screen TV, and tea and coffee making facilities. The bathroom comes with a hairdryer.

This design hotel includes a fitness centre.

The hotel has the Oxygen restaurant, where you can enjoy a delicious, complete and healthy breakfast buffet. It also has the Orbital Bar, the ideal space to disconnect from daily life; a fun and perfect place to have a delicious cocktail with your partner or to hang out and have a drink with colleagues after a long working day.

Sants Train and Metro Station offers direct access to Barcelona Airport, and the historic city centre, 3.5 km away. There are also high-speed AVE services to Madrid and international trains.

There is a 24-hour front desk, and you can hire a car from the tour desk. On-site parking is available for an extra charge and the hotel has a Wi-Fi zone.

Name: Onix Liceo
Description:
Onix Liceo is next to Gaudi’s Palau Guell, 300 metres from Liceo Metro Station on Barcelona’s Ramblas. This stylish hotel offers a sun terrace and free Wi-Fi access.

The Onix is a design hotel with modern art in its public spaces. There is also a lounge and a business centre.

Free water, coffe and tea are available 24 hours a day.

All air-conditioned rooms at the Onix are spacious and elegant. They have a minibar and LCD satellite TV. The private bathroom is equipped with a hairdryer.

You can hire a car or bicycle from the hotel tour desk. There is a 24-hour reception and a laundry service.

Please, be aware that swimming pool is not heated and will be opened from April to October.

Name: Acta Voraport
Description:
Set in Barcelona, less than 1 km from Bogatell Beach, Acta Voraport offers accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a terrace and a restaurant. With a bar, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation features an ATM, a concierge service and organising tours for guests.

At the hotel, the rooms are equipped with a desk. All guest rooms in Acta Voraport are fitted with a flat-screen TV and free toiletries.

Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a buffet breakfast.

Speaking Catalan, English, Spanish and French, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical information on the area at the 24-hour front desk.

Popular points of interest near Acta Voraport include Mar Bella Beach, Nova Icaria Beach and Somorrostro Beach. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 15 km from the property.

Name: The Moods Oasis
Description:
Boasting a terrace, The Moods Oasis is situated in Barcelona in the Catalonia region, 600 metres from Passeig de Gracia and 1.1 km from La Pedrera. Featuring a fitness centre, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation features room service, a concierge service and organising tours for guests.

At the hotel, the rooms are fitted with a wardrobe. All rooms in The Moods Oasis are fitted with a flat-screen TV and a hairdryer.

Buffet and continental breakfast options are available at the accommodation.

Speaking Catalan, English, Spanish and French, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical advice on the area at the reception.

Casa Batllo is 1.5 km from The Moods Oasis, while Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 1.8 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km away.

Name: Pensión Teruel
Description:
Located just 70 metres from Las Ramblas, this simple guest house features air-conditioned rooms with a balcony and free Wi-Fi. It has a 24-hour reception and is set just 200 metres from Plaza Catalunya.

Pensión Teruel’s spacious and comfortable rooms are bright and feature vibrant décor. Each includes central heating, a plasma TV and private bathroom with free toiletries. Air conditioning is available for an extra charge.

There are several bars and restaurants within 5 minutes’ walk. Barcelona Cathedral is 10 minutes’ walk away and Passeig de Gracia Boulevard, with its chic shops and Gaudí monuments, is 600 metres away.

Teruel offers luggage storage and is 2 minutes’ walk from Plaza Catalunya Metro and Train Station. The Airport bus stop for Barcelona El Prat Airport is 5 minutes’ walk away.

Name: 11RDSP1061 - Fantastic 1BR Apartment in Sant Antoni
Description:
In the Eixample district of Barcelona, close to Plaça Catalunya, 11RDSP1061 - Fantastic 1BR Apartment in Sant Antoni features free WiFi and a washing machine. It is set 1.5 km from Portal de l'Angel and offers a lift. The property is 1.5 km from Magic Fountain of Montjuic, and within 1.2 km of the city centre.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 1 bedroom, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a coffee machine, and 2 bathrooms with a shower. A TV is featured. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Tivoli Theatre, Passeig de Gracia and Boqueria Market. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km away.

Name: Port Loft
Description:
Situated right in the heart of Barcelona, 2.2 km from Barceloneta Beach, Port Loft features air-conditioned accommodation with free WiFi and a flat-screen TV. The property is around 2.3 km from Sant Miquel Beach, 1.3 km from Plaça Catalunya and 1.2 km from Portal de l'Angel. The property is non-smoking and is set 2.3 km from Sant Sebastian Beach.

The apartment is composed of 1 bedroom, a fully equipped kitchen, and 1 bathroom.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Santa Maria del Mar, Picasso Museum and Plaça Reial. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 11 km from the property.

Name: Aspasios Arc de Triomf Apartments
Description:
Situated conveniently in the Eixample district of Barcelona, Aspasios Arc de Triomf Apartments is set 2.2 km from Barceloneta Beach, 2.2 km from Nova Icaria Beach and less than 1 km from Passeig de Gracia. The air-conditioned accommodation is 2.2 km from Somorrostro Beach. The accommodation offers a lift and private check-in and check-out for guests.

Each unit is fitted with a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a washing machine, and a private bathroom with shower and free toiletries. Free WiFi is available to all guests, while selected rooms here will provide you with a terrace. The units are equipped with heating facilities.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Casa Batllo, Palau de la Musica Catalana and Tivoli Theatre. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from Aspasios Arc de Triomf Apartments.

Name: Brummell Apartments Montjuic
Description:
Featuring air-conditioned accommodation with a private pool, Brummell Apartments Montjuic is set in Barcelona. Boasting a lift, this property also provides guests with a sun terrace. Offering free WiFi throughout the property, the non-smoking apartment features a sauna.

The apartment is fitted with 2 bedrooms, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a balcony with city views. The unit has soundproofing and an a bath or shower.

A bicycle rental service is available at the apartment.

Popular points of interest near Brummell Apartments Montjuic include Magic Fountain of Montjuic, Portal de l'Angel and Boqueria Market. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 11 km away.

Name: Exe Plaza Catalunya
Description:
In a prime location in Barcelona, Exe Plaza Catalunya provides air-conditioned rooms, a terrace and free WiFi. This 4-star hotel offers a concierge service and a tour desk. The property is non-smoking and is located 2.7 km from Sant Miquel Beach.

At the hotel, every room is fitted with a desk. All units include a safety deposit box.

Guests at Exe Plaza Catalunya can enjoy a buffet or a gluten-free breakfast.

Speaking Catalan, English, Spanish and French at the 24-hour front desk, staff are always on hand to help.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Plaça Catalunya, Portal de l'Angel and Boqueria Market. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km away.

Name: Eurohotel Diagonal Port
Description:
Just 350 metres from Mar Bella Beach, Eurohotel Diagonal Port offers Mediterranean Sea views from its setting in Barcelona’s Poble Nou district.

Rooms at this hotel are spacious and feature contemporary design. All come with air conditioning, satellite TV. Free wired internet access is also available.

Facilities at Eurohotel Diagonal Port include a continental breakfast.

Eurohotel Diagonal Port is located 7 minutes’ walk from Poblenou Metro Station, which is just 5 stops from central Barcelona. The hotel is just over 2 km from Ciutadella Park and the Forum venue is a 20-minute walk away.

The hotel offers easy access to the 22@ financial district, close to Barcelona International Convention Centre and shops. There is a Metro station and buses stop within 5 minutes' walk of the hotel.

Name: El Avenida Palace
Description:
El Avenida Palace Hotel is set on Barcelona’s Gran Via, 5 minutes’ walk from Plaza Catalunya, La Rambla and Paseo de Gracia. Its grand interior features an impressive staircase and marble columns.

Many famous guests have stayed at the Hotel Avenida Palace, including the Beatles in 1965.

The elegant air-conditioned rooms feature satellite TV and carpeted or parquet floors. Rooms are soundproofed and have a minibar, work desk and a safe.

The hotel's panoramic rooftop terrace offers views over the city, a sun deck and a swimming pool. There is also a lounge bar, a 24-hour front desk and both free WiFi and room service are available.

Name: Brummell Apartments Poble Sec
Description:
Situated in Barcelona, 1.3 km from Magic Fountain of Montjuic and 1.8 km from Plaça Catalunya, Brummell Apartments Poble Sec offers a rooftop pool and air conditioning. It is located 1.8 km from Portal de l'Angel and features a lift. Featuring free WiFi throughout the property, the non-smoking apartment features a sauna.

The apartment with a terrace and city views has 2 bedrooms, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 2 bathrooms with a shower. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. The property has an outdoor dining area.

A bicycle rental service is available at the apartment.

Popular points of interest near Brummell Apartments Poble Sec include Palau Sant Jordi, Passeig de Gracia and Boqueria Market. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km from the property, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: Casual Colours Barcelona
Description:
Casual Colours Barcelona is set approximately 10 minutes’ walk from Barcelona Sants Railway Station and 200 metres from Avinguda Diagonal. This functional hotel offers comfortable rooms and free Wi-Fi.

Casual Colors offers simple, attractive décor. Each of its air-conditioned rooms has a TV and minibar.

The property has easy access to Barcelona’s main attractions. Las Ramblas and the city’s old town can be reached in approximately 15 minutes from either Sants or Entença Metro Stations.

The hotel serves a daily buffet breakfast. Staff at the 24-hour reception can arrange restaurant reservations and provide information on the city’s attractions.

Sants Metro Station connects guests to La Fira Exhibition Centre and Plaza de España in just 3 stops. The airport bus also stops here.

Name: BBarcelona Fira Superior Flats
Description:
Featuring city views, BBarcelona Fira Superior Flats is situated in the Sants-Montjuïc district of Barcelona, 1.5 km from Palau Sant Jordi and 1.4 km from Sants Railway Station. There is a private entrance at the apartment for the convenience of those who stay. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Magic Fountain of Montjuic is 700 metres away.

All units at the apartment complex come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a kitchen, a dining area and a private bathroom with a hair dryer, a shower and free toiletries. A dishwasher, an oven and microwave are also offered, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, units include bed linen and towels.

Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 3.3 km from the apartment, while Plaça Catalunya is 3.7 km away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 10 km from the property, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: Charmsuites Paralel
Description:
Offering stylish, well-equipped apartments with free Wi-Fi, Charmsuites Paralel is set next to Parallel Metro Station and Victoria Theatre. It features air-conditioned accommodation with kitchen facilities.

These spacious, newly built apartments have attractive, modern décor. All have a spacious living room with a sofa bed and a flat-screen TV. Kitchens and kitchenettes come with an electric hob, oven, kettle and coffee maker.

Shops, cafés and bars can be found in the streets surrounding the apartments. There are many restaurants in the nearby Raval district and around Las Ramblas, a 10-minute walk away.

Barcelona’s Port Vell marina is just over 1 km from Charmsuites Paralel, and the Funicular Train to Montjuïc Hill leaves from Parallel Station. Barcelona's Fira Exhibition Centre is around 15 minutes' walk away.

Name: Park Hotel
Description:
Located in Barcelona’s trendy Born district, Park Hotel offers stylish accommodation just 10 minutes' walk from Barceloneta Beach, opposite to Estació de França Station. Reception is open 24 hours a day. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property.

The air-conditioned rooms at the Hotel Park feature modern décor in warm tones. They are equipped with flat-screen satellite TV, and soundproofing.

A buffet breakfast is served daily in the hotel’s bright café; and a wide variety of tapas are served at the on-site Ten's Tapas Restaurant, from the awarded-winning chef Jordi Cruz.

Park Hotel is just 200 metres from Mercat del Born public market and from Ciudadela Park, where you can find Barcelona Zoo.

Barceloneta Metro Station, located 300 metres from the hotel, connects you with the city centre in just 5 minutes.

Name: Centric apartment Gràcia
Description:
Featuring air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony, Centric apartment Gràcia is located in Barcelona. The property is around 2.2 km from Casa Batllo, 2.7 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and 2.8 km from Tivoli Theatre. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Passeig de Gracia is 1.3 km away.

The apartment is composed of 1 bedroom, a fully equipped kitchen, and 1 bathroom. A flat-screen TV is provided. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include La Pedrera, Sagrada Familia and Park Güell. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from Centric apartment Gràcia.

Name: Ola Living Gaudi
Description:
In the Ciutat Vella district of Barcelona, close to Passeig de Gracia, Ola Living Gaudi features free WiFi and a washing machine. This property is located a short distance from attractions such as Cathedral of Barcelona, Plaça Catalunya, and Santa Maria del Mar. The property is 500 metres from the city centre and 2.1 km from Barceloneta Beach.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 1 bedroom, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a bath and a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Palau de la Musica Catalana, Tivoli Theatre and Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km away.

Name: Centric Apartment El Molino Theater p1
Description:
Located in Barcelona, Centric Apartment El Molino Theater 2 offers a furnished terrace, city views and free WiFi just 150 metres from Paralel Metro Station. Montjuic Park is 10 minutes’ walk away.

This modern apartment features wooden floors and it comes with 2 bedrooms and 1 bathroom with hairdryer. The living area includes a flat-screen TV, sofa and dining table. The kitchen is equipped with a washing machine, microwave and coffee machine.

Located in Barcelona’s Poble Sec neighbourhood, you will find many theatres, bars and restaurants in the surrounding streets.

Plaza de España, with direct buses to Barcelona Airport, is 20 minutes’ walk away and Barceloneta Beach is 2.5 km from the property. Plaza Catalunya is 8 minutes’ metro ride away.

Name: Boutique Apartments 23 Barcelona
Description:
Ideally situated in the Gràcia district of Barcelona, Boutique Apartments 23 Barcelona is located less than 1 km from La Pedrera, a 16-minute walk from Casa Batllo and 1.3 km from Sagrada Familia. It is situated 700 metres from Passeig de Gracia and provides a lift. The aparthotel features quiet street views, a sun terrace, and free WiFi is available.

Accommodation is fitted with air conditioning and features a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a fully equipped kitchen with a dining area, and a private bathroom with a hair dryer. There is also a fridge, kitchenware and a kettle. At the aparthotel, units include bed linen and towels.

There is a coffee shop and lounge.

Sightseeing tours are available in the vicinity of the property.

Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 1.6 km from the aparthotel, while Tivoli Theatre is 1.8 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 14 km away.

Name: Hotel Arconte
Description:
Situated 350 metres from Paseo de Gracia Boulevard, Hotel Arconte is an eco-friendly hotel with a small outdoor pool, sauna and terrace. Provença Train Station is 200 metres away.

The Hotel Arconte's air-conditioned rooms feature elegant white décor and various mirrors. They offer free WiFi, and LCD TVs in the bedroom and bathroom. Bathrooms also include a bathrobes and slippers.

The Hotel Arconte offers a spacious reception area with a lobby bar.

You will find shopping areas nearby.

Diagonal Metro Station is within 400 metres of Hotel Arconte. Gaudi’s Casa Milà and the popular Gràcia district can be reached in an 8-minute walk.

Name: Onix Rambla
Description:
This central Barcelona hotel is surrounded by the boutiques and cafes of the elegant Rambla de Catalunya. It offers free internet access and an outdoor pool, not heated and is open from April to October.

Onix Rambla has a fitness centre and a business centre with free internet access. There is also a nice terrace.

All air-conditioned rooms have flat-screen satellite TV. Rooms are also heated and come with a minibar and free safe. The private bathroom is equipped with a hairdryer and amenities.

The hotel is housed in a building with typical Modernist architecture. The surrounding area of the Eixample neighbourhood is famous for its beautiful buildings.

There is a 24-hour front desk, and you can hire a car at the hotel tour desk.

Please, be aware that swimming pool is not heated and will be opened from April to October.

Name: AinB B&B Eixample-Muntaner
Description:
Set at the heart of historical Barcelona and near to many of its most popular sites, this carefully restored hotel is set in a charming, Neoclassical building.

The spacious rooms in the AinB B&B Eixample-Muntaner are elegantly decorated with organic colours to highlight the original features of the building.

Splendid decor includes soothing white walls punctuated by Barroque furniture and all is highlighted by plenty of natural light.

The hotel features a communal lounge and kitchen, allowing you to prepare your own meals before heading out to explore the city. Both the kitchen and the lounge are shared in the AinB B&B Eixample-Muntaner.

Stroll from this guest accommodation to the famous Las Ramblas  less than 5 minutes away by foot. Nearby are the spectacular Modernist buildings of La Pedrera and Casa Batlló  the well-known architectural work of Antoni Gaudí.

In the evening you can explore the neighbourhoods of Raval and the Gothic Quarter, where you will find numerous restaurants, bars and nightclubs.

Name: Hotel Lugano Barcelona
Description:
Set on Avinguda Parallel, Lugano is 500 metres from Plaza España’s FIRA Exhibition Centre, and the nearby Metro and railway stations. It offers a 24-hour reception and free Wi-Fi.

Each air-conditioned room at Lugano has simple décor. There is a flat-screen TV, a minibar and a private bathroom with free toiletries.

Guests can enjoy a buffet breakfast in the Lugano’s café-bar. Restaurants can be found in Barcelona’s Gothic Quarter and along Las Ramblas, 20 minutes’ walk away. Drassanes Metro Station, at the bottom of Las Ramblas, is also just 2 stops from Poble Sec Metro Station.

Rooms located on the main façade and with views over Avenida del Paralelo. It has two beds and an extra bed to accommodate a third person.

Montjuïc Park, the MNAC Museum and Pueblo Español Village are less than 1 km from the hotel. The city’s old port is just 2 km away.

Name: Inside Barcelona Apartments Esparteria
Description:
These stylish apartments are located in Barcelona’s El Born district, 3 minutes' walk from the Picasso Museum. Each apartment offers free Wi-Fi and flat-screen satellite TV.

Inside Barcelona Apartments Espartería are bright and air-conditioned. They all have a spacious seating area and a modern kitchenette with an oven, hob, fridge and n´espresso machine

Inside Barcelona Apartments Esparteria has a communal terrace (open during office hours), where guests can enjoy views of nearby Santa María del Mar Church.

Staff at reception can help organise your trip to Barcelona.

The Esparteria is within 100 metres of the popular Passeig del Born. Barceloneta Beach is a 15-minute walk away, and Ciutadella Park is 400 metres away. There are various restaurants, bars and supermarkets within a short walk.

Name: En Casa de Girona 17
Description:
En Casa de Girona 17 features accommodation within 700 metres of the centre of Barcelona, with free WiFi, and a kitchen with a dishwasher, an oven and a microwave. It is situated 2.4 km from Barceloneta Beach and offers a lift. The apartment has family rooms.

All units are fitted with air conditioning, a toaster, a fridge, a coffee machine, a shower, a hair dryer and a desk. Every unit is fitted with a kettle and a private bathroom, while certain rooms have a terrace and some have city views. At the apartment complex, the units are fitted with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Passeig de Gracia, Palau de la Musica Catalana and Tivoli Theatre. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 14 km from the property.

Name: Catalonia La Boquería
Description:
Catalonia La Boqueria hotel is set in the centre of Barcelona’s old town, a few metres from Las Ramblas. This stylish hotel offers free WiFi and rooms with satellite TV.

Catalonia La Boqueria hotel features contemporary design and modern rooms decorated elegantly. Each room has air conditioning, a minibar and a desk.

Catalonia La Boqueria hotel is ideally situated for visiting Barcelona’s main attractions. There are several restaurants, bars and cafés in the nearby Gothic Quarter and the famous Boquería Market is less than 100 metres away.

Barcelona Port is a 10-minute walk from the hotel and the city’s cathedral is one kilometre away. Liceu Metro Station and Liceu Theatre are a 1-minute walk from the Catalonia La Boqueria hotel.

Name: Hg City Suites Barcelona Apartments
Description:
Set within 800 metres of Passeig de Gracia and 1.3 km of La Pedrera, Hg City Suites Barcelona Apartments offers rooms with air conditioning and a private bathroom in Barcelona. Among the facilities at this property are a 24-hour front desk and a lift, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Private parking can be arranged at an extra charge.

All self-catered units feature parquet floors and are fitted with a satellite flat-screen TV, a safety deposit box, an equipped kitchen with a microwave, and a private bathroom with shower. At the apartment complex, the units come with bed linen and towels.

A car rental service is available at the apartment.

Casa Batllo is 1.7 km from Hg City Suites Barcelona Apartments, while Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 2.5 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from the accommodation.

Name: ApartEasy - Family 4-Bedroom Apartment
Description:
Set in Barcelona, 1.2 km from Magic Fountain of Montjuic and 1.6 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, ApartEasy - Family 4-Bedroom Apartment offers air conditioning. Among the facilities at this property are a lift and private check-in and check-out, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The accommodation offers airport transfers, while a bicycle rental service is also available.

The spacious apartment is fitted with 4 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, bed linen, towels, a TV with satellite channels, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a balcony with city views. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Sightseeing tours are available within easy reach.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Tivoli Theatre, Plaça Catalunya and Sants Railway Station. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 11 km from ApartEasy - Family 4-Bedroom Apartment.

Name: Catalonia Rigoletto
Description:
The stylish Catalonia Rigoletto is set 500 metres from FC Barça’s Camp Nou stadium and 5 minutes’ walk from Maria Cristina Metro Station. It offers an outdoor pool and rooms with free WiFi and flat-screen TVs.

The Rigoletto’s spacious rooms are air conditioned and decorated with dark woods and luxurious fabrics. All rooms have satellite TV, free smartphone, a minibar and safety deposit box.

A buffet breakfast is on offer in the dining room and Mediterranean cuisine is served in the stylish La Traviata restaurant. There is also a bar in the hotel featuring attractive art work.

Sights including Las Ramblas and Gaudí’s Casa Batlló can be reached in 15 minutes, by Metro. Sants Railway Station, where there is an airport train connection, is just 1.5 km from the Rigoletto.

Name: Yurbban Ramblas Boutique Hotel
Description:
Situated conveniently in the centre of Barcelona, Yurbban Ramblas Boutique Hotel offers air-conditioned rooms, a terrace, free WiFi and a restaurant. Popular points of interest nearby include Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Tivoli Theatre and Passeig de Gracia. The property is non-smoking and is set 2.5 km from Sant Miquel Beach.

At the hotel, all rooms are fitted with a wardrobe, a TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Every room has a safety deposit box, while selected rooms will provide you with a balcony and others also have city views.

A buffet breakfast is available every morning at Yurbban Ramblas Boutique Hotel.

Speaking English, Spanish and French, staff are willing to help at the 24-hour front desk.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Boqueria Market, Plaça Catalunya and Portal de l'Angel. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km away.

Name: Hostal Argo
Description:
Hostal Argo is a modern guest house located Barcelona, 4 minutes' walk from Diagonal Avenue and 450 metres away from Passeig de Gràcia. Free Wi-Fi access is available.

Air-conditioned rooms at Argo feature stylish Minimalist décor in neutral tones. They feature parquet floors, a TV and a private bathroom with shower, hairdryer and free toiletries. Bed linen and towels are included.

At Hostal Argo you will find a 24-hour front desk where luggage storage can be provided for free. An exclusive roof-top terrace with limited access is featured during summer season.

Modernist buildings like La Pedrera or Casa Batlló are 8 minutes on foot. Sagrada Familia Temple is 1 km away. The nearest metro station is Girona, 400 metres away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 20 minutes by car.

Name: Alcam Flassaders
Description:
In the centre of Barcelona, located within a short distance of Somorrostro Beach and Barceloneta Beach, Alcam Flassaders offers free WiFi, air conditioning and household amenities such as a microwave and coffee machine. The property is set 1.3 km from Passeig de Gracia, less than 1 km from Palau de la Musica Catalana and a 15-minute walk from Tivoli Theatre. The property is non-smoking and is situated 1.6 km from Sant Miquel Beach.

This apartment is equipped with 1 bedroom, a kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a flat-screen TV, a seating area and 1 bathroom. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Picasso Museum, Santa Maria del Mar and Plaça Reial. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km away.

Name: NH Barcelona Les Corts
Description:
Located 5 minutes’ walk from Les Corts Metro Station, this hotel offers modern accommodation in Barcelona. It has good access to the city's main attractions, such as the Nou Camp Football Stadium.

The air-conditioned rooms at the NH Barcelona Les Corts feature contemporary décor, free Wi-Fi, satellite TV and a private balcony or terrace. The private bathroom has a hairdryer and toiletries.

The hotel operates a tour desk and a 24-hour reception. Helpful staff can organise bicycle and car rental, as well as provide information on Barcelona.

NH Les Corts is less than 10 minutes’ walk from Sants Train Station, providing access to Barcelona Airport. L’Illa Diagonal Shopping Centre is just 300 metres away. Barcelona Airport is 15 km from the property.

Name: Pestana Arena Barcelona
Description:
Pestana Arena Barcelona is less than 5 minutes’ walk from Barcelona’s Plaza Espanya and Fira Exhibition Centre. It offers a gym, sauna and modern, air-conditioned rooms with free wired internet access.

Some rooms offers free use of the Maritimo Meeting Room, up to 12 people, for private meetings.

Pestana Arena Barcelona is just 3 minutes’ walk from Las Arenas Shopping Centre and you can walk to Sants Station in 8 minutes. You can get to the Rambla in 5 minutes from Plaza Espanya Metro.

Rooms feature parquet floors and stylish décor. Each one has work desk, a pillow menu and an LCD TV with satellite channels.

The hotel’s restaurant serves Mediterranean food and has a terrace. There is also a bar where you can get a snack or a drink. The hotel's breakfast includes products for celiacs.

Until further notice, the use of jacuzzi is prohibited due to the existing drought in Catalonia.

Name: 31ENT1027 - Mediterranean decorated apartment
Description:
Set in Barcelona, less than 1 km from Sants Railway Station and a 17-minute walk from Magic Fountain of Montjuic, 31ENT1027 - Mediterranean decorated apartment offers air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. It is located 2.5 km from Plaça Catalunya and features a lift. The property is non-smoking and is situated 2.1 km from Casa Batllo.

The apartment has 2 bedrooms, a TV, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment.

Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 2.5 km from the apartment, while Passeig de Gracia is 2.6 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 11 km away.

Name: Catalonia Passeig de Gràcia 4* Sup
Description:
Located next to Barcelona’s Passeig de Gracia Boulevard, Catalonia Passeig de Gràcia 4* Sup offers an outdoor pool, a free gym, a terrace, free Wi-Fi and paid private parking.

All the rooms at Catalonia Passeig de Gràcia 4* Sup has a smart TV with Chromecast app.

The restaurant offers Mediterranean cuisine with a selection of dishes from the "Gourmet Corner" menu. Gluten-free menus are available on request.

There is also a gastrobar and a bar with a cocktail menu. An electric vehicle charging station is available.

The property is 500 metres from Gaudí’s Casa Batlló, 200 metres from Passeig de Gràcia Metro Station, 13-minute walk from La Pedrera and 7-minute walk from Palau de la Música Catalana. Airport buses can be reached within 350 metres.

Airport buses leave from Plaza Catalunya, located 350 metres away.

Name: Som Nit Port Vell
Description:
Ideally located in the Ciutat Vella district of Barcelona, Som Nit Port Vell is set 1.3 km from Barceloneta Beach, 2.9 km from Nova Icaria Beach and 3 km from Mar Bella Beach. Among the facilities at this property are full-day security and a housekeeping service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is 1.2 km from Sant Miquel Beach, and within 1.2 km of the city centre.

The guest house will provide guests with air-conditioned units with a desk, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a shower. At the guest house, all units are soundproof. At the guest house, units come with bed linen and towels.

Sightseeing tours are available within easy reach of the property. A bicycle rental service is available at the guest house.

Popular points of interest near Som Nit Port Vell include Santa Maria del Mar, Picasso Museum and Plaça Reial. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km from the property, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: Acta Antibes
Description:
The Acta Antibes is set in Barcelona’s Eixample District, 10 minutes’ walk from the Sagrada Familia. This hotel features a 24-hour reception, buffet breakfast and free Wi-Fi.

Each of the Acta Antibes’s rooms has simple, stylish décor and wooden flooring. All air-conditioned rooms have a TV and a desk.

Whilst visiting the city’s tourist attractions, guests at the Antibes can make use of its luggage storage. A gluten-free breakfast is available upon request.

The hotel is ideally located for visiting sights such as Gaudí’s Casa Batlló and La Pedrera, which are around 20 minutes’ walk away.

Plaza de Catalunya and Las Ramblas are just over one kilometre away. The nearest Metro station, Monumental, is just 200 metres from the hotel.

Name: Be Barcelona Eixample Universidad
Description:
Be Barcelona Eixample Universidad is situated in the Eixample district of Barcelona, 1.2 km from Casa Batllo, 1.5 km from Plaça Catalunya and 1.4 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. Among the facilities at this property are a lift and private check-in and check-out, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The accommodation features airport transfers, while a bicycle rental service is also available.

The spacious apartment has 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a balcony with city views. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Sightseeing tours are available within a reachable distance of the property. A car rental service is available at the apartment.

Popular points of interest near Be Barcelona Eixample Universidad include Tivoli Theatre, La Pedrera and Portal de l'Angel. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km from the property.

Name: Bonavista Apartments - Eixample
Description:
Located in a typical Eixample-style building in Barcelona’s Quadrat d’Or, Bonavista Apartments Eixample offers modern accommodation with free Wi-Fi. Plaza Catalunya Square is 1.5 km away.

All 2-bedroom apartments feature a modern décor with parquet flooring and contemporary furnishings. Each includes a 32-inch flat-screen TV, a washing machine and ironing facilities. The fully-equipped kitchenette includes a kettle, microwave and dishwasher.

Bonavista Apartments – Eixample is located on the corner of Enric Granados Street, where guests will find plenty of cafés, bars and restaurants. There is also a supermarket just 1 block away.

Diagonal Metro Stop, servicing lines 3 and 5, is a 5-minute walk away. Barcelona’s FGC urban rail line also stops at Provença, just 250 metres from the apartments and will take you to Plaça Catalunya in about 5 minutes.

Name: NH Collection Barcelona Constanza
Description:
Offering a rooftop pool and terrace,  NH Collection Barcelona Constanza has modern rooms with satellite TV. It is located next to L’Illa Shopping Centre on Diagonal Avenue, 15 minutes' walk from Sants Train Station.

The elegant, modern rooms at the Constanza feature a Nespresso machine, flat-screen TV, and pillow menu, while the bathroom includes a rain shower and a professional hairdryer. Free WiFi is included.

Guests can use the spa for an extra cost: please, note that the spa is included for stays in Premium rooms, Junior suites and Suite. The gym is available free of charge. Room service is available 24 hours.

The hotel's Antiox healthy buffet breakfast features antioxidant dishes made with ecological produce.

The hotel is 15 minutes’ walk from Barcelona FC’s Camp Nou Stadium. María Cristina Metro Station is 10 minutes’ walk away, connecting you with the Fira Exhibition Centre in under 10 minutes.

Name: Find Calm at this cozy City Sanctuary with terrace
Description:
In the Eixample district of Barcelona, close to Passeig de Gracia, Find Calm at this cozy City Sanctuary with terrace has a terrace, free WiFi and a washing machine. Guests staying at this apartment have access to a patio. The property is 1.1 km from the city centre and 700 metres from Casa Batllo.

The spacious apartment includes 2 bedrooms, a living room, and 2 bathrooms with a hair dryer and a walk-in shower. A flat-screen TV is available. The accommodation offers a fireplace.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include La Pedrera, Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and Tivoli Theatre. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from Find Calm at this cozy City Sanctuary with terrace.

Name: Occidental Atenea Mar - Adults Only
Description:
Situated 150 metres from Barcelona’s Nova Mar Bella Beach, Occidental Atenea Mar - Adults Only offers sauna and gym, and a free WiFi zone. Each air-conditioned room features international satellite TV.

The hotel features a terrace with sea views and a seasonal infinity pool with hydromassage beds and seats. You can rent Balinese beds and sun loungers. There is also a seasonal snack bar, which is open from June to September.

Occidental Atenea Mar - Adults Only offers bright, functional rooms, many with views of the city or sea. They include a minibar, a free safe and a private bathroom with amenities.

The hotel’s Canela restaurant serves à la carte Mediterranean meals, and a varied breakfast buffet is available each morning. There are also many bars and restaurants on the nearby seafront promenade.

Regular bus services to central Barcelona stop outside the Occidental Atenea Mar - Adults Only, while Poble Nou Metro Station is a 10-minute walk away. The CCIB Conference Centre and Diagonal Mar Shopping Centre are just 1 km from the hotel.

Name: Hostal Barcelona Centro
Description:
Within 5 minutes’ walk of Passeig de Gràcia and Catalunya Metro and railway stations, Hostal Barcelona Centro offers modern rooms with free Wi-Fi.

Each air-conditioned room at Hostal Barcelona Centro has a flat-screen TV, heating and private bathroom.

Restaurants, bars and cafés can be found on Passeig de Gràcia and around Las Ramblas, 10 minutes' walking from Hostal Barcelona Centro.

Gaudí’s Casa Batlló and La Pedrera can be reached in 5 minutes by foot. Plaza de Catalunya and the Gothic Quarter are within 600 metres of the guest house.

Name: Duquesa de Cardona Hotel 4 Sup by Grup Duquessa
Description:
The 19th-century Duquesa de Cardona Hotel 4 Sup by Grup Duquessa, opposite Barcelona’s marina in the Gothic Quarter, is 600 metres from the Ramblas and has free Wi-Fi. Its rooftop terrace offers panoramic city views and includes 2 plunge pools and a bar. Property also features a Gym.

Duquesa de Cardona has spacious, air-conditioned rooms with a flat-screen satellite TV, a safety deposit box and a minibar. The private bathroom comes with a bathrobe and slippers.

The hotel’s restaurant offers Mediterranean cuisine. During summer, the snack bar serves creative tapas, BBQ dishes and cocktails.

The famous Sagrada Familia is 2.5 km away, and Barceloneta Metro Station is only 300 metres away. The Maremagnum Shopping Centre and Barcelona Aquarium are 500 metres from Duquesa de Cardona Hotel 4 Sup by Grup Duquessa.

Name: Rooms Aribau
Description:
Attractively situated in the Eixample district of Barcelona, Rooms Aribau is set 1.3 km from Plaça Catalunya, 1.1 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and less than 1 km from La Pedrera. It is situated 1.1 km from Passeig de Gracia and features a shared kitchen. The property is 1.1 km from the city centre and less than 1 km from Casa Batllo.

All units are fitted with air conditioning, a microwave, a toaster, a coffee machine, a bidet, a hair dryer and a wardrobe. With a shared bathroom fitted with a bath and free toiletries, units at the bed and breakfast also boast free WiFi. At the bed and breakfast, every unit is fitted with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the bed and breakfast include Boqueria Market, Tivoli Theatre and Palau de la Musica Catalana. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km from the property.

Name: Gran Hotel Havana 4Sup by Escampa Hotels
Description:
This elegant, design hotel is set in Barcelona’s city centre, 5 minutes’ walk from Plaza Catalunya. It features a sauna and a seasonal rooftop pool with a terrace.

The Gran Hotel Havana is located in Casa Fradera, a historic building dating from 1882. Rooms are decorated in a classic style and feature a marble bathroom. They come with a flat-screen TV and free WiFi.

The Grand Place restaurant serves traditional cuisine, and in summer guests can enjoy light meals on the hotel’s rooftop bar-terrace.

Please note that the rooftop bar-terrace may be closed to the public at certain times due to private events.

Girona Metro Station is 200 metres away while the stylish Paseo de Gracia is just 5 minutes’ walk from the hotel, with many shops, bars and restaurants.

Name: 51PAR1011 Nice apartment in Parallel
Description:
Set in Barcelona, 700 metres from Magic Fountain of Montjuic and 1.9 km from Plaça Catalunya, 51PAR1011 Nice apartment in Parallel offers air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. It is located 2.6 km from Portal de l'Angel and features a lift. The property is non-smoking and is situated 2.6 km from Passeig de Gracia.

The apartment features 3 bedrooms, a TV, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Boqueria Market, Sants Railway Station and Palau Sant Jordi. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km away.

Name: Catalonia La Maquinista
Description:
Catalonia La Maquinista is ideally located next to the La Maquinista Shopping Centre in Barcelona’s Sant Andreu District. Plaza de Catalunya is just a 15-minute Metro journey away.

The Maquinista’s bright rooms have air conditioning and flat-screen smart TV equipped with Chromecast app. All rooms have a work desk and safe. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the hotel.

The hotel restaurant serves a buffet breakfast and Mediterranean cuisine for lunch and dinner. The neighbouring Maquinista Shopping Centre has a selection of cinemas, a bowling alley, as well as cafés and bars.

Catalonia La Maquinista is 500 metres from Barcelona’s ring road, the B10 Ronda del Litoral, connecting guests to the beach in 10 minutes.

Sant Andreu Metro and Railway Station is just a 10-minute walk from Catalonia La Maquinista and has direct trains to Passeig de Gràcia and to El Prat Airport. Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas are 8 Metro stops away.

As with reservations of more than 4 rooms, special conditions and supplements will apply to those of more than 8 nights.

Name: Dalia Ramblas
Description:
Set 50 metres from the Ramblas, in the Raval district, Dalia Ramblas features air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi. Well served by public transport, it offers 24-hour reception and free luggage storage.

Featuring a modern and functional décor, rooms come with a flat-screen TV, wardrobe and a desk. All have a private bathroom with bath or shower. Free toiletries and hairdryer are provided.

Dalia Ramblas is set in the lively city centre. There are plenty of bars and restaurants in the surrounding area.

Next to the Gothic Quarter, Dalia Ramblas is 10 minutes’ walk from Plaza Catalunya and from Barcelona Cathedral. You can also reach the bustling Plaza Reial Square in a 5-minute walk.

Barcelona Airport is 12 km away from the hotel. Regular airport buses leave from a bus stop located just 800 metres away.

Name: Hotel & Spa Villa Olimpica Suites
Description:
This minimalist hotel is situated in the Poble Nou district of Barcelona, 15 minutes’ by foot from Bogatell Beach. It offers a seasonal outdoor pool surrounded by wooden decking and loungers.

The suites at Hotel & Spa Villa Olimpica Suites feature monochrome decoration and a flat-screen TV. They also include air conditioning and a modern bathroom.

The Hotel & Spa Villa Olimpica Suites complex offers a stylish café-bar and restaurant. Guests can enjoy Mediterranean cuisine from the á la carte and daily menus. In summer meals can be enjoyed on the terrace by the pool.

Guests have access to the hotel's large spa for an additional cost. It includes an indoor treatment pool, Finnish sauna, Turkish baths, jacuzzis, hot tubs, several types of shower and an ice fountain. There is also a gym.

Barcelona Port is 15 minutes' walk away and Bogatell Metro Station is 100 metres from the hotel. Guests can walk to the lively Villa Olimpica area in 5 minutes.

All rooms include 1 complimentary access per person per stay to the hotel spa (subject to availability and upon reservation).

Name: BcnStop Sagrada Familia
Description:
Less than 1 km from Sagrada Familia, BcnStop Sagrada Familia is a recently renovated property set in Barcelona and offers air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi and private parking. There is a private entrance at the aparthotel for the convenience of those who stay. Featuring family rooms, this property also provides guests with a sun terrace.

The units come with parquet floors and feature a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, and a private bathroom with a bath or shower and a hair dryer. A toaster, a fridge and stovetop are also featured, as well as a coffee machine. At the aparthotel, the units come with bed linen and towels.

Sightseeing tours are available close by. Both a bicycle rental service and a car rental service are available at the aparthotel.

La Pedrera is 2.8 km from BcnStop Sagrada Familia, while Passeig de Gracia is 3.1 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 16 km away, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: Barrio Gotico Apartments Escudellers
Description:
Right in the centre of Barcelona, situated within a short distance of Sant Sebastian Beach and Sant Miquel Beach, Barrio Gotico Apartments Escudellers offers free WiFi, air conditioning and household amenities such as an oven and coffee machine. This apartment features accommodation with a balcony. The accommodation provides a lift, and luggage storage for guests.

The spacious apartment has 2 separate bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, a fully equipped kitchen with a dining area and dishwasher, and a living room with a flat-screen TV. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. This apartment is non-smoking and soundproof.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Barceloneta Beach, Plaça Reial and Santa Maria del Mar. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km from the property.

Name: 51SAM1021 - Modern apartment near Montjuic
Description:
Set in Barcelona in the Catalonia region, 51SAM1021 - Modern apartment near Montjuic features a balcony. It is situated 600 metres from Magic Fountain of Montjuic and offers a lift. Plaça Catalunya is 2.6 km from the apartment and Portal de l'Angel is 2.7 km away.

Each unit is fitted with air conditioning, a private bathroom and a well-fitted kitchen including a dishwasher, oven, microwave and a toaster. A fridge and kitchenware are also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, the units come with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Sants Railway Station, Boqueria Market and Palau Sant Jordi. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km away.

Name: Sixties Ramblas
Description:
Offering a 1960’s vibe and rooms with vintage décor, this hotel is set in the heart of Barcelona, only 2 minutes’ walk from the famous Ramblas.  Free Wi-Fi is available throughout.

Each air-conditioned room at Sixties Ramblas features a TV and a private bathroom. Most rooms have a balcony.

Sixties Ramblas has a bar and a restaurant. Staff at the 24-hour reception can provide tourist information about the area. Bike rental services are also available, and there is also a stylish white billiards table.

The nearest Metro Station is Drassanes, only 2 minutes’ walk from the hotel. You can also walk to the harbour or Plaza Catalunya Square in less than 10 minutes.

Sixties Ramblas is close to the Born district, with numerous trendy bars and restaurants serving local and international food.

Name: You Stylish Sagrada Familia Apartments
Description:
Located within 2.8 km of Nova Icaria Beach and 500 metres of Sagrada Familia in Barcelona, You Stylish Sagrada Familia Apartments features accommodation with seating area. Among the facilities at this property are a lift and a concierge service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The accommodation provides a shuttle service, while a bicycle rental service is also available.

The apartment complex will provide guests with air-conditioned units offering a wardrobe, a coffee machine, a dishwasher, an oven, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. There is also a dining area and a fully equipped kitchen equipped with a microwave, a toaster, and a fridge. At the apartment complex, all units have bed linen and towels.

Sightseeing tours are available in the area.

Casa Batllo is 2.4 km from the apartment, while La Pedrera is 2.4 km away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 15 km from the property.

Name: Brummell Apartments Gracia
Description:
Brummell Apartments Gracia features a balcony and is situated in Barcelona, within just less than 1 km of Passeig de Gracia and a 14-minute walk of La Pedrera. Among the facilities at this property are a lift and a concierge service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The accommodation features airport transfers, while a bicycle rental service is also available.

The spacious apartment has 1 bedroom, a TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Casa Batllo, Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and Sagrada Familia. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 14 km from the property.

Name: Ideal 2 bedroom apartment close to Plaza ESpaña
Description:
Set in Barcelona, 800 metres from Sants Railway Station and 2.9 km from Camp Nou, Ideal 2 bedroom apartment close to Plaza ESpaña offers air conditioning. It is situated 3.4 km from Casa Batllo and offers a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Magic Fountain of Montjuic is 1.6 km away.

The apartment features 2 bedrooms, a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave and a fridge, a washing machine and 1 bathroom with a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Palau Sant Jordi is 3.5 km from Ideal 2 bedroom apartment close to Plaza ESpaña, while Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 3.5 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 10 km away.

Name: The Orbit Apartments
Description:
A recently renovated property, The Orbit Apartments is set in Barcelona near Park Güell, Passeig de Gracia and La Pedrera. Among the facilities at this property are a lift and luggage storage space, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Boasting family rooms, this property also provides guests with a sun terrace.

All units at the apartment complex come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a kitchen, a dining area and a private bathroom with a hair dryer, a shower and free toiletries. A dishwasher, an oven and microwave are also offered, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, the units include bed linen and towels.

Sightseeing tours are available within easy reach. The apartment has a picnic area where you can spend a day out in the open.

Casa Batllo is 2.6 km from the apartment, while Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 3.1 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 14 km away.

Name: AMISTAT City Hostel Barcelona
Description:
AMISTAT City Hostel Barcelona features a shared lounge, terrace, a restaurant and bar in Barcelona. Among the facilities at this property are a concierge service and a tour desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The accommodation provides evening entertainment and a shared kitchen.

Guest rooms at the hostel include air conditioning and a wardrobe.

The breakfast offers à la carte, continental or vegetarian options.

Speaking Catalan, German, English and Spanish at the 24-hour front desk, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical guidance on the area.

Sagrada Familia is 3.1 km from AMISTAT City Hostel Barcelona, while La Pedrera is 4.6 km away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 17 km from the property.

Name: Onix Fira
Description:
Onix Fira offers a small rooftop pool which is opened from April to October and is not heated and soundproofed rooms in Barcelona’s centre, overlooking Joan Miró Park. Lively Plaza Espanya is 200 metres away and offers a direct connection to Ramblas.

All of the spacious rooms in the Onix Fira come with free Wi-Fi, a modern décor and a private bathroom. They include a safe, minibar and telephone.

A number of restaurants and bars can be found within a 15-minute walk from the Onix Fira Hotel.

Montjuïc and the Magic Fountains are less than a 10 minutes’ walk away from Fira. The airport bus and Fira Exhibition Centre are 200 metres away.

Please, be aware that swimming pool is not heated and will be opened from April to October.

Name: Centric Apartment Molino P3
Description:
Situated in Barcelona, 1.7 km from Plaça Catalunya and 1.9 km from Santa Maria del Mar, Centric Apartment Molino P3 offers air conditioning. This property is set a short distance from attractions such as Cathedral of Barcelona, Montjuïc, and Plaça Reial. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Magic Fountain of Montjuic is 1.6 km away.

The spacious apartment has 2 separate bedrooms, 1 bathroom, a fully equipped kitchen with a dining area, and a flat-screen TV. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Portal de l'Angel, Passeig de Gracia and Boqueria Market. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 11 km from Centric Apartment Molino P3.

Name: Apartamentos DV
Description:
Featuring free Wi-Fi and air conditioning, Apartamentos DV is located in Barcelona, 800 metres from Camp Nou. Palau Sant Jordi is 2.8 km from the property. Private parking is available for a fee.

Offering views over a patio, each apartment comes with a flat-screen TV and a fully equipped kitchen including a microwave, kettle and kitchenware. Apartments come with a bathroom with a double ended bath and hairdryer is available on prior request. Apartments are cleaned every day and bed linen and towels are provided. Superior apartments have a spa bath.

Plenty of restaurants, bars and shops are within 5 minutes' walk.

Montjuïc is 2.9 km from Apartamentos DV, while Casa Batllo is 3.9 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 9 km from the property.

Name: Fabulous One bedroom Apartament in Poble nou
Description:
Fabulous One bedroom Apartament in Poble nou is set in the Sant Martí district of Barcelona, less than 1 km from Nova Icaria Beach, a 14-minute walk from Mar Bella Beach and 1.5 km from Port Olimpic. The property is located 2.8 km from Sagrada Familia, 3.1 km from Santa Maria del Mar and 3.2 km from Passeig de Gracia. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Bogatell Beach is 800 metres away.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 1 bedroom, a fully equipped kitchen and 1 bathroom. A flat-screen TV is offered. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Picasso Museum is 3.3 km from the apartment, while Palau de la Musica Catalana is 3.3 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 15 km away.

Name: Parc Güell
Description:
Located in Barcelona, 600 metres from Park Güell and 3.9 km from Passeig de Gracia, Parc Güell offers free WiFi and air conditioning. The property is around 4.3 km from Casa Batllo, 4.5 km from Sagrada Familia and 4.8 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. The property is non-smoking and is situated 4.1 km from La Pedrera.

The apartment is equipped with 2 bedrooms, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a hair dryer and free toiletries. A TV is provided.

Tivoli Theatre is 4.9 km from Parc Güell, while Plaça Catalunya is 5.1 km away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 16 km from the property.

Name: Acta Atrium Palace
Description:
