This elegant hotel is 250 metres from Paseo de Gracia Metro Station and Boulevard. Plaza Catalunya is a 5-minute walk away. It offers free Wi-Fi.

Set in an attractive building, dating from 1888, rooms at the Acta Atrium Palace are modern and chic, with air conditioning and satellite TV. The private bathrooms offer free toiletries and a bathrobe.

The hotel has 24-hour room service.

Gaudí's famous Casa Batlló and La Pedrera are 10 minutes' walk away. There is a 24-hour front desk, and you can hire a car at the hotel tour desk. Public parking is available nearby.

Name: Cram Hotel
Description:
Hotel Cram Hotel is set in Barcelona’s central Eixample district, a 10-minute walk from Plaza Catalunya. It features a rooftop pool with city views and the Two Michelin Stars Angle Barcelona restaurant. All rooms have free WiFi and large flat-screen TVs.

The Cram Hotel Hotel is located in a building that dates back to 1892 and features a modernist façade, and a modern, elegant interior. Rooms boast advanced lighting and access control technology.

The air-conditioned rooms at Cram Hotel Hotel feature a private bathroom with a hairdryer. A bathrobe and slippers are available upon request. Rooms feature beds by Treca de Paris, and elegant curtains by Gastón y Daniela. Some rooms have a private balcony.

The Two Michelin Stars Restaurante Angle Barcelona offers modern dishes using fresh produce. Hotel Cram Hotel Barcelona also has a cocktail bar and poolside bar, and room service is available.

The hotel has a tour desk and 24-hour front desk. You can hire a bicycle or car.

Name: Gothic - Ramblas Apartments
Description:
Located in the centre of Barcelona, 1.9 km from Sant Sebastian Beach and 1.9 km from Sant Miquel Beach, Gothic - Ramblas Apartments offers free WiFi and air conditioning. It is set 2 km from Barceloneta Beach and provides a lift. The apartment features family rooms.

Each unit comes with a balcony, a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a washing machine, and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. A toaster, a fridge and stovetop are also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, all units are fitted with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Plaça Reial, Santa Maria del Mar and Picasso Museum. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km away.

Name: RIUS - Modern Apartment in Montjuic
Description:
Situated within 400 metres of Magic Fountain of Montjuic and 1.9 km of Sants Railway Station, RIUS - Modern Apartment in Montjuic features rooms with air conditioning and a private bathroom in Barcelona. The property is around 2.5 km from Plaça Catalunya, 2.5 km from Portal de l'Angel and 2.6 km from Passeig de Gracia. Cathedral of Barcelona is 3.3 km away and Plaça Reial is 5 km from the apartment.

With a private bathroom fitted with a hair dryer, units at the apartment complex also feature free WiFi, while selected rooms also feature a balcony. The units are equipped with heating facilities.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Palau Sant Jordi, Boqueria Market and Montjuïc. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 11 km from the property.

Name: Ilunion Almirante
Description:
Located between the Gothic Quarter and the fashionable Born district, this stylish hotel has a fitness centre and free WiFi in all areas.

Barcelona Cathedral is just 200 metres from the Ilunion Almirante, and guests can walk to the famous Las Ramblas in less than 10 minutes. Jaume I Metro Station is 300 metres from the hotel.

Rooms feature wooden furniture and an en suite bathroom with marble finishes. They all include a large flat-screen TV with satellite channels, safe and minibar.

This hotel is officially adapted for guests with reduced mobility, accessible rooms are available on request, also for people with auditory and visual impairment.

The Ilunion Almirante features a stylish breakfast room where an à-la-carte breakfast is served daily. Room service is available during limited hours.

This hotel is officially adapted for guests with reduced mobility.

Name: Apartment Camp Nou by Interhome
Description:
Located in Barcelona, 1.8 km from Sants Railway Station and 3.2 km from Magic Fountain of Montjuic, Apartment Camp Nou by Interhome offers air conditioning. This 3-star apartment offers a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Camp Nou is 1.3 km away.

The spacious apartment features 3 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower.

Passeig de Gracia is 4.1 km from the apartment, while La Pedrera is 4.2 km away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 11 km from the property.

Name: Boutique Lepant
Description:
Situated in Barcelona, 300 metres from Sagrada Familia and 2 km from Casa Batllo, Boutique Lepant offers air conditioning. It is located 2.2 km from Passeig de Gracia and features a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Nova Icaria Beach is 2.7 km away.

The recently renovated apartment features 2 separate bedrooms, 1 bathroom, a fully equipped kitchen with a dining area and microwave, and a living room with a flat-screen TV. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

La Pedrera is 1.8 km from the apartment, while Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 2.4 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 15 km away.

Name: Inside Barcelona Apartments Princep
Description:
Inside Barcelona Apartments Princep offers modern and good value for money accommodation. The apartments are located in a quiet street, close to Plaza España.

It offers well-appointed apartments with full kitchens and air conditioning. There is free WiFi, Smart TV, washing machine, dishwasher and n´espresso machine. The building has been completely renovated in September 2021.

The accommodations are spacious and have a kitchen, bathroom and living-dining area. Here you can relax after a long day of sightseeing and prepare your own meals.

The apartments are located in a well-connected area of ​​the city, Plaza España and the Fira fairgrounds are between 2 and 10 minutes' walk away. A little further afield, you can find the Montjuïc mountain, which houses the National Art Museum of Catalonia and the Miró Foundation.

Our clients say that this part of Barcelona is their favorite, based on independent reviews.

Inside Barcelona Apartments Princep has been receiving Booking.com clients since 14 Oct 2008.

Name: BBarcelona Montjuic Apartment
Description:
BBarcelona Montjuic Apartment in Barcelona provides accommodation with free WiFi, 500 metres from Magic Fountain of Montjuic, 1.4 km from Palau Sant Jordi and 1.4 km from Sants Railway Station. The property is situated 3.3 km from Passeig de Gracia, 3.3 km from Portal de l'Angel and 3.6 km from Boqueria Market. The property is non-smoking and is located 3.3 km from Plaça Catalunya.

The apartment features 2 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower.

Montjuïc is 3.9 km from the apartment, while Camp Nou is 4.7 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 10 km from BBarcelona Montjuic Apartment.

Name: MH Apartments Tetuan
Description:
Housed in a reformed modernist building located in the centre of Barcelona, these apartments are ideal for enjoying a highly independent and relaxing break in the city.

MH Apartments Tetuan has a variety of apartments, all of which are spacious and charming in design. Relax in the tranquillity of this accommodation at the end of a long day of sightseeing or business in the city. The apartments boast free WiFi internet access and a TV with international channels.

The central location of these apartments means you can easily get around the city using the excellent public transport or on foot.

Name: Acta BCN 40
Description:
Acta BCN 40 Hotel is centrally located 350 metres from Barcelona’s Plaza Universitat, and a 5-minute walk from the Ramblas. It offers modern rooms with flat-screen satellite TVs.

Rooms at the Acta are air-conditioned in summer and heated in winter, and have a free safe. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and amenities, and you can request an iron at reception.

Guests can enjoy a varied buffet breakfast in the hotel’s stylish breakfast room. A gluten-free breakfast is available upon request. There are many bars, shops and restaurants within a short walk of the hotel.

The Acta BCN 40 has a 24-hour front desk and offers luggage storage. Parking is available nearby for an extra charge.

Name: ApartEasy - Authentic Family Apartment
Description:
Situated in Barcelona, 1.2 km from Magic Fountain of Montjuic and 1.6 km from Passeig de Gracia, ApartEasy - Authentic Family Apartment offers air conditioning. It is located 1.5 km from Plaça Catalunya and features a lift. Free WiFi is available and private parking can be arranged at an extra charge.

The spacious apartment with a balcony and quiet street views has 4 bedrooms, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, and 2 bathrooms with a shower. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. The property has an outdoor dining area.

A bicycle rental service is available at the apartment.

Popular points of interest near ApartEasy - Authentic Family Apartment include Portal de l'Angel, Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and Tivoli Theatre. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat, 11 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: Centric Molino Theatre 1-1
Description:
Centric Molino Theatre 1-1 is set in the Sants-Montjuïc district of Barcelona, 1.7 km from Plaça Catalunya, 1.9 km from Santa Maria del Mar and 1.6 km from Portal de l'Angel. The property is close to Montjuïc, Plaça Reial and Palau Sant Jordi. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Magic Fountain of Montjuic is 1.6 km away.

The air-conditioned apartment is composed of 2 separate bedrooms, a fully equipped kitchen, and 1 bathroom. A flat-screen TV is offered. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Passeig de Gracia, Boqueria Market and Cathedral of Barcelona. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 11 km from the property.

Name: Alojamiento Sepulveds
Description:
Alojamiento Sepulveds is situated in the Eixample district of Barcelona, 1.3 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, 1.1 km from Plaça Catalunya and 1.3 km from Portal de l'Angel. This property is located a short distance from attractions such as Boqueria Market, Casa Batllo, and Cathedral of Barcelona. The accommodation features a lift and a shared kitchen for guests.

All units in the bed and breakfast are fitted with a kettle. Featuring a shared bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer, units at the bed and breakfast also boast free WiFi, while certain rooms come with a balcony. At the bed and breakfast, every unit is equipped with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the bed and breakfast include Tivoli Theatre, Passeig de Gracia and Magic Fountain of Montjuic. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 11 km from the property.

Name: Tendency Apartments 3
Description:
Situated in Barcelona, 1.4 km from Llevant, Tendency Apartments 3 features air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi and express check-in and check-out. It is located 1.5 km from Nova Mar Bella Beach and provides a lift. The apartment has family rooms.

Each unit has a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a washing machine, and a private bathroom with bath and a hair dryer. An oven, a microwave and toaster are also offered, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, units include bed linen and towels.

Mar Bella Beach is 1.5 km from the apartment, while Sagrada Familia is 3.1 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 17 km away.

Name: HA Diputació terrace apartment
Description:
Situated in Barcelona, less than 1 km from Magic Fountain of Montjuic and a 14-minute walk from Sants Railway Station, HA Diputació terrace apartment features air-conditioned accommodation with a patio and free WiFi. The property is set 2.4 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, 2.8 km from Casa Batllo and 1.9 km from Palau Sant Jordi. Portal de l'Angel is 3.3 km away and Boqueria Market is 3.5 km from the apartment.

The spacious apartment with a terrace and inner courtyard views has 3 bedrooms, a living room, a TV, an equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, and 2 bathrooms with a bidet. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. The property has an outdoor dining area.

Passeig de Gracia is 3.1 km from the apartment, while Plaça Catalunya is 3.1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 10 km from HA Diputació terrace apartment.

Name: Labtwentytwo Barcelona, a Tribute Portfolio Hotel
Description:
Set in Barcelona, 1.9 km from Nova Mar Bella Beach, Labtwentytwo Barcelona, a Tribute Portfolio Hotel offers accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a fitness centre and a terrace. This 4-star hotel offers a business centre, a concierge service and free WiFi. Guests can make use of a bar.

At the hotel every room includes air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. Labtwentytwo Barcelona, a Tribute Portfolio Hotel provides certain units with city views, and all rooms come with a coffee machine. The units will provide guests with a desk and a kettle.

A buffet, à la carte or continental breakfast is available at the property. At the accommodation you will find a restaurant serving Middle Eastern and international cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and vegan options can also be requested.

Speaking German, English, Spanish and French, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical information on the area at the reception.

Llevant is 2.1 km from Labtwentytwo Barcelona, a Tribute Portfolio Hotel, while Mar Bella Beach is 2.1 km away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 17 km from the property.

Name: Sunotel Aston
Description:
Featuring a rooftop terrace with a seasonal swimming pool and hot tub, as well as panoramic views of Barcelona, Sunotel Aston is a 3-minute walk from Hospital Clinic Metro Station.

Air-conditioned rooms include a flat-screen TV, soundproofed windows and a private bathroom with a hairdryer. Free, high-speed WiFi is available.

An extensive buffet breakfast is served at the hotel. The hotel’s Pa'l Caldero Restaurant offers a wide selection of dishes from around the world. There are also many eating options in the area.

Sunotel Aston has a 24-hour reception and offers services such as luggage storage, free pool towels and free bikes.

Plaza Catalunya and the Ramblas can be reached in around 15 minutes by public transport; while Barcelona’s famous Sagrada Familia Cathedral is around 10 minutes away.

Name: Autèntic Barcelona Monumental
Description:
Autèntic Barcelona Monumental is located 10 minutes' walk from Barcelona's Glòries Shopping Centre and 100 metres from La Monumental Bullring. It offers modern apartments with free WiFi and a balcony.

The apartments at Autèntic Monumental feature large bedrooms with wardrobes. Each one has a lounge with sofas and a flat-screen TV. The well equipped kitchens include a hob, oven and microwave, as well as a washing machine.

In 5 minutes you can walk to the Encants flea market, and more modern shopping options are available at Glòries Shopping Centre. Located 150 metres away, Monumental Metro Station connects you with the rest of the city with ease. Private parking is available on request, for an extra cost.

Name: Modernist Family Barcelona apartment
Description:
Located in Barcelona, 1.9 km from Passeig de Gracia and 1.9 km from Sants Railway Station, Modernist Family Barcelona apartment offers air conditioning. The property is close to Boqueria Market, Palau Sant Jordi and Plaça Reial. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Magic Fountain of Montjuic is less than 1 km away.

The spacious apartment with a balcony and city views features 3 bedrooms, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 2 bathrooms with a shower. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Plaça Catalunya, Portal de l'Angel and Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 11 km from Modernist Family Barcelona apartment.

Name: Hotel Cortes Rambla
Description:
Attractively situated in the Ciutat Vella district of Barcelona, Hotel Cortes Rambla is situated 2.4 km from Somorrostro Beach, 2.6 km from Barceloneta Beach and 300 metres from Plaça Catalunya. With free WiFi, this 3-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and luggage storage space. The property is 100 metres from the city centre and 2.4 km from Sant Miquel Beach.

Complete with a private bathroom fitted with a shower and free toiletries, the rooms at the hotel have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and certain rooms are fitted with a terrace.

Popular points of interest near Hotel Cortes Rambla include Portal de l'Angel, Tivoli Theatre and Palau de la Musica Catalana. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km from the property.

Name: Charmsuites Nou Rambla
Description:
Set just off Avinguda Paral.lel, Charmsuites Nou Rambla offers bright, stylish apartments with free Wi-Fi. Paral·lel Metro and Funicular Station is within 100 metres of the property.

Each spacious apartment at Charmsuites Nou Rambla has a living area with a flat-screen TV and a DVD player. There is a dining area, and a kitchen with an electric hob, oven, coffee maker and fridge.

Shops can be found in the streets surrounding the hotel. There are many cafés, bars and restaurants in the nearby Raval district and on Las Ramblas, a 10-minute walk away.

Barcelona’s Old Port is less than 1 km from the apartments. Plaza España Square, the Fira Exhibition Centre and Sants Railway Station can be reached in 10 minutes by Metro.

Name: Hostal Hera
Description:
Situated within 1.3 km of Barceloneta Beach and 1.4 km of Sant Miquel Beach, Hostal Hera features rooms with air conditioning and a private bathroom in Barcelona. This 1-star guest house offers luggage storage space and a housekeeping service. The property is 1.2 km from Somorrostro Beach, and within 1.1 km of the city centre.

All units in the guest house are fitted with a flat-screen TV. Featuring a private bathroom with a shower, units at the guest house also feature free WiFi, while selected rooms also feature a balcony. At the guest house, units are fitted with bed linen and towels.

Sightseeing tours are available in the vicinity of the property.

Popular points of interest near the guest house include Santa Maria del Mar, Picasso Museum and Plaça Reial. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km from the property.

Name: Bonavista Apartments - Virreina
Description:
These elegant, fully-equipped apartments are located in a new building just 4 minutes’ walk from Fontana metro station. They have a roof terrace with views over the Gracia neighbourhood and free Wi-fi.

Bonavista’s air-conditioned apartments have floor-to-ceiling windows and a modern décor with stone flooring and a neutral colour scheme. The kitchen features a vitroceramic hob, oven, dishwasher and toaster. The bathroom has a shower and includes a heated towel rail and hairdryer. Towels and bed linen are provided.

There are 2 food markets within less than 10 minutes’ walk of Bonavista Apartments. Visitors will also find many shops, bars, cafés and restaurants in Gracia.

Gaudí’s famous creations, such as Parc Güell, Sagrada Família, and La Pedrera are all within less than 20 minutes’ walk of the apartments. The number 39 bus to Barceloneta beach stops on Gran de Gracia, about 5 minutes’ walk away. Private parking is available upon request and at an additional cost.

Name: Centric Apartments Sagrada Famila 3
Description:
Located 100 metres from Sagrada Familia, Centric Apartments Sagrada Famila 3 offers air conditioning, free WiFi and a two balconies in Barcelona. Sagrada Familia Metro Station is 2 minutes’ walk away.

This apartment combine the traditional Catalan tiled flooring with modern dècor. The apartment has a living area with a bed sofa, 2 berooms, kitchen a two complete bathrooms.

You will find bars, restaurants and supermarkets within 100 metres from Centric Apartments Sagrada Famila 3.

Plaza Catalunya, with direct buses to Barcelona Airport, is a 20-minute metro ride away. Barceloneta Beach is 4 km from the property.

Name: Housalia Sant Pau Views- Suite with View on Hospital Sant Pau
Description:
Offering city views, Housalia Sant Pau Views- Suite with View on Hospital Sant Pau is an accommodation situated in Barcelona, 2.8 km from La Pedrera and 3.1 km from Passeig de Gracia. Among the facilities at this property are a lift and luggage storage space, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is non-smoking and is located less than 1 km from Sagrada Familia.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 1 bedroom, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment.

Casa Batllo is 3.3 km from the apartment, while Park Güell is 3.7 km away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 16 km from the property.

Name: Factory Suites Barcelona
Description:
Featuring free WiFi throughout the property, Factory Suites Barcelona offers pet-friendly accommodation in Barcelona. Sagrada Familia is 700 metres from the property.

Rooms are equipped with a private bathroom equipped with a shower. For your comfort, you will find free toiletries and a hair dryer.

You will find a shared lounge at the property. The property offers vegetarian breakfast.

Casa Batllo is 600 metres from Factory Suites Barcelona, while La Pedrera is 600 metres from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km away.

Name: Housalia Corsega - Apartment 3 bedrooms next to Sagrada Familia
Description:
Situated in Barcelona, 500 metres from Sagrada Familia and 2 km from La Pedrera, Housalia Corsega - Apartment 3 bedrooms next to Sagrada Familia offers air conditioning. Among the facilities at this property are a lift and luggage storage space, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is non-smoking and is located 2.1 km from Passeig de Gracia.

The spacious apartment has 3 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a washing machine, and 2 bathrooms with a bidet. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment.

Casa Batllo is 2.5 km from the apartment, while Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 3 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 15 km away.

Name: En Casa de Calders 5
Description:
Right in the centre of Barcelona, set within a short distance of Somorrostro Beach and Barceloneta Beach, En Casa de Calders 5 offers free WiFi, air conditioning and household amenities such as a microwave and coffee machine. It is located 200 metres from Santa Maria del Mar and offers a lift. The property is non-smoking and is situated 1.6 km from Sant Miquel Beach.

The apartment has 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchenette, and a balcony with city views.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Picasso Museum, Plaça Reial and Passeig de Gracia. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km from the property.

Name: Amazing city viewsterrace -Gràcia -Parc Güell
Description:
Situated in Barcelona, less than 1 km from Park Güell and 3.1 km from Passeig de Gracia, Amazing city viewsterrace -Gràcia -Parc Güell features air-conditioned accommodation with a terrace and free WiFi. It is located 3.6 km from Casa Batllo and offers a lift. The property is non-smoking and is set 3.3 km from La Pedrera.

The spacious apartment has 1 bedroom, a fully equipped kitchen with a toaster and a fridge, and 1 bathroom with a shower, a hair dryer and a washing machine. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment.

Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 4.1 km from the apartment, while Tivoli Theatre is 4.2 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 15 km away.

Name: Hostal Operaramblas
Description:
Hostal Operaramblas is situated less than 100 metres from Las Ramblas and Liceu Metro Station. This guest house features rooms with private bathrooms, a 24-hour front desk and free Wi-Fi.

The Operaramblas’ rooms offers simple décor with tiled floors. Each room has heating (in winter), air conditioning (in summer) and a telephone.

The guest house has an ideal location in the centre of Barcelona. It is 5 minutes’ walk from the Gothic Quarter, where there are a range of cafés, bars and restaurants. The city’s cathedral is 500 metres from the Opera and the Old Port is less than 10 minutes’ walk away.

Name: Arya Stadium Hotel
Description:
Situated in Barcelona, 1.3 km from Camp Nou, Arya Stadium Hotel features accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a garden and a terrace. With a restaurant, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation provides room service, a concierge service and organising tours for guests.

At the hotel, the rooms have a desk. The rooms come with a safety deposit box, while selected rooms also feature a balcony and others also feature city views. All rooms in Arya Stadium Hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV and a hairdryer.

A buffet breakfast is available at the accommodation.

Speaking Catalan, English, Spanish and French, staff at the 24-hour front desk can help you plan your stay.

Sants Railway Station is 1.8 km from Arya Stadium Hotel, while Magic Fountain of Montjuic is 3.3 km away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 11 km from the property, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: Stay U-nique Apartments Est
Description:
Located in Barcelona, 2.3 km from Sant Sebastian Beach and 1 km from the centre, Stay U-nique Apartments Est provides air-conditioned accommodation with free WiFi, and a terrace. It is situated 2.3 km from Sant Miquel Beach and features a lift. The apartment features family rooms.

Each unit is equipped with a balcony, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven, a seating area, a TV, a washing machine, and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, all units come with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Boqueria Market, Santa Maria del Mar and Picasso Museum. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 12 km from Stay U-nique Apartments Est.

Name: Cozy Apt with sunny terrace in the heart of Gracia
Description:
Set in Barcelona, 400 metres from Passeig de Gracia and 800 metres from La Pedrera, Cozy Apt with sunny terrace in the heart of Gracia offers air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. The property is around 2.4 km from Palau de la Musica Catalana, 2.7 km from Plaça Catalunya and 3 km from Portal de l'Angel. The property is non-smoking and is situated 1.3 km from Casa Batllo.

The spacious apartment comes with 2 bedrooms, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a terrace with quiet street views. Guests can take in the ambience of the surroundings from an outdoor dining area.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Tivoli Theatre and Sagrada Familia. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 14 km away.

Name: ClassBedroom Gothic Ramblas Apartments
Description:
Situated within 1.8 km of Sant Sebastian Beach and 1.8 km of Sant Miquel Beach in the centre of Barcelona, ClassBedroom Gothic Ramblas Apartments features accommodation with free WiFi, seating area and a kitchen. The property is located 800 metres from Picasso Museum, 1.2 km from Passeig de Gracia and less than 1 km from Palau de la Musica Catalana. Tivoli Theatre is 1.3 km away and Plaça Catalunya is 1.1 km from the apartment.

The apartment complex will provide guests with air-conditioned units offering a wardrobe, a coffee machine, a microwave, a toaster, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a shower. A fridge and kitchenware are also available, as well as a kettle. At the apartment complex, each unit is fitted with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Barceloneta Beach, Plaça Reial and Santa Maria del Mar. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km from the property, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: Catalonia Port
Description:
Situated in Barcelona’s Gothic Quarter, Hotel Catalonia Port has a modern gym and a sun terrace with a small seasonal outdoor pool. Each air-conditioned room has free WiFi, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels.

The hotel’s contemporary El Racó del Port restaurant opens from Monday to Saturday, serving seasonal Mediterranean cuisine. A varied buffet breakfast is offered in the dining room, and there is also a lobby bar.

The Catalonia Port Hotel offers stylish rooms with hardwood floors. They all include a safe, a minibar and a private bathroom.

Catalonia Port is just 250 metres from the bottom of the famous Las Ramblas, and Port Vell Harbour is 400 metres away. Drassanes Metro Station is a 5-minute walk away.

Name: Hotel Casa Teva Barcelona
Description:
Located in the lively Raval district and 250 metres from Las Ramblas, Hotel Casa Teva Barcelona has easy access to Barcelona’s Old Town. It features 24-hour reception and air-conditioned rooms with a TV.

Gaudi‘s Palau Güell is only 100 metres from the hotel, whilst La Boqueria Market is just a 5-minute walk away.

There are several restaurants, bars and cafés in the surrounding area. Barcelona’s Old Port and Maremagnum Shopping Centre are a 20-minute walk from the hotel.

Drassanes Metro Station is approximately 500 metres from the hotel.  Guests can reach sights such as the Sagrada Familia and Parc Güell in around 20 minutes, by Metro.

Name: Pensión San Ramón
Description:
Pensión San Ramón is located in Barcelona’s Raval district, just 350 metres from the Rambla. It offers a 24-hour reception and air-conditioned rooms with a flat-screen TV.

The guest house has vending machines for drinks, and there is a common area with a microwave for guests’ use. There are many restaurants and bars in the surrounding streets.

Staff at reception can provide information about what Barcelona has to offer. Pensión San Ramón is 5 minutes’ walk from the Sala Apolo Nightclub and Paral·lel Metro Station, which connects you with the rest of the city.

Name: Housalia Casa del Mar en Vila Olímpica
Description:
Featuring city views, Housalia Casa del Mar en Vila Olímpica provides accommodation with a patio, around less than 1 km from Bogatell Beach. The air-conditioned accommodation is 400 metres from Nova Icaria Beach, and guests can benefit from on-site private parking and complimentary WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is located 500 metres from Somorrostro Beach.

This apartment is equipped with 1 bedroom, a kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a flat-screen TV, a seating area and 1 bathroom equipped with a shower. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Port Olimpic, Santa Maria del Mar and Picasso Museum. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from Housalia Casa del Mar en Vila Olímpica.

Name: ApartEasy - Plaza España Deluxe
Description:
Offering city views, ApartEasy - Plaza España Deluxe is an accommodation set in Barcelona, 600 metres from Magic Fountain of Montjuic and 1.4 km from Sants Railway Station. Among the facilities at this property are a lift and private check-in and check-out, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The accommodation offers airport transfers, while a bicycle rental service is also available.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 3 bedrooms, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a coffee machine, and 2 bathrooms with a shower and a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Dining options are available close to the apartment.

Sightseeing tours are available close to the property.

Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 2.4 km from ApartEasy - Plaza España Deluxe, while Palau Sant Jordi is 1.7 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 10 km from the accommodation.

Name: ApartEasy - Turo Park with lovely balcony
Description:
ApartEasy - Turo Park with lovely balcony features a balcony and is located in Barcelona, within just 1.3 km of Passeig de Gracia and 1.6 km of La Pedrera. The property is set 2.2 km from Casa Batllo, 2 km from Sants Railway Station and 2.7 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. Free WiFi is available and private parking can be arranged at an extra charge.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 1 bedroom, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. The property has an outdoor dining area.

Tivoli Theatre is 2.8 km from the apartment, while Plaça Catalunya is 2.9 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from ApartEasy - Turo Park with lovely balcony.

Name: Housalia Gracia 2
Description:
Situated in Barcelona, 700 metres from Passeig de Gracia and less than 1 km from La Pedrera, Housalia Gracia 2 offers free WiFi and air conditioning. It is set 1.4 km from Sagrada Familia and features a lift. The property is non-smoking and is located 1.5 km from Casa Batllo.

The spacious apartment has 3 separate bedrooms, 1 bathroom, a fully equipped kitchen with a dining area and dishwasher, and a living room with a TV. The property offers inner courtyard views.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Tivoli Theatre and Park Güell. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 14 km from the property.

Name: Casa Consell Bailen, Guest House
Description:
Set in the centre of Barcelona, Casa Consell Bailen, Guest House is a recently renovated accommodation, which offers soundproof rooms. It is situated 2.8 km from Barceloneta Beach and features a shared kitchen. The guest house has family rooms.

All units feature air conditioning and a flat-screen TV. Units come with a private bathroom, a safety deposit box and free WiFi, while some rooms also feature a terrace and some have city views. At the guest house, the units include bed linen and towels.

Sightseeing tours are available within easy reach of the property.

Popular points of interest near the guest house include Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Casa Batllo and Passeig de Gracia. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from Casa Consell Bailen, Guest House.

Name: MH Apartments Liceo
Description:
MH Apartments Liceo is located in central Barcelona, just 130 metres from the Ramblas and next to the Gran Liceu Theatre. Each stylish, air-conditioned apartment features free Wi-Fi and international TV.

The modern MH apartments have a spacious lounge with a sofa. Each one has a kitchen with an oven, microwave and washing machine. There is also a safe and a hairdryer. Bed linen and towels are provided. Lockers for luggage are available.

The property's 24-hour customer service can provide information about what to see and do in Barcelona. You can walk to Plaza Catalunya and the MACBA Modern Art Museum in 10 minutes.

Name: Pensión Villanueva
Description:
Featuring 2-star accommodation, Pensión Villanueva is set in Barcelona, 2.2 km from Sant Miquel Beach and 2.2 km from Somorrostro Beach. Among the facilities at this property are a lift and luggage storage space, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is 800 metres from the city centre and 2.2 km from Sant Sebastian Beach.

At the guest house, all units are fitted with a wardrobe. At the guest house, some units are soundproof. At the guest house, each unit comes with bed linen and towels.

Sightseeing tours are available in the neighbourhood.

Popular points of interest near the guest house include Plaça Catalunya, Portal de l'Angel and Tivoli Theatre. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km away.

Name: NH Sants Barcelona
Description:
Located 400 metres from Sants Station in Barcelona, NH Sants Barcelona offers modern, air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, flat-screen TV and private bathroom.

The hotel has a restaurant, serving fresh Mediterranean cuisine. There is also a relaxing café-bar. It also offers a healthy breakfast. The restaurant is closed during summer months.

The NH Sants Barcelona is set in a quiet area of Barcelona's Les Corts Financial District, but Barcelona city centre is within 15 minutes by Metro. Guests can reach FC Barcelona Football Stadium from Sants Metro Station, which is 300 metres away.

Name: Grums Hotel & Spa
Description:
The modern Hotel Grums is located in central Barcelona, 5 minutes' walk from Barcelona’s port, ferry terminal and cruise terminal. The Ramblas are 600 metres away, and Parallel Metro Station 300 metres away.

Hotel Grums Barcelona offers elegant, bright and spacious rooms with themed design décor and panoramic floor-to-ceiling windows. There is free high-speed WiFi available throughout.

All our rooms have free RITUALS Cosmetics amenities.

The Hotel Grums Barcelona features a wellness spa which is not included in the room rate and can be accessed for a small surcharge. Guests can relax in the hot tub, Finnish sauna or steam bath. A selection of massage and treatments are also available at an extra cost.

Name: ApartEasy - Modernist flat in Eixample center
Description:
In the heart of Barcelona, set within a short distance of La Pedrera and Casa Batllo, ApartEasy - Modernist flat in Eixample center offers free WiFi, air conditioning and household amenities such as an oven and coffee machine. It is located 1.1 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and offers a lift. The property is non-smoking and is situated 700 metres from Passeig de Gracia.

The spacious apartment is fitted with 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, bed linen, towels, a TV, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a balcony with city views.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Tivoli Theatre, Sagrada Familia and Palau de la Musica Catalana. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 14 km away.

Name: Alojamiento Villarro
Description:
Set within 1.2 km of Passeig de Gracia and 1.4 km of La Pedrera, Alojamiento Villarro offers rooms with air conditioning and a shared bathroom in Barcelona. Among the facilities at this property are a lift and a shared kitchen, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Plaça Catalunya is 2.5 km from the bed and breakfast and Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 2.5 km away.

At the bed and breakfast, the units include a desk, a flat-screen TV, a shared bathroom, bed linen and towels. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also offered, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. The units are equipped with heating facilities.

Sants Railway Station is 1.8 km from the bed and breakfast, while Casa Batllo is 1.8 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km away.

Name: Hotel Sagrada Familia
Description:
Located just 2 blocks from the Sagrada Familia, this hotel has a rooftop terrace overlooking Gaudí’s world-famous temple. It offers 24-hour reception and rooms with satellite TV and free Wi-Fi.

The air-conditioned rooms at the Hotel Sagrada Familia feature parquet floors and modern furniture. They are equipped with a minibar and the private bathrooms come with a hairdryer.

Glòries Shopping Centre and Arc de Triomf are under 20 minutes’ walk from the hotel. Sagrada Familia Metro Station, located a 3-minute walk away, connects you with the city centre in 5 minutes.

Name: Tres Torres Atiram Hotels
Description:
Hotel Tres Torres is located in Barcelona’s Sarrià district, just 350 metres from Tres Torres Metro Station, connecting you to Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas in 15 minutes. It offers attractive rooms with free Wi-Fi.

The modern rooms are air-conditioned and feature wooden floors. All have satellite TV, a safe and minibar. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and amenities.

A buffet breakfast is served in the Tres Torres' restaurant. There is a bar and room service is available.

The Tres Torres has a 24-hour front desk, and you can hire a car from the tour desk. On-site parking is offered for an extra charge.

The hotel is located close Barcelona's L'Illa Shopping Centre.

Name: Generator Barcelona
Description:
Generator Barcelona is located 500 metres from the fashionable Passeig de Gracia Avenue. The hostel offers a 24-hour reception, free private lockers in shared dormitories and free Wi-Fi in public areas.

Diagonal and Verdaguer metro stations are within 5 minutes’ walk from Generator Barcelona. The Gràcia district, which has plenty of boutique shops and bars, is only 200 metres away.

Both private rooms and dormitories have air conditioning and heating, as well as individual power sockets and reading lamps for each bed. Female-only dormitories include hairdryers and other amenities.

They also feature an en suite bathroom, a sink and a mirror. Bed linen is included, while towels can be rented at the reception. Dormitories are available for guests over 18 years old.

Guests can have a daily breakfast for an extra cost. Generator Barcelona also has a communal lounge and a luggage storage service.

Name: Izaila Plaza Catalunya
Description:
Izaila Plaza Catalunya features free WiFi, air conditioning and heating. Located in the centre of Barcelona, this hotel is 50 metres from Plaza Catalunya Square.

The bright rooms at Izaila Plaza Catalunya include a flat-screen TV and a wardrobe. The private bathroom comes with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. Some rooms have a balcony with city views.

Guests have access to a shared lounge and a library. The hotel offers tourist information and free storage luggage.

The hotel is a 2 minute walk from Plaza Catalunya metro and train stations. The famous Sagrada Familia Cathedral is 2.5 km away. Passeig de Gracia, with its high end shops and Gaudi's La Pedrera and Casa Batlló, is within 5 minutes' walk from Izaila Plaza Catalunya.

Barcelona Airport is 20 minutes away by car. Buses run regularly between the airport and Plaza Catalunya Square.

Name: White Apartment Barcelona
Description:
Boasting a terrace, White Apartment Barcelona is a recently renovated apartment situated in a historic building in the centre of Barcelona, close to Sant Miquel Beach. Among the facilities at this property are a lift and private check-in and check-out, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is non-smoking and is set 1.5 km from Sant Sebastian Beach.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 2 bedrooms, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a bath and a hair dryer. A flat-screen TV is available.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Barceloneta Beach, Plaça Reial and Santa Maria del Mar. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km from the property.

Name: ApartEasy - Montjuïc & Fira
Description:
ApartEasy - Montjuïc & Fira features a balcony and is located in Barcelona, within just 500 metres of Magic Fountain of Montjuic and 1.8 km of Sants Railway Station. Among the facilities at this property are private check-in and check-out and a tour desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The accommodation provides airport transfers, while a bicycle rental service is also available.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 1 bedroom, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Palau Sant Jordi, Boqueria Market and Montjuïc. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 11 km from ApartEasy - Montjuïc & Fira.

Name: Apartment Sants-Montjuïc- Avenida Madrid by Interhome
Description:
Situated in Barcelona, 1.5 km from Camp Nou and 1.5 km from Sants Railway Station, Apartment Sants-Montjuïc- Avenida Madrid by Interhome features air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. It is set 2.8 km from Magic Fountain of Montjuic and offers a lift. Passeig de Gracia is 3.9 km away and La Pedrera is 4 km from the apartment.

The apartment has 2 bedrooms, a TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a microwave, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower.

Casa Batllo is 4.1 km from the apartment, while Palau Sant Jordi is 4.4 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 10 km away.

Name: ApartEasy - Central Barcelona Studio Apartment
Description:
ApartEasy - Central Barcelona Studio Apartment features a patio and is set in Barcelona, within just 700 metres of Sagrada Familia and 1.9 km of Casa Batllo. It is situated 2.5 km from Somorrostro Beach and offers a lift. The property is non-smoking and is located 2.3 km from Nova Icaria Beach.

With free WiFi, this apartment provides a TV, a washing machine and a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave and toaster. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. The accommodation offers an air conditioning, a heating and a private bathroom.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Passeig de Gracia, La Pedrera and Tivoli Theatre. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from ApartEasy - Central Barcelona Studio Apartment.

Name: Central Rooms Cathedral
Description:
Situated in the centre of Barcelona, 2 km from Sant Miquel Beach, Central Rooms Cathedral features air-conditioned rooms and free WiFi. The property is close to several well-known attractions, 700 metres from Picasso Museum, 700 metres from Passeig de Gracia and 400 metres from Palau de la Musica Catalana. The property is non-smoking and is set 2.1 km from Somorrostro Beach.

At the hostel, rooms have a wardrobe. The rooms have bed linen.

Popular points of interest near Central Rooms Cathedral include Cathedral of Barcelona, Santa Maria del Mar and Plaça Reial. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from the accommodation.

Name: Housalia Ondina Suites Sagrada Familia
Description:
Housalia Ondina Suites Sagrada Familia offers accommodation in Barcelona, 100 metres from the Sagrada Familia.

An oven, a microwave and a toaster can be found in the kitchen and there is a private bathroom with free toiletries and a hair dryer. A flat-screen TV with satellite channels is available.

The apartment is located on the fourth floor of a building without elevator.

Housalia Ondina Suites Sagrada Familia is 1.2 km from La Pedrera. The nearest airport is El Prat Airport, 14 km from the property.

Name: Housalia Lepant 3 bedroom apartment 300 meters de Sagrada Familia
Description:
Set in Barcelona, 300 metres from Sagrada Familia and 1.8 km from La Pedrera, Housalia Lepant 3 bedroom apartment 300 meters de Sagrada Familia offers air conditioning. Among the facilities at this property are a lift and luggage storage space, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is non-smoking and is located 2.2 km from Casa Batllo.

The spacious apartment is fitted with 3 separate bedrooms, 1 bathroom, a fully equipped kitchen with a dining area and oven, and a living room with a flat-screen TV. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. The property offers city views.

Passeig de Gracia is 2 km from the apartment, while Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 2.7 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 15 km away.

Name: MH Apartments S. Familia
Description:
MH Apartments S. Familia are located around 100 metres from Barcelona’s Sagrada Familia Church. The apartments feature balconies, well-equipped kitchens and free Wi-Fi access.

The spacious MH Apartments have contemporary design and offer kitchens with oven, microwave, kettle and toaster. Each apartment has a living area with satellite TV, bathroom and separate bedrooms.

Facilities at the MH include 24-hour customer service, and guests are provided with bed linen, towels and basic cleaning materials.The apartments can arrange car hire and provide tourist information.

The apartments are a 2-minute walk from Sagrada Familia Metro Station and 20 minutes’ walk from Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard. Plaza de Catalunya is a 15-minute Metro journey from the apartments and Sants Train Station is less than 4 km away.

Name: Fantastic 3 bedroom apartment in Sants
Description:
Fantastic 3 bedroom apartment in Sants is situated in the Sants-Montjuïc district of Barcelona, 1.5 km from Sants Railway Station, 3 km from Magic Fountain of Montjuic and 3.8 km from Palau Sant Jordi. The property is located 4.9 km from Passeig de Gracia, 5 km from La Pedrera and 5.1 km from Casa Batllo. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Camp Nou is 2 km away.

The apartment consists of 3 separate bedrooms, 1 bathroom and a living room. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Montjuïc is 5.2 km from the apartment, while Plaça Catalunya is 5.5 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 10 km away.

Name: 13PAR1004 - Fabulous apartment in the heart of Barcelona
Description:
Set in Barcelona, 700 metres from Magic Fountain of Montjuic and 1.9 km from Plaça Catalunya, 13PAR1004 - Fabulous apartment in the heart of Barcelona offers air-conditioned accommodation with a terrace and free WiFi. Guests staying at this apartment have access to a balcony. The property is non-smoking and is located 2.6 km from Passeig de Gracia.

The spacious apartment has 2 bedrooms, a TV, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, a washing machine, and 2 bathrooms with a shower.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Boqueria Market, Sants Railway Station and Palau Sant Jordi. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km from the property.

Name: Hostal Elkano
Description:
This family-run guest house is 500 metres from Barcelona’s Fira Exhibition Centre at Plaza España. It offers heated rooms with free Wi-Fi, 200 metres from Poble Sec Metro Station.

Spacious rooms at Hostal Elkano feature functional décor and a TV. Bathrooms are shared or private.

You will find numerous bars, restaurants and shops within 5 minutes’ walk. Sant Antoni Market is 500 metres away and the Arenas Shopping Centre, a former bullring, is 10 minutes’ walk away.

Elkano’s 24-hour reception offers tourist information. Montjuic Park, with the Olympic Stadium, its museums and outdoor swimming pools, is 10 minutes’ walk away.

The property is 10 minutes’ walk from the ferry port. Las Ramblas is 3 metro stops away and chic Passeig de Gracias, 5 stops away. You can catch a direct bus to Barcelona El Prat Airport from Plaza España.

Name: The Hoxton, Poblenou
Description:
Located in Barcelona, 1.7 km from Bogatell, The Hoxton, Poblenou provides accommodation with a restaurant, private parking, an outdoor swimming pool and a bar. Featuring family rooms, this property also provides guests with a terrace. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, room service and currency exchange for guests.

Guest rooms at the hotel come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, a hairdryer and free toiletries. The units will provide guests with a desk and a kettle.

Guests at The Hoxton, Poblenou can enjoy a à la carte breakfast.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Nova Icaria, Mar Bella and Sagrada Familia. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from The Hoxton, Poblenou.

Name: Paraiso Hostel
Description:
Paraiso Hostel is in central Barcelona, 100 metres from Sant Antoni Metro Station. Rooms have free WiFi, and some have private bathrooms, a plasma TV and balcony.

Paraiso Hostel is located in the lively neighborhood of Ciutat Vella. Guests will find a variety of shops, museums and places to eat and drink.

Paraiso’s large common room includes satellite TV, including many international channels. There is also a DVD player and internet corner. Paraiso also has a large roof terrace with tables.

Parallel Metro Station is 250 metros from the property and a 10-minute walk will take you to Barcelona Museum of Contemporary Art.

Name: Arenas Atiram Hotels
Description:
Situated 200 metres from Barcelona’s Diagonal Avenue with its many shops and restaurants, Arenas offers modern rooms with TV.

A buffet breakfast is served in the hotel’s restaurant.

A public car park is situated 3 minutes away from the hotel.

Arenas Atiram is a 15-minute walk from the Camp Nou Football Stadium. Maria Cristina Metro Station is 200 metres away and L’Illa Shopping Centre is a 10-minute walk away.

Name: Housalia Sagrada Familia Views
Description:
Situated in Barcelona, 2.9 km from Nova Icaria Beach and 300 metres from Sagrada Familia, Housalia Sagrada Familia Views offers air conditioning. Among the facilities at this property are a lift and a minimarket, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is non-smoking and is set 1.7 km from La Pedrera.

The apartment with a balcony and garden views has 2 bedrooms, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with a bidet. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. The property offers city views.

Sightseeing tours are available within a reachable distance.

Casa Batllo is 2.1 km from the apartment, while Passeig de Gracia is 2.5 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 15 km away.

Name: Grupotel Gran Via 678
Description:
The stylish Gran Via 678 is situated 700 metres from Plaza Catalunya in central Barcelona and features an outdoor pool with a sun terrace. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the hotel.

Modern rooms at this design hotel include satellite TV and a minibar. The private bathroom is complete with a hairdryer.

Grupotel Gran Via 678 offers a restaurant which serves Mediterranean and international cuisine. Guests can enjoy meals on the terrace.

Urquinaona Metro Station is 400 metres away while the Arc de Triomf monument is less than 10 minutes’ walk from the hotel.

Name: Flateli Calabria
Description:
Located in Barcelona, 1.7 km from Plaça Catalunya and 1.8 km from Portal de l'Angel, Flateli Calabria offers air conditioning. It is situated 2 km from Tivoli Theatre and provides a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Magic Fountain of Montjuic is 1 km away.

The apartment with a terrace and city views features 1 bedroom, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with a shower. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. The property has an outdoor dining area.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Passeig de Gracia, Boqueria Market and Cathedral of Barcelona. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 11 km from Flateli Calabria.

Name: Paral·lel
Description:
Situated just 10 minutes walk from the stunning centre of Barcelona, this smart and practical hotel is set in the charming neighbourhood of Poble Sec, at the foot of Montjüic, where you can visit the Olympic site.

Start your day with breakfast in Paral.lel, before heading out for a stroll up Montjüic, where you can spend the day relaxing in a natural setting, and also visit museums such as Fundació Joan Mirò and the national gallery, MNAC.

Each of the bedrooms in Paral.lel comes with air conditioning, so you can enjoy tranquillity and rest in the warm summer months. Browse the internet using the free Wi-Fi connection available in this hotel.

Paral.lel is located just a short stroll from the port and beach area of the city, and you can get to top sights such as Las Ramblas and the Gothic Quarter with its stunning cathedral.

Name: Primavera Hostel
Description:
Primavera hostel is set in Barcelona’s Eixample district, 8 minutes’ walk from the Sagrada Familia Basilica. It offers free Wi-Fi and private rooms with a balcony, 200 metres from Verdaguer Metro Station.

Rooms at Primavera hostel are bright and feature smart, functional décor and original features. All include a fan and central heating, while bathrooms are shared.

The property has a communal kitchen where you can prepare meals, snacks and drinks and you can relax in the lounge area with big sofas and a selection of books.

Primavera is 5 minutes’ walk from the bohemian Gracia area and 600 metres from Passeig de Gracia, with its exclusive shops and Gaudi monuments.

Luggage storage is available and you can walk to the Arc de Triomf, Ciutadella Park and Estació del Nord Bus Station in 15 minutes.

Name: Uma Suites Barceloneta Beach
Description:
Barcelona Beach Apartments is located 350 metres from Barceloneta Beach. It offers modern apartments with air conditioning.

The apartments feature a lounge area with sofas and a flat-screen TV. Each one has a kitchenette with a microwave, hob and oven, as well as a washing machine and dishwasher. Bed linen and towels are provided, as well as toiletries.

There is a supermarket located 20 metres from the apartments, and there are many good seafood restaurants within a short walk. There is a traditional food market located 170 metres away.

You can walk to Barceloneta Metro Station in 6 minutes, and the charming Born Neighbourhood is just beyond. França Train Station is a 10-minute walk away.

Name: Catalonia Square 4* Sup
Description:
Featuring an outdoor pool and a fitness centre, Catalonia Square is located in Barcelona’s historic centre. The 4-star hotel is only 100 metres from Plaça Catalunya and offers free Wi-Fi

Each air-conditioned room has wooden floors and modern décor and comes with a satellite flat-screen TV, minibar and a battery charger for iPhone/iPad. Featuring a hairdryer, private bathrooms also include free toiletries and towels. Private pool and terrace are available in some rooms. All hotel rooms have smart TVs, which are equipped with Chromecast app.

Guests can enjoy drinks, snacks and traditional tapas at Catalonia Square Bar. The breakfast is served until 12:00. Room service is also available.

La Rambla and the Gothic District are only 5 minutes’ walk from the hotel. Within 300 metres, guests can find the metro stations of Passeig de Gracia, Plaça Catalunya and Urquinaona, offering connection to most parts of Barcelona.

Name: Putxet by Gaiarooms
Description:
Putxet by Gaiarooms is just 600 metres from Gaudí’s Park Güell, in a quiet residential area. It offers good-value accommodation, with free Wi-Fi internet and easy access to Barcelona city centre.

The guesthouse is set in the elegant Sant Gervasi area. The bars and restaurants of Gràcia are within minutes.

Hostal Putxet is a short walk from Lesseps Metro Station and Padua Station. Plaça Catalunya is just 4 stops away.

Please note there is no lift in the building.

Rooms at the guesthouse are simple and comfortable. They all have an en suite bathroom with a hairdryer. Rooms have central air conditioning and flat-screen satellite TV.

Name: Catalonia Magdalenes
Description:
Catalonia Magdalenes Hotel is set in  Barcelona, 200 metres from the Cathedral of Barcelona and offers a terrace with an outdoor pool with views of the Cathedral and a spa. Portal de l'Angel is 200 metres away.

Each room at this hotel is air conditioned, soundproofed and features a flat-screen TV and a Nespresso Coffee Machine. The bathroom comes with free toiletries and a hairdryer. All hotel rooms have smart TVs, which are equipped with Chromecast app.

You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property, There is also a spa with a hot tub and a gym. The hotel offers show-cooking during breakfast.

Plaça Catalunya is 400 metres from Catalonia Magdalenes Hotel, while Picasso Museum is 600 metres away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km from the property.

Name: Zenit Barcelona
Description:
Zenit Barcelona is 250 metres from Plaza Francesc Macià on Barcelona’s Diagonal Avenue. This modern hotel offers stylish air-conditioned and soundproofed rooms, with free Wi-Fi and a pillow menu.

The Zenit is a 15-minute walk from Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard, where Gaudí’s famous La Pedrera and Casa Batlló can be found. Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas are a further 15 minutes’ walk away.

Rooms at the Zenit Barcelona feature satellite TV and a safe and minibar. There is a work desk and a kettle with free tea and coffee set; the private bathrooms come with a hairdryer.

Zenit Hotel’s restaurant offers gourmet Spanish and international cuisine. A special gluten-free breakfast and children's menus are available, and packed lunches and room service can be requested.

There is a 24-hour front desk and a tour desk. A laundry, dry cleaning and ironing service is offered. Parking is available 10 minutes' walk away, for an extra cost.

Name: Ro Lively and bright apartment next to Blai st
Description:
Set in Barcelona, 1.6 km from Magic Fountain of Montjuic and 1.7 km from Plaça Catalunya, Ro Lively and bright apartment next to Blai st offers air conditioning. The property is situated 1.1 km from Boqueria Market, 1.8 km from Palau de la Musica Catalana and 1.6 km from Montjuïc. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Sant Miquel Beach is 2.9 km away.

The apartment is fitted with 3 bedrooms, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a balcony with city views. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Santa Maria del Mar, Portal de l'Angel and Passeig de Gracia. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 12 km from Ro Lively and bright apartment next to Blai st.

Name: Bird House
Description:
Offering modern rooms with free WiFi, Bird House is just 30 metres from Urgell Metro Station and within 15 minutes’ walk of Plaza de Catalunya, Las Ramblas and Plaza Espanya.

Featuring high ceilings, each air-conditioned room at Bird House has bright, minimalist décor. There is heating and access to shared bathroom facilities. The bedrooms also include free WiFi, a wardrobe and a desk. Bed linen and towels are provided.

It offers use of a shared kitchen and serves breakfast.

Restaurants, bars and cafés can be found around Sant Antoni District, 5 minutes' walk away. Passeig de Gràcia is a 15-minute walk away.

The Airport Bus stops 30 metres away from Bird House, at Gran Via-Urgell bus stop. The MACBA Modern Art Museum is less than 1 km from the Bird House, while Gaudí’s La Pedrera and Casa Batlló houses can be reached in 20 minutes by foot.

Name: Apart-Suites Hostemplo
Description:
Apart-Suites Hostemplo offers stylish apartments and suites set in 2 beautiful Modernist buildings, 250 metres from Gaudí’s Sagrada Familia. This soundproofed accommodation features free Wi-Fi and a DVD player.

The property offers contemporary décor with wooden floors. The apartments come with air conditioning and heating, as well as a private balcony. Most have views of Sagrada Família. Most of the apartments have a washing machine.

A buffet breakfast with homemade pastries, local produce and freshly squeezed natural orange juice is served daily at Hotel Hostemplo, located 150 meters from the property.

The junior suite features a fridge, microwave and kettle, and it has a TV. Located on the 5th floor, it offers views of Sagrada Família.

In 5 minutes you can walk to Sagrada Família Market, as well as Gaudí Avenue, where there are many restaurants, bars and shops. Barcelona's open-top bus tour route also stops just 3 minutes' walk from the property.

Apart-Suites Hostemplo is situated just metres from Avinguda Diagonal and just 3 minutes' walk from Sagrada Família Metro Station. Casa Batlló and La Pedrera are a 10-minute walk away on Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard, in the city centre.

Name: Fisa Rentals Ramblas Apartments
Description:
Fisa Rentals Ramblas Apartments is located in central Barcelona, just 250 metres from Plaza Catalunya and the Ramblas. It offers stylish, air-conditioned apartments with free Wi-Fi and flat-screen satellite TV.

The Fisa Rentals apartments feature parquet floors and modern décor. Each one comes with a DVD player, and the kitchen includes a hob, microwave, washing machine and dishwasher.

Gaudí’s Casa Batlló and La Pedrera are about 15 minutes’ walk from the apartments. La Boquería Market and the spectacular Palau de la Música Catalana are within a 10-minute walk. Airport buses leave from Plaza Catalunya.

Name: Apartamento Amplio en el Centro de Barcelona - 3 Habitaciones - ES-341-4
Description:
Right in the centre of Barcelona, situated within a short distance of Boqueria Market and Santa Maria del Mar, Apartamento Amplio en el Centro de Barcelona - 3 Habitaciones - ES-341-4 offers free WiFi, air conditioning and household amenities such as a microwave and coffee machine. The property is set 2.4 km from Sant Sebastian Beach, 2.4 km from Sant Miquel Beach and 1.5 km from Tivoli Theatre. The property is non-smoking and is located 2.4 km from Barceloneta Beach.

The spacious apartment has 3 separate bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, a fully equipped kitchen with a dining area, and a TV. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Picasso Museum, Plaça Catalunya and Portal de l'Angel. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from Apartamento Amplio en el Centro de Barcelona - 3 Habitaciones - ES-341-4.

Name: Forget Me Not Barcelona
Description:
Featuring free WiFi throughout the property, Forget Me Not Barcelona offers accommodation in Barcelona, 400 metres from La Pedrera. Guests can enjoy the on-site bar.

All rooms are fitted with a flat-screen TV. You will find a kettle in the room. Each room is equipped with a private bathroom. For your comfort, you will find free toiletries and a hair dryer.

There is a shared lounge at the property.

Plaça Catalunya is 1.3 km from Forget Me Not Barcelona, while Portal de l'Angel is 1.5 km away. The nearest airport is El Prat Airport, 13 km from Forget Me Not Barcelona.

Name: Catalonia Plaza Catalunya
Description:
Hotel Catalonia Plaza Cataluña offers an outdoor pool and air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi and satellite TV. It is housed in a building 50 metres from Barcelona’s Plaza Catalunya. All hotel rooms have smart TVs equipped with Chromecast app.

The hotel serves a continental buffet breakfast with show cooking and it includes a wide variety of regional products and home-made cakes.

Catalonia Plaza Cataluña Hotel has a sun terrace with loungers, a gym and a pool. Guests can also enjoy the on-site spa and cabin for spa treatments and massages.

Hotel Catalonia Plaza is a 5-minute walk from Barcelona’s Gothic Quarter and the Palau de la Música Catalana. A regular bus service to the airport leaves from the other side of Plaza Catalunya, just 100 metres away.

Name: Apartments Barcelona Sagrada
Description:
Situated within 2.9 km of Bogatell Beach and 600 metres of Sagrada Familia, Apartments Barcelona Sagrada features rooms with air conditioning and a private bathroom in Barcelona. It is located 2.1 km from La Pedrera and provides a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Nova Icaria Beach is 2.7 km away.

The apartment provides guests with a balcony, city views, a seating area, satellite flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. A toaster, a fridge and stovetop are also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, each unit includes bed linen and towels.

Casa Batllo is 2.3 km from the apartment, while Passeig de Gracia is 2.5 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 15 km away.

Name: Estudio en Gracia 2
Description:
Estudio en Gracia 2 is located in the Gràcia district of Barcelona, 600 metres from La Pedrera, 1.1 km from Casa Batllo and 1.4 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. The property is situated 2.8 km from Palau de la Musica Catalana, 3 km from Park Güell and 3.4 km from Portal de l'Angel. The property is non-smoking and is set 300 metres from Passeig de Gracia.

With free WiFi, this 1-bedroom apartment offers a flat-screen TV and a kitchen with an oven and stovetop. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Tivoli Theatre, Plaça Catalunya and Sagrada Familia. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 15 km away.

Name: Consell Cent Apartment II 3 domitorios Eixample
Description:
Set in Barcelona, 1 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and 1.1 km from Plaça Catalunya, Consell Cent Apartment II 3 domitorios Eixample offers air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. Popular points of interest nearby include Passeig de Gracia, Palau de la Musica Catalana and Cathedral of Barcelona. The property is non-smoking and is located 1.3 km from Tivoli Theatre.

The spacious apartment comes with 3 bedrooms, a TV and a fully equipped kitchen that provides guests with a dishwasher, an oven, a washing machine, a microwave and a toaster. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Dining options are available close to the apartment.

Popular points of interest near Consell Cent Apartment II 3 domitorios Eixample include Portal de l'Angel, Boqueria Market and Casa Batllo. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km away.

Name: Apartamento para 2 céntrico
Description:
Situated in Barcelona, 2.5 km from Nova Icaria Beach and 2.8 km from Bogatell Beach, Apartamento para 2 céntrico offers air conditioning. It is set 600 metres from Sagrada Familia and features a lift. This pet-friendly apartment also has free WiFi.

The apartment has 1 bedroom, a TV, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a fridge, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower. The accommodation is non-smoking.

La Pedrera is 2.3 km from the apartment, while Casa Batllo is 2.5 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 15 km away.

Name: NH Barcelona Entenza
Description:
NH Barcelona Entenza is 10 minutes’ walk from Barcelona Sants Station and high-speed AVE Station. La Fira Exhibition Centre is 1.5 km away. All air-conditioned rooms are spacious, soundproofed and offer free Wi-Fi.

Rooms in the NH Barcelona Entenza Hotel are bright and modern with wooden floors. They feature satellite TV, minibar and a fully equipped bathroom with hairdryer.

A buffet breakfast is served in the hotel and breakfast in the room is available. One of Barcelona’s main streets, Diagonal Avenue, is a 10-minute walk from the hotel, with many restaurants and shops.

The NH Barcelona Entenza is in a quiet area but is well-connected to the city centre by Metro. Entença Metro Station is 200 metres away. FC Barcelona's Camp Nou Stadium is 3 stops away by Metro.

Name: Verdi 254
Description:
Verdi 254 is located in the Gràcia district of Barcelona, 1.7 km from Passeig de Gracia, 2.8 km from La Pedrera and 3 km from Sagrada Familia. The property is set 3 km from Casa Batllo, 3.5 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and 3.6 km from Tivoli Theatre. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Park Güell is 700 metres away.

A buffet breakfast is available daily at the bed and breakfast.

Guests can also relax in the garden.

Plaça Catalunya is 3.8 km from Verdi 254, while Palau de la Musica Catalana is 4.1 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from the accommodation.

Name: Hotel Astoria
Description:
Astoria is just off Barcelona’s Diagonal Avenue, a 5-minute walk from Diagonal Metro Station and Paseo de Gracia Avenue. It features a rooftop pool with views, and a gym.

The Astoria Hotel combines original Art Nouveau features with modern facilities. Air-conditioned rooms have satellite TV, a safe and minibar. They feature wooden floors and free Wi-Fi, and the modern bathrooms come with a hairdryer.

The restaurant at the Astoria offers traditional Catalan cuisine, and room service is available. There is also a terrace and a bar.

There is a 24-hour front desk

Name: Apartamento 1 habitación cerca Sants-Estación
Description:
Apartamento 1 habitación cerca Sants-Estación is located in the Sants-Montjuïc district of Barcelona, less than 1 km from Sants Railway Station, 2.9 km from Camp Nou and 3.2 km from Casa Batllo. The property is around 3.3 km from Palau Sant Jordi, 3.7 km from Plaça Catalunya and 3.8 km from Passeig de Gracia. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Magic Fountain of Montjuic is 1.3 km away.

The apartment consists of 1 separate bedroom, 1 bathroom and a living room. The accommodation is non-smoking.

La Pedrera is 3.9 km from the apartment, while Boqueria Market is 4 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 10 km from Apartamento 1 habitación cerca Sants-Estación.

Name: Hostal Laia by Gaiarooms
Description:
Situated within 1.4 km of Casa Batllo and 1.5 km of Passeig de Gracia, Hostal Laia by Gaiarooms features rooms with air conditioning and a private bathroom in Barcelona. It is set 1.5 km from Plaça Catalunya and offers a lift. Featuring a private entrance, the guest house allows guests to maintain their privacy.

All units in the guest house are fitted with a flat-screen TV. Featuring a private bathroom with a shower and free toiletries, units at the guest house also boast free WiFi. At the guest house, each unit includes bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the guest house include Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Sants Railway Station and Magic Fountain of Montjuic. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km from the property.

Name: Plaza Goya Rooms
Description:
Plaza Goya Rooms is located in the centre of Barcelona and a few minutes’ walk from the Las Ramblas. It features free WiFi and free luggage storage.

Rooms at Plaza Goya Rooms are air conditioned and include a flat-screen TV and safe. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and free toiletries. Some rooms have a balcony.

You can find several restaurants, bars, and a grocery shop within a 5-minute walk of Plaza Goya Rooms. Universitat Metro Station is 50 metres away, and Gaudi’s Sagrada Familia is 4 metro stops away. Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas are 700 metres from the property.

Name: Guitart Grand Passage
Description:
This modern hotel offers spacious, air-conditioned suites with a separate seating area, private balcony, free WiFi and 2 TVs. The hotel is 10 minutes’ walk from Barcelona’s Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard.

There are several restaurants within a 5-minute walk from Guitard Grand Passage. Also, the hotel is only 500 metres from Hospital Clinic Metro Station.

There are good transport connections to Barcelona El Prat Airport from Passeig de Gràcia Metro Station, located around 15 minutes’ walk away.

Name: Ilunion Les Corts Spa
Description:
Ilunion Les Corts Spa features a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, fitness centre, a terrace and bar in Barcelona. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The accommodation provides a concierge service, a tour desk and currency exchange for guests.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bidet. At Ilunion Les Corts Spa every room comes with bed linen and towels.

A gluten-free breakfast is available daily at the accommodation.

Camp Nou is less than 1 km from Ilunion Les Corts Spa, while Sants Railway Station is 3.5 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 11 km from the hotel.

The hotel is a 15-minute drive from Plaza España, from where the shuttles leave to the Montjuic field.

Name: Aparthotel Atenea Calabria
Description:
Aparthotel Atenea Calabria is situated 200 metres from Rocafort Metro Station, a 10-minute walk from Plaza España Square. This aparthotel features spacious studios with free Wi-Fi, a well-equipped kitchenette and a flat-screen TV.

The Atenea’s studios are spacious and brightly decorated. Each has a seating area with satellite TV and sofa bed. The kitchenette comes with a fridge, microwave and coffee maker.

The Calabria offers a daily buffet breakfast. There are also a range of supermarkets, cafés and restaurants within walking distance of the aparthotel.

The Atenea Calabria is around a 20-minute walk from Sants Train and Bus Station. Plaza Catalunya and the Ramblas are 3 Metro stops away from nearby Rocafort Metro Station.

Name: The Loft House - Barcelona La Pedrera
Description:
The Loft House - Barcelona La Pedrera is located just a two-minute walk from Gaudi's house La Pedrera. Our hostel is 400 meters from Diagonal Metro Station, you are also able to walk to La Sagrada Familia in 15 minutes. Plaça Catalunya is just a ten-minute metro ride away.

There are many bars, supermarkets, and restaurants around the property, you can walk to Paseo de Gracia Boulevard and its designer boutiques in three minutes. The popular district of Gracia is 600 meters away.

In our commitment to sustainability, The Loft House is proud to operate as a carbon-neutral property, working diligently to minimize our environmental footprint. We implement eco-friendly practices throughout the property and continuously strive to reduce our energy consumption and waste.

Boasting a grand entrance hall with beautiful mosaic floor tiles, the property includes a well-equipped shared kitchen for guests. Personal lockers in shared bedrooms. Bed linen and blankets are provided.

Free WiFi and two communal gardens with outdoor furniture. For a surcharge, guests may hire towels and make use of the laundry service.

Name: Alma Azul Consell de Cent
Description:
Located in Barcelona, 2.8 km from Somorrostro Beach and 2.8 km from Nova Icaria Beach, Alma Azul Consell de Cent provides air-conditioned accommodation with a terrace and free WiFi. This apartment features accommodation with a balcony. Passeig de Gracia is 1.2 km away and Palau de la Musica Catalana is 1.5 km from the apartment.

The spacious apartment is equipped with 2 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV and a fully equipped kitchen that provides guests with a dishwasher, an oven, a washing machine, a microwave and a fridge. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Sagrada Familia, Casa Batllo and La Pedrera. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from Alma Azul Consell de Cent.

Name: Barcelona Apartment Villarroel
Description:
Located in Eixample District, close to Hospital Clínic metro station and only 15 minutes’ walk from Barcelona’s historic town, these modern décor apartments offer free Wi-Fi throughout.

Barcelona Apartment Villaroel features deluxe and executive 2-bedroom apartments. Each of them has a comfortable living-dining area with sofa and flat-screen TV, a private bathroom and well-equipped kitchen.
