Numerous bars and restaurants as well as supermarkets can be found nearby. Barcelona main shopping district is just 10 minutes’ walk away.

You can reach Barcelona Sants AVE Train Station in less than 15 minutes' walk away or a short metro ride from Hospital Clínic metro station.

When booking more than 2 apartments, different policies and additional supplements may apply.

Name: Hotel Acta Laumon
Description:
Situated just 200 metres from Sagrera Metro Station in Sant Andreu, the modern Hotel Acta Laumon is 25 minutes from the centre of Barcelona by metro.

It features stylish rooms with air conditioning, a plasma TV and a private bathroom. Free WiFi is offered. Hotel Acta Laumon also offers apartments, located in front of the hotel. Guests have access to the hotel facilities.

The hotel have a spacious lounge to rest, work or have a coffee.
There are also 24-hour vending machines for snacks and drinks.

The hotel offers tourist information and ticket services.

Name: Casa Lolita
Description:
Situated in Barcelona, 2.9 km from Somorrostro Beach and 800 metres from the centre, Casa Lolita features air-conditioned accommodation with free WiFi, and a terrace. The property is set 2.9 km from Barceloneta Beach, 700 metres from Tivoli Theatre and 1 km from Palau de la Musica Catalana. The accommodation offers a lift, a shared kitchen and luggage storage for guests.

At the guest house, every unit is fitted with a wardrobe. Some units have a balcony and/or a patio with city or inner courtyard views. All units in the guest house are fitted with a flat-screen TV with streaming services and with satellite channels.

Popular points of interest near the guest house include Passeig de Gracia, Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and Casa Batllo. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 14 km from the property.

Name: Sunny central apartment with a 100m2 city oasis
Description:
In the centre of Barcelona, located within a short distance of Passeig de Gracia and La Pedrera, Sunny central apartment with a 100m2 city oasis offers free WiFi, air conditioning and household amenities such as a toaster and coffee machine. This apartment provides accommodation with a terrace. The property is non-smoking and is set 1.3 km from Casa Batllo.

The spacious apartment features 3 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. The property has an outdoor dining area.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Plaça Catalunya, Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and Tivoli Theatre. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 14 km away.

Name: Lumine Luxury Suites by Gaiarooms
Description:
Situated in the centre of Barcelona, less than 1 km from Casa Batllo and a 16-minute walk from Plaça Catalunya, Lumine Luxury Suites by Gaiarooms offers free WiFi and air conditioning. The property has inner courtyard views and is 1.2 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and 400 metres from Passeig de Gracia. The accommodation features a lift, a housekeeping service and organising tours for guests.

The guest house offers a seating area with a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a hair dryer, free toiletries and shower. At the guest house, all units are allergy-free and soundproof. At the guest house, every unit is equipped with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the guest house include Tivoli Theatre, La Pedrera and Portal de l'Angel. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km from the property.

Name: Port V Apart centrico con estilo 21
Description:
Port V Apart centrico con estilo 21 has a balcony and is situated in Barcelona, within just 1.6 km of Magic Fountain of Montjuic and 1.8 km of Plaça Catalunya. It is located 2 km from Santa Maria del Mar and features a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Sant Miquel Beach is 3 km away.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 1 bedroom, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a bath and a shower. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Portal de l'Angel, Boqueria Market and Cathedral of Barcelona. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 11 km from the property.

Name: Allegro Barcelona
Description:
Allegro Barcelona is a futuristic design hotel, situated 100 metres from Barcelona’s Diagonal Metro Station. Its stylish rooms include free Wi-Fi, digital radio and LCD TV with satellite channels.

Each room at Allegro Barcelona features elegant white décor with colourful touches. Rooms are air-conditioned and come with an electronic safe. Bathrooms include a hairdryer and toiletries.

A continental breakfast buffet is served until 10:30 each day at Allegro Barcelona. Numerous tapas bars and pavement cafés can be found on Rambla de Catalunya, a 5-minute walk away.

Other facilities include portable WiFi for no charge.

The famous Gaudi buildings and designer shops of Passeig de Gracia are just 500 metres from the hotel, while Plaza Catalunya is a 15-minute walk away. Staff at the 24-hour reception can provide information about Barcelona, recommend excursions and arrange airport transfers.

Name: Hostel New York
Description:
Hostel New York is a youth hostel located in Barcelona’s Gothic Quarter, 5 minutes’ walk from Las Ramblas. It offers 24-hour reception and free WiFi, 500 metres from Jaume and Drassanes Metro Stations.

The hostel’s simple dormitory rooms feature modest décor, bunk beds and individual lockers. They include access to a shared bathroom; and free bed linen are provided.

There is a kitchen available for guests in the evenings and a TV lounge with vending machines selling drinks and snacks. There are also 2 computers.

New York is ideally located for visiting many of Barcelona’s sights by foot. Ciutadella Park is a 10-minute walk away and Barceloneta Beach is 15 minutes's walk away.

The ferry port bus is a 10-minute walk from the hostel and you can catch a bus to the airport from Plaza Catalunya Square, 20 minutes’ walk away.

Name: Sallés Hotel Pere IV
Description:
Pere IV is situated in the Poble Nou District, 10 minutes’ walk from the lively Port Olimpic area and Barcelona's beaches. This hotel features a free spa, free Wi-Fi, a seasonal roof top terrace and 24-hour reception.

Each of the spacious rooms comes with a minibar, and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels.

The à la carte Garum Restaurant offers Mediterranean cuisine. The hotel serves a daily, buffet breakfast.

Guests enjoy free access to the Pere IV's spa, which includes a Finnish sauna, a hammam, indoor pool and sensation showers.

The Pere IV is a short walk from the beach and the new marina. Nearby Bogatell Metro Station offers easy access to the beach and the city centre, which can both be reached within 15 minutes.

Name: Autèntic Arc de Triomf Apartment
Description:
Situated in central Barcelona, a 5-minute walk from the Arc de Triomf, Autèntic Arc de Triomf Apartment offers accommodation with heating and free WiFi. Barceloneta beach is a 25-minute walk away.

The apartment features a spacious living room with a flat-screen TV and a dining area. There is also a kitchen, complete with an oven, dishwasher, and washing machine.

Featuring a small balcony, the apartment has 1 twin and 2 double bedrooms, as well as 2 sofa beds in the living room. There are 2 bathrooms with a shower, hairdryer, and free toiletries. Towels and bed linen are provided.

You will find shops and restaurants within a 5-minute walk of the apartment. Ciutadella Park is 700 metres away and Plaza Cataluña Square can be reached in around 15 minutes on foot.

Name: Hotel Roger de Llúria
Description:
This boutique hotel offers comfortable rooms with 42-inch (101 cm) flat-screen TVs and free Wi-Fi. The Roger de Lluria is set in an elegant area, 2 streets from Plaça Catalunya.

The Roger de Llúria is a 10-minute walk from Gaudí’s Casa Batlló, on Passeig de Gràcia and around 700 metres from Las Ramblas.

Rooms at the Roger de Lluria are spacious and well-equipped. Each room has a marble bathroom with a bath, bathrobe and hairdryer. There is a daily turn-down service.

The Roger de Lluria offers a transfer service from the airport, at an additional cost. There is also a ticket service and business centre.

A large buffet breakfast is served every morning.  There is also a lounge bar.

Name: My best house BCN
Description:
Situated in Barcelona, 6.8 km from Casa Batllo and 7.1 km from La Pedrera, My best house BCN offers air conditioning. The property is set 7.3 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, 7.4 km from Passeig de Gracia and 7.4 km from Tivoli Theatre. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Sagrada Familia is 5.6 km away.

The spacious apartment has 1 bedroom, a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a bidet. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Palau de la Musica Catalana is 7.6 km from the apartment, while Port Olimpic is 7.9 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 21 km from My best house BCN.

Name: Ramblas Apartment 5
Description:
In the Ciutat Vella district of Barcelona, close to Plaça Catalunya, Ramblas Apartment 5 features free WiFi and a washing machine. This property is located a short distance from attractions such as Passeig de Gracia, Cathedral of Barcelona, and Boqueria Market. The property is 500 metres from the city centre and 2.3 km from Sant Miquel Beach.

The air-conditioned apartment is composed of 2 separate bedrooms, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a microwave, and 1 bathroom. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Sightseeing tours are available in the vicinity.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Portal de l'Angel, Tivoli Theatre and Palau de la Musica Catalana. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km away.

Name: Praktik Èssens
Description:
Boasting a terrace, Praktik Èssens is located in Barcelona and is 300 metres from Passeig de Gracia. The property is set 300 metres from Casa Batllo and 350 metres from Tivoli Theatre. The accommodation features free WiFi and an outdoor terrace, tea and coffee with free pastries corner and happy hour every day from 19:00 hours to 20:00 hours (free wines and snacks).

The rooms in the hotel are equipped with a coffee machine. Rooms are complete with a private bathroom, while certain rooms at Praktik Èssens also feature a seating area. All rooms have a desk.

Speaking English and Spanish, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical information on the area at the reception.

Plaça Catalunya is 500 metres from the accommodation. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 16 km from Praktik Èssens.

Name: BCN Town Apartments Portaferrissa
Description:
Offering free WiFi, BCN Town Apartments Portaferrissa is a self-catering accommodation located in Barcelona, 400 metres from Liceu Metro Station.

These modern, luxury apartments include a seating area with a flat-screen TV and air conditioning. There is a full kitchen with a dishwasher, oven, coffee machine and a microwave, and the private bathrooms also come with a shower and a hairdryer. You can enjoy city view from the rooms.

Located in the Gothic Quarter, guests will find many bars and restaurants within minutes of the apartments. Las Ramblas is a 2-minute walk away.

BCN Town Apartments Portaferrissa are 500 metres from Plaça Catalunya, and a 20-minute metro ride will take you to Gaudi's La Sagrada Familia.

Name: Mosaic by Ona
Description:
Located in a historic building in the heart of Rambla Catalunya, Mosaic by Ona is situated in Barcelona, 10 minutes' walk from Plaça Catalunya and 5 minutes' walk from Casa Batllo and La Pedrera. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property

Every room at this hotel is air conditioned, and features a flat-screen TV and modern décor. A terrace or balcony are featured in certain rooms. The rooms include a private bathroom fitted with a shower.

Staff at the 24-hour reception can provide information about what to see and do in Barcelona. The hotel also offers car hire.

Due to its central location, several bars and restaurants can be found nearby.

The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from Mosaic by Ona.

Name: Petit Hotel
Description:
The Petit Hotel guest house is situated in the Sarrià-Sant Gervasi district of Barcelona and 350 metres from the Metro station, Muntaner. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the property.

Rooms at the Petit guest house are spacious and feature bright décor. All rooms are air-conditioned and feature a TV and minibar.

Facilities include luggage storage and breakfast service. The area of Sarrià-Sant Gervasi has many restaurants and cafés.

Las Ramblas and the centre of Barcelona can be reached in less than 10 minutes, by train. Local attractions include Gaudí’s La Pedrera and Casa Batlló, which can be reached in around 20 minutes, by foot.

Parking is available nearby. Guests of the Petit Hotel have a discount, please contact for more information.

Name: Petit Palace Boqueria Garden
Description:
The Petit Palace Boqueria Garden is set in a historic 19th-century building by La Boqueria Market, 10 meters from Las Ramblas, and offers free high-speed WiFi and free bicycle use (subject to availability).

Each room at the Petit Palace Boqueria Garden includes a flat-screen TV and laptop safe, and a private bathroom. The hotel also offers an electric scooter hire service, subject to availability.

The hotel's bar is set by a private courtyard and garden with hundred-year-old trees, a listed site of architectural heritage in Barcelona.

Petit Palace Boqueria Garden is located in Barcelona's Gothic Quarter, just a 1-minute walk from Liceu Metro Station, offering convenient transport around the city. Plaça Catalunya Square is 800 meters away, and you can walk to Barcelona Port in 8 minutes.

Name: Mambo Tango
Description:
Mambo Tango is a backpackers’ hostel located in Barcelona’s Poble Sec district, just 100 metres from Parallel Metro Station. It offers free daily activities and free Wi-Fi access.

Mambo Tango Hostel offers colourful dormitories and private rooms, all with air conditioning, heating and individual lockers.

You can prepare meals in the Mambo Tango’s shared kitchen, or enjoy a film in the TV lounge. The hotel’s free activities include photo exhibitions, music classes and city walks.

Staff can provide information on Barcelona’s many attractions, as well as help with ticket reservations and discounts. The property also organizes daily guided walking tours and night tours to bars and nightclubs. The famous Gaudí houses are within 15 minutes’ walk of the hostel.

Situated at the foot of Montjuïc Hill, the hostel is an ideal base for visiting Montjuïc Castle and the Magic Fountains. The lively Raval district is just a 5-minute walk away.

Name: Diagonal Apartments
Description:
Situated on Barcelona’s Diagonal Avenue, these apartments are 150 metres from Monumental Metro Station. All the apartments at Diagonal Apartments are air-conditioned and have free Wi-Fi.

The apartments are also heated and include an equipped kitchen. The building has a lift and a shared rooftop terrace with a picnic area.

Within 10 minutes' walk you can find plenty of supermarkets and other shops, as well as the Glòries Shopping Centre.

Name: SANT ANTONI HOSTAL, Sustainable Tourism
Description:
Situated conveniently in Barcelona, SANT ANTONI HOSTAL, Sustainable Tourism offers a continental breakfast and free WiFi. This 1-star guest house offers a lift and a shared kitchen. Private parking can be arranged at an extra charge.

The units come with air conditioning, a microwave, a fridge, a coffee machine, a shower, a hair dryer and a wardrobe. At the guest house, the units are fitted with a private bathroom and bed linen.

A bicycle rental service is available at the guest house.

Popular points of interest near SANT ANTONI HOSTAL, Sustainable Tourism include Plaça Catalunya, Portal de l'Angel and Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km away, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: Hotel Barcelona Catedral
Description:
There is a gym and a rooftop chill-out terrace with a swimming pool and wonderful city views. It is located 100 metres from Barcelona Cathedral, in the historic Gothic Quarter.

Each elegant room at the Barcelona Catedral Hotel features wooden flooring and air conditioning. Rooms have free WiFi, a laptop safe and flat-screen TV with international channels. Smoking is not allowed in any of the rooms, but there are common areas where smoking is allowed.

Creative Mediterranean cuisine is served in the hotel’s 4 Capellans restaurant, which offers a menu for celiacs. There is a wide range of restaurants and tapas bars within a 5-minute walk, including many in the popular El Born district.

Hotel Barcelona Catedral is 450 metres from Plaza Catalunya Square, while Las Ramblas are a 5-minute walk away.

Name: Click&Flat Sugranyes
Description:
Located in Barcelona, 1.6 km from Sants Railway Station and 3.6 km from Magic Fountain of Montjuic, Click&Flat Sugranyes offers air conditioning. It is situated 3.9 km from Palau Sant Jordi and provides a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Camp Nou is 1.8 km away.

The apartment features 1 bedroom, a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchenette with an oven and a microwave, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Passeig de Gracia is 4.7 km from the apartment, while La Pedrera is 4.8 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 10 km from Click&Flat Sugranyes.

Name: Studio Hostel
Description:
Studio Hostel is set in the residential district of Sarrià, 50 metres from Reina Elisenda Metro Station. It offers free Wi-Fi, free breakfast, a roof terrace and rooms with private bathrooms.

Rooms at the Studio are brightly decorated. Each has heating and a desk.

The Albergue has a communal lounge with a TV and there is also a reading area. There are vending machines in the reception and guests can make use of the fridge, microwave and kettle in the shared area.

Set just off Passeig de la Bonanova, the hostel is within 10 minutes’ walk of a selection of restaurants, cafés and bars. The popular Gràcia district is just 5 train stops away.

Staff at the Studio’s can provide information on Barcelona’s many tourist attractions. The city centre is 20 minutes from Reina Elisenda Station, and free on-street parking is available nearby.

Name: Bonavista Apartments - Pedrera
Description:
Bonavista Apartments - Pedrera provides accommodation within 1.3 km of the centre of Barcelona, with free WiFi, and a kitchen with an oven, a toaster and a fridge. There is a private entrance at the apartment for the convenience of those who stay. The accommodation offers airport transfers, while a car rental service is also available.

The apartment complex will provide guests with air-conditioned units with a desk, a coffee machine, a dishwasher, a microwave, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. A terrace with an outdoor dining area and garden views is offered in some units. At the apartment complex, all units come with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Passeig de Gracia, La Pedrera and Casa Batllo. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km away.

Name: Aparthotel Mariano Cubi Barcelona
Description:
Aparthotel Mariano Cubi can be found just 200 metres from Barcelona’s Avinguda Diagonal and 15 minutes' walk from Passeig de Gracia. It offers air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi and some have a kitchenette.

All spacious rooms have wooden floors, satellite TV, and a desk.

The Aparthotel Mariano Cubi's tour desk can help guests plan their stay in Barcelona. There is also a free business centre with internet access.

The area has a wide range of shops. Fontana Metro station is about 500 metres away and Gràcia FGC Station is only 150 metres away. From there you can get to Plaça Catalunya and the Ramblas. Gaudí's La Pedrera is about 20 minutes’ walk away.

Name: 2 BDR EIXAMPLE APARTMENT
Description:
2 BDR EIXAMPLE APARTMENT features a balcony and is situated in Barcelona, within just 1.4 km of La Pedrera and 1.8 km of Casa Batllo. It is set 2.3 km from Plaça Catalunya and features a lift. The property is non-smoking and is located 1.2 km from Passeig de Gracia.

With free WiFi, this 2-bedroom apartment provides a flat-screen TV, a washing machine and a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave and toaster. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment.

Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 2.4 km from the apartment, while Sants Railway Station is 1.7 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from 2 BDR EIXAMPLE APARTMENT.

Name: Hotel Pulitzer Barcelona
Description:
This design hotel is right next to Plaza Catalunya in the centre of Barcelona. It has a rooftop garden terrace and offers free high-speed WiFi.

Set in a 19th-Century building, the hotel features modern, elegant décor. Its rooms include free tea and coffee, air conditioning, heating, and flat-screen satellite TV. The private bathrooms include luxury cosmetics. Some rooms have a private balcony.

A varied buffet breakfast with zero-kilometre and homemade products is served. Gluten-free breakfasts can be requested.

Hotel Pulitzer Barcelona has a gastronomic restaurant with a terrace, lobby bar and library. Around 100 live music sessions take place on the terrace throughout the year.

The 24-hour reception offers services such as bike and scooter rental, massages and personal training or yoga sessions.

The Hotel Pulitzer Barcelona has a Biosphere Responsible Tourism certificate.

Name: Barcelona Princess
Description:
Barcelona Princess Hotel is a 10-minute walk from the beach in the city’s Forum area. It offers wonderful views and a free gym. Free WiFi is available throughout.

All guests have free access to the 2 heated outdoor pools. The one on the 23rd floor offers spectacular sea views.

Rooms at Princess Barcelona are elegant and bright. Each has contemporary décor. All rooms have satellite TV.

The hotel has a Mediterranean restaurant and 2 stylish bars, including a relaxed poolside bar with panoramic views.

Princess Hotel Barcelona is set on Avenida Diagonal, next to Diagonal Mar Shopping Centre. The tour bus stops in front of the hotel and Maresme Forum Metro Station is 100 metres away. Plaza de Catalunya and Las Ramblas can be reached in 15 minutes, by Metro.

Name: Meeting Point Hostels
Description:
Meeting Point Hostels is located just behind Barcelona Sants train station and offers free WiFi.

Both private and shared rooms are offered. The rooms have air conditioning and heating, and all beds have an individual reading light, a small shelf and a power socket. Free lockers secured with keycard locks are available. A luggage storage room is available on request.

Central Barcelona can be reached in around 10 minutes by train. Plaça d'Espanya and Fira de Barcelona are a 20-minute walk away from Meeting Point Hostels.

Sagrada Familia is a 20-minute metro ride from Meeting Point Hostels, while Camp Nou Stadium is a 20-minute walk away.

Name: Barcelona Apartment Republica
Description:
Located 150 metres from Llacuna Metro Station, Derby Republica offers modern loft-style apartments featuring exposed brick walls. Guests have access to a rooftop pool and sun terrace with views over Barcelona.

The air-conditioned apartments at Derby include a kitchen equipped with a microwave, hob, fridge and dishwasher. There is also a washing machine, and bedding and towels are provided.

The Republica has a concierge service that can help organise activities such as tours and water sports. Guests can also enjoy free entry to the Barcelona Egyptian Museum.

Glories Shopping Centre is a 10-minute walk away from Derby Republica. The beach and Poble Nou Park are also just 15 minutes’ walk away.

Name: Magnifico apartamento camp nou
Description:
Located in Barcelona, 1.6 km from Camp Nou and 1.4 km from Sants Railway Station, Magnifico apartamento camp nou provides air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. The property is situated 3.2 km from Magic Fountain of Montjuic, 4.3 km from Passeig de Gracia and 4.4 km from La Pedrera. Casa Batllo is 4.5 km from the apartment and Plaça Catalunya is 5 km away.

The spacious apartment comes with 2 bedrooms, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, and 1 bathroom with a bath, bathrobes and a washing machine. A TV is featured.

Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 5 km from the apartment, while Palau Sant Jordi is 5 km away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 11 km from the property.

Name: ApartEasy - Family Sant Antoni apt.
Description:
Set in Barcelona, 1.5 km from Plaça Catalunya and 1.5 km from Portal de l'Angel, ApartEasy - Family Sant Antoni apt. Offers air conditioning. Among the facilities at this property are a lift and private check-in and check-out, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is non-smoking and is situated 1.7 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station.

The spacious apartment with a balcony and city views has 3 bedrooms, a living room, a TV, an equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, and 2 bathrooms with a shower. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment.

Sightseeing tours are available close to the property.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Tivoli Theatre, Passeig de Gracia and Boqueria Market. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km from the property.

Name: Hotel La Pau 4 Sup
Description:
Hotel La Pau 4 Sup is situated in central Barcelona, 400 metres from Plaza Reial and a 2-minute walk from Barcelona's famous Las Ramblas Street. Drassanes Metro Station is 350 metres away.

You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property and luggage storage. Free WiFi is available in the reception area. All rooms have private bathrooms.

La Seu, Cathedral of Barcelona is 800 metres from Hotel La Pau 4 Sup, while Picasso Museum is 900 metres from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 12 km from the property.

Name: Luxury Born
Description:
Set in Barcelona, just 1.4 km from Somorrostro Beach, Luxury Born offers beachfront accommodation with free WiFi. The property is close to Plaça Reial, Passeig de Gracia and Palau de la Musica Catalana. The property is 1 km from the city centre and 1.3 km from Barceloneta Beach.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 1 bedroom, a fully equipped kitchen and 1 bathroom. A flat-screen TV is offered. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Sant Miquel Beach, Santa Maria del Mar and Picasso Museum. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km from the property.

Name: Wello Apartments
Description:
Wello Eixample Apartments is centrally located in Barcelona, within 10 minutes’ walk of Passeig de Gràcia and Plaza Catalunya. The modern, air-conditioned apartments offer free WiFi.

The stylish apartments have wooden floors, a balcony and private bathroom with hairdryer and toiletries. The living room has a sofa bed and flat-screen satellite TV.

There is a dining area, dishwasher and washing machine. The kitchenette includes a fridge, microwave and coffee maker.

You can walk to MACBA Modern Art Museum in 10 minutes from Wello Eixample Apartments. Airport buses leave from Plaza Catalunya.

Name: Ferienwohnung für 3 Personen ca 50 qm in Barcelona-Sants-Montjuïc, Costa Brava Costa del Maresme
Description:
Ferienwohnung für 3 Personen ca 50 qm in Barcelona-Sants-Montjuïc, Costa Brava Costa del Maresme features a balcony and is located in Barcelona, within just 500 metres of Magic Fountain of Montjuic and 1.8 km of Sants Railway Station. The property is around 2.6 km from Plaça Catalunya, 2.7 km from Passeig de Gracia and 2.7 km from Portal de l'Angel. Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 2.7 km from the apartment and Plaça Reial is 5.1 km away.

With free WiFi, this apartment provides a TV, a washing machine and a fully equipped kitchenette with a microwave and toaster.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Palau Sant Jordi, Boqueria Market and Montjuïc. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 11 km away.

Name: MH Apartments Ramblas
Description:
MH Apartments Ramblas is located in front of Palau Güell, 120 metres from Las Ramblas of Barcelona. Columbus Monument and Moll de Barcelona Ferry Station are within 10 minutes’ walk away.

Each bright apartment features city views. There is a living room with air condition with a TV, a dining area and a well-equipped kitchen. There is free high-speed WiFi.

The apartments at MH also include a washing machine and basic cleaning products. Tourist information can be provided at the reception.

The nearest metro station is Liceu, which is 350 metres away from MH Apartments Ramblas. Plaça Catalunya Square is 1 km away.

Name: Exe Mitre
Description:
Exe Mitre enjoys a peaceful location in the San Gervasi district of Barcelona, 200 metres from Putxet Park. It offers spacious rooms with and free WiFi.

An extensive buffet breakfast is served, with hot and cold options. The friendly staff are happy to recommend restaurants and bars nearby.

The elegant rooms at Exe Mitre feature classic décor and come with a flat-screen TV. Some rooms also have a terrace with views over Mount Tibidabo.

Exe Mitre is just 15 minutes’ walk from Gaudi’s famous Park Guell. Putxet Metro Station is 200 metres away and connects with Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard in just 6 minutes. Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas are an 8-minute metro ride away.

Name: Alcam Books
Description:
Alcam Books is situated in the Eixample district of Barcelona, 1.7 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, 1.7 km from Tivoli Theatre and 1.5 km from Passeig de Gracia. It is located 1.5 km from Portal de l'Angel and provides a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Plaça Catalunya is 1.5 km away.

Some units are equipped with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV, washing machine and a coffee machine, as well as a fully equipped kitchen. At the apartment complex, all units are equipped with a private bathroom.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Boqueria Market, Magic Fountain of Montjuic and Cathedral of Barcelona. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km away.

Name: Hotel Toledano Ramblas
Description:
Offering a fantastic location, right on the famous Ramblas, next to Plaza Cataluña Square and Barcelona’s main shopping area, this hotel features a 24-hour reception and free Wi-Fi throughout.

Rooms at Hotel Toledano Ramblas include satellite TV , desk and a private bathroom. Some rooms have air conditioning.

This hotel is close to the Aerobus bus stop, which takes you to Barcelona International Airport. Plaza Cataluña or Liceu metro stations are less than 4 minutes’ walk of the hotel.

Numerous bars and restaurants serving national and international food can be found nearby.

Name: Apartamento en Avenida Gaudi
Description:
Set in Barcelona in the Catalonia region, Apartamento en Avenida Gaudi has a balcony. The property is around 2.3 km from La Pedrera, 2.4 km from Passeig de Gracia and 2.8 km from Casa Batllo. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Sagrada Familia is 600 metres away.

This apartment has 2 bedrooms, a kitchen with an oven and a stovetop, a flat-screen TV, a seating area and 1 bathroom fitted with an a bath or shower. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 3.3 km from the apartment, while Tivoli Theatre is 3.4 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 16 km away.

Name: Apartamento zona Sagrada Familia II
Description:
Set in Barcelona, 2.9 km from Nova Icaria Beach and less than 1 km from Sagrada Familia, Apartamento zona Sagrada Familia II offers air conditioning. The property is around 2.4 km from La Pedrera, 2.7 km from Casa Batllo and 3.2 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Bogatell Beach is 2.9 km away.

The spacious apartment has 2 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV and a fully equipped kitchen that provides guests with a dishwasher, an oven, a washing machine and a fridge. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Passeig de Gracia is 3.2 km from the apartment, while Tivoli Theatre is 3.3 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 15 km away.

Name: Tendency Apartments - Sagrada Familia
Description:
Set in Barcelona, Tendency Apartments - Sagrada Familia is 700 metres from Sagrada Familia. La Pedrera is 1.9 km from the property.

The accommodation is air conditioned and features a seating area. There is also a kitchen, fitted with a dishwasher. An oven and coffee machine are also offered. There is a private bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer in every unit. Towels are provided.

Plaça Catalunya is 2.3 km from Tendency Apartments - Sagrada Familia. The nearest airport is El Prat Airport, 15 km from Tendency Apartments - Sagrada Familia.

Name: Fira Apartments by Gaiarooms
Description:
Located next to the Fira de Barcelona Exhibition Centre, these bright modern apartments offer free WiFi and a flat-screen TV. Plaza Espanya Square is just 50 metres away.

Each stylish Ding Dong Fira Apartment is decorated in light colours, with smart wooden floors. Apartments have a lounge with a sofa bed, and air conditioning and heating is available in the lounge only.

There is a well-equipped open-plan kitchenette with a washing machine, microwave, toaster, Nespresso coffee machine and utensils. Towels and bed linen are provided and there is a hairdryer.

A range of bars, restaurants and shops can be found within a 5-minute walk of the Fira Apartments by Gaiarooms. The famous Magic Fountain and Las Arenas Shopping Centre are both within 100 metres.

Espanya Metro Station, 250 metres away, offers direct metro services within 10 minutes to Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas. Sants International Train Station is within a 500 metre walk of the apartments or can be reached by direct metro line. Buses to and from the airport, as well as city tour buses, stop 3 minutes' walk from the apartments.

Name: Hotel Turin Barcelona
Description:
Hotel Turin Barcelona is located just 50 meters from the famous Ramblas in Barcelona. It offers free Wi-Fi, 24-hour reception, free luggage storage and a lovely sun terrace. There is free water, coffee and tea in the lobby lounge.

It features stylish rooms with wooden floors and furnishings. They are equipped with a private bathroom, hairdryer, safe, Smart TV and minibar.

The Turin Hotel is located just 150 meters from the Gothic District, 3 minutes from the Liceu metro and a 20-minute walk from the beach. In the area there are several restaurants, shops and supermarkets open until late.

The hotel offers a fabulous breakfast buffet. Most of the food items come from La Boquería Market, located 2 minutes' walk away.

Name: Habitacion privada en BELLO APARTAMENTO COMPARTIDO
Description:
Featuring a garden, a shared lounge as well as a terrace, Habitacion privada en BELLO APARTAMENTO COMPARTIDO is set in the centre of Barcelona, less than 1 km from Casa Batllo. This property is located a short distance from attractions such as La Pedrera, Portal de l'Angel, and Boqueria Market. The property is non-smoking and is situated 1.4 km from Plaça Catalunya.

The units in the hostel are equipped with a coffee machine. Featuring a shared bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer, rooms at Habitacion privada en BELLO APARTAMENTO COMPARTIDO also provide guests with free WiFi. At the accommodation every room includes bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near Habitacion privada en BELLO APARTAMENTO COMPARTIDO include Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Passeig de Gracia and Tivoli Theatre. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from the hostel.

Name: Catalonia Barcelona Plaza
Description:
Located in Barcelona's Plaza de España, Hotel Catalonia Barcelona Plaza offers a seasonal rooftop pool and a terrace with panoramic city views. It also has a fitness room, beauty salon and free Wi-Fi.

The property is located next to Espanya Metro Station. In the square there are numerous bus stops that connect with other parts of the city, with the Fira Barcelona fairground and with Barcelona airport.

All spacious rooms are equipped with air conditioning, satellite TV, a safe and a private marble bathroom with hairdryer. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout, and Smart TVs with Chromecast apps are available. Choose one of the two clock suites and you will have incredible views of Montjuïc from the floor-to-ceiling windows. If you prefer, the hotel also has rooms and suites with private terrace.

The Catalonia Barcelona Plaza serves a daily buffet breakfast in the Simultáneo space, Barcelona's new meeting point that fuses cultural and leisure activities with the best gastronomic offer. Come to Simultáneo to telework with free wifi, to have an informal meeting, to enjoy a concert or to have an afterwork cocktail.

Do you already know the  Simultáneo Gastrobar? An avant-garde space that offers unique haute cuisine dishes. If you book half board, you can enjoy the Gastrobar menu during lunch or dinner.

The Filigrana restaurant specialises in modern Catalan cuisine made with local ingredients. You can also visit the Japanese restaurant Kurai or have a drink on The Clock terrace, overlooking Montjuïc.

The Catalonia Barcelona Plaza has a spacious business centre with 3 large conference rooms and 8 meeting rooms, all equipped with the latest technology.

This is our guests' favourite part of Barcelona, according to independent reviews.

Name: Apartment Eixample Esquerre Arago Rocafort by Interhome
Description:
Boasting air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony, Apartment Eixample Esquerre Arago Rocafort by Interhome is set in Barcelona. This 3-star apartment offers a lift. Plaça Catalunya is 2.7 km from the apartment and Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 2.8 km away.

The spacious apartment has 2 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a bath.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Sants Railway Station, Magic Fountain of Montjuic and Casa Batllo. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 11 km from the property.

Name: Ma Bright apartment next to Parc de Montjuïc
Description:
Featuring city views, Ma Bright apartment next to Parc de Montjuïc offers accommodation with a balcony, around 2.9 km from Plaça Catalunya. The property is set 2.9 km from Santa Maria del Mar, 3.1 km from Passeig de Gracia and 1.2 km from Montjuïc. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Magic Fountain of Montjuic is 1.3 km away.

The apartment consists of 2 bedrooms, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a bath and a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Portal de l'Angel, Boqueria Market and Palau Sant Jordi. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 11 km away.

Name: P1GRVCC1059 - Fantastic 2bedroom flat in the center
Description:
P1GRVCC1059 - Fantastic 2bedroom flat in the center features a balcony and is located in Barcelona, within just 1.6 km of Palau Sant Jordi and 1.3 km of Sants Railway Station. It is situated 3.4 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and provides a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Magic Fountain of Montjuic is less than 1 km away.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 2 bedrooms, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower. A TV is provided. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Plaça Catalunya is 3.7 km from the apartment, while Boqueria Market is 4 km away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 10 km from the property.

Name: Apartment Vila Olimpica Sant Marti by Interhome
Description:
In the Sant Martí district of Barcelona, close to Nova Icaria Beach, Apartment Vila Olimpica Sant Marti by Interhome has a garden and a washing machine. The property was built in 2002 and features accommodation with a balcony. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Bogatell Beach is 300 metres away.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 1 bedroom, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a bidet and a hair dryer. A TV is available.

Mar Bella Beach is 1 km from the apartment, while Port Olimpic is 1.2 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 14 km away.

Name: Liceu Apartments by Gaiarooms
Description:
Set in the centre of Barcelona, 2.4 km from Sant Sebastian Beach and 2.4 km from Sant Miquel Beach, Liceu Apartments by Gaiarooms offers free WiFi and air conditioning. It is located 200 metres from Boqueria Market and offers a lift. The property is non-smoking and is situated 2.5 km from Barceloneta Beach.

The apartment is fitted with 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a balcony with city views. The unit at the property features a shower and a dressing room. For added privacy, the accommodation has a private entrance and is protected by full-day security.

Sightseeing tours are available close to the property.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Plaça Catalunya, Portal de l'Angel and Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km away.

Name: El Palauet Royal Suites
Description:
Located in a Modernist building, El Palauet Royal Suites features a rooftop spa with spectacular city views. It offers elegant, modern suites with free Wi-Fi.

El Palauet Royal Suites’s spacious suites include 2 bedrooms with private bathrooms, a spacious living room and a fully-equipped kitchen including a hob, microwave, small fridge and a dishwasher. Some include a balcony. All suites come with 2 bottles of water, a bottle of cava courtesy of the house, other welcome details and Wallpaper guide to Barcelona.

This luxury hotel delivers breakfast to the rooms. Main restaurants and bars can be found on Barcelona’s elegant Passeig de Gràcia Avenue, where it intersects with Diagonal Avenue.apples

El Palauet Royal Suites offers a personal assistant service. A shuttle service is available at an additional cost and guests can rent cars at the hotel.

Name: Hostourist@Bcn Apartamento Monumental
Description:
Located in Barcelona, 1.9 km from Nova Icaria Beach and 2.1 km from Somorrostro Beach, Hostourist@Bcn Apartamento Monumental provides spacious air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. The property is close to several well-known attractions, 1.6 km from Tivoli Theatre, 1.9 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and 1.9 km from Cathedral of Barcelona. The property is non-smoking and is situated 2.2 km from Bogatell Beach.

The apartment is composed of 2 bedrooms, a fully equipped kitchen, and 1 bathroom. A flat-screen TV is provided.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Sagrada Familia, Passeig de Gracia and Palau de la Musica Catalana. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 14 km away.

Name: Apartment Sants-Les Corts Galileu by Interhome
Description:
Located in Barcelona, 1.9 km from Camp Nou and 1.2 km from Sants Railway Station, Apartment Sants-Les Corts Galileu by Interhome provides air-conditioned accommodation with a terrace and free WiFi. This 3-star apartment offers a lift. The property is non-smoking and is set 2.7 km from Magic Fountain of Montjuic.

The spacious apartment features 2 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a washing machine, and 2 bathrooms with a bidet.

Passeig de Gracia is 3.8 km from the apartment, while La Pedrera is 4 km away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 11 km from the property.

Name: 21PER1020 - Cozy apartment in Vila de Gracia
Description:
Situated in Barcelona, less than 1 km from Passeig de Gracia and a 15-minute walk from La Pedrera, 21PER1020 - Cozy apartment in Vila de Gracia features air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. It is set 2.4 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and provides a lift. The property is non-smoking and is located 1.8 km from Casa Batllo.

The apartment has 2 bedrooms, a TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a washing machine, and 2 bathrooms with a shower. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment.

Tivoli Theatre is 2.6 km from the apartment, while Palau de la Musica Catalana is 2.7 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 15 km away.

Name: Fisa Rentals Gran Via Apartments
Description:
Fisa Rentals Gran Via Apartments are stylish apartments set 5 minutes’ walk from Plaza de Catalunya and Las Ramblas. They have free Wi-Fi access and a flat-screen TV.

Each spacious Fisa Rentals apartment offers contemporary décor and chic wooden floors. All apartments are air conditioned, but there is one bedroom that doesn't have air conditioning. All the apartments have a spacious seating area with satellite TV. The well-equipped kitchens also have a washing machine.

The apartments have easy access to the centre of Barcelona and are within 10 minutes’ walk of a selection of shops, bars and restaurants.

Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard is 300 metres away and Gaudí’s Casa Batlló and La Pedrera can be reached in 15 minutes, by foot. Passeig de Gràcia and Urquinaona Metro Stations are around 200 metres away.

Name: MH Apartments Gracia
Description:
Offering free Wi-Fi, MH Apartments Gracia offers  bright, soundproofed apartments located in Barcelona’s Gracia District, 10 minutes’ walk from Passeig de Gracia.

Featuring wooden floors, each soundproofed apartment has a living room with a sofa and satellite flat-screen TV. A dishwasher, oven and washing machine are included in the kitchen. Some apartments come with 2 bathrooms.

Private parking and an airport shuttle service are available at an extra cost and there is luggage storage.

A large variety of bars and restaurants can be found in the area, There is a 24-hour supermarket 500 meters from the apartments.

Gaudí’s Sagrada Familia and La Pedrera can be visited within a 20-minute walk. Fontana Metro Station, with connection to Plaça Catalunya and Barcelona’s historic centre, is 400 metres away.

Name: Boutique Casanova
Description:
In the centre of Barcelona, located within a short distance of Passeig de Gracia and Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Boutique Casanova offers free WiFi, air conditioning and household amenities such as a microwave and coffee machine. This apartment provides accommodation with a patio. The property is non-smoking and is set less than 1 km from Plaça Catalunya.

The apartment is equipped with 2 bedrooms, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a balcony with city views.

Dining options are available close to the apartment.

Popular points of interest near Boutique Casanova include Portal de l'Angel, Tivoli Theatre and Boqueria Market. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km away.

Name: MH Apartments Sant Pau
Description:
MH Apartments Sant Pau are located just 7 minutes’ walk from Gaudi’s famous Sagrada Família, in Barcelona. These modern, air-conditioned apartments feature free WiFi and a flat-screen TV.

MH Apartments Sant Pau have parquet floors. There is also a washing machine and dishwasher. Bed linen and towels are provided.

There are various restaurants, bars and supermarkets located in the streets around the apartments. The charming Bohemian district of Gràcia is just 5 minutes' walk away.

The amazing Hospital de Sant Pau, a UNESCO World Heritage Site, is just 8 minutes’ walk from the apartments. Located a 7-minute walk away, Joanic Metro Station connects you with Barcelona City Centre and the Gothic Quarter in under 10 minutes.

Private parking is available 300 metres from the property, for an extra cost.

Name: Fisa Rentals Aribau
Description:
Located in the centre of Barcelona, 700 metres from Passeig de Gracia and less than 1 km from Casa Batllo, Fisa Rentals Aribau offers free WiFi and air conditioning. It is set 1.4 km from Plaça Catalunya and provides a lift. The property is non-smoking and is situated 700 metres from La Pedrera.

This apartment includes 2 bedrooms, a living room and a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a dining area, and 1 bathroom with an a bath or shower and a washing machine. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. The property offers city views.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Tivoli Theatre and Portal de l'Angel. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km away.

Name: 12PAR1003 - Luminoso piso en Paralelo
Description:
Situated in Barcelona, 700 metres from Magic Fountain of Montjuic and 1.9 km from Plaça Catalunya, 12PAR1003 - Luminoso piso en Paralelo features air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. It is located 2.6 km from Portal de l'Angel and offers a lift. The property is non-smoking and is set 2.6 km from Passeig de Gracia.

The spacious apartment has 2 bedrooms, a TV, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Boqueria Market, Sants Railway Station and Palau Sant Jordi. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km from the property.

Name: Magnífico apartamento en el centro
Description:
Situated in Barcelona, less than 1 km from Passeig de Gracia and a 17-minute walk from La Pedrera, Magnífico apartamento en el centro features air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. The property is around 2.5 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, 2.5 km from Plaça Catalunya and 2.6 km from Tivoli Theatre. The property is non-smoking and is located 1.9 km from Casa Batllo.

The spacious apartment has 3 bedrooms, a living room with a TV, an equipped kitchen, and 2 bathrooms with a shower and a hair dryer.

Portal de l'Angel is 2.8 km from the apartment, while Park Güell is 2.9 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 14 km away.

Name: Tendency Rambla Catalunya
Description:
Tendency Rambla Catalunya offers accommodation within 600 metres of the centre of Barcelona, with free WiFi, and a kitchen with a dishwasher, an oven and a microwave. There is a private entrance at the apartment for the convenience of those who stay. The apartment features family rooms.

The units come with air conditioning, a toaster, a fridge, a coffee machine, a bidet, a hair dryer and a wardrobe. Each unit comes with a kettle and a private bathroom, while some rooms come with a balcony. At the apartment complex, units come with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Plaça Catalunya, Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and Tivoli Theatre. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km away.

Name: BBarcelona Guinardó Flat
Description:
BBarcelona Guinardó Flat is situated in the Horta-Guinardó district of Barcelona, 3.7 km from Park Güell, 4 km from Passeig de Gracia and 4.1 km from La Pedrera. The apartment, set in a building dating from 1970, is 4.6 km from Casa Batllo and 5.1 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Sagrada Familia is 2.9 km away.

The air-conditioned apartment is composed of 2 separate bedrooms, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen, and 1 bathroom. A flat-screen TV is available. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Tivoli Theatre is 5.2 km from the apartment, while Palau de la Musica Catalana is 5.4 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 17 km away.

Name: ApartEasy - Gracia Apartments
Description:
Featuring free Wi-Fi, Apart Easy Gracia is located in Barcelona’s Gracia District, within 400 metres of Passeig de Gracia and Gaudí’s La Pedrera building. The property offers modern apartments with air conditioning.

Each apartment features wooden floors and has a living room with a sofa and TV. An oven, microwave and washing machine are included in the kitchenette. The bathroom comes with a shower.

Some apartments offer a private terrace with city views. A large variety of supermarkets, bars and restaurants can be found within 5 minutes’ walk of the apartments.

Plaça Catalunya and the famous Sagrada Familia can be reached in 20 minutes on foot. Diagonal Metro Station, with connection to the historic centre, is 400 metres away.

Name: Ronda Sant Pere Rafael
Description:
In the centre of Barcelona, located within a short distance of Passeig de Gracia and Palau de la Musica Catalana, Ronda Sant Pere Rafael offers free WiFi, air conditioning and household amenities such as a fridge and coffee machine. It is set 2.3 km from Barceloneta Beach and provides a lift. The property is non-smoking and is situated 2.3 km from Somorrostro Beach.

The spacious apartment with a balcony and city views features 2 bedrooms, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a microwave and a toaster, and 1 bathroom with a bidet. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. At the apartment, there is a dressing room for guests to change in.

At Ronda Sant Pere Rafael, the restaurant is open for brunch and serves Mediterranean cuisine.

Sightseeing tours are available nearby.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Tivoli Theatre, Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and Cathedral of Barcelona. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km away, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: Alojamiento Parrales
Description:
In the Eixample district of Barcelona, close to Magic Fountain of Montjuic, Alojamiento Parrales features free WiFi and a washing machine. This property is located a short distance from attractions such as Passeig de Gracia, Boqueria Market, and Palau de la Musica Catalana. The accommodation provides a lift and a shared kitchen for guests.

The units are equipped with a microwave, fridge, a coffee machine, a shower, a hair dryer and a wardrobe. A stovetop and kitchenware are also provided, as well as a kettle. All units include a shared bathroom, free toiletries and bed linen.

Popular points of interest near the bed and breakfast include Plaça Catalunya, Portal de l'Angel and Tivoli Theatre. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km away.

Name: Catalonia Catedral
Description:
The Catalonia Catedral is set in a traditional Modernist building, just 100 metres from Barcelona Cathedral. It offers free use of Smartphones, Wi-Fi access, a rooftop seasonal pool and a Japanese-style terrace and garden.

The Catedral has stylish rooms, which have contemporary décor. Each has a flat-screen smart TV equipped with Chromecast app, air conditioning, a minibar, a Nespresso machine. A smartphone is available for guests during their stay free of charge.

The hotel’s Ascent Restaurant by Eboca serves Mediterrean cuisine and offers views of the nearby Palacio Pignatelli Art Gallery. There is also a bar in the hotel lobby where guests can use the computers with internet access and printers for free.

The Catalonia Catedral is around 10 minutes’ walk from landmarks such as Las Ramblas and Plaza de Catalunya Square. Barcelona’s Old Port and Marina are less than one kilometre away. Jaume I Metro Station is 5 minutes' walk away.

Name: Ferienwohnung für 3 Personen ca 38 qm in Barcelona-Gràcia, Costa Brava Costa del Maresme - b62765
Description:
Ferienwohnung für 3 Personen ca 38 qm in Barcelona-Gràcia, Costa Brava Costa del Maresme - b62765 has a terrace and is situated in Barcelona, within just 200 metres of Passeig de Gracia and 400 metres of La Pedrera. Guests staying at this apartment have access to a balcony. Palau de la Musica Catalana is 1.9 km from the apartment and Plaça Catalunya is 1.7 km away.

With free WiFi, this apartment features a TV, a washing machine and a fully equipped kitchenette with an oven and microwave.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Casa Batllo, Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and Tivoli Theatre. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 14 km from the property.

Name: Stay U-nique Apartments Mistral
Description:
Stay U-nique Apartments Mistral is set in the Eixample district of Barcelona, 2 km from Plaça Catalunya, 2.3 km from Portal de l'Angel and 2.4 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. It is situated 1.6 km from Sants Railway Station and features a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Magic Fountain of Montjuic is less than 1 km away.

The spacious apartment with a balcony and city views has 3 bedrooms, a living room, a TV, an equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 2 bathrooms with a shower. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Boqueria Market is 1.8 km from the apartment, while Palau Sant Jordi is 1.9 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 11 km from Stay U-nique Apartments Mistral.

Name: Modern and bright apartment in Eixample 5-2
Description:
Modern and bright apartment in Eixample 5-2 is set in the Eixample district of Barcelona, 2 km from Casa Batllo, 2.6 km from Plaça Catalunya and 2.7 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. It is located 1.2 km from Magic Fountain of Montjuic and provides a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Sants Railway Station is 1.1 km away.

The spacious apartment features a patio, 2 bedrooms, a living room and a well-equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave. A TV is provided. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Tivoli Theatre is 2.8 km from the apartment, while La Pedrera is 2.8 km away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 11 km from the property.

Name: 21par1005 - Beautiful Apartment in Paral-lel
Description:
Set in Barcelona, 700 metres from Magic Fountain of Montjuic and 1.9 km from Plaça Catalunya, 21par1005 - Beautiful Apartment in Paral-lel offers air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. It is located 2.6 km from Portal de l'Angel and features a lift. The property is non-smoking and is situated 2.6 km from Passeig de Gracia.

The spacious apartment has 2 bedrooms, a TV, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Boqueria Market, Sants Railway Station and Palau Sant Jordi. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km from the property.

Name: El Born Guest House by Casa Consell
Description:
Set next to Francia Train Station, El Born Guest House by Casa Consell is a guest house located in Barcelona. The property offers free Wi-Fi access and is 15 minutes’ walk from Barceloneta Beach.

The rooms are soundproofed and feature a TV and air conditioning, some rooms can offer a balcony with city views. Every room has a private bathroom, a safe and luggage storage.

The Born Food Market is only 2 minutes’ walk from the guest house. Guests can also find a large variety of bars and restaurants in the area.

La Ciutadella Park and Barcelona Zoo are only 200 metres from the property. Guests can reach Barcelona Port and La Rambla within 15 minutes on foot. Barceloneta Metro Station is 400 metres away.

Name: Axel Hotel Barcelona - Adults Only
Description:
The area around the Hotel Axel Barcelona is known as the Gay-xample because of its lively gay scene. The staff has knowledge of the local gay scene, and the hotel is hetero-friendly too.

Offering free Wi-Fi throughout, this design hotel is close to Passeig de Gràcia's exclusive boutiques. The Axel Hotel’s 500m² Spa Centre includes a hydromassage pool and saunas, and the modern rooms have flat-screen satellite TVs.

The Axel’s Sky Bar features a large swimming pool, a terrace with a hot tub and a cocktail bar. Here you will find parties, art exhibitions and shows.

The Axel Hotel Barcelona & Urban Spa offers easy access to the Ramblas, the Picasso Museum and Gothic Quarter. The hotel occupies an attractive 19th-century building.

Name: Blanc Guest House
Description:
Blanc Guest House is 8 minutes’ walk from Barcelona’s famous Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard. It offers an attractive terrace and smart rooms with free Wi-Fi and a flat-screen TV.

The rooms at Blanc Guest House are decorated in white, with parquet floors and white furniture. Each one comes with air conditioning, heating and a fan, and some have a private bathroom.

Staff at reception can provide information about what to see and do in Barcelona. Car rental is also available from the front desk.

The Blanc is 8 minutes’ walk from Diagonal Metro Station, connecting you with the rest of the city with ease. Plaza Catalunya is just 2 stops away.

Name: AinB Sagrada Familia Apartments
Description:
Just a 15-minute walk from Gaudí’s Sagrada Família Basilica, the stylish, air-conditioned AinB Sagrada Familia apartments offer free Wi-Fi and well-equipped kitchens. Arc de Triomf Metro Station is 250 metres away.

The bright apartments offer city views and elegant minimalist décor. Each apartment has a spacious living-dining room with flat-screen satellite TV. Kitchenettes include a hob, oven and coffee maker.

The charming Born district and Ciutadella Park are within a 10-minute walk of AinB Sagrada Familia. Las Ramblas and Barceloneta Beach can be reached within a 20-minute walk.

Estació del Nord Bus Station is just 200 metres from the apartments and offers national and international bus services, including direct buses to Girona Airport.

Name: BcnStop Parc Güell
Description:
Set 350 metres from Park Güell in Barcelona's quiet Gracia district, BcnStop Parc Güell apartments have air conditioning and free Wi-Fi. Vallcarca Metro Station is just 220 metres away.

The BcnStop Parc Güell apartments are heated and have a fully equipped kitchen, TV and either one or two bathrooms. Apartments with a private balcony or terrace available for a small surcharge.

Towels, bed linen and soap are included at BcnStop Parc Güell.
At reception you can request a laundry service and tourist information.

You can reach Plaça Catalunya and the Ramblas, the heart of Barcelona, in just 10 minutes by metro. There is a bus stop opposite the apartments, and there is private parking just 40 metres away that can also be reserved in advance for a small surcharge.

Name: Bed&BCN Diagonal 6
Description:
In the Eixample district of Barcelona, close to Casa Batllo, Bed&BCN Diagonal 6 has free WiFi and a washing machine. With city views, this accommodation features a balcony. The property is non-smoking and is situated 2.9 km from Somorrostro Beach.

This air-conditioned apartment features 2 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, and a living room. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Passeig de Gracia, La Pedrera and Sagrada Familia. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat, 14 km from Bed&BCN Diagonal 6, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: BYPILLOW Wander
Description:
Set just 100 metres from La Rambla in central Barcelona, BYPILLOW Wander offers modern rooms with air conditioning and free WiFi. Drassanes Metro Station is just 50 metres away.

Located on the 4th floor, all rooms have a private bathroom with a hairdryer and shower. They are heated, air-conditioned and include a flat-screen TV.

You will find a wide range of shops, restaurants and bars in the area. Barcelona’s Port Vell is just 350 metres from BYPILLOW Wander and the Maritime Museum is 150 metres away.

Barcelona Beach can be reached in a 15-minute bus ride. Plaza Catalunya is a 15-minute walk from the property and buses to the airport leave from there.

Name: Abba Rambla Hotel
Description:
Abba Rambla Hotel is set in the Raval District, 500 metres from Las Ramblas and Liceu Metro Station. It offers free Wi-Fi and a sun terrace.

The modern, air-conditioned rooms at Abba Rambla feature satellite TV, a safe and minibar. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and amenities. Some rooms have a balcony with views.

There is a café-bar, where guests can enjoy a buffet breakfast. Room service and a pizza delivery option are available.

There is a 24-hour reception, and you can hire a bicycle or car from the tour desk. Parking can be reserved near the hotel for an additional charge.  Attractions including La Boqueria Market and the MACBA Museum are 5 minutes’ walk away.

Name: Casa Pince
Description:
Boasting a terrace, a restaurant as well as a bar, Casa Pince is situated in the centre of Barcelona, 2 km from Sant Miquel Beach. This 3-star hotel offers a concierge service and a tour desk. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. The rooms come with a kettle, while selected rooms also feature a balcony and others also feature city views. All rooms have a wardrobe.

An à la carte, continental or American breakfast can be enjoyed at the property.

Popular points of interest near Casa Pince include Plaça Reial, Plaça Catalunya and Portal de l'Angel. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km from the property.

Name: Sercotel Amister Art Hotel Barcelona
Description:
Offering a roof terrace with a swimming pool and bar, Sercotel Amister Art Hotel Barcelona is located just 10 minutes’ walk from Barcelona’s fashionable Paseo de Gracia Boulevard. Free WiFi is available throughout the hotel.

Each floor of the hotel is dedicated to a different artist and rooms feature contemporary art work. The stylish rooms come with a flat-screen TV, safe and air conditioning,

Located in the Eixample district of Barcelona, Sercotel Amister Art Hotel Barcelona is approximately 400 metres from Entença and Hospital Clinic Metro Stations. It is also 15 minutes’ walk from Gaudís Casa Batllò, and La Pedrera.

Parking can be arranged at the hotel. Across the hotel there is a bus stop and taxi service.

Cots are available on request and are subject to availability. You can use the Special Requests box when booking or contact the property. Please note, when booking more booking 5 or more rooms, different policies and additional supplements may apply.﻿ Please note that guests must present the credit card used to make the reservation upon arrival. If you are not the owner of the credit card used to make the reservation, please contact the property in advance.

Name: SLS Barcelona
Description:
Facing the beachfront, SLS Barcelona offers 5-star accommodation in Barcelona and has a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, shared lounge and terrace. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, room service and a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property features a hammam, entertainment staff and a concierge service.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a wardrobe, a coffee machine, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a shower. SLS Barcelona features some rooms with sea views, and the rooms include a kettle.

Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a buffet or a continental breakfast.

Guests can relax in the wellness area, including a fitness centre, a sauna and a hot tub, or in the garden equipped with a children's playground.

Forum Beach is a few steps from SLS Barcelona, while Platja del Litoral is 1.6 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 19 km away.

Name: Silken Ramblas
Description:
This stylish hotel has an excellent central location, 50 metres from Barcelona’s Las Ramblas and just 100 metres from Plaza Catalunya. It offers a rooftop pool, sauna and free Wi-Fi.

Rooms at the Silken Ramblas are stylish, and are equipped with a flat-screen satellite TV and a minibar. There is central heating and air conditioning according to the season. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer.

The Silken has a restaurant and bar. Room service is available. There is a also a pleasant terrace.

The Silken has a tour desk and the sightseeing bus stops nearby in Plaza Catalunya.

Name: Bonito piso cerca de park guell
Description:
Bonito piso cerca de park guell is set in the Gràcia district of Barcelona, 4.1 km from La Pedrera, 4.3 km from Casa Batllo and 4.6 km from Sagrada Familia. The property is around 4.8 km from Passeig de Gracia, 4.8 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and 5.1 km from Plaça Catalunya. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Park Güell is 700 metres away.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 2 bedrooms, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Guests at the apartment will be able to enjoy activities in and around Barcelona, like hiking.

Palau de la Musica Catalana is 5.4 km from Bonito piso cerca de park guell, while Tivoli Theatre is 5.4 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 16 km away.

Name: Cómodo apartamento para 2
Description:
Set in Barcelona, 2.5 km from Plaça Catalunya and 2.6 km from Portal de l'Angel, Cómodo apartamento para 2 offers air conditioning. The property is around 2.7 km from Passeig de Gracia, 2.9 km from Sants Railway Station and 3.3 km from Cathedral of Barcelona. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Magic Fountain of Montjuic is less than 1 km away.

The apartment is fitted with 1 bedroom, a TV with streaming services and a fully equipped kitchen that provides guests with an oven, a microwave, a washing machine, a fridge and a stovetop. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Boqueria Market, Palau Sant Jordi and Montjuïc. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km away.

Name: Cozy Terrace In Eixample
Description:
Situated in Barcelona, 1.3 km from Magic Fountain of Montjuic and 1.5 km from Plaça Catalunya, Cozy Terrace In Eixample features air-conditioned accommodation with a terrace and free WiFi. This apartment provides accommodation with a patio. The property is non-smoking and is located 1.5 km from Portal de l'Angel.

The apartment features 3 bedrooms, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, a washing machine and 1 bathroom with a hair dryer. A TV is available.

Popular points of interest near Cozy Terrace In Eixample include Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Tivoli Theatre and Passeig de Gracia. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km from the property.

Name: Sweett - Sepulveda
Description:
Ideally located in the Eixample district of Barcelona, Sweett - Sepulveda is located 1.5 km from Portal de l'Angel, 1.4 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and 1.5 km from Tivoli Theatre. It is set 1.3 km from Plaça Catalunya and offers a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Magic Fountain of Montjuic is 1.6 km away.

Each unit comes with a sofa, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a well-fitted kitchen with a dining area, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a hair dryer. A dishwasher, an oven and microwave are also offered, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, units come with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Passeig de Gracia, Boqueria Market and Casa Batllo. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 11 km from the property.

Name: Catalonia Atenas
Description:
Set 3 metro stops from central Barcelona, the Atenas Catalonia has a rooftop swimming pool, offering views of the nearby Torre Agbar and Sagrada Familia. It also features free WiFi, a gym and a spa with a Turkish bath.

The bright rooms of Hotel Atenas Barcelona have simple décor with wooden flooring. Each has air conditioning, a mini fridge and satellite TV.

The hotel's buffet breakfast features a show kitchen and its Gastrobar offers cocktails and Mediterranean dishes. You will also find a pool on the 11th floor, with spectacular views of the city.

The Sagrada Familia is just over one kilometre from the hotel, while Glòries shopping centre can be reached in 15 minutes by foot.

The Catalonia Atenas has a convenient left luggage service, on-site parking, and is 2 minutes’ walk from Clot Metro Station; and 200 metres from Clot Train Station; here you can take a direct train to Barcelona Airport.

Name: New, Stylish Quiet & Next To Metro
Description:
New, Stylish Quiet & Next To Metro is situated in Barcelona, 4.5 km from Magic Fountain of Montjuic, 5.3 km from Passeig de Gracia, as well as 5.4 km from La Pedrera. It is located 3.7 km from Sants Railway Station and provides a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Camp Nou is 1.2 km away.

The air-conditioned apartment is composed of 3 separate bedrooms, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and microwave, and 1 bathroom. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Casa Batllo is 5.6 km from the apartment, while Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 6.1 km away.

Name: Be Barcelona Eixample Urquinaona II
Description:
Offering free Wi-Fi, Be Barcelona Eixample Urquinaona II is located in Barcelona’s Eixample District, 600 metres from Plaça Catalunya. The property offers air-conditioned apartments with modern décor and private balcony.

Each 2-bedroom apartment has a living room with a sofa, flat-screen TV and DVD player. A ceramic hob, oven and washing machine are included in the kitchen. The bathroom comes with a bathtub and bidet.

A wide variety of bars, restaurants and supermarkets can be found in the area. The Mercat de Born food market is 10 minutes’ walk away.

The Ciutadella Park and the Gothic District can be reached within a 10-minute walk. Urquinaona Metro Station, 300 metres from the apartments, offers connection to La Barceloneta Beach and Barcelona Forum.

Name: Ferienwohnung für 3 Personen ca 40 qm in Barcelona-Gràcia, Costa Brava Costa del Maresme - b62772
Description:
Ferienwohnung für 3 Personen ca 40 qm in Barcelona-Gràcia, Costa Brava Costa del Maresme - b62772 features a balcony and is set in Barcelona, within just 200 metres of Passeig de Gracia and 400 metres of La Pedrera. The property is close to Palau de la Musica Catalana, Plaça Catalunya and Sagrada Familia. Portal de l'Angel is 1.8 km from the apartment and Park Güell is 3.6 km away.

With free WiFi, this apartment offers a TV, a washing machine and a fully equipped kitchenette with an oven and microwave.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Casa Batllo, Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and Tivoli Theatre. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 14 km away.

Name: Sweet BCN Three Bedroom Apartment
Description:
Sweet BCN Three Bedroom Apartment in Barcelona offers accommodation with free WiFi, a 5-minute walk from La Pedrera and 900 metres from Casa Batllo. The Sagrada Familia is within 1.4 km of the apartment.

The 3-bedroom apartment is equipped with a kitchen with a dishwasher and oven, and a bathroom with a bath or shower and a bidet. A flat-screen TV is offered.

A bicycle rental service is available at the apartment.

Tivoli Theatre is 1.4 km from Sweet BCN Three Bedroom Apartment, while Plaça Catalunya is a 19-minute walk away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km from the property.

Name: Grupotel Gravina
Description:
Housed in an attractive 19th-century building, Grupotel Gravina is located just off Plaza Catalunya, Barcelona’s main square, 5 minutes' walk from Las Ramblas. It offers 24-hour reception and modern rooms with free WiFi and satellite TV.

The Hotel Gravina is just 5 minutes’ walk from the MACBA Modern Art Gallery and 15 minutes from Gaudí’s La Pedrera and Casa Batlló. Catalunya Metro Station, located 100 metres from the hotel, connects you with the rest of the city.

The air-conditioned rooms at Grupotel Gravina feature modern furniture and some have parquet floors. They are equipped with a work desk and a private bathroom with a hairdryer.

The hotel has a smart bar where you can get a snack or a drink. There are numerous restaurants in the surrounding streets.

Name: 22MAN1017- Cute apartment in Sant Antoni
Description:
Located in Barcelona, 1.2 km from Magic Fountain of Montjuic and 1.4 km from Plaça Catalunya, 22MAN1017- Cute apartment in Sant Antoni provides air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. It is set 1.6 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and features a lift. The property is non-smoking and is situated 1.5 km from Portal de l'Angel.

The spacious apartment features 2 bedrooms, a TV, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Tivoli Theatre, Passeig de Gracia and Boqueria Market. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 11 km away.

Name: Barceloneta near Beach Apartments
Description:
Situated in Barcelona, 500 metres from Sant Miquel Beach and 600 metres from Somorrostro Beach, Barceloneta near Beach Apartments offers air conditioning. Popular points of interest nearby include Plaça Reial, Palau de la Musica Catalana and Cathedral of Barcelona. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Barceloneta Beach is 500 metres away.

The apartment is composed of 1 bedroom, a fully equipped kitchenette, and 1 bathroom. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Santa Maria del Mar, Picasso Museum and Port Olimpic. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km from the property.

Name: Hotel Ciutadella Barcelona
Description:
Offering beautiful, stylish rooms Hotel Ciutadella Barcelona has an ideal central setting within 300 metres of Santa María del Mar Church, Ciutadella Park and Barceloneta Metro Station. It offers easy access to the historic Born and Gothic districts.

Each air-conditioned room at Hotel Ciutadella Barcelona has contemporary décor. All rooms have a TV and a private bathroom.

Bars and cafés can be found along Passeig del Born, 200 metres away. There are several seafood restaurants along the seaside Passeig de Joan de Borbó, a 5-minute walk from the Hotel Ciutadella.

The nearest beaches can be reached in 15 minutes by foot. Plaza de Catalunya and Las Ramblas are within 2 km of the hotel.

Name: Apartment-Loft Sagrada famila L5 Metro exit
Description:
Set in Barcelona, 500 metres from Sagrada Familia and 1.4 km from La Pedrera, Apartment-Loft Sagrada famila L5 Metro exit offers air conditioning. Among the facilities at this property are full-day security and an ATM, along with free WiFi throughout the property. There is parking on-site and the property offers an electric vehicle charging station.
