This apartment is fitted with 1 bedroom, a kitchen, a flat-screen TV, a seating area and 1 bathroom with a shower. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

There is a coffee shop, and a minimarket is also available.

Passeig de Gracia is 1.5 km from the apartment, while Casa Batllo is 1.8 km away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 15 km from the property, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: Som Nit Triomf
Description:
Centrally located, Som Nit Triomf features rooms with free WiFi and private bathroom. It is 800 metres from Ramblas and Plaza Catalunya as well as from Barcelona North Bus Station.

Rooms are fitted with traditional Catalan Modernist tiles and they all have a wardrobe. Some rooms have a balcony with city views. A kettle and ironing facilities are available on prior request at reception.

There is a plenty of restaurants, shops and trendy bars in the surrounding area and a 24-hour supermarket can be found 200 metres away.

Som Nit Triomf is located between the Eixample and Borne District, 450 metres from Arc de Triomf and Urquinaona Metro Stations.  You can walk to fashionable Passeig de Gracia in 10 minutes and the tree-lined Passeig de Companys connected to Ciutadella Park is just 150 metres away.

Name: Hotel Nouvel
Description:
Offering air-conditioned rooms, free WiFi and an on-site restaurant, Hotel Nouvel is located on a pedestrianised street just 100 metres from Barcelona’s Plaza Catalunya Square and the Ramblas.

The hotel features ornate ceilings, cast bronze and crystal lamps, and marble floors, in the style of its 19th-century building.

All rooms come with a flat-screen TV, double-glazed windows and a private bathroom with a bath or shower and a hairdryer. A safe is available to rent.

The hotel’s La Lluna Restaurant serves Mediterranean cuisine. Vending machines with snacks, ice, and drinks, are also available.

Staff at the 24-hour reception can help you arrange car hire, a laundry service and tickets for shows. You will also find luggage storage and a reading room with two computers.

Portal de Angel shopping street is just 2 minutes’ walk away, while Barcelona Cathedral and the Gothic Quarter are a 10-minute walk from Hotel Nouvel.

Name: Atica Apartments - by Weflating
Description:
Set within less than 1 km of Sagrada Familia and 2.8 km of Passeig de Gracia, Atica Apartments - by Weflating offers rooms with air conditioning and a private bathroom in Barcelona. Among the facilities at this property are a lift and luggage storage space, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The aparthotel features family rooms.

The units come with parquet floors and feature a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave, a dining area, a flat-screen TV, and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. A toaster and fridge are also featured, as well as a coffee machine. At the aparthotel, the units come with bed linen and towels.

A minimarket is available at the aparthotel.

Sightseeing tours are available close by.

La Pedrera is 2.8 km from the aparthotel, while Casa Batllo is 3.3 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 16 km away, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: Àmfores Boutique Guest House
Description:
Set within 1.2 km of Santa Maria del Mar and 1.1 km of Picasso Museum, Àmfores Boutique Guest House provides rooms in Barcelona. Located around 850 m from Tivoli Theatre, the guest house with free WiFi is also 750 m away from La Seu, Cathedral of Barcelona. The property is situated in the Ciutat Vella district.

All guest rooms in the guest house are equipped with a flat-screen TV. Each room comes with a private bathroom with a shower and free toiletries.

Àmfores Boutique Guest House is set in a building of medieval origin, located next to the Palau de la Música and the city centre.

The accommodation offers a terrace.

Speaking Catalan and English, staff are ready to help at the reception.

Plaça Catalunya is 800 m from Àmfores Boutique Guest House. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 18 km from the guest house.

The accommodation offers a terrace with a small swimming pool (from may till october).

Name: B-Garden BCN
Description:
BGarden BCN is a small and cozy guest-house which offers a personalized service.
Housed in a Art Nouveau building and placed in one of the best locations in Barcelona for travelers, our goal is to make guests feel at home.

It is 10 min by foot to Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard, Plaça Catalunya, Las Ramblas and Arc de Triumf. You can find all kind of shops, restaurants and bars nearby.
As you were in a typical Spanish 1900’s house with authentical vitreaux and high ceilings, B-Garden BCN offers rooms with private balcony and most of them have private and renovated bathrooms.
All the rooms at B-Garden BCN feature tiled floors and stylish dècor, with a mix of antique and modern mobiliary. We offer flat-screen Smart T.V, free Wi-Fi connection and a varied buffet breakfast.
Barcelona’s charming Born district is just 7 minutes’ walk from B-Garden BCN. Here you can find the Palau de la Música Catalana and a Modernist Auditorium.
Tetuán metro station is only 100 metres away and it connects you with the rest of the city, as well as all the buses options in Gran Via de les corts catalanes avenue, just round the corner.

Name: Bonito apartamento en Eixample
Description:
Located in Barcelona, 1.2 km from Casa Batllo and 1.6 km from Plaça Catalunya, Bonito apartamento en Eixample offers air conditioning. The property is situated 1.2 km from Passeig de Gracia, 1.9 km from Boqueria Market and 1.6 km from Sants Railway Station. The property is non-smoking and is set 1.5 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station.

With free WiFi, this 1-bedroom apartment provides a flat-screen TV, a washing machine and a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and microwave. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Tivoli Theatre, La Pedrera and Portal de l'Angel. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km away.

Name: Catalonia Gran Via BCN
Description:
Catalonia Gran Via BCN is set on Gran Vía and within 5 minutes’ walk of Urgell and Universitat Metro Stations, and beside the airport bus stop. It features an outdoor swimming pool, a gym and free Wi-Fi.

Each of the modern rooms at Catalonia Gran Via BCN is themed around a different city and air travel. All rooms have flat-screen TVs with satellite channels and an iPod docking station.

You can enjoy breakfast in Catalonia Gran Via BCN, while à la carte options are offered in the Gourmet Corner.

You can walk to both Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas in 10 minutes. Plaza de España, the Magic Fountains and the FIRA are just 2 stops from Urgell Station.

Name: Aparthotel Napols - Abapart
Description:
Aparthotel Napols is centrally located, 350 metres from Barcelona’s Arc de Triomf Metro Station. Air-conditioned rooms feature a well-equipped kitchen, and a living room with sofa and TV.

Estació de Nord Bus Station is 5 minutes’ walk away, and has direct connections to Girona Airport. You can walk to Plaza Catalunya and the Rambla in 15 minutes. There is free WiFi in the apartments.

Soundproofed rooms at the Napols have a safe and minibar. The private bathroom comes with amenities.

The modern kitchen has a fridge, microwave and coffee maker. There is a dishwasher and dining area.

The complex has a 24-hour reception and a shared terrace. You can hire a car, and Napols offers a laundry service and luggage storage.

Name: Bonanova Suite
Description:
These apartments are located in the residential neighbourhood of Sarrià-Sant Gervasi, only 10 minutes from Plaça Catalunya.

The aparthotel boasts attractive and spacious studios that make your stay a more comfortable and pleasant one. It also has excellent public transport connections with the centre of Barcelona.

Bonanova Suite offers 24-hour reception, a tour desk and shuttle service at an extra cost.

El Putxet Train Station is 4 minutes' walk away and Gaudi's Park Güell is a 30-minute walk away.

Name: Hotel Jazz
Description:
The stylish Hotel Jazz is located 2 minutes’ walk from Plaza Catalunya in the centre of Barcelona. It features a rooftop pool and terrace with views over the city.

The contemporary rooms include free Wi-Fi and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. The modern bathroom comes with a hairdryer and amenities.

A breakfast buffet is served in the modern bar-café area of Hotel Jazz. This includes fresh fruit, pastries, and baked goods.

Universitat Metro Station is less than 100 metres from the hotel. The MACBA and CCCB galleries are within a 5-minute walk while the Gothic Quarter is 10 minutes away.

Name: Senator Barcelona Apartments
Description:
The Senator Barcelona Apartments is situated on Via Augusta, in a pleasant residential area, a 2-minute walk from Muntaner Train Station. It includes air conditioning, heating, and free Wi-Fi in hotel rooms.

All apartments have a TV, telephone, and a private bathroom with a bathtub or a shower. The apartments also include an equipped with kitchenette.

A 6-minute train ride will take you to Plaza Cataluña and Barcelona city centre. Sagrada Familia Cathedral is 3.3 km away.

Name: Occidental Diagonal 414
Description:
Attractively set in the centre of Barcelona, Occidental Diagonal 414 features air-conditioned rooms, an outdoor swimming pool, free WiFi and a fitness centre. Boasting room service, this property also has a restaurant and a terrace. Private parking is available on site.

The rooms are fitted with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, minibar, a kettle, a shower, free toiletries and a wardrobe. Rooms come with a private bathroom with a hairdryer, while certain rooms are equipped with a balcony and others also boast city views. All guest rooms have a safety deposit box.

Guests at the hotel can enjoy a buffet breakfast.

Speaking Catalan, German, English and Spanish at the 24-hour front desk, staff are always at hand to help.

Popular points of interest near Occidental Diagonal 414 include La Pedrera, Passeig de Gracia and Casa Batllo. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 14 km from the property.

Name: ApartEasy - Eixample Center
Description:
Located in the centre of Barcelona, ApartEasy - Eixample Center is close to sights such as Passeig de Gracia, La Pedrera and Casa Batllo. It is set 1.6 km from Plaça Catalunya and provides a lift. Free WiFi is available and private parking can be arranged at an extra charge.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 2 bedrooms, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Tivoli Theatre and Portal de l'Angel. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from ApartEasy - Eixample Center.

Name: BCN Condal Hostal
Description:
Located just a 2-minute walk from Gaudi’s iconic Sagrada Familia basilica, BCN Condal hostal is located in Barcelona’s Eixample district. It offers free Wi-Fi, free coffee and hot drinks, and is 300 metres from Sagrada Familia Metro Station.

BCN Condal hostal offers simple and comfortable accommodation. Each room has central heating, and is equipped with a TV, wardrobe and desk. The rooms all have a shower and sink and some have a private bathroom.

The property offers free free tourist information, maps and discounts.

The guest house is situated in a quiet area, ideal if you want to be out of the city centre, but have the city’s famous landmarks within easy reach.

The spectacular Hospital Sant Pau is just an 5-minute walk away, while the city centre can be reached by metro in 5 minutes from Sagrada Familia station.

Name: Chic 3br Retreat With Private Terrace
Description:
Set in Barcelona, 500 metres from Sagrada Familia and 1.9 km from La Pedrera, Chic 3br Retreat With Private Terrace offers air-conditioned accommodation with a patio and free WiFi. The property is around 2.4 km from Casa Batllo, 2.9 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and 3 km from Tivoli Theatre. The property is non-smoking and is located 2.1 km from Passeig de Gracia.

The spacious apartment comes with 3 bedrooms, a TV and a fully equipped kitchen that provides guests with a dishwasher, an oven, a washing machine, a microwave and a toaster. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment.

Palau de la Musica Catalana is 3.2 km from the apartment, while Park Güell is 3.4 km away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 15 km from the property.

Name: AC Hotel Victoria Suites by Marriott
Description:
Beautiful and stylish suites located in the heart of Pedralbes, one of the top residential areas of Barcelona and close to one of the city's main business districts.

AC Hotel Victoria Suites is ideal for business travellers due its location, for weekend breaks due its tranquil environment and excellent gastronomy offer as well for families due the spaciousness of the rooms.

It features a large terrace-bar, a high quality restaurant, friendly staff and many other details.

Name: Ola Living Batlló
Description:
Set within 1.5 km of Sants Railway Station and 1.4 km of Passeig de Gracia, Ola Living Batlló offers rooms with air conditioning and a private bathroom in Barcelona. It is located 1.2 km from La Pedrera and provides a lift. Magic Fountain of Montjuic is 2.4 km from the apartment and Tivoli Theatre is 3 km away.

Featuring free WiFi, the units have a washing machine and a TV. A dishwasher, an oven and microwave are also offered, as well as a coffee machine. All units feature a private bathroom, a hair dryer and bed linen.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Casa Batllo, Plaça Catalunya and Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km from the property.

Name: Hotel Casa Trafalgar Barcelona
Description:
Casa Trafalgar is located in Plaza Urquinaona, just a few minutes from the vibrant Plaza Catalunya and Paseo de Gracia, where the city's best shops and restaurants are located.

Casa Trafalgar offers three-room models. The economic one has the same quality as the other types of rooms but has limited natural light. The small room with a balcony,  offers a large window with views of Plaza Urquinaona. And the standard interior rooms offer great tranquility as they are located in the hotel's backyard.

All rooms have Chromecast technology and Smart TV. In addition to a complete bathroom with shower and aromatherapy amenities. The air conditioning is individually controlled in each room, which also has an ultra-silent fan that improves rest in summer.

The mattresses and pillows are very comfortable and of high quality, with hypoallergenic duvets adapted to each season and temperature of the year.

The reception offers luggage storage service both on the check-in day and on the check-out day, helps in booking visits to monuments and restaurant reservations. Casa Trafalgar strives to make your stay in Barcelona easy and very comfortable.

Name: P1PAR1001 - Wonderfull aparment in Paralel
Description:
Situated in Barcelona, 700 metres from Magic Fountain of Montjuic and 2.7 km from Plaça Catalunya, P1PAR1001 - Wonderfull aparment in Paralel features air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. It is located 1.4 km from Palau Sant Jordi and offers a lift. The property is non-smoking and is set 2.8 km from Portal de l'Angel.

The apartment has 3 bedrooms, a TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Boqueria Market, Montjuïc and Plaça Reial. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km from the property.

Name: 2 bedroom with balcony in Eixample 1-1
Description:
2 bedroom with balcony in Eixample 1-1 is situated in the Eixample district of Barcelona, 2 km from Casa Batllo, 2.6 km from Plaça Catalunya and 2.7 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. It is set 1.2 km from Magic Fountain of Montjuic and offers a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Sants Railway Station is 1.1 km away.

The spacious apartment is fitted with 2 bedrooms, a TV and a fully equipped kitchen that provides guests with an oven, a microwave, a washing machine, a fridge and a stovetop. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Tivoli Theatre is 2.8 km from the apartment, while La Pedrera is 2.8 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 11 km from 2 bedroom with balcony in Eixample 1-1.

Name: Ola Living Hostal Diagonal
Description:
Featuring free WiFi, Ola Living Hostal Diagonal is located in Barcelona. Set 800 metres from Passeig de Gracia, famous for its luxury shops, this hotel offers modern rooms with air conditioning.

Each heated room at this hotel has modern décor and includes 1 double or 2 single beds, a flat-screen TV and wardrobe. The private bathroom comes with a shower and hairdryer. Some rooms have a spa bath. All are on the ground floor.

The hotel offers a lounge area.

You can find several restaurants, bars, and grocery shops within a 5-minute walk of Ola Living Hostal Diagonal Exclusive rooms. Diagonal Metro Station is 850 metres from the property, and Plaza Catalunya is 2 stops away.

Our reception is located at 228 Aribau Street. The opening hours are from 09:00 to 20:00, Monday to Sunday.

Check in time is 3:00 PM. If you arrive earlier we can store your luggage at reception until your apartment is ready. Also after your check out (11.00 AM).  You can leave your luggage at the reception.

The apartment has opening through a smartphone. If you need a face-to-face check-in later than 9:00 PM.  There is a surcharge of €30.

Name: H10 Casa Mimosa 4* Sup
Description:
Housed in a 19th- century modernist building, just behind La Pedrera, H10 Casa Mimosa offers an impressive chill-out terrace with a plunge pool and a sun lounger area with privileged views of Casa Milà’s terrace.

All rooms are outward-facing, with both views over Pau Claris Street or over the courtyard garden which has Gaudí’s chimneys in the background. All have smart temperature control and high-quality amenities including a Nespresso Coffee Machine and a digital safe box. Some rooms also have spacious terraces.

The on-site El Til•ler Restaurant serves a delicious breakfast with a buffet consisting of natural products and a selection of à la carte dishes. The Lobby Bar also offers light meals and is also an excellent meeting point for a drink.

The beautiful garden retains some former cabins which are located in a courtyard that is typical of the Eixample district; and has a large variety of Mediterranean greenery such as a century-old palm tree, an impressive lime tree and mimosas, which give the hotel’s name. In the garden there is also an elevated swimming pool and a sun lounger area.

From here, there is access to the Las Cocheras meeting room, a former garage with high-ceilings and a capacity up to 100 people.

Ideally located, H10 Casa Mimosa is 10 minutes’ walk from Casa Battló; Plaza Catalunya and Ramblas can be reached within 15 minutes’ walk. There is free high-speed WiFi available throughout.

Name: 2 bedroom Duplex apartment with balcony 4-3
Description:
2 bedroom Duplex apartment with balcony 4-3 is set in the Eixample district of Barcelona, 2 km from Casa Batllo, 2.6 km from Plaça Catalunya and 2.7 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. It is situated 1.2 km from Magic Fountain of Montjuic and features a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Sants Railway Station is 1.1 km away.

The spacious apartment has a patio, 2 bedrooms, a living room and a well-equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave. A TV is available. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Tivoli Theatre is 2.8 km from the apartment, while La Pedrera is 2.8 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 11 km away.

Name: P2VIL1042 Modern & Cozy Apartment Poble Sec
Description:
Set in Barcelona, 2.7 km from Sant Miquel Beach and 2.8 km from Barceloneta Beach, P2VIL1042 Modern & Cozy Apartment Poble Sec offers air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. It is located 1.9 km from Picasso Museum and features a lift. The property is non-smoking and is situated 1.7 km from Santa Maria del Mar.

The apartment has 2 bedrooms, a TV, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Plaça Catalunya, Portal de l'Angel and Boqueria Market. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 11 km from the property.

Name: Eixample Sagrada Familia Apartments II
Description:
Located 250 metres from the Sagrada Familia in Barcelona, Eixample Sagrada Familia Aparments II features free WiFi. It offers apartments with air conditioning and views of the city.

This stylish property has modern décor and parquet floors throughout. The bright and spacious living area includes a sofa, flat-screen TV with cable channels, and a dining table.

The kitchen comes with a ceramic hob, microwave and kitchenware, as well as a washing machine. Bed linen and towels are provided.

Sagrada Familia Metro Station is 250 metres from Eixample Sagrada Familia Aparments II, and Gaudi’s La Pedrera and Casa Batlló are just 3 stops away by metro. Plaza Catalunya and the famous Las Ramblas are a 20-minute metro ride away.

Name: Petit Palace Museum
Description:
This stylish design hotel is situated in the centre of Barcelona, less than 10 minutes’ walk from Plaza Catalunya. The chic rooms include free WiFi.

Rooms at the Petit Palace Museum feature a contemporary bathroom with a hydromassage shower and hairdryer.

Bicycles can be hired for free at the Petit Palace, subject to availability. Bus tours can be organised for guests. The exclusive Paseo de Gracia Boulevard is 200 metres away with its many shops, restaurants and bars.

A buffet breakfast is served in the hotel’s restaurant. There is also a bar where guests can enjoy cocktails.

Name: ApartEasy - Private terrace, 3 bedrooms, Eixample
Description:
Situated in Barcelona, 700 metres from Sants Railway Station and 1.8 km from Magic Fountain of Montjuic, ApartEasy - Private terrace, 3 bedrooms, Eixample features air-conditioned accommodation with a terrace and free WiFi. This apartment provides accommodation with a patio. The property is non-smoking and is located 2.7 km from Passeig de Gracia.

The spacious apartment features 2 separate bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, a fully equipped kitchen with a dining area and dishwasher, and a living room with a TV. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. The property has an outdoor dining area.

La Pedrera is 2.8 km from the apartment, while Casa Batllo is 2.9 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 11 km away.

Name: Classic catalan family apartment with balcony by Maison Piñata
Description:
Situated in the centre of Barcelona, 2.7 km from Barceloneta Beach and 2.7 km from Somorrostro Beach, Classic catalan family apartment with balcony by Maison Piñata offers free WiFi and air conditioning. This recently renovated apartment is located 2.7 km from Nova Icaria Beach and less than 1 km from Passeig de Gracia. The property is non-smoking and is set 1 km from Palau de la Musica Catalana.

The spacious apartment features 3 separate bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, a fully equipped kitchen with a dining area and oven, and a living room with a flat-screen TV.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Tivoli Theatre, Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and Cathedral of Barcelona. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 14 km from the property.

Name: Plaza España 238
Description:
Plaza España 238 features a balcony and is located in Barcelona, within just 1.5 km of Palau Sant Jordi and 1.5 km of Sants Railway Station. The property is around 3.1 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, 3.5 km from Plaça Catalunya and 3.8 km from Boqueria Market. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Magic Fountain of Montjuic is less than 1 km away.

The spacious apartment comes with 3 bedrooms, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, and 1 bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Passeig de Gracia is 3.8 km from the apartment, while Camp Nou is 4.2 km away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 9 km from the property.

Name: AC Hotel Sants by Marriott
Description:
AC Hotel Sants is located just 50 metres from Barcelona Sants Train Station. It offers 24-hour reception and modern, air-conditioned rooms with a satellite TV and free safe.

Each room features special reading lamps, 4 pillows and elegant furnishings. They come equipped with a desk and a minibar. Some rooms offer city views.

Free WiFi is available in the lobby and bar. The restaurant inside the property serves a breakfast buffet every morning.

AC Hotel Sants is around 500 metres from Plaça Espanya and Montjuic. Sants Station offers direct metro access to Plaça Catalunya and Las Ramblas, as well as direct access to El Prat Airport.

Name: Som Nit Born
Description:
Featuring free Wi-Fi and air conditioning, Som Nit Born is located in the Born district of Barcelona. Just 10 minutes’ walk from Barceloneta Beach, the guest house is also 500 metres away from the Picasso Museum.

The soundproofed rooms at Som Nit Born come with a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom including a shower. There is a free luggage storage service and a safety deposit box is also available.

A wide range of bars and restaurants can be found in a 1-minute walk through the Born district.

This 19th-century Neoclassical building was chosen to feature in the first ever photograph taken in Spain. Picasso also lived here.

La Rambla Street, Port Vell Harbor and Barrio Gotico District can be reached within 10 minutes’ walk as Som Nit is located in the heart of Barcelona. You can catch the Sightseeing Bus 200 metres from the guest house and Barceloneta Metro Station is 2 minutes’ walk away.

Name: Hermoso apartamento en el centro
Description:
Set in the centre of Barcelona, 1.1 km from Casa Batllo and less than 1 km from Passeig de Gracia, Hermoso apartamento en el centro offers free WiFi and air conditioning. This property is situated a short distance from attractions such as Portal de l'Angel, Boqueria Market, and Sants Railway Station. The property is non-smoking and is located 1.5 km from Plaça Catalunya.

The spacious apartment features 3 bedrooms, a living room with a TV, an equipped kitchen, and 2 bathrooms with a shower.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Tivoli Theatre and La Pedrera. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km away.

Name: Citadines Ramblas Barcelona
Description:
Centrally located on Barcelona’s famous Las Ramblas Boulevard, this aparthotel offers 24-hour reception and is surrounded by many restaurants, bars and shops. Free WiFi is available throughout the property.

All air-conditioned studios and apartments at Citadines Ramblas Barcelona feature a kitchen with a microwave, fridge and dishwasher. Bathrooms are equipped with hairdryers and all rooms have a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. All Classic Rooms are equipped with fridge and kettle.


Linen and towels are provided. The apartment is cleaned and linen and towels are changed for free once a week. An additional housecleaning service is available upon request and is charged according to your needs.

Bicycle and car rental can be arranged for guests at Citadines. Luggage storage is also available and the aparthotel operates a ticket service for attractions in Barcelona.

Plaza Catalunya Metro Station is just 100 metres away, and airport buses leave from the square. The impressive Boqueria Market is 2 minutes’ walk from Citadines Ramblas.

Name: Piso con Piscina en Barcelona
Description:
Featuring air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony, Piso con Piscina en Barcelona is located in Barcelona. This apartment also features a private pool. The property is non-smoking and is situated less than 1 km from Sants Railway Station.

With free WiFi, this 3-bedroom apartment provides a flat-screen TV, a washing machine and a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and oven. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Casa Batllo, Magic Fountain of Montjuic and La Pedrera. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km away.

Name: Spacious doubleroom apartment at Sants
Description:
In the Sants-Montjuïc district of Barcelona, close to Magic Fountain of Montjuic, Spacious doubleroom apartment at Sants features free WiFi and a washing machine. This apartment provides accommodation with a balcony. The property is non-smoking and is located 1 km from Sants Railway Station.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 2 bedrooms, 2 living rooms, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a coffee machine, and 2 bathrooms with a shower and a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Camp Nou is 2.9 km from the apartment, while Casa Batllo is 3.3 km away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 10 km from the property.

Name: MUNTANYA - Apartment with balcony Sagrada Familia
Description:
Located within 1.4 km of Sagrada Familia and 3.2 km of La Pedrera, MUNTANYA - Apartment with balcony Sagrada Familia provides rooms with air conditioning and a private bathroom in Barcelona. Guests staying at this apartment have access to a balcony. Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 3.9 km away and Tivoli Theatre is 4 km from the apartment.

With a private bathroom equipped with a hair dryer, units at the apartment complex also offer free WiFi, while selected rooms are fitted with a terrace. The units are equipped with heating facilities.

Casa Batllo is 3.4 km from the apartment, while Passeig de Gracia is 3.8 km away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 16 km from the property.

Name: Cozy Apt in Residential Center by Maison Piñata
Description:
Situated in Barcelona, 600 metres from La Pedrera and 1 km from Casa Batllo, Cozy Apt in Residential Center by Maison Piñata offers air conditioning. It is set 1.3 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and features a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Passeig de Gracia is 80 metres away.

The spacious apartment with a balcony and city views has 2 bedrooms, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with a shower. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. The property has an outdoor dining area.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Tivoli Theatre, Plaça Catalunya and Portal de l'Angel. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 14 km from the property.

Name: ApartEasy - Atic Sants
Description:
ApartEasy - Atic Sants has a terrace and is set in Barcelona, within just 1.6 km of Sants Railway Station and 1.9 km of Magic Fountain of Montjuic. Guests staying at this apartment have access to a balcony. Free WiFi is available and private parking can be arranged at an extra charge.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 2 bedrooms, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a bath and a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. The property has an outdoor dining area.

Camp Nou is 3.1 km from the apartment, while Palau Sant Jordi is 3.3 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 9 km from ApartEasy - Atic Sants.

Name: Hostal MiMi Las Ramblas
Description:
Located just 35 metres from La Rambla, Hostal MiMi Las Ramblas in Barcelona offers free WiFi and 24-hour front desk. The guest house is 20 minutes’ walk from La Barceloneta Beach.

Wooden-floor rooms at Hostal MiMi Las Ramblas come with a wardrobe and a desk. The shared bathroom includes a shower, and guests can also enjoy a shared living room.

A wide range of bars and restaurants offering traditional Catalan and Spanish cuisine can be found in La Rambla, within 2 minutes’ walk of the guest house.

Plaza Catalunya is is 10 minutes’ walk from Hostal MiMi Las Ramblas and guests can enjoy a range of nightclubs in La Rambla. The closest metro Station is Liceu, 3 minutes’ walk from the property and Barcelona Port is 9 km away.

Name: May Ramblas Hotel
Description:
Set in Barcelona in the Catalonia Region, 200 metres from Plaza Reial, May Ramblas Hotel boasts a sun terrace and views of the city. Free WiFi is available throughout the property.

Every room at this hotel is air conditioned and features a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. A terrace or balcony are featured in certain rooms. All rooms have a private bathroom with free toiletries and a hairdryer.

There is a 24-hour front desk at the property.

La Seu, Cathedral of Barcelona is 400 metres from May Ramblas Hotel, while Portal de l'Angel is 500 metres away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km from the property.

Name: The MO GOTIC
Description:
Situated in the centre of Barcelona, The MO GOTIC is set 2.1 km from Sant Miquel Beach and 2.2 km from Somorrostro Beach. This property is located a short distance from attractions such as Palau de la Musica Catalana, Passeig de Gracia, and Cathedral of Barcelona. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, a tour desk and free WiFi throughout the property.

At the hotel rooms come with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near The MO GOTIC include Plaça Catalunya, Portal de l'Angel and Tivoli Theatre. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km from the property.

Name: En el corazón de Barcelona
Description:
Located in Barcelona in the Catalonia region, En el corazón de Barcelona provides accommodation with free WiFi. The property is 1.1 km from the city centre.

The apartment is composed of 2 bedrooms, a fully equipped kitchen, and 2 bathrooms. A flat-screen TV is featured. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km away.

Name: Hotel America Barcelona
Description:
Situated in the charming Enric Granados Boulevard, 500 metres from Barcelona’s Passeig de Gràcia, this stylish hotel offers a gym, sauna and rooftop terrace with a seasonal swimming pool and city views.

America Barcelona’s rooms are bright and airy, decorated with soft colours and wooden flooring. Each one has a flat-screen TV and a Nespresso Coffee Machine, and some courtesy capsules are provided on arrival. The private bathroom comes with a rain shower, bathrobes and slippers.

Hotel America Barcelona serves a daily buffet breakfast including fresh pastries and fruit and offers a relaxed café-bar in the lobby. A range of drinks and cocktails can be enjoyed on the seasonal terrace, overlooking the city.

Guests are welcome to enjoy free 24-hour access to the modern gym equipped with sauna as well as a free welcome drink including cava, sparkling water or natural juice.

Plaça Catalunya and the Gothic Quarter are just a 15-minute walk from the America Barcelona. Diagonal Metro station is only 400 metres away.

Name: The Social Hub Barcelona Poblenou
Description:
Situated in Barcelona, 1.4 km from Llevant, The Social Hub Barcelona Poblenou features accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. Among the facilities at this property are a shared lounge and a business centre, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel has a terrace and city views, and guests can enjoy a meal at the restaurant or a drink at the bar.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Rooms have a kettle, while certain rooms are fitted with a kitchenette with a minibar. The rooms have a wardrobe.

Guests at The Social Hub Barcelona Poblenou can enjoy a buffet or a continental breakfast.

You can play table tennis at the accommodation, and bike hire is available.

Staff speak Catalan, Czech, English and Spanish at the 24-hour front desk.

Nova Mar Bella Beach is 1.6 km from The Social Hub Barcelona Poblenou, while Mar Bella Beach is 1.7 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 17 km away.

Name: Duquesa Suites Landmark Hotel by Grup Duquessa
Description:
Set the centre of Barcelona, 400 metres from Picasso Museum and Barceloneta Metro Station, Duquesa Suites Landmark Hotel by Grup Duquessa features a year-round outdoor plunge pool, sun terrace and free WiFi. It is housed in a building from the 18th century with the Speciality Monument status.

Rooms at this hotel come with 1 extra large double bed, a sofa bed and a bathroom with free toiletries and a hairdryer. Rooms have air conditioning, a flat-screen TV and capsule coffee machine.

Please note that the hotel reserves the right to pre-authorise credit cards prior to arrival. When booking more than 3 rooms, different policies and additional charges may apply. Buffet breakfast is served at Hotel Duquesa de Cardona. Local City Tax pending to be paid at Front Desk.

Plaza Reial is 500 metres from Duquesa Suites Landmark Hotel by Grup Duquessa, while La Seu, Cathedral of Barcelona is 600 metres from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from Duquesa Suites Landmark Hotel by Grup Duquessa.

Name: Modern and bright apartment in Eixample 3-1
Description:
Modern and bright apartment in Eixample 3-1 has a patio and is situated in Barcelona, within just 1.2 km of Magic Fountain of Montjuic and 2 km of Casa Batllo. It is set 2.6 km from Plaça Catalunya and features a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Sants Railway Station is 1.1 km away.

The spacious apartment features 2 bedrooms, a TV and a fully equipped kitchen that provides guests with an oven, a microwave, a washing machine, a fridge and a stovetop. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 2.7 km from the apartment, while Tivoli Theatre is 2.8 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 11 km away.

Name: Poblenou renovated 3BD next to the beach
Description:
Located in Barcelona, less than 1 km from Nova Icaria Beach and a 14-minute walk from Bogatell Beach, Poblenou renovated 3BD next to the beach provides air-conditioned accommodation with a patio and free WiFi. It is situated 1.4 km from Port Olimpic and offers a lift. The property is non-smoking and is set 1.5 km from Somorrostro Beach.

The spacious apartment comes with 3 bedrooms, a TV and a fully equipped kitchen that provides guests with an oven, a fridge, a washing machine, a stovetop and kitchenware. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Santa Maria del Mar is 2 km from the apartment, while Picasso Museum is 1.7 km away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 14 km from the property.

Name: DreamKeys Barcelona City
Description:
Featuring air conditioning, DreamKeys Barcelona City offers accommodation in Barcelona. Passeig de Gracia Boulevard and Gaudís La Pedrera and Casa Batlló are a 10-minute walk away.

The property offers apartments and rooms. There is a seating and/or dining area in some units. There is also a kitchen in some of the units, equipped with a dishwasher and oven. Towels and bed linen are featured.

The property offers grocery delivery and packed lunches. You will also find many restaurants, bars and shops in the surrounding area.

Plaça Catalunya is 2 km from DreamKeys Barcelona City. The nearest airport is El Prat Airport, 12 km from DreamKeys - Barcelona City.

Name: ApartEasy - Central Gracia Apartments
Description:
Located within 200 metres of Passeig de Gracia and 500 metres of La Pedrera, ApartEasy - Central Gracia Apartments provides rooms with air conditioning and a private bathroom in Barcelona. It is situated less than 1 km from Casa Batllo and features luggage storage space. Free WiFi is available and private parking can be arranged at an extra charge.

All units include a seating area, a TV, a fully equipped kitchen, a dining area, and a private bathroom, while some feature a terrace or a balcony. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, every unit includes bed linen and towels.

A bicycle rental service is available at the apartment.

Popular points of interest near ApartEasy - Central Gracia Apartments include Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Tivoli Theatre and Palau de la Musica Catalana. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat, 14 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: INNOUTHOME Apartamento Eixample Barcelona
Description:
INNOUTHOME Apartamento Eixample Barcelona features a terrace and is set in Barcelona, within just 1.6 km of Plaça Catalunya and 1.5 km of Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. This apartment offers accommodation with a balcony. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Casa Batllo is 1.2 km away.

The spacious apartment has 3 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a washing machine, and 2 bathrooms with a bidet. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. The property has an outdoor dining area.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Tivoli Theatre, La Pedrera and Portal de l'Angel. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km from the property.

Name: Barcelona Apartment Milà
Description:
Barcelona Apartment Milà is centrally located, 7 minutes’ walk from Barcelona’s Joanic Metro Station. Each apartment is air conditioned and features free WiFi and a flat-screen TV.

Apartments have one or two bedrooms and some have a sofa bed in the living room. All have a private bathroom with a shower, hairdryer and free toiletries. The well-equipped kitchen includes a dishwasher and washing machine.

The Sagrada Familia is a 20-minute walk from the apartments. You can reach Plaza Catalunya in 20 minutes by Metro.

Name: 2 bedroom with balcony in Eixample 3-2
Description:
2 bedroom with balcony in Eixample 3-2 is set in the Eixample district of Barcelona, 2 km from Casa Batllo, 2.6 km from Plaça Catalunya and 2.7 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. It is located 1.2 km from Magic Fountain of Montjuic and provides a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Sants Railway Station is 1.1 km away.

The spacious apartment features a patio, 2 bedrooms, a living room and a well-equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave. A TV is featured. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Tivoli Theatre is 2.8 km from the apartment, while La Pedrera is 2.8 km away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 11 km from the property.

Name: Stay Barcelona Charming Gracia
Description:
Situated within the Gràcia district in Barcelona, Stay Barcelona Charming Gracia has air conditioning, a balcony, and quiet street views. The property is around 2.4 km from Casa Batllo, 2.9 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and 3 km from Tivoli Theatre. The property is non-smoking and is set 1.4 km from Passeig de Gracia.

With free WiFi, this 1-bedroom apartment features a flat-screen TV, a washing machine and a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and microwave. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include La Pedrera, Park Güell and Sagrada Familia. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 16 km from Stay Barcelona Charming Gracia.

Name: ApartEasy - Lightly, central and quiet apartment
Description:
ApartEasy - Lightly, central and quiet apartment is located in the Eixample district of Barcelona, 2 km from Magic Fountain of Montjuic, 1.9 km from Passeig de Gracia and 2.6 km from Plaça Catalunya. It is set 2 km from Casa Batllo and offers a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Sants Railway Station is 1.1 km away.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 1 bedroom, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

La Pedrera is 1.7 km from the apartment, while Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 2.6 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 12 km from ApartEasy - Lightly, central and quiet apartment.

Name: Bonito apartamento Camp Nou
Description:
Bonito apartamento Camp Nou in Barcelona provides accommodation with free WiFi, 1.6 km from Camp Nou, 1.3 km from Sants Railway Station and 3.1 km from Magic Fountain of Montjuic. The property is set 4.3 km from La Pedrera, 4.4 km from Casa Batllo and 4.8 km from Plaça Catalunya. The property is non-smoking and is located 4.2 km from Passeig de Gracia.

The spacious apartment includes 4 bedrooms, a living room, and 2 bathrooms with a shower.

Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 4.9 km from the apartment, while Palau Sant Jordi is 4.9 km away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 11 km from the property.

Name: 41PAR1022 - Luminous apartment in Sant Antoni
Description:
Set in Barcelona, 1.2 km from Magic Fountain of Montjuic and 1.6 km from Plaça Catalunya, 41PAR1022 - Luminous apartment in Sant Antoni offers air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. It is located 1.8 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and features a lift. The property is non-smoking and is situated 1.6 km from Portal de l'Angel.

The spacious apartment features 3 bedrooms, a TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Tivoli Theatre, Passeig de Gracia and Boqueria Market. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km away.

Name: Amazing 3 bedroom penthouse in Plaza España
Description:
Featuring air-conditioned accommodation with a patio, Amazing 3 bedroom penthouse in Plaza España is located in Barcelona. It is set 1.2 km from Sants Railway Station and features a lift. The property is non-smoking and is situated less than 1 km from Magic Fountain of Montjuic.

With free WiFi, this 3-bedroom apartment provides a TV, a washing machine and a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and oven. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 2.4 km from the apartment, while Tivoli Theatre is 2.5 km away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 11 km from the property.

Name: Esparteria 1
Description:
Right in the centre of Barcelona, situated within a short distance of Barceloneta Beach and Somorrostro Beach, Esparteria 1 offers free WiFi, air conditioning and household amenities such as a toaster and coffee machine. This apartment features accommodation with a balcony. The property is non-smoking and is located 1.4 km from Sant Miquel Beach.

The spacious apartment has 2 separate bedrooms, 1 bathroom, a fully equipped kitchen with a dining area and microwave, and a living room with a flat-screen TV.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Santa Maria del Mar, Picasso Museum and Plaça Reial. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 12 km from Esparteria 1.

Name: Rambla 102
Description:
Located just off Las Ramblas and La Boqueria Market, Rambla 102 offers soundproofed accommodation with free Wi-Fi. Central Plaza Catalunya, and Barcelona Cathedral are both 500 metres away.

Modern and bright apartments and lofts with air conditioning and balcony, some with views of the Ramblas. They have a living-dining area with a sofa bed and a flat-screen satellite TV; and come with an open-plan kitchen equipped with a dishwasher, ceramic hobs and kitchenware. There is a washing machine, a dryer, and bed linen and towels are provided.

There are plenty of bars and tapas restaurants within a 2-minute walk of Rambla 102.

Centrally located, you can walk to the main Barcelona tourist attractions within 15 minutes. A 20-minute metro ride will take you to Sagrada Familia.

Name: Precioso apartamento en el Centro
Description:
Located in Barcelona, 1.4 km from Magic Fountain of Montjuic and 1.9 km from Palau Sant Jordi, Precioso apartamento en el Centro provides air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. The property is close to several well-known attractions, 1.9 km from Palau de la Musica Catalana, 1.6 km from Cathedral of Barcelona and 1.2 km from Plaça Reial. The property is non-smoking and is set 1.9 km from Plaça Catalunya.

The spacious apartment comes with 3 separate bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, a fully equipped kitchen with a dining area and oven, and a living room with a TV.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Portal de l'Angel, Boqueria Market and Montjuïc. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km away.

Name: Cozy Studio with Amazing Terrace near Plaza España
Description:
Located in Barcelona, 1.1 km from Sants Railway Station and 1.1 km from Magic Fountain of Montjuic, Cozy Studio with Amazing Terrace near Plaza España provides air-conditioned accommodation with a terrace and free WiFi. It is situated 2.8 km from Plaça Catalunya and offers a lift. The property is non-smoking and is set 2.4 km from Casa Batllo.

The apartment features 1 bedroom, a TV, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment.

Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 2.8 km from the apartment, while Tivoli Theatre is 2.9 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 11 km from Cozy Studio with Amazing Terrace near Plaza España.

Name: Torre de Gracia Barcelona
Description:
Located in Barcelona, within 300 metres of Passeig de Gracia and 700 metres of La Pedrera, Torre de Gracia Barcelona offers accommodation with free WiFi, air conditioning, a private beach area and a terrace. This apartment provides accommodation with a balcony. The property is non-smoking and is set 1.2 km from Casa Batllo.

The spacious apartment features 2 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Tivoli Theatre and Plaça Catalunya. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from Torre de Gracia Barcelona.

Name: limehome Barcelona Carrer de Besalú 82
Description:
3.5 km from La Pedrera, limehome Barcelona Carrer de Besalú 82 is set in Barcelona and provides free WiFi and express check-in and check-out. The property is around 3.6 km from Casa Batllo, 4 km from Passeig de Gracia and 4.1 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. The property is non-smoking and is located 1.8 km from Sagrada Familia.

All units in the hotel are fitted with a coffee machine. Complete with a private bathroom equipped with a shower and free toiletries, guest rooms at limehome Barcelona Carrer de Besalú 82 have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and certain rooms include a balcony.

Tivoli Theatre is 4.2 km from the accommodation, while Palau de la Musica Catalana is 4.4 km away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 16 km from the property.

Name: Eurostars Monumental
Description:
This design hotel offers free WiFi and is just 400 metres from Sagrada Família Church. Decorated in elegant neutral tones, rooms include a plasma screen TV with satellite channels.

Rooms at the Eurostars Monumental have wooden floors and modern lighting. Toiletries and a hairdryer are included in the stylish marble bathrooms.

A breakfast buffet is served in the hotel’s restaurant. You can also find various restaurants and cafés within a 5-minute walk, in the area around the Sagrada Familia.

Eurostars Monumental is 100 metres from Monumental Metro Station, which provides direct trains to Passeig de Gracia Station. Estació del Nord Bus Station is just 850 metres away. The property offers a parking space for luggage drop off in front of the hotel.

Name: Boutique Hotel H10 Catalunya Plaza
Description:
The striking Boutique Hotel H10 Catalunya Plaza is set directly on the square, just 200 metres from Las Ramblas. It offers chic, air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi and a lovely chill-out terrace.

The stylish rooms at Boutique Hotel H10 Catalunya Plaza have lightly coloured contemporary décor. All feature a coffee maker with 2 free capsules, a safe, minibar and 1 bottle of water per person on arrival. A luxury apartment is also available.

Modern bathrooms include H10 toiletries, a hairdryer, magnifying mirror, a bathrobe and slippers. Some rooms also have views of the square or feature a terrace.

Dating from the 19th century, the hotel combines original ornate tiles, murals and carved wooden doors with modern finishes.

The 1892 Restaurant offers traditional Catalan dishes, a Modernist ceiling and great views of the square. There is also a lobby-bar and a library.

The H10 has a 24-hour reception, where staff can provide you with information on Barcelona. There is also a 24-hour internet terminal.

Boutique Hotel H10 Catalunya Plaza is just 20 metres from Catalunya Metro and train stations. The Aerobus shuttle to Barcelona Airport leaves from the other side of Plaza Catalunya.

Name: Stay U-nique Apartments Rocafort
Description:
Stay U-nique Apartments Rocafort features a terrace and is located in Barcelona, within just 1.7 km of Sants Railway Station and 1.7 km of Plaça Catalunya. This apartment provides accommodation with a patio. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Magic Fountain of Montjuic is 1.1 km away.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 3 bedrooms, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. The property has an outdoor dining area.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Tivoli Theatre and Boqueria Market. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 11 km from Stay U-nique Apartments Rocafort.

Name: Tendency Apartments Miro 8
Description:
Located in Barcelona, 1.4 km from Casa Batllo and 1.7 km from Plaça Catalunya, Tendency Apartments Miro 8 provides air-conditioned accommodation with a terrace and free WiFi. This recently renovated apartment is located 1.7 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and 1.2 km from Passeig de Gracia. The property is non-smoking and is set 1.6 km from Sants Railway Station.

The spacious apartment features 2 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a washing machine, and 2 bathrooms with a shower. This apartment also provides guests with a balcony that doubles up as an outdoor dining area.

Tivoli Theatre is 1.9 km from the apartment, while La Pedrera is 1.1 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 12 km from Tendency Apartments Miro 8.

Name: Comfortable 3BD in Poblenou next to the beach!
Description:
Set in Barcelona, less than 1 km from Nova Icaria Beach and a 14-minute walk from Bogatell Beach, Comfortable 3BD in Poblenou next to the beach! offers air-conditioned accommodation with a patio and free WiFi. It is located 1.4 km from Port Olimpic and features a lift. The property is non-smoking and is situated 1.5 km from Somorrostro Beach.

The spacious apartment is fitted with 2 bedrooms, a TV and a fully equipped kitchen that provides guests with an oven, a microwave, a washing machine, a fridge and a stovetop. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Santa Maria del Mar is 2 km from the apartment, while Picasso Museum is 1.7 km away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 14 km from the property.

Name: Cozy place next to Park Güell
Description:
In the Horta-Guinardó district of Barcelona, close to Park Güell, Cozy place next to Park Güell has a garden and a washing machine. Guests staying at this apartment have access to a terrace. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Sagrada Familia is 2.6 km away.

The spacious apartment is composed of 2 bedrooms, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen, and 1 bathroom. A flat-screen TV is offered.

Passeig de Gracia is 3.4 km from the apartment, while La Pedrera is 3.5 km away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 16 km from the property, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: Habitat Apartments Ribes
Description:
Located in Barcelona, 2.1 km from Nova Icaria Beach and 2.3 km from Barceloneta Beach, Habitat Apartments Ribes offers air conditioning. It is situated 1.2 km from Passeig de Gracia and provides a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Somorrostro Beach is 2 km away.

The spacious apartment is equipped with 2 separate bedrooms, 1 bathroom, a fully equipped kitchen with a dining area and oven, and a living room with a flat-screen TV. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Palau de la Musica Catalana, Tivoli Theatre and Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat, 14 km from Habitat Apartments Ribes, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: 11BLDG1025 - Superp Apartment downtown
Description:
Located in Barcelona, 1.1 km from Magic Fountain of Montjuic and 2 km from Plaça Catalunya, 11BLDG1025 - Superp Apartment downtown provides air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. The property is set 3.1 km from Tivoli Theatre, 3.1 km from Passeig de Gracia and 2 km from Cathedral of Barcelona. The property is non-smoking and is situated 2 km from Portal de l'Angel.

The apartment features 2 bedrooms, a TV, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Palau Sant Jordi, Boqueria Market and Montjuïc. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km away.

Name: Boutique Hotel H10 Montcada
Description:
Boutique Hotel H10 Montcada has fantastic views of Barcelona’s Gothic Quarter and the sea from its roof terrace and hot tub. It offers modern rooms with free Wi-Fi.

The air-conditioned rooms at Boutique Hotel H10 Montcada feature parquet floors and natural light. Each one comes with a minibar, a free safe, and a flat-screen TV with international satellite channels.

The hotel’s stylish restaurant serves a daily buffet breakfast. There are also 2 bars, including the Sunset Bar located on the roof terrace. Room service is also available.

The attentive staff at the 24-hour reception can help booking tickets for guided tours, live shows and other events. Bicycle and car rental services can also be arranged.

Barcelona's main tourist attractions such as the Cathedral, the Ramblas and the Picasso Museum are within walking distance of the hotel.

Boutique Hotel H10 Montcada is just 3 minutes’ walk from the Palau de la Música Catalana, a spectacular Modernist auditorium and UNESCO World Heritage Site. Airport buses leave from Plaza Catalunya, 5 minutes’ walk away.

Name: BacHome Gallery B&B
Description:
BacHome Barcelona B&B offers free Wi-Fi and features elegant rooms with street views. Paseo de Gracia, with its high end shops, restaurants and Gaudi's La Pedrera and Casa Batló, is just 200 metres from this bed and breakfast.

Featuring plenty of natural light and stylish décor, each air-conditioned bedroom comes with a seating area, flat-screen TV and a wardrobe. Fitted with parquet flooring, the spacious bedrooms also have heating. The modern bathrooms have a shower and they include a hairdryer and free toiletries.

BacHome Barcelona B&B has 24 hour coffee machine.

Gaudi's famous Sagrada Familia Cathedral can be reached by foot and it is 1.3 km away. Girona Metro Station, line 4, is a short 3 minutes' walk away. Plaza Cataluña Square and Las Ramblas Boulevard are about a 15-minute walk from the accommodation.

Barcelona Airport is a 25-minute drive away. Buses run regularly between Plaza Cataluña Square and the airport.

Name: Radisson Blu 1882 Hotel, Barcelona Sagrada Familia
Description:
Set in Barcelona, 400 metres from Sagrada Familia, Radisson Blu 1882 Hotel, Barcelona Sagrada Familia has an outdoor pool and a fitness centre. The 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with a private bathroom and free WiFi.

At the hotel, each room comes with a desk. The rooms are fitted with a flat-screen TV, and certain rooms include a city view. All rooms feature a wardrobe.

A continental breakfast is served every morning at the property.

Radisson Blu 1882 Hotel, Barcelona Sagrada Familia offers a terrace with views of Sagrada Familia.

Staff are ready to help around the clock.

La Pedrera is a 14-minute walk from the accommodation. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from Radisson Blu 1882 Hotel, Barcelona Sagrada Familia.

Name: Novotel Barcelona City
Description:
Novotel Barcelona City is situated in the avant-garde area of the city just 15 minutes from central Barcelona, next to the Agbar Tower, designed by Jean Nouvel.

Moreover, the unique Sagrada Familia and Bogatell Beach are just a few minutes away, walking from the hotel.

The air-conditioned rooms at Novotel Barcelona City have simple, modern décor. Up to 2 children under 16 stay for free when sharing with parents. The rooms include free Wi fi and flat screen satellite TV.

The hotel’s restaurant offers typical Mediterranean food and the typical paella.

On the rooftop there is an outdoor swimming pool and a gourmet bar where guests can enjoy tapas, wines and cocktails enjoying panoramic city views.

This hotel offers a free gym and a roof terrace with a seasonal outdoor pool and panoramic views of Barcelona.

Tram and bus services to the city center stop outside the hotel. Glòries Metro Station is just 300 metres away.

The reception staff will be more than happy to provide you with all the tips and tricks to make your stay in Barcelona unforgettable! Don't hesitate to stop by for recommendations on must-see attractions, restaurants, and so much more.

Business travellers particularly like the location.

Name: Alojamiento Mallor
Description:
In the Eixample district of Barcelona, close to Passeig de Gracia, Alojamiento Mallor has free WiFi and a washing machine. The property is close to several well-known attractions, 1.9 km from Sants Railway Station, 1.6 km from Tivoli Theatre and 1.8 km from Portal de l'Angel. The accommodation features a lift and a shared kitchen for guests.

At the bed and breakfast, each unit is fitted with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a shared bathroom, bed linen and towels. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. The units are equipped with heating facilities.

Popular points of interest near the bed and breakfast include Casa Batllo, Plaça Catalunya and Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km from the property.

Name: BUHO Boutique Rooms
Description:
Set just 500 metres from Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas,  BUHO Boutique Barcelona offers charming, air-conditioned rooms, individually decorated with antique furniture. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the property.

Rooms feature artwork and large windows, as well as a flat-screen TV, DVD player and DVDs. The private bathrooms include a hairdryer and free toiletries. Some rooms have access to a pretty, shared terrace.

BUHO Boutique Barcelona also has a TV lounge. The guest house is surrounded by restaurants and bars.

Tourist information can be provided by staff, and both Barcelona Cathedral and Gaudí’s Casa Batlló are less than 10 minutes’ walk away.

Airport buses leave from Plaza Catalunya and luggage storage is offered at the property.

Name: Mihlton Barcelona Boutique B&B
Description:
Set in the centre of Barcelona, Mihlton Barcelona Boutique B&B is a recently renovated accommodation, which offers allergy-free rooms. Boasting a lift, this property also provides guests with a sun terrace. The accommodation features luggage storage space, a housekeeping service and organising tours for guests.

All units feature air conditioning and a satellite flat-screen TV. Units are equipped with a private bathroom, a safety deposit box and free WiFi, while certain rooms also offer a balcony and some have garden views. At the bed and breakfast, every unit comes with bed linen and towels.

Buffet and continental breakfast options with warm dishes, local specialities and champagne are available every morning. There is a coffee shop, and a minimarket is also available.

Guests at the bed and breakfast will be able to enjoy activities in and around Barcelona, like walking tours. The bed and breakfast has a picnic area where you can spend a day out in the open.

Popular points of interest near Mihlton Barcelona Boutique B&B include Passeig de Gracia, La Pedrera and Casa Batllo. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km from the property.

Name: Montserrat Apartments by Gaiarooms
Description:
Featuring quiet street views, Montserrat Apartments by Gaiarooms provides accommodation with balcony, around 200 metres from Sagrada Familia. Among the facilities at this property are a lift and private check-in and check-out, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The apartment features family rooms.

At the apartment complex, every unit includes air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a kitchen, a dining area and a private bathroom with a hair dryer, a shower and free toiletries. A microwave, a fridge and stovetop are also provided, as well as a coffee machine. At the apartment complex, all units come with bed linen and towels.

Sightseeing tours are available in the surroundings.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include La Pedrera, Casa Batllo and Passeig de Gracia. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 15 km away.

Name: Click&Flat Luxury cabanyes
Description:
Click&Flat Luxury cabanyes has a balcony and is situated in Barcelona, within just 1.9 km of Palau Sant Jordi and 1.9 km of Plaça Catalunya. The property is around 3.5 km from Passeig de Gracia, 1.9 km from Palau de la Musica Catalana and 1.6 km from Cathedral of Barcelona. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Magic Fountain of Montjuic is 1.4 km away.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 1 bedroom, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Portal de l'Angel, Boqueria Market and Montjuïc. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 12 km from Click&Flat Luxury cabanyes.

Name: Ola Living Born
Description:
Ola Living Born offers accommodation within less than 1 km of the centre of Barcelona, with free WiFi, and a kitchen with a dishwasher, a microwave and a toaster. It is set 1.4 km from Somorrostro Beach and features a lift. The property is close to popular attractions like Picasso Museum, Plaça Reial and Passeig de Gracia.

The units in the apartment complex are equipped with a coffee machine. Complete with a private bathroom fitted with a shower and a hair dryer, all units at the apartment complex have a TV and air conditioning, and selected rooms also feature a terrace. At the apartment complex, units are fitted with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Barceloneta Beach, Sant Miquel Beach and Santa Maria del Mar. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km from the property.

Name: ApartEasy - MONUMENT, large, cosy apartment
Description:
ApartEasy - MONUMENT, large, cosy apartment is situated in the Eixample district of Barcelona, 2.6 km from Somorrostro Beach, 2.9 km from Barceloneta Beach and less than 1 km from Sagrada Familia. The property is close to several well-known attractions, 1.3 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, 1.4 km from Passeig de Gracia and 1.3 km from Tivoli Theatre. The property is non-smoking and is located 2.5 km from Nova Icaria Beach.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 2 bedrooms, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Casa Batllo, La Pedrera and Palau de la Musica Catalana. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 14 km away.

Name: Ola Living Vidreria
Description:
These apartments can be found in Barcelona's Born area, close to the Picasso Museum. They have free Wi-Fi.

The apartments have heating and air conditioning.

Bedrooms have an en-suite bathroom with a shower. The kitchen has a fridge, microwave and hob.

Bicycle rental is available.

Staff at reception can organise your trip to Barcelona. Barceloneta with its seafront bars and restaurants is just a 10-minute away from the property. The Ramblas is also nearby.

Name: Aspasios Sagrada Familia Apartments
Description:
Situated in Barcelona, Aspasios Sagrada Familia Apartments has well-equipped accommodation boasting free WiFi, 500 metres from Sagrada Familia.

Each unit offers a fully equipped kitchen, a flat-screen TV, a living room with a sofa, and a private bathroom. A dishwasher and oven are also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. There is a washing machine and bed linen and towels are provided.

La Pedrera is a 19-minute walk from the apartment, while Casa Batllo is 1.8 km away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 15 km from the property.

Name: ApartEasy - Atic Sagrada Familia
Description:
Located in Barcelona, 2.7 km from Nova Icaria Beach and 2.7 km from Somorrostro Beach, ApartEasy - Atic Sagrada Familia offers air conditioning. Among the facilities at this property are a lift and private check-in and check-out, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The accommodation provides airport transfers, while a bicycle rental service is also available.

The spacious apartment with a terrace and city views features 2 bedrooms, a living room, a TV, an equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with a shower. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. The property has an outdoor dining area.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Sagrada Familia, Casa Batllo and La Pedrera. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from ApartEasy - Atic Sagrada Familia.

Name: GIRONA - Central apartment with balcony
Description:
Located within 700 metres of Passeig de Gracia and 800 metres of Casa Batllo, GIRONA - Central apartment with balcony provides rooms with air conditioning and a private bathroom in Barcelona. Popular points of interest nearby include Cathedral of Barcelona, Plaça Catalunya and Sagrada Familia. The property is 1.2 km from the city centre and 800 metres from La Pedrera.

At the apartment complex, every unit is equipped with a balcony. At the apartment complex, each unit is equipped with a private bathroom with a hair dryer.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Tivoli Theatre and Palau de la Musica Catalana. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 14 km away.

Name: Barcelona Eixample
Description:
Offering free WiFi, Barcelona Eixample features a 3-bedroom apartment close to Gaudi’s Casa Batlló and La Pedrera Modernist buildings. Pets are allowed.

The apartment at Barcelona Eixample has air conditioning and parquet flooring. It has a lounge area with sofa and TV; and a modern kitchen equipped with a dishwasher and kitchenware. There are 2 bathrooms. A washing machine and cleaning products are provided.

Numerous bars and restaurants serving local and international cuisine can be found nearby.

The apartments are also well connected by bus and metro to all main tourist attractions in Barcelona.

Name: Port III Apart céntrico ideal familias 11
Description:
Located in Barcelona, 3 km from Sant Miquel Beach and 1.6 km from Magic Fountain of Montjuic, Port III Apart céntrico ideal familias 11 provides air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. It is set 2 km from Santa Maria del Mar and features a lift. The property is non-smoking and is situated 1.8 km from Plaça Catalunya.

The spacious apartment features 3 bedrooms, a TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a washing machine, and 2 bathrooms with a bath. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Portal de l'Angel, Boqueria Market and Cathedral of Barcelona. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 11 km away.

Name: Hotel Inglés
Description:
Hotel Inglés is located right next to the Ramblas and Boquería market, 5 minutes’ walk from Plaça Catalunya. It offers 24-hour reception and rooms with free Wi-Fi and satellite TV.

Air-conditioned rooms at the Inglés are simple and comfortable. They come with a private bathroom and some rooms have a private balcony.

A breakfast is served every morning in a restaurant located next to the hotel.

Staff at the hotel’s 24-hour reception can provide information about what to see and do in Barcelona. You can also hire a car and store your luggage at the front desk.

The Palau de la Música Catalana, a Modernist auditorium, is 10 minutes’ walk from the Hotel Inglés. The characterful streets of the Gothic Quarter are on the doorstep, and you can walk to the trendy Born area in around 5 minutes.

Name: Hotel España Ramblas
Description:
Hotel España is situated in a 19th-century building in central Barcelona, within 100 metres of the Ramblas and Liceu Theatre and 200 metres from Boqueria Market. Its Mediterranean restaurant is run by famous chef Martín Berasategui. There is free high-speed WiFi available throughout.

The stylish and elegant rooms include a flat-screen TV and air conditioning. They also come with a modern bathroom.

Hotel España offers a variety of drinks and cocktails at AlAire rooftop terrace bar. There is also a small swimming pool.

Liceu Metro Station is 100 metres away and the Gothic Quarter is less than 5 minutes’ walk away.

Name: Serras Barcelona
Description:
Informal offers a menu where seasonal and local products, flavor and taste predominate to offer you, whether snacking or à la carte, an informal luxury experience.

Set in a historic building where the famous painter Pablo Picasso started his career in 1896, the hotel preserves the building's original façade. Luxurious services like airport pick-up, limousine, concierge and valet parking are standard in this hotel.

All stylish rooms at Serras are air conditioned and soundproofed, featuring a private balcony with views of Barcelona's Port Vell or Mercè Street in the Gothic Quarter. Each comes with state-of-the-art facilities such as a Smart HD TV, wireless sound system and bathrooms with bathrobes and slippers.

Featuring attractive sea views, guests can have a signature cocktail on the stylish lounge in the rooftop terrace, while listening to chill-out music. The mezzanine level in Serras Barcelona features a cosy library with bar, while the restaurant serves Catalan specialities and Mediterranean tapas. The restaurant opens for breakfast, lunch and dinner.

This boutique hotel is 10 minutes' walk from Picasso Museum and Estaciò de França Railway Station. Plaça Reial Square is 650 metres away, and Santa María del Mar Cathedral is 500 metres away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 15 minutes by car.

Name: Modern and bright apartment in Eixample 1-2
Description:
Modern and bright apartment in Eixample 1-2 features a patio and is set in Barcelona, within just 1.2 km of Magic Fountain of Montjuic and 2 km of Casa Batllo. It is situated 2.6 km from Plaça Catalunya and offers a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Sants Railway Station is 1.1 km away.

The spacious apartment comes with 2 bedrooms, a TV and a fully equipped kitchen that provides guests with an oven, a microwave, a washing machine, a fridge and a stovetop. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 2.7 km from the apartment, while Tivoli Theatre is 2.8 km away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 11 km from the property.

Name: E4lle1031 - Studio next to Plaza Espanya
Description:
A recently renovated property, E4lle1031 - Studio next to Plaza Espanya is situated in Barcelona near Palau Sant Jordi, Sants Railway Station and Boqueria Market. It is located 2.5 km from Plaça Catalunya and features a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Magic Fountain of Montjuic is 400 metres away.

Each unit is fitted with air conditioning, a private bathroom and a well-fitted kitchen including a dishwasher, oven, microwave and a toaster. A fridge and kitchenware are also offered, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. The units are equipped with heating facilities.

Portal de l'Angel is 2.6 km from the apartment, while Passeig de Gracia is 2.6 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 11 km away.

Name: Apartments Barcelona & Home Deco Eixample
Description:
Apartments Barcelona & Home Deco offers chic apartments in the Eixample district within 10 minutes’ walk of Las Ramblas and Plaza de Catalunya. These stylish properties come with free Wi-Fi.

Located on Rambla de Catalunya, Carrer Balmes or Carrer d’Aragó, each apartment at Barcelona & Home Deco offers elegant décor and attractive finishes. The spacious lounge areas include a TV, while the kitchen comes with a microwave, fridge, oven, toaster and a coffee maker.

Transport links, shops, bars and restaurants can be found along Rambla de Catalunya, Passeig de Gràcia and around Plaza de Catalunya.

Nearby tourist attractions include Gaudí’s Casa Batlló, and you can easily reach the Gothic Quarter and Born districts by foot or Metro.

Name: Sibs Bcn- Balmes- Romantic CityCentre Beautiful
Description:
Right in the centre of Barcelona, set within a short distance of Plaça Catalunya and Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Sibs Bcn- Balmes- Romantic CityCentre Beautiful offers free WiFi, air conditioning and household amenities such as a dishwasher and coffee machine. It is located less than 1 km from Tivoli Theatre and offers a lift. Boqueria Market is 1.3 km away and Palau de la Musica Catalana is 1.5 km from the apartment.

The apartment has 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a balcony with city views. This apartment is non-smoking and soundproof.

A car rental service is available at the apartment.

Popular points of interest near Sibs Bcn- Balmes- Romantic CityCentre Beautiful include Portal de l'Angel, Casa Batllo and Passeig de Gracia. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km from the property.

Name: Aparthotel Allada 3*
Description:
Situated in a pedestrianised street in the neighbourhood of Borne, Aparthotel Allada 3* offers a tranquil atmosphere due to the scarcity of street noise and the sound-proofing of the building.

Aparthotel Allada 3* is situated in a picturesque, historical area that has maintained the façades and arches of the 17th century, whilst incorporating the modern architecture of the 21st century.
