The apartments and studios have been designed to offer the greatest comfort and functionality during your stay. All also benefit from ample natural light throughout the day.

The Borne district is full of winding streets that form a labyrinth, allowing you to find some of the most intriguing areas in the old city. Close to the apartments, you will find the church of Saint Mary, the city gardens, the Picasso museum, the chocolate museum, the Cathedral, the market of Saint Catherine as well as many other sites of interest. In addition, you enjoy free access to the Barcelona Egyptian Museum.

Name: Tendency Apartments Miro 6
Description:
Located in Barcelona, less than 1 km from Passeig de Gracia and a 15-minute walk from La Pedrera, Tendency Apartments Miro 6 offers a terrace and air conditioning. Among the facilities at this property are a lift and private check-in and check-out, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is non-smoking and is set 1.7 km from Casa Batllo.

The 1-bedroom apartment is equipped with a living room with a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. The property offers inner courtyard views.

Plaça Catalunya is 2.7 km from the apartment, while Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 2.8 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from Tendency Apartments Miro 6.

Name: Sweett - Palau
Description:
Sweett - Palau offers accommodation within 1.4 km of the centre of Barcelona, with free WiFi, and a kitchen with a dishwasher, an oven and a microwave. The property is around 1.1 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, 1.3 km from Tivoli Theatre and 1.8 km from Palau de la Musica Catalana. Cathedral of Barcelona is 1.9 km from the apartment and Plaça Catalunya is 1.6 km away.

All units come with a toaster, fridge, a coffee machine, a stovetop and kettle. Complete with a private bathroom equipped with a shower and a hair dryer, the units at the apartment complex have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and selected rooms will provide you with a terrace. At the apartment complex, the units are fitted with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include La Pedrera, Passeig de Gracia and Casa Batllo. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 14 km away.

Name: Port VI Apart céntrico ideal familias 22
Description:
Situated in Barcelona, 3 km from Sant Miquel Beach and 1.6 km from Magic Fountain of Montjuic, Port VI Apart céntrico ideal familias 22 features air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. It is set 2 km from Santa Maria del Mar and provides a lift. The property is non-smoking and is located 1.8 km from Plaça Catalunya.

The spacious apartment has 2 separate bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, a fully equipped kitchen with a dining area and dishwasher, and a living room with a TV. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Portal de l'Angel, Boqueria Market and Cathedral of Barcelona. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 11 km from the property.

Name: Hostal Live Barcelona
Description:
Hostal Live Barcelona is located on central Barcelona's Gran Vía Avenue, 10 minutes’ walk from Las Ramblas, Plaza Catalunya Square and Plaza España Square. It offers air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi.

Rooms are modern and spacious, featuring 32-inch LED TVs. Some rooms have a private terrace overlooking a courtyard, or a balcony with views of Gran Vía Avenue. Use of a microwave, fridge and ironing facilities can be requested at the reception.

Guests can find a wide selection of bars and restaurants in the area, including a restaurant located 20 metres away, where guests receive discounts on breakfast, lunch and dinner.

In 15 minutes you can walk to Plaza Espanya, where the Fira Exhibition Centre and Las Arenas Shopping Centre are. It is also 2 stops away on the metro.

The nearest metro station is Urgell, just 100 metres away. Airport buses leave from a stop located 350 metres away.

Name: Loft Pere IV
Description:
Set in Barcelona, 1.5 km from Nova Icaria Beach and 1.8 km from Mar Bella Beach, Loft Pere IV offers a bar and air conditioning. It is situated 2.6 km from Port Olimpic and offers a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Bogatell Beach is 1.5 km away.

This apartment includes 1 bedroom, a living room and a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a dining area, and 1 bathroom with a bath and a washing machine. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

There is a snack bar on-site.

Sagrada Familia is 2.9 km from the apartment, while Passeig de Gracia is 3.5 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 16 km away.

Name: Alcam Montjuic
Description:
Alcam Montjuic offers self-accommodation 700 metres from both Plaza de España, and Fira de Barcelona. Mercat de Les Flores Theatre is 2 minutes’ walk away, and free Wi-Fi is provided.

Each apartment features a living room with a double sofa bed, and a kitchen or kitchenette equipped with a microwave, fridge, and kitchenware. The bathroom comes with a hairdryer, and bath or shower; and bed linen and towels are provided.

You can find all kind of bars and restaurants in the surrounding area, and Arena de Barcelona Shopping Centre is 750 metres away.

Alcam Montjuic is 40 minutes’ drive from El Prat Airport; regular airport buses leave from a bus stop located 10 minutes’ walk away.

Name: Boutique Pare Lainez
Description:
Located in Barcelona, less than 1 km from Sagrada Familia and 1.7 km from Passeig de Gracia, Boutique Pare Lainez provides air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. The property was built in 19th century and features accommodation with a patio. The property is non-smoking and is situated 2 km from La Pedrera.

The 1-bedroom apartment comes with a living room with a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment.

Casa Batllo is 2.7 km from the apartment, while Park Güell is 1.8 km away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 15 km from the property.

Name: Barcelona Apartment Aramunt
Description:
Aramunt Apartments offers modern, stylish studios 10 minutes' walk from Passeig de Gràcia Metro Station. It features free Wi-Fi, and a terrace with sun loungers and a small swimming pool of 5,5 metres by 1.

Aramunt offers bright, well-equipped studios for 2 to 4 people, They have air conditioning, a kitchenette with a washer dryer and a dishwasher, a dining area, and a seating area with a flat-screen TV and a double sofa bed. The bathroom comes with a shower, hairdryer and free toiletries.

The property is just a few minutes' walk from numerous tourist attractions. On the nearby Passeig de Gràcia you will find world-famous examples of Modernist architecture, such as Casa Batlló and La Pedrera.

The cultural heart of the Catalan capital, around Plaça Catalunya and Las Ramblas, is just a 10-minute stroll away.

As a guest of the Aramunt Apartments you enjoy free access to the Barcelona Egyptian Museum. Pay public parking can be found next to the property and buses to Barceloneta's beaches stop outside.

Name: BYPILLOW Ramblas
Description:
BYPILLOW Ramblas is a modern guest house conveniently located in the famous Ramblas in Barcelona, 15 minutes’ walk from Plaza Catalunya and the port.

The Wax Museum and the airport bus stop are next to this guest house. The nearest metro station is Drassanes, located only 100 metres away. There is a wide range of monuments, bars and shops within walking distance.

The air-conditioned rooms at BYPILLOW Ramblas come with a TV and private bathroom with shower.

The multilingual staff will be happy to provide tourist information and free local maps. Free WiFi and luggage storage are also offered.

Fully renovated on february 2024

Name: Tendency Plaza España
Description:
Tendency Plaza España has a balcony and is set in Barcelona, within just 2 km of Plaça Catalunya and 2 km of Portal de l'Angel. It is located 2.7 km from Passeig de Gracia and offers a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Magic Fountain of Montjuic is less than 1 km away.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 2 bedrooms, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a coffee machine, and 2 bathrooms with a shower and a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Boqueria Market, Cathedral of Barcelona and Palau Sant Jordi. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 12 km from Tendency Plaza España.

Name: Moll de la Fusta Rooms
Description:
Set in the centre of Barcelona, 1.3 km from Sant Miquel Beach, Moll de la Fusta Rooms offers air-conditioned rooms and free WiFi. This property is located a short distance from attractions such as Picasso Museum, Passeig de Gracia, and Palau de la Musica Catalana. The property is non-smoking and is situated 1.4 km from Barceloneta Beach.

The units feature bed linen.

Popular points of interest near the hostel include Sant Sebastian Beach, Plaça Reial and Santa Maria del Mar. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 12 km from Moll de la Fusta Rooms.

Name: Room Mate Pau
Description:
Room Mate Pau is set 50 metres from the emblematic Plaza Catalunya. It offers a stylish décor and a terrace and bright, contemporary rooms with free Wi-Fi.

Rooms at Room Mate Pau feature chic decor and air conditioning. All include a plasma TV with USB port for laptop connection, a minibar, safe and a modern private bathroom.

A buffet breakfast is served daily, which you can enjoy at the property's shared terrace. Events can be catered for and various bars, restaurants and shops are within 2 minutes’ walk.

Other facilities include meeting and conference rooms.

Room Mate Pau is 2 minutes’ walk from Las Ramblas and Passeig de Gracia, with its exclusive shops and Gaudí monuments. Urquinaona Metro station is 150 metres away, 2 stops from Barceloneta and its beach.

The hotel can help book tickets and activities and is 250 metres from Catalunya Metro and FGC Train Station.

Name: AinB Gothic-Jaume I Apartments
Description:
These modern, air-conditioned apartments are located in central Barcelona’s Gothic Quarter, just 200 metres from Barcelona Cathedral. They feature free Wi-Fi, a private balcony and flat-screen satellite TV.

The apartments at Apartments in Barcelona Gothic-Jaume I feature stylish décor and parquet floors. Each one has a kitchen with a microwave and coffee maker, and the bathroom includes a hairdryer.

Barcelona’s impressive Palau de la Música Catalana is just 3 minutes’ walk from the apartments, and you can walk to Plaza Catalunya and the Ramblas in around 7 minutes. Airport buses leave from Plaza Catalunya.

Name: Flaugier Apartments 33
Description:
Apartments Flaugier is a located in Barcelona, just 110 metres from Hospital de Sant Pau and 15 minutes' walk from Sagrada Família. It offers air-conditioned apartments with a flat-screen TV.

The Flaugier Apartment with terrace feature a kitchen with a hob, microwave and oven. Each one has a washing machine, and bed linen and towels are included. Some apartments have a terrace.

Located 350 metres away, Guinardó-Hospital de Sant Pau Metro Station is 5 stops from Passeig de Gràcia Metro Station in the city centre. Parc del Guinardó is 15 minutes' walk away. Here you can find Turó de la Rovira, a hill where there is an old Civil War bunker offering amazing views over the city.

Name: Ramblas Hotel
Description:
Ramblas Hotel is situated on Barcelona’s famous Las Ramblas, just 500 metres from Port Vell Harbour. It offers free Wi-Fi, a 24-hour reception and air-conditioned rooms with a balcony or terrace.

Each bright room at the Hotel Ramblas includes satellite TV, a minibar and a safe. The private bathrooms come with a hairdryer and toiletries. Some rooms have views over the Ramblas.

The Ramblas Hotel has a lobby bar and a charming café with original Modernista design and a pavement terrace. Breakfast is included in all room rates.

Located at the edge of Barcelona’s Gothic Quarter, the hotel is a 10-minute walk from Barcelona Cathedral. Liceu Metro Station is just 250 metres away.

Name: Sagrada familia apartment
Description:
Situated in Barcelona, 500 metres from Sagrada Familia and 1.7 km from La Pedrera, Sagrada familia apartment features air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. It is located 2.1 km from Casa Batllo and offers a lift. The property is non-smoking and is set 1.7 km from Passeig de Gracia.

The apartment has 2 bedrooms, a TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a microwave, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment.

Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 2.6 km from the apartment, while Tivoli Theatre is 2.7 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from Sagrada familia apartment.

Name: Ilunion Barcelona
Description:
Located 10 minutes away from Bogatell Beach in the 22 district, the modern Ilunion Barcelona features a rooftop swimming pool, sun terrace, and a gym. The CCIB Conference Centre is 2 km away. Free WiFi is available.

Rooms at Ilunion Barcelona feature air conditioning, a desk and a TV. The private bathroom includes a hairdryer and free toiletries. A safe and minibar are provided. Superior rooms also feature a furnished terrace with sea or city views.

This hotel is officially adapted for disabled guests. It has rooms adapted for people with reduced mobility or hearing/visual impairment, available upon request.

Ilunion Barcelona's restaurant serves breakfast and also offers an à la carte menu. The hotel has a bar and provides room service. A menu for guests with specific dietary requirements is also available.

Just a few minutes walk from the hotel is Rambla de Poblenou and Bogatell Beach, which are home to a wide variety of shops, bars and restaurants. The shopping centre is a 4-minute drive away and the Diagonal Mar shopping centre is an 8-minute drive away.

Ilunion Barcelona has pleasant, renovated common areas and free internet access. Private underground parking is available for an extra cost.

Llacuna and Poble Nou Metro Station is located less than 300 metres from the hotel. The bus stop of the line number 6 is located 50 metres from the hotel.

Gran Via is 15 minutes away by bus. There is a tourist bus stop near the hotel. Barcelona-El Prat airport is located 20 km away, with quick access to the Ronda Litoral.

Name: Apartamentos Laforja
Description:
Offering free Wi-Fi, these modern décor apartments are located in Sant Gervasi District, less than 15 minutes’ walk from the famous Passeig the Gracia Avenue and the Modernist buildings.

Apartamentos Laforja features air-conditioned 1-bedroom apartments. They all include 1 double room, a seating area with sofa bed, a modern and well equipped kitchenette and a private bathroom.

Numerous bars and restaurants as well as supermarkets can be found nearby. You can also visit the charming Gracia District, less than 15 minutes’ walk from the apartments.

Muntaner Train Station is 5 minutes’ walk of the apartments while Diagonal Metro Station is 15 minutes’ walk away.

Apartments are well connected to the city centre, only 10 minutes away by public transport.

Name: GuestReady - Bright home near Montjuïc
Description:
GuestReady - Bright home near Montjuïc is set in the Sants-Montjuïc district of Barcelona, 3 km from Santa Maria del Mar, 1.9 km from Portal de l'Angel and 1.7 km from Palau Sant Jordi. It is situated 2 km from Plaça Catalunya and features a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Magic Fountain of Montjuic is 1.3 km away.

The 1-bedroom apartment has a living room with a TV, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and microwave, and 1 bathroom with shower. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Guests at the apartment will be able to enjoy activities in and around Barcelona, like cycling.

Popular points of interest near GuestReady - Bright home near Montjuïc include Boqueria Market, Montjuïc and Cathedral of Barcelona. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 11 km from the property.

Name: Renovated 4BD in Sagrada Familia!
Description:
Situated in Barcelona, 1.2 km from La Pedrera and 1.3 km from Passeig de Gracia, Renovated 4BD in Sagrada Familia! features spacious air-conditioned accommodation with a patio and free WiFi. It is located 1.6 km from Casa Batllo and offers a lift. The property is non-smoking and is set less than 1 km from Sagrada Familia.

The 4-bedroom apartment features a living room with a TV, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a fridge, and 1 bathroom with a hair dryer. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 1.8 km from the apartment, while Tivoli Theatre is 2 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 14 km away.

Name: Fuster Apartments by Aspasios
Description:
Fuster Apartments are just 150 metres from Diagonal Avenue and 15 minutes’ walk from Plaza de Catalunya. These stylish apartments are set in a Modernist building dating from 1905.

Fuster Apartments boast high ceilings and mosaic floors. Lounges include a plasma TV, DVD and CD player and sofa, while kitchens have a washing machine, dishwasher, oven and microwave. Some apartments also have balconies. Free Wi-Fi and air conditioning are included, and towels, bed linen and a hairdryer are provided.

There are several bars and restaurants within 5 minutes’ walk. Passeig de Gràcia, with its Gaudí buildings and exclusive shops, is 650 metres away.

The Sagrada Familia is 10 minutes’ walk from the Fuster Apartments. You can reach Ciutadella Park and Las Ramblas by foot in 20 minutes.

The properties are set 5 minutes’ walk from both Girona and Verdaguer Metro Stations. Nord Bus Station is 1.4 km away

Name: Condes de Barcelona
Description:
Hotel Condes Barcelona occupies a 19th-century building on Passeig de Gracia with a seasonal rooftop pool and terrace. It features a gym and a sauna.

The soundproofed rooms at Condes de Barcelona Hotel are air conditioned, LCD satellite TV and laptop safe. They have views of Passeig de Gracia or a pretty Eixample courtyard, and some rooms include a small balcony.

The hotel has an elegant rooftop bar, Alaire Terrace Bar with wonderful views.

The Condes is just 100 metres from Gaudi’s La Pedrera, and a 10-minute walk from Plaça Catalunya and La Rambla. Passeig de Gracia Train Station, 200 metres away, offers direct links to Barcelona Airport.

Name: Molino Fresh
Description:
Molino Fresh is a self-catering accommodation located in the heart of Barcelona. Cafeterias and tapas bars are 70 metres away. La Rambla, Barceloneta and its port are 1 km away.

The air-conditioned apartment includes a seating area with sofa and flat-screen TV and heating. The kitchen is equipped with a stove, oven and microwave. There are 2 bathrooms with a  shower.

Plaça Catalunya is 2 km away. Molino Fresh is 15 km from Barcelona El Prat Airport.

Name: Stay U-nique Apartments Balmes II
Description:
Situated within 1.9 km of La Pedrera and 2.4 km of Casa Batllo, Stay U-nique Apartments Balmes II features rooms with air conditioning and a private bathroom in Barcelona. It is set 1.8 km from Park Güell and offers a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Passeig de Gracia is 1.4 km away.

Each unit has a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a washing machine, and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. An oven, a microwave and toaster are also offered, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, units have bed linen and towels.

Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 2.9 km from the apartment, while Plaça Catalunya is 3 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 14 km away.

Name: Sansi Pedralbes
Description:
Peaceful gardens and stylish rooms with free Wi-Fi and TV are offered at Sansi Pedralbes.

It is just 250 metres from Pedralbes Monastery and 700 metres from UPC University.
IESE University is just 5 minutes walking and ESADE University 200 meters from the hotel.

Decorated in soft blues and browns, this design hotel’s air-conditioned rooms come with a minibar, safe and iron. Bathrooms include toiletries.

Buses to central Barcelona stop within 20 metres of the hotel, and city tour buses stop at Pedralbes Monastery.
Reina Elisenda Station is 800 metres away and Barcelona Airport is a 15-minute drive away.

There are various popular bars and cafés in Sarrià, a 10-minute walk from the hotel.

You can also enjoy a varied breakfast and Catalan cuisine in the Sansi’s elegant restaurant.

A heated indoor pool, saunas and aromatherapy showers are offered in the hotel’s spa, available at an extra cost. Massages can be arranged on request.

Name: Hotel Casa Bonay
Description:
Located in central Barcelona, 200 metres from Tetuan Metro Station, Hotel Casa Bonay is a boutique hotel offering a shared terrace and free WiFi throughout. Plaça Catalunya is 10 minutes’ walk away.

Set in a 19th-century Neoclassical residential building, all rooms at Hotel Casa Bonay hotel are soundproofed and combine traditional features such as mosaic floors and modern textiles, lighting and furniture. They come with a minibar filled with local refreshments and snacks, complimentary WiFi, premium TV, selected magazines, air conditioning and ceiling fans in most rooms. . The bathroom comes with natural amenities from Mailin+Goetz

Casa Bonay hotel also offers a dynamic and unique culinary experience. Guests will find a rooftop restaurant; Chiringuito TosTao café, Libertine Cocktail Bar and Bodega Bonay's cuisine on site.

Hop on complimentary bikes to take you to the beach club where you will find complimentary boats and paddle boards or join rooftop weekend yoga classes. Sustainability focused.

The popular Passeig de Gracia Street, with shops and restaurants, is 700 metres away.  A 20-minute walk will take you to Gaudi’s Sagrada Familia. Barceloneta Beach is 4 metro stops away from Hotel Casa Bonay.

Name: Key PENTHOUSE Sagrada Familia
Description:
Situated within the Eixample district in Barcelona, Key PENTHOUSE Sagrada Familia has air conditioning, a balcony, and inner courtyard views. Among the facilities at this property are a lift and full-day security, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is non-smoking and is set 2.8 km from Nova Icaria Beach.

The apartment with a terrace and garden views has 2 bedrooms, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, and 1 bathroom with a shower. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. The property has an outdoor dining area.

Sagrada Familia is 800 metres from the apartment, while La Pedrera is 2.4 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from Key PENTHOUSE Sagrada Familia.

Name: Ola Living Boqueria
Description:
Ola Living Boqueria features accommodation within 500 metres of the centre of Barcelona, with free WiFi, and a kitchen with a dishwasher, an oven and a microwave. It is situated 2.3 km from Sant Sebastian Beach and provides a lift. The property is close to popular attractions like Passeig de Gracia, Tivoli Theatre and Santa Maria del Mar.

Each unit features a toaster, fridge, a coffee machine, as well as a kitchenware and kettle. Complete with a private bathroom fitted with a shower and a hair dryer, all units at the apartment complex have a TV and air conditioning, and certain rooms are fitted with a terrace. At the apartment complex, every unit comes with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Boqueria Market, Plaça Catalunya and Portal de l'Angel. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km from the property.

Name: rentBCN Gracia Jardinets
Description:
RentBCN Gracia Jardinets is situated in the Gràcia district of Barcelona, 500 metres from La Pedrera, 1 km from Casa Batllo and 1.3 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. The property is set 2 km from Palau de la Musica Catalana, 2 km from Portal de l'Angel and 3.6 km from Park Güell. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Passeig de Gracia is 200 metres away.

The air-conditioned apartment is composed of 2 separate bedrooms, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen, and 1 bathroom. A flat-screen TV is available. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Tivoli Theatre, Plaça Catalunya and Sagrada Familia. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from rentBCN Gracia Jardinets.

Name: 3BD with private terrace right by Sagrada Familia
Description:
Set in Barcelona, 2.9 km from Nova Icaria Beach and 300 metres from Sagrada Familia, 3BD with private terrace right by Sagrada Familia offers air-conditioned accommodation with a patio and free WiFi. It is located 1.6 km from Casa Batllo and features a lift. The property is non-smoking and is situated 1.6 km from La Pedrera.

The spacious apartment has 3 bedrooms, a TV and a fully equipped kitchen that provides guests with an oven, a microwave, a washing machine, a fridge and a stovetop. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Passeig de Gracia, Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and Tivoli Theatre. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 15 km from the property.

Name: Hotel Ramblas Internacional
Description:
Hotel Ramblas Internacional is set right on the famous Las Ramblas, 50 metres from Liceu Metro Station and close to La Boquería Market.
Each of the soundproofed rooms is individually decorated and has plenty of natural light. Most rooms offer views of central Barcelona and some look onto Las Ramblas.

Hotel Ramblas Internacional serves a daily breakfast.

Located just 150 metres from Liceu Theatre, the hotel has easy access to Barcelona’s Gothic Quarter and the city’s cathedral is less than 10 minutes’ walk away.

Name: Acta Splendid
Description:
Acta Splendid is located in central Barcelona, 5 minutes’ walk from Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas. It offers 24-hour reception and air-conditioned rooms with satellite TV and free Wi-Fi.

Staff at the Hotel Splendid’s 24-hour reception can help booking tickets for guided tours, live shows and other events. There is also a computer in the lobby that guests can use for free.

There is a public car park 450 metres from the hotel, around a 7-minute walk. You can walk to the Palau de la Música Catalana, a Modernist auditorium and UNESCO World Heritage Site, in 15 minutes.

Gluten-free breakfasts are available upon request.

Name: Classic Palau Apartments
Description:
Providing inner courtyard views, Classic Palau Apartments is situated in the Ciutat Vella district of Barcelona, 2.2 km from Sant Miquel Beach and 600 metres from Passeig de Gracia. It is located 2.1 km from Somorrostro Beach and provides a lift. The property is 500 metres from the city centre and 2.1 km from Barceloneta Beach.

All units are equipped with a flat-screen TV and a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave. All units come with a kettle, a private bathroom and free WiFi, while selected rooms have a balcony and some have city views. At the apartment complex, each unit is fitted with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Palau de la Musica Catalana, Tivoli Theatre and Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km away.

Name: AinB Las Ramblas-Guardia Apartments
Description:
These apartments are located in the historic centre of Barcelona, a short walk from the Ramblas.

The apartments are equipped with all modern comforts so that you can enjoy a highly private or independent atmosphere, whether you are booking a stay with the family or a group of friends. The building itself has a lift and a magnificent terrace for communal use where you can organise barbeques or simply relax in the middle of the city. You can easily visit the nearby Gothic Quarter that is only a few minutes on foot from the city port and beach front.

Name: Alba Hotel
Description:
This hotel is set in the heart of the cosmopolitan city of Barcelona, just a short distance from Las Ramblas and within walking distance of attractions such as the Liceu opera house and Plaça Catalunya.

The Hotel Alba is located in Barcelona’s old town, and its beautiful façade is listed for its artistic interest. Inside, relax in a spacious en suite bedroom with balcony and air conditioning.

Stroll down the colourful Ramblas to the seafront, or enjoy cava and tapas in the famous Boqueria food market. Just a short walk away, the narrow streets of the Gothic Quarter are full of shops, bars and restaurants.

The Alba boasts convenient public transport links, with Liceu metro station only 300 metres away. From here you can travel quickly and conveniently to attractions including the Fira de Barcelona and Gaudi’s incredible Parc Güell.

Name: Centric Apartments Paseo de Gracia
Description:
Located in Barcelona, 2.9 km from Somorrostro Beach and less than 1 km from the centre, Centric Apartments Paseo de Gracia provides air-conditioned accommodation with free WiFi, and a bar. The property features city and inner courtyard views, and is 2.9 km from Barceloneta Beach. In good weather, guests are welcome to sit outside.

Each unit has a balcony, a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave, a dining area and a seating area with a flat-screen TV, while the private bathroom includes a shower and free toiletries. A fridge and kitchenware are also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, every unit includes bed linen and towels.

There is a snack bar on-site.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Passeig de Gracia, Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and Casa Batllo. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 14 km away.

Name: Maravilloso piso en el corazón de Barcelona
Description:
In the centre of Barcelona, located within a short distance of Plaça Catalunya and Portal de l'Angel, Maravilloso piso en el corazón de Barcelona offers free WiFi, air conditioning and household amenities such as kitchenware and coffee machine. Featuring a shared lounge, the apartment is close to several noted attractions, around 600 metres from Tivoli Theatre, less than 1 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and a 5-minute walk from Palau de la Musica Catalana. The accommodation provides a lift, private check-in and check-out and organising tours for guests.

The spacious apartment features 2 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a fridge, a washing machine, and 2 bathrooms with a bath. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation has a private entrance and soundproofing.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Passeig de Gracia, Cathedral of Barcelona and Boqueria Market. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km away.

Name: Winahost Barcelona Provenza
Description:
In the Eixample district of Barcelona, close to Casa Batllo, Winahost Barcelona Provenza features free WiFi and a washing machine. With city views, this accommodation provides a balcony. The property is 1.3 km from the city centre and 700 metres from Passeig de Gracia.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 1 bedroom, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include La Pedrera, Plaça Catalunya and Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km away.

Name: Barcelona Apartment Gran de Gràcia
Description:
Situated in the charming Gràcia district, these elegant design apartments offer a balcony and a stylish kitchen with a ceramic hob, dishwasher and washing machine. Fontana Metro Station is just 200 metres away.

The air-conditioned Gran de Gracia apartments feature sleek contemporary décor. Each one has a lounge with a flat-screen TV and 2 sofa beds. The modern bathrooms include a shower.

A variety of supermarkets, cafés and restaurants can be found within a 5-minute walk of the Gran de Gracia apartments. The surrounding streets are full of quirky boutiques and lively bars.

Gaudí’s Casa Vicenç is just 150 metres from the apartments, while Parc Güell is a 20-minute walk away. You can walk to Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard in around 15 minutes.

Name: Stay Unique Apartments Cent
Description:
Situated in Barcelona, 1.1 km from Plaça Catalunya and 1.3 km from Tivoli Theatre, Stay Unique Apartments Cent offers air conditioning. It is located 1.4 km from Portal de l'Angel and features a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 1.1 km away.

The spacious apartment features 3 separate bedrooms, 1 bathroom, a fully equipped kitchenette with a dining area and dishwasher, and a living room with a TV. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Boqueria Market, Casa Batllo and Passeig de Gracia. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 12 km from Stay Unique Apartments Cent.

Name: ApartEasy - Sant Antoni Market
Description:
Located in Barcelona in the Catalonia region, ApartEasy - Sant Antoni Market features a balcony and quiet street views. It is situated 1.2 km from Magic Fountain of Montjuic and provides private check-in and check-out. Free WiFi is available and private parking can be arranged at an extra charge.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 2 bedrooms, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Sightseeing tours are available in the surroundings. A bicycle rental service is available at the apartment.

Popular points of interest near ApartEasy - Sant Antoni Market include Plaça Catalunya, Portal de l'Angel and Tivoli Theatre. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat, 11 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: Gallery Hotel 4 Sup
Description:
Located just off Barcelona’s Passeig de Gracia, Gallery Hotel 4 Sup offers a free sauna and gym, and a seasonal rooftop terrace with a pool and city views. Rooms include free Wi-Fi and free water on arrival.

This elegant hotel offers spacious, air-conditioned rooms with flat-screen satellite TV. The modern bathrooms include amenities, a hairdryer and a bathrobe.

The Gallery’s restaurant has an attractive garden terrace where you can enjoy Mediterranean cuisine. The hotel also has a bar and a café.

Gallery Hotel 4 Sup is situated next to the gardens of Palau Robert, a gallery and tourist information centre. Gaudí’s La Pedrera is a 3-minute walk away, while nearby Diagonal Metro Station provides direct access to the Sagrada Familia. Regular airport trains stop 600 metres away at Passeig de Gracia Station.

Name: 42man1018 Centrally located flat in Sant Antoni
Description:
Situated in Barcelona, 1.2 km from Magic Fountain of Montjuic and 1.4 km from Plaça Catalunya, 42man1018 Centrally located flat in Sant Antoni features air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. It is located 1.6 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and offers a lift. The property is non-smoking and is set 1.5 km from Portal de l'Angel.

The spacious apartment has 3 bedrooms, a TV, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Tivoli Theatre, Passeig de Gracia and Boqueria Market. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 11 km from the property.

Name: New 2 bedroom apartment in Plaza España
Description:
Situated in Barcelona, 1.1 km from Sants Railway Station and 1.8 km from Palau Sant Jordi, New 2 bedroom apartment in Plaza España offers air conditioning. It is located 3.3 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and features a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Magic Fountain of Montjuic is less than 1 km away.

The spacious apartment features 1 bedroom, a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave, and 1 bathroom. A flat-screen TV is available. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Camp Nou is 3.5 km from the apartment, while Plaça Catalunya is 3.7 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 10 km away.

Name: Best Western Plus Hotel Alfa Aeropuerto
Description:
Best Western Alfa Aeropuerto offers free airport shuttle service (please check the schedules), a heated pool and free Wi-Fi. It is under 15 minutes’ drive from El Prat Airport and 12 minutes from the Barcelona Fira Trade Fair.

Air-conditioned rooms at the Alfa Aeropuerto feature satellite TV( between 43" to 50") with Chromecast technology, minibar and safety deposit box.

The hotel restaurant, Gran Mercat, serves a range of cuisine and also offers an à la carte option. Guests can make use of the hotel lounge, bar and terrace. The fitness centre is equipped with treadmills, air bikes and Crossfit equipment.

The Alfa Aeropuerto is situated in Barcelona's largest industrial estate, next to Mercabarna wholesale market. It is a 30-minute bus ride from Barcelona’s Ramblas. There is a bus stop outside the hotel, and on-site parking is available.

Name: Cozy One bedroom apartment right in Gracia
Description:
Situated in Barcelona, 500 metres from La Pedrera and 1 km from Casa Batllo, Cozy One bedroom apartment right in Gracia features air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. It is located 1.3 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and offers a lift. The property is non-smoking and is set 1.4 km from Passeig de Gracia.

The apartment features 1 bedroom, a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave and a fridge, a washing machine and 1 bathroom with a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Popular points of interest near Cozy One bedroom apartment right in Gracia include Tivoli Theatre, Sagrada Familia and Portal de l'Angel. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from the accommodation.

Name: Pierre & Vacances Barcelona Sants
Description:
Pierre & Vacances Barcelona Sants offers stylish air-conditioned accommodation, just a 5-minute walk from FC Barcelona’s Camp Nou Stadium. Free high-speed WiFi is available.

Each bright apartment and studio has a well-equipped kitchenette and flat-screen satellite TV.

All the Pierre & Vacances apartments and studios have functional modern décor and street views. Kitchen facilities include a fridge, microwave and dishwasher. A safe is available at an extra cost.

Pierre & Vacances Barcelona Sants is situated in the lively Sants neighbourhood, home to a wide range of shops, bars and cafés.

Just 200 metres away, Badal Metro Station connects with Sants Train Station in under 10 minutes. Collblanc metro station with direct trains to Barcelona Airport and Europa Fira is 500 metres away.

Name: Hostal Martinval
Description:
Set 5 minutes’ walk from the avenues of Diagonal and Passeig de Gracia, this guest house is located in the central Eixample neighbourhood of Barcelona. Verdaguer metro station is 350 metres away.

Hostal Martinval offers both apartments or modern rooms, most of which have a private bathroom. All rooms have a flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi, while some of them have a balcony.

The Martinval also features a luggage storage. There is a wide offer of restaurants and bars in the surrounding area.

This accommodation is well connected to public transport and within walking distance from Barcelona’s most important buildings. La Pedrera and Casa Batlló are 10 minutes’ walk, and Sagrada Familia Temple is about the same distance.

Name: Factory Apartments Barcelona
Description:
Factory Apartments Barcelona features accommodation within 700 metres of the centre of Barcelona, with free WiFi, and a kitchen with a dishwasher, an oven and a microwave. This recently renovated apartment is located 2.7 km from Somorrostro Beach and 2.7 km from Barceloneta Beach. The accommodation offers a lift, and luggage storage for guests.

At the apartment complex, each unit has a desk, a TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. A toaster, a fridge and stovetop are also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. All units at the apartment complex have air conditioning and a wardrobe.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Palau de la Musica Catalana, Passeig de Gracia and Tivoli Theatre. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 14 km from the property.

Name: Stay U-nique Apartment Arago II
Description:
In the Eixample district of Barcelona, close to Passeig de Gracia, Stay U-nique Apartment Arago II has free WiFi and a washing machine. This apartment features accommodation with a balcony. The property is 600 metres from Casa Batllo, and within less than 1 km of the city centre.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 1 bedroom, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a bath and a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Dining options are available close to the apartment.

Popular points of interest near Stay U-nique Apartment Arago II include Plaça Catalunya, Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and Tivoli Theatre. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km from the property.

Name: Bonito apartamento cerca de la Sagrada Familia
Description:
Located in Barcelona, 3 km from Bogatell Beach and 400 metres from Sagrada Familia, Bonito apartamento cerca de la Sagrada Familia offers air conditioning. The property is around 1.9 km from La Pedrera, 2 km from Casa Batllo and 2.5 km from Passeig de Gracia. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Nova Icaria Beach is 2.7 km away.

The spacious apartment comes with 2 bedrooms, a TV and a fully equipped kitchen that provides guests with an oven, a fridge, a washing machine and a stovetop. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 2.8 km from the apartment, while Tivoli Theatre is 2.9 km away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 15 km from the property.

Name: Aparteasy - Deluxe Family Apartments with Pool
Description:
Aparteasy - Deluxe Family Apartments with Pool offers accommodation in Barcelona. Plaça Catalunya is located just 10 minutes walking from the property.

All units are air-conditioned and have a seating area. There is also a dining area and a kitchenette equipped with a dishwasher and oven. A microwave and toaster are also offered, as well as a coffee machine. Bed linen and towels are provided.

Aparteasy - Deluxe Family Apartments with Pool also includes an outdoor pool, and free WiFi is available.

Portal de l'Angel is 1.2 km from Aparteasy - Deluxe Family Apartments with Pool, while La Pedrera is 1.3 km from the property. The nearest airport is El Prat Airport, 12 km from Aparteasy - Deluxe Family Apartments with Pool.

Name: Great apartment in Poblenou perfect for 4 people
Description:
Located in Barcelona, 1.6 km from Llevant and 1.8 km from Nova Mar Bella Beach, Great apartment in Poblenou perfect for 4 people offers air conditioning. Among the facilities at this property are private check-in and check-out and a tour desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Staff on-site can arrange a shuttle service.

The spacious apartment is equipped with 3 bedrooms, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a balcony with city views. The unit has soundproofing and a shower. This apartment is allergy-free and non-smoking.

Mar Bella Beach is 1.8 km from the apartment, while Sagrada Familia is 3 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 17 km away, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: BBarcelona Sant Pau Flat
Description:
BBarcelona Sant Pau Flat is set in the Sant Martí district of Barcelona, 3.2 km from La Pedrera, 3.3 km from Passeig de Gracia and 3.7 km from Casa Batllo. The property is situated 4.2 km from Park Güell, 4.2 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and 4.3 km from Tivoli Theatre. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Sagrada Familia is 1.3 km away.

The air-conditioned apartment is composed of 2 separate bedrooms, a fully equipped kitchen, and 1 bathroom. A flat-screen TV is offered. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Palau de la Musica Catalana is 4.5 km from the apartment, while Plaça Catalunya is 4.8 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 16 km away.

Name: Eixample 19
Description:
In the heart of Barcelona, set within a short distance of Passeig de Gracia and Casa Batllo, Eixample 19 offers free WiFi, air conditioning and household amenities such as a fridge and coffee machine. It is located 1.5 km from Plaça Catalunya and offers a lift. The property is non-smoking and is situated 700 metres from La Pedrera.

This apartment is fitted with 2 bedrooms, a kitchen with an oven and a microwave, a flat-screen TV, a seating area and 1 bathroom fitted with an a bath or shower.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Tivoli Theatre and Portal de l'Angel. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km from the property.

Name: Stay U-nique Apartments Ramón y Cajal
Description:
Stay U-nique Apartments Ramón y Cajal has a terrace and is set in Barcelona, within just 1 km of La Pedrera and 1.5 km of Casa Batllo. This apartment offers accommodation with a balcony. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Passeig de Gracia is 700 metres away.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 1 bedroom, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. The property has an outdoor dining area.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Sagrada Familia and Park Güell. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from Stay U-nique Apartments Ramón y Cajal.

Name: Acogedor apartamento Diagonal Mar
Description:
Situated in Barcelona, 1.1 km from Nova Mar Bella Beach and 1.4 km from Mar Bella Beach, Acogedor apartamento Diagonal Mar offers air conditioning. The property is around 3.5 km from Sagrada Familia, 3.8 km from Port Olimpic and 4.3 km from Passeig de Gracia. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Llevant is 1 km away.

The apartment has 1 bedroom, a living room with a TV, an equipped kitchen, and 1 bathroom with a bath and a hair dryer. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Palau de la Musica Catalana is 4.5 km from the apartment, while Tivoli Theatre is 4.5 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 16 km away.

Name: Amister Apartments
Description:
Located in the heart of Barcelona, 300 metres from Plaça Catalunya, Amister Apartments offers 1-bedroom apartments with free WiFi.

Each apartment at Amister has a fully-equipped kitchen, completed with an oven and a dishwasher, opening onto a living-dining room with a sofa and a flat-screen TV. There is a washing machine and cleaning products are provided.

Shops, bars and dining options are in the surrounding streets.

Regular airport buses leave from a bus stop located just 250 metres away.

Name: 45 Times Barcelona Hotel
Description:
45 Times Barcelona Hotel has an outdoor swimming pool, fitness centre, a terrace and restaurant in Barcelona. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The property is 2.7 km from Sant Miquel Beach, and within 200 metres of the city centre.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. All guest rooms feature a wardrobe.

A buffet, continental or American breakfast is available every morning at the property.

Popular points of interest near 45 Times Barcelona Hotel include Plaça Catalunya, Portal de l'Angel and Passeig de Gracia. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km from the property.

Name: Click&Flat Stylish Torrijos
Description:
Situated in Barcelona, less than 1 km from Passeig de Gracia and a 14-minute walk from La Pedrera, Click&Flat Stylish Torrijos features spacious air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. The property is around 2.4 km from Tivoli Theatre, 2.6 km from Palau de la Musica Catalana and 2.9 km from Plaça Catalunya. The property is non-smoking and is located 1.7 km from Casa Batllo.

This apartment features 2 bedrooms, a kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a flat-screen TV, a seating area and 1 bathroom fitted with a shower. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Sagrada Familia and Park Güell. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from Click&Flat Stylish Torrijos.

Name: Gracia 1872
Description:
Located in Barcelona, 400 metres from Passeig de Gracia and less than 1 km from La Pedrera, Gracia 1872 provides air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. With city views, this accommodation features a patio. The property is non-smoking and is situated 1.4 km from Casa Batllo.

The spacious apartment with a terrace and garden views features 2 bedrooms, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 2 bathrooms with a walk-in shower. A private entrance leads guests into the apartment, where they can enjoy some wine or champagne and chocolates or cookies. The property offers inner courtyard views.

Guests can also relax in the garden.

Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 1.6 km from the apartment, while Tivoli Theatre is 1.9 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from Gracia 1872.

Name: Hostemplo Sagrada Familia
Description:
This design guest house has an excellent location just 200 metres from Gaudí’s world-famous Sagrada Familia. There is free Wi-Fi throughout.

Rooms and apartments at Hostemplo Sagrada Familia are bright and have modern design. They have a flat-screen TV with DVD player and air conditioning. All rooms have a private bathroom.

Hostemplo Sagrada Familia rooms occupy all three floors of a historic modernist building, that preserves its original front. The interior is fully renovated. The suites are located in a new outbuilding.

A buffet breakfast with homemade pastries, local produce and freshly squeezed natural orange juice is served daily at Hotel Hostemplo, located 150 metres from the property.

The Tourist Bus passes the guest house and stops only 100 metres away. Tickets are conveniently available at reception. There is a metro station just 150 metres from the property.

There is 24-hour access to the building, as well as 24-hour reception.

Name: Atic Barcelona
Description:
Set within the Eixample district in Barcelona, Atic Barcelona has air conditioning, a balcony, and city views. It is situated 1.4 km from Sants Railway Station and offers a lift. Offering free WiFi throughout the property, the non-smoking apartment features a hot tub.

The apartment is fitted with 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a terrace with mountain views. Guests can take in the ambience of the surroundings from an outdoor dining area. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Sightseeing tours are available close to the property.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Magic Fountain of Montjuic, Casa Batllo and Plaça Catalunya. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 11 km away.

Name: Next to Sagrada Familia 4-bedroom Apartment
Description:
Set in Barcelona, 2.8 km from Nova Icaria Beach and 200 metres from Sagrada Familia, Next to Sagrada Familia 4-bedroom Apartment offers air-conditioned accommodation with a patio and free WiFi. It is situated 1.8 km from Casa Batllo and provides a lift. The property is non-smoking and is located 1.7 km from La Pedrera.

The spacious apartment has 4 bedrooms, a TV and a fully equipped kitchen that provides guests with an oven, a microwave, a washing machine, a fridge and a stovetop. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Passeig de Gracia is 1.9 km from the apartment, while Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 2.3 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 15 km away.

Name: Ferienwohnung für 3 Personen ca 38 qm in Barcelona-Gràcia, Costa Brava Costa del Maresme
Description:
Ferienwohnung für 3 Personen ca 38 qm in Barcelona-Gràcia, Costa Brava Costa del Maresme has a terrace and is situated in Barcelona, within just 200 metres of Passeig de Gracia and 400 metres of La Pedrera. Guests staying at this apartment have access to a balcony. Palau de la Musica Catalana is 1.9 km from the apartment and Plaça Catalunya is 1.7 km away.

With free WiFi, this apartment features a TV, a washing machine and a fully equipped kitchenette with an oven and microwave.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Casa Batllo, Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and Tivoli Theatre. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 14 km from the property.

Name: Tendency Apartments 7
Description:
Situated in Barcelona’s Eixample District, 600 metres from Diagonal Metro Station, Tendency Apartments 7 offers accommodation with air conditioning, heating, and free WiFi.

The apartments include a living area with a flat-screen TV and sofa. Each has a kitchen, complete with an oven, dishwasher, and washing machine.

Some apartments feature a private balcony or a furnished terrace. Each apartment has a private bathroom with a bath or a shower, and towels and bed linen are provided.

Given its central location, the property is within walking distance of a number of shops and restaurants, as well as many of Barcelona’s sights. You can reach both Sagrada Familia and Plaza Cataluña Square within 20 minutes on foot. Paseo de Gracia Boulevard, with Gaudi’s building and designer boutiques, is 500 metres away.

Name: Tendency Apartments 8
Description:
Tendency Apartments 8 provides accommodation within 1.2 km of the centre of Barcelona, with free WiFi, and a kitchen with a dishwasher, an oven and a microwave. There is a private entrance at the apartment for the convenience of those who stay. Private parking can be arranged at an extra charge.

At the apartment complex, all units come with a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. All units are air conditioned and include a seating and/or dining area. The units are equipped with heating facilities.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Passeig de Gracia, Casa Batllo and La Pedrera. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from Tendency Apartments 8.

Name: Hip Karma Hostel
Description:
Housed in a traditional Modernist building, 300 metres from Urquinaona Metro Station, Hip Karma Hostel is a small hostel offering free high-speed Wi-Fi, free lockers, free bag storage and kitchen facilities.

The rooms in Hip Karma Hostel are both private rooms with a smart TV and a private bathroom; or dormitory style with bunk beds. All beds in dormitory have curtains and reading light, and a security locker with an electrical socket.

Guests have access to a shared kitchen, completed with a large fridge and a satellite TV.

Hip Karma Hostel is 8 minutes’ walk from North Bus Station and 350 metres from Arc de Triomf Metro station. You can walk to central Plaza Catalunya in 10 minutes.

Name: Hotel Monegal
Description:
Situated right on the corner of Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas, Hotel Monegal boasts a fantastic central location. It offers good-value rooms with free Wi-Fi and satellite TV.

Staff at Hotel Monegal’s  can provide information about what to see and do in Barcelona.
From the Monegal you can walk to Barcelona’s Gothic Cathedral and the modernist Palau de la Musica Auditorium in around 7 minutes. Gaudí’s La Pedrera and Casa Batlló are both within 20 minutes’ walk.

Buses to and from the airport leave from the other side of Plaza Catalunya, 200 metres away from the hotel.

Name: Mercer Hotel Barcelona
Description:
Featuring a rooftop swimming pool, Mercer Hotel Barcelona is set in Barcelona’s Gothic Quarter, within 10 minutes’ walk of Las Ramblas. This boutique hotel is set in one of the city’s ancient buildings, next to the Roman walls.

The stylish rooms at Mercer Hotel Barcelona have chic décor with original beamed ceilings and exposed brick walls. There is free Wi-Fi, air conditioning and flat-screen satellite TV. The bathroom has a rain-effect shower.

The hotel features an interior courtyard with orange trees. There is also a poolside bar and a terrace with loungers.

Several cafés, bars and restaurants can be found in the charming, winding streets and pretty squares surrounding the hotel.

Jaume I Metro Station is just 5 minutes’ walk from the Mercer. The trendy Born district is approximately 300 metres away, while Barcelona Cathedral can be reached in 5 minutes by foot.

Name: Catalonia Ramblas 4* Sup
Description:
Set just off Barcelona’s famous Las Ramblas, 3 minutes’ walk from central Plaza Catalunya, Catalonia Ramblas 4* Sup  features a seasonal outdoor pool with a south-facing terrace, a poolside snack bar and a chill-out area.

Housed in a modernist building, all bright and spacious rooms come with a flat-screen satellite smart TV equipped with Chromecast App, free WiFi and tea and coffee facilities. Some have a private terrace with a private pool. Room service is available.

The spa at Catalonia Ramblas 4* Sup features a relaxation area. It includes a sauna, a steam bath and a hot tub. Massage and beauty treatments are also available.

The hotel’s restaurant, Pelai Restaurant, offers Catalan market cuisine. Dishes cooked on a coal stove are available at the Pelai terrace, a rooftop terrace with a chill-out area with panoramic city views. A buffet breakfast is offered every morning and, on weekends, it is available until 11:00.

In the summer months, the terrace is open until 00:00 and has a summer menu, as well as cocktails and milkshakes.

Name: Exe Ramblas Boquería
Description:
Exe Ramblas Boquería is situated right on Barcelona’s famous Las Ramblas, next to La Boquería Market. The stylish, air-conditioned rooms offer free WiFi, flat-screen satellite TV and a private balcony.

Exe Ramblas Boquería features elegant modern décor, with hardwood floors and designer furniture. The soundproofed rooms have views of Las Ramblas or the colourful Boqueria Market.

A varied buffet breakfast is served in the Exe Ramblas Boquería’s bright dining room. The Boquería is an ideal place to sample typical tapas and fresh fruit, while numerous restaurants and bars can be found nearby.

Barcelona Cathedral and Plaça Catalunya are both within 400 metres of the hotel. Liceu Metro Station is just 100 metres away.

Name: Stay U-nique Apartments Pellaires
Description:
Located within 700 metres of Llevant and 800 metres of Mar Bella Beach, Stay U-nique Apartments Pellaires provides rooms with air conditioning and a private bathroom in Barcelona. Among the facilities at this property are a lift and private check-in and check-out, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The apartment features family rooms.

Each unit is equipped with a terrace, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a washing machine, and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. An oven, a microwave and toaster are also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, each unit is equipped with bed linen and towels.

Nova Mar Bella Beach is less than 1 km from the apartment, while Somorrostro Beach is 2.8 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 17 km from Stay U-nique Apartments Pellaires.

Name: Apartamento para 2 en Gracia
Description:
Apartamento para 2 en Gracia is situated in the Gràcia district of Barcelona, 600 metres from La Pedrera, 1.1 km from Casa Batllo and 1.4 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. The property is located 2.8 km from Palau de la Musica Catalana, 3 km from Park Güell and 3.4 km from Portal de l'Angel. The property is non-smoking and is set 300 metres from Passeig de Gracia.

With free WiFi, this 1-bedroom apartment offers a flat-screen TV, a washing machine and a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and microwave. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Tivoli Theatre, Plaça Catalunya and Sagrada Familia. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 15 km from the property.

Name: Spacious and Elegant 4 Bedroom with Private Terrace
Description:
Spacious and Elegant 4 Bedroom with Private Terrace features a patio and is set in Barcelona, within just 700 metres of Sagrada Familia and 1.5 km of Casa Batllo. It is situated 2.7 km from Somorrostro Beach and offers a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Nova Icaria Beach is 2.6 km away.

The spacious apartment is fitted with 4 bedrooms, a TV and a fully equipped kitchen that provides guests with a dishwasher, an oven, a washing machine, a microwave and a fridge. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include La Pedrera, Palau de la Musica Catalana and Tivoli Theatre. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 15 km away.

Name: Ilunion Bel-Art
Description:
Situated in Barcelona, 1 km from Sagrada Familia, Ilunion Bel-Art features accommodation with a fitness centre, private parking, a shared lounge and a restaurant. This 4-star hotel offers a tour desk, luggage storage space and free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is located 2.6 km from Passeig de Gracia.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bath. The rooms have a wardrobe.

A buffet, continental or Full English/Irish breakfast can be enjoyed at the property.

Speaking Catalan, English, Spanish and French at the reception, staff are always on hand to help.

La Pedrera is 2.7 km from Ilunion Bel-Art, while Park Güell is 1.8 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 16 km away.

Name: Aspasios Poble Nou Apartments
Description:
Located in the Sant Martí district of Barcelona, Aspasios Poble Nou Apartments provides accommodation with a rooftop pool, free WiFi, a lift and a tour desk. The air-conditioned accommodation is 1.4 km from Bogatell Beach. Featuring family rooms, this property also provides guests with a sun terrace.

Each unit comes with a fully equipped kitchen with an oven, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a washing machine, and a private bathroom with a bath or shower and a hair dryer. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, all units have bed linen and towels.

Nova Icaria Beach is 1.5 km from the apartment, while Mar Bella Beach is 1.5 km away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 16 km from the property.

Name: Sensation Sagrada Familia
Description:
Within 2 minutes’ walk of Gaudí’s Sagrada Família, these bright modern apartments feature a shared rooftop sun terrace and a small outdoor swimming pool with views of the city’s famous Basilica.

Sensation Sagrada Familia apartments feature a balcony and a living room with parquet floors and floor-to-ceiling windows. The modern kitchen is equipped with a hob, oven, coffee maker and dishwasher.

All Sensation Sagrada Familia apartments have free Wi-Fi. There is also a gym and sauna in the same building which can be used free of charge.

There are several cafés, bars and restaurants on the tree-lined Avinguda Gaudí Avenue, just 250 metres away. There are plenty of shops and supermarkets within walking distance, including Mercat Sagrada Família food market, 5 minutes’ walk away.

Sagrada Família metro station, with lines 2 and 5, is just 1 minute walk from the apartments. Line 2 will take visitors to the city centre in 15 minutes. The number 92 bus goes to Gaudí’s Parc Güell, and Barcelona's El Prat Airport is a 30-minute drive away.

Name: Sagrada Familia Gaudi
Description:
Situated in Barcelona, 3 km from Nova Icaria Beach and 500 metres from Sagrada Familia, Sagrada Familia Gaudi features air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. The property is located 2.6 km from La Pedrera, 2.7 km from Passeig de Gracia and 3.1 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. The property is non-smoking and is set 2.6 km from Casa Batllo.

The spacious apartment has 2 bedrooms, a TV, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, a washing machine, and 2 bathrooms with a shower. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment.

Tivoli Theatre is 3.2 km from the apartment, while Palau de la Musica Catalana is 3.4 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from Sagrada Familia Gaudi.

Name: Beautiful 4bd 4ba apartment in Eixample District
Description:
Set in Barcelona, 700 metres from Casa Batllo, 1.2 km from Plaça Catalunya and 1 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Beautiful 4bd 4ba apartment in Eixample District offers accommodation with a patio and free WiFi. It is located 1.3 km from Tivoli Theatre and provides a lift. The property is 1.1 km from the city centre and 700 metres from Passeig de Gracia.

The spacious apartment is fitted with 4 bedrooms, a TV and a fully equipped kitchen that provides guests with a dishwasher, an oven, a washing machine, a microwave and a fridge. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include La Pedrera, Portal de l'Angel and Boqueria Market. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km from the property.

Name: Heaven With a Garden at Las Ramblas
Description:
Featuring air-conditioned accommodation with a terrace, Heaven With a Garden at Las Ramblas is set in Barcelona. Guests staying at this apartment have access to a balcony. The property is 2 km from Barceloneta Beach, and within 1 km of the city centre.

With free WiFi, this 3-bedroom apartment offers a flat-screen TV, a washing machine and a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave and fridge. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Santa Maria del Mar, Picasso Museum and Plaça Reial. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km away.

Name: Apartment Barcelona Rentals - Pool Terrace in City Center
Description:
Apartment Barcelona Rentals - Pool Terrace in City Center in Barcelona provides accommodation with free WiFi, 900 metres from Picasso Museum, 1 km from Tivoli Theatre and 1 km from La Seu, Cathedral of Barcelona. Situated 1 km from Portal de l'Angel, the property features a terrace.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 3 separate bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, and a seating area. The accommodation is equipped with a kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven.

The apartment offers a shared rooftop outdoor pool.

The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from the property.

Name: Hotel Midmost by Majestic Hotel Group
Description:
Located in the heart of Barcelona, Hotel Midmost by Majestic Hotel Group is a few steps from the famous Ramblas and the Gothic Quarter. This stylish hotel features a roof terrace with a pool (not climatized) and views over the city.

The Hotel Midmost by Majestic Hotel Group has elegant interiors with all modern comforts. Relax in a sunny en suite bedroom, decorated in soothing soft colours and with air conditioning, free WiFi, satellite TV and a Nespresso coffee machine.

Treat yourself to a delicious meal in the hotel’s restaurant, or step outside to sample the huge range of regional and international foods in one of Barcelona’s many restaurants.

Take a stroll up the impressive Passeig de Gracia to visit the famous Modernista creations of Gaudi, or visit the colourful Ramblas and the mouthwatering food stalls of the Boqueria market.

Name: Wow Hostel Barcelona
Description:
Located in Barcelona’s Eixample District, 10 minutes’ walk from Passeig de Gracia Boulevard and Diagonal Metro Station, Wow Hostel Barcelona offers air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi.

Wow Hostel Barcelona offers dormitories and private rooms. Dormitories have shared bathroom facilities. Double and triple rooms can have private or shared bathrooms. There is a TV lounge with a pool table and vending machines.

You will find many bars and restaurants in the surrounding area. Staff can also provide tourist information, a party guide and discounts for night clubs. You can access the hostel 24 hours a day.

You can reach Barcelona city centre in 15 minutes by bus. Private parking is possible 150 metres away.

Name: S2SEP1099 - Great apartment with private terrace
Description:
Set in Barcelona, 700 metres from Magic Fountain of Montjuic and 1.5 km from Sants Railway Station, S2SEP1099 - Great apartment with private terrace offers air-conditioned accommodation with a terrace and free WiFi. It is situated 2.4 km from Portal de l'Angel and provides a lift. The property is non-smoking and is located 2.4 km from Plaça Catalunya.

The spacious apartment has 2 bedrooms, a TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower.

Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 2.6 km from the apartment, while Boqueria Market is 2 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 11 km away.

Name: Enrique Granados Apartment
Description:
In the Eixample district of Barcelona, close to Casa Batllo, Enrique Granados Apartment has free WiFi and a washing machine. The property is close to Portal de l'Angel, La Pedrera and Boqueria Market. The property is 1.1 km from the city centre and 700 metres from Passeig de Gracia.

The air-conditioned apartment is composed of 1 separate bedroom, a fully equipped kitchen, and 1 bathroom. A flat-screen TV is offered. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Plaça Catalunya, Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and Tivoli Theatre. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km from the property.

Name: Pol & Grace Hotel
Description:
Immerse yourself in the world of art at Pol & Grace Hotel by enjoying a unique room, where the walls capture the essence of the artists and designers who have participated in artistic residencies in our facilities, creating an atmosphere full of inspiration and originality".

Pol & Grace Hotel is located just 100 metres from Barcelona's Plaça Molina and Sant Gervasi train stations. It offers spacious, air-conditioned rooms with flat-screen satellite TV, free Wi-Fi and a working area with unlimited coffee and tea from 10:30 am.

All rooms at Pol & Grace Hotel include a minibar, a free safe and the bathrooms are fully equipped with toiletries.

The property serves a buffet breakfast with fresh, seasonal regional produce. Vegetarian and gluten-free options are available daily.
There is also a 24-hour reception with taxi service, tourist information and private parking.

Fontana Metro Station is 600 metres away and offers direct connections to Plaza Catalunya Square, Las Ramblas and Park Güell. The property is a 2-minute walk from the famous Gracia district, where guests can find numerous shops, restaurants and bars.

To reach the hotel from the airport by public transport you can take the AEROBUS to Plaça Catalunya Square and then L6 or L7 to Sant Gervasi/Plaza Molina. From there is a 1 min walk to the hotel.

Name: Cosmo Apartments Passeig de Gràcia
Description:
Cosmo Apartments Passeig de Gràcia is located in central Barcelona, 50 metres from the well-know Passeig de Gràcia Avenue. Casa Batlló and La Pedrera Modernist buildings are 5 minutes’ walk away.

The stylish and bright apartments at Cosmo Apartments Passeig de Gràcia can have 1 to 3 bedrooms, and duplex apartments with terrace are also available.

Featuring modern décor, all air-conditioned apartments are equipped with an open-plan kitchen with ceramic hob, microwave, dishwasher and kitchenware. There is also a living room with a 32-inch flat-screen TV and sofa bed.

Cosmo Apartments Passeig de Gràcia is well communicated to the city’s main tourist places, having the metro station 300 metres away.  Passeig de Gràcia is known for being the most important shopping street in Barcelona. Airport buses leave from Plaza Catalunya, located just 10 minutes' walk away.

Name: Vilana Hotel Boutique
Description:
Enjoy the unique architecture of this elegant, contemporary hotel, located in the prestigious La Bonanova district of Barcelona, 20 minutes from Plaza Catalunya by public transport.

The design of Vilana Hotel features floor-to-ceiling windows, skylights, and impressive design touches.

Rooms feature air conditioning, a flat-screen TV, minibar and a private bathroom.

On site you will find a fitness centre, restaurant, and bar. Guests can also enjoy a buffet breakfast.

The hotel is surrounded by one of the city centre’s most upmarket areas, full of chic boutiques and stylish architecture.

Name: Spatious luxe apartment Paseo de Gracia Diagonal
Description:
Situated in Barcelona, 200 metres from Passeig de Gracia and 400 metres from La Pedrera, Spatious luxe apartment Paseo de Gracia Diagonal features accommodation with free WiFi in a historic building. The air-conditioned accommodation is less than 1 km from Casa Batllo. The accommodation offers private check-in and check-out, and organising tours for guests.

The spacious apartment with a balcony and city views has 1 bedroom, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with a walk-in shower. A private entrance leads guests into the apartment, where they can enjoy some wine or champagne and chocolates or cookies. This apartment is non-smoking and soundproof.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Tivoli Theatre and Palau de la Musica Catalana. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 14 km from the property.

Name: Barcelona Apartment Val
Description:
These modern décor apartments are located in Barcelona city centre, next to Passeig de Gracia Avenue and within walking distance of Gaudi’s most famous Modernist buildings.

Barcelona Apartment Val features air-conditioned 1, 2 or 3 bedroom apartments. Each one offers plenty of natural light and views of the city.

Apartments also include a comfortable seating area with sofa and flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen and a private bathroom.

Guests have free access to an outdoor pool located in Paseo de Gracia Boulevard, 300 metres away.

Set in Barcelona’s main shopping district, the apartments are well connected by public transport to all main tourist attractions in Barcelona. Apartments are situated 10 minutes’ walk from both the Plaza Catalunya Square and the Ramblas.

Name: Inside Barcelona Apartments Salva
Description:
These modern, fully-equipped apartments with free Wi-Fi are located in a quiet neighbourhood near Montjuïc Hill and the lively Poble Sec neighbourhood. Barcelona’s ferry terminal is just 5 minutes’ drive away.

There are several bars, restaurants and shops within 5 minutes’ walk of the apartments. Mercat Sant Antoni Food Market is about 10 minute’s walk away.

The apartments are about 15 minutes’ walk from the city’s famous Ramblas. Parallel Metro Station is about 5 minutes’ walk away and services line 3, which will take visitors to Plaza Catalunya and Plaza Espanya.

Name: Acta CITY47
Description:
Acta CITY47 is 5 minutes’ walk from Barcelona Sants Train Station and 15 minutes from the Fira Exhibition Centre. It offers a 24-hour reception and air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi.

The rooms at Acta CITY47 feature simple, modern décor and a private bathroom. Each one comes with a TV, free safe, and a work desk. Guests have free access to an ironing room open 24 hours.

The hotel’s modern Nass City restaurant serves international food and a gluten-free breakfast is available on prior request. There is also a bar where you can get a snack or a drink.

The Acta CITY47 is 20 minutes’ walk from Barcelona FC’s Camp Nou Stadium. Sants Metro Station connects you with the centre of Barcelona in 15 minutes.

Name: Hotel Concordia Barcelona
Description:
Hotel Concordia Barcelona is situated 800 metres from Plaza España and the Fira de Barcelona Exhibition Centre. It features a sun terrace with an outdoor swimming pool, cocktail bar in the summer and solarium.

The Hotel Concordia Barcelona’s bright, spacious rooms feature contemporary décor and air conditioning.  Each room includes free WiFi, a flat-screen TV, safe, minibar and a private bathroom with a range of amenities.

The Concordia Barcelona’s modern, elegant  Bistro Triple Sec Restaurant serves typical Mediterranean cuisine. The varied breakfast buffet includes healthy options. There is also a café and cocktail bar open daily. Private parking is available on site for an extra cost and electrical cars charging station is available.

Located next to Poble Sec Station, the hotel is a 5-minute Metro journey from Barcelona Port and La Rambla. You can also walk to the Rambla in 15 minutes. Direct airport buses stop in Plaza España, a 15-minute walk away.

Private parking is available on site for an extra cost.

Name: Spectacular Five Senses Mallorca Apartment
Description:
Set in Barcelona, 1.1 km from Passeig de Gracia and 1.6 km from Plaça Catalunya, Spectacular Five Senses Mallorca Apartment offers air conditioning. It is located 1.5 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and offers a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Casa Batllo is 1.2 km away.

The spacious apartment is fitted with 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a patio with inner courtyard views. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Sants Railway Station, Tivoli Theatre and La Pedrera. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km from the property, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: Niu Barcelona Hotel
Description:
Located 600 metres from Plaza Reial in Barcelona, Niu Barcelona Hotel features an outdoor pool on the rooftop. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property

Every room at this hotel comes with a flat-screen TV; while the private bathrooms come with shower and hairdryer. Rooms are air-conditioned in summer and heated in winter.

There is a 24-hour front desk at the property. Guests benefit from a complimentary bottle of water upon arrival.
