Portal de l'Angel is 800 metres from Niu Barcelona Hotel, while Plaça Catalunya is 900 metres from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 12 km from Niu Barcelona Hotel.

Name: La Casa de Antonio Boutique Rooms
Description:
Featuring free WiFi, La Casa de Antonio Boutique Rooms is located in Barcelona. This guest house is set a 7-minute walk from Plaza Catalunya and 94 metres from Universitat Metro Station.

This guest house has a Modernist décor and offers air-conditioned rooms in the centre of Barcelona. Each room comes with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and tiled floors, and the private bathroom includes a bath or shower, hairdryer, and free toiletries.

There is a tour desk available to all guests, and the property can arrange a shuttle to the airport for an extra charge.

You can find several restaurants, bars, and a grocery shop within a 5-minute walk of La Casa de Antonio Boutique Rooms. Plaza Espanya and the famous Montjuic Fountain are 2 metro stops from the property, and Gaudi’s Sagrada Familia is 2.7 km away.

Name: Cosmopolitan Boutique Rambla
Description:
Located in Barcelona’s Eixample district, Cosmopolitan Boutique Rambla is only 200 metres from Gaudi’s famous La Pedrera. This guest house offers rooms with free WiFi.

Rooms at the Cosmopolitan Boutique Rambla have typical tiled floors and high ceilings. All rooms have heating, TV, and private bathroom. Some have a balcony with city views.

Cosmopolitan Boutique Rambla is set on Rambla Catalunya, a tree-lined avenue full of shops, cafés and tapas bars.

Passeig de Gracia is 100 metres away, and Diagonal Metro Station is within 50 metres. Las Ramblas, Sagrada Familia and Camp Nou Stadium are all just a few stops away by Metro.

Name: Sunotel Club Central
Description:
Featuring an outdoor swimming pool and hot tub on its terrace, Sunotel Club Central is set in Barcelona’s elegant Eixample neighbourhood.

Each modern air-conditioned room has free, high-speed WiFi, a TV and a minibar. The private bathroom includes a bath, shower and hairdryer.

Sunotel Club Central features a cosy bar, serving snacks and drinks. There is also room service available. The hotel has a 24-hour reception, and free bicycles are available upon request and subject to availability.

Passeig de Gracia, with its Gaudi monuments and designer shops, is a 10-minute walk from Sunotel Club Central. The famous Las Ramblas Boulevard and Plaza Catalunya are a 15-minute walk from the hotel. Barcelona Airport is 15 km away, and you can catch an airport bus in Plaza Catalunya.

Name: Cozy yacht lodge in Barcelona with boat tour option
Description:
Cozy yacht lodge in Barcelona with boat tour option features a patio and is set in Barcelona, within just 500 metres of Forum Beach and 1.5 km of Platja del Litoral. Featuring full-day security, this property also provides guests with a casino. Free WiFi is available and private parking can be arranged at an extra charge.

Featuring garden and city views, this boat offers 2 bedrooms and opens to a balcony. Offering a terrace with sea views, this boat also has a well-equipped kitchen with an oven, a microwave and a fridge, as well as 1 bathroom with a shower. The property has an outdoor dining area.

A restaurant and snack bar can be found on-site.

Llevant is 1.7 km from the boat, while Platja de la Mora is 2.1 km away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 19 km from the property.

Name: 360 Hostel Borne
Description:
Centrally located 360 Hostel Borne is 5 minutes from Arco de Triunfo and its metro station. It offers free Wi-Fi and each room has air-conditioning and heating.

The hostel features a shared kitchen with stove, oven, fridge and microwave. There is laundry service and luggage storage upon request. A computer room can be accessed 24 hours.

Around the hostel there are a variety of restaurants and bars. Shopping area Passeig de Gràcia is a 10-minute walk from the hostel.

Hostel Barcelona Arts & Culture is just 750 meters from Placa de Catalunya. Within 10 minutes’ walk, travelers can reach Las Ramblas, Gothic and Born neighborhoods.

We offer a variety of activities that allow you to meet other travelers such as beach volleyball and the free dinners we offer every night.

Name: Sweett - Avenida Roma
Description:
Situated within 1.5 km of Plaça Catalunya and 1.5 km of Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Sweett - Avenida Roma features rooms with air conditioning and a private bathroom in Barcelona. There is a private entrance at the apartment for the convenience of those who stay. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Casa Batllo is 1.2 km away.

Each unit features a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, a seating area, a TV, a washing machine, and a private bathroom with bidet and free toiletries. An oven, a microwave and toaster are also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, each unit has bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Sants Railway Station, Tivoli Theatre and La Pedrera. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km from the property.

Name: Amazing patio views with private terrace
Description:
In a central area of Barcelona, located within a short distance of Passeig de Gracia and Palau de la Musica Catalana, Amazing patio views with private terrace offers free WiFi, air conditioning and household amenities such as a fridge and coffee machine. With inner courtyard views, this accommodation provides a balcony. The property has a lift, a family-friendly restaurant with an outdoor dining area.

The spacious apartment with a terrace and city views features 1 bedroom, 2 living rooms, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a microwave and a toaster, and 1 bathroom with a walk-in shower. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Sightseeing tours are available in the area. A bicycle rental service is available at the apartment.

Popular points of interest near Amazing patio views with private terrace include Tivoli Theatre, Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and Cathedral of Barcelona. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km away.

Name: AC Hotel Barcelona Fórum by Marriott
Description:
AC Hotel Barcelona Forum is located opposite Diagonal Mar Shopping Centre, at the end of Avenida Diagonal. It offers a rooftop pool and modern rooms with Mediterranean Sea views. Free WiFi is available in all areas.

All stylish rooms come with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, and minibar. The private bathrooms have a hairdryer.

The Suite Bar offers healthy Mediterranean food, including tapas and bluefin tuna. Room service is available 24 hours a day, and there is a safe in reception.

AC Hotel Barcelona Forum is 500 metres from Maresme Metro Station. From here you can reach Passeig de Gràcia in central Barcelona in 15 minutes. Barcelona Airport is 19 km away.

Name: Central Apartment
Description:
Set in the Ciutat Vella district in Barcelona, this apartment is 600 metres from Plaza Reial. The apartment is a 6-minute walk from Plaça Catalunya and from Las Ramblas. Free WiFi is provided throughout the property.

There is a seating area and a fully equipped kitchen fitted with an oven, a washing machine, a dishwasher, and a coffee machine. Air conditioning is available in all rooms. Towels and bed linen are featured in this apartment.

La Seu, Cathedral of Barcelona is 900 metres from Central Apartment, while Portal de l'Angel is 900 metres away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 12 km from the property.

Name: Exquisite and Modern Paradise w Private Terrace and City Center
Description:
Right in the heart of Barcelona, situated within a short distance of Casa Batllo and Passeig de Gracia, Exquisite and Modern Paradise w Private Terrace and City Center offers free WiFi, air conditioning and household amenities such as kitchenware and kettle. Guests staying at this apartment have access to a patio. The property is non-smoking and is located 1.2 km from Plaça Catalunya.

The spacious apartment features 3 bedrooms, a TV and a fully equipped kitchen that provides guests with a dishwasher, a microwave, a washing machine, a fridge and a stovetop. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Guests can relax in the garden at the property.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Tivoli Theatre and La Pedrera. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km from the property.

Name: Autèntic Eixample Barcelona
Description:
Located in central Barcelona, just 400 metres from Universitat Metro Station, Autèntic Eixample Barcelona apartments offer free WiFi and air conditioning and some have a private terrace.

Featuring wooden floors, the apartments come with 1 or 3 bedrooms and 1 bathroom. The living area has a flat-screen TV, sofa and radio and the kitchens are equipped with an oven, microwave and dishwasher.

You will find many bars and restaurants in the surrounding streets. Plaza Catalunya, with direct buses to Barcelona El Prat Airport is 10 minutes’ walk away and Gaudi´s Sagrada Familia is 14 minutes’ metro ride away.

Name: Tendency Apartments 6
Description:
Situated in central Barcelona, a 2-minute walk from Girona Metro Station, Tendency Apartments 6 offers accommodation with free Wi-Fi, air conditioning, and heating. Sagrada Familia Cathedral is a 17-minute walk away.

All apartments have a living area with a flat-screen TV, DVD player, and dining table. The private kitchen is equipped with a hob, microwave, and fridge. Kitchenware is provided in all apartments and some of them have a washing machine and dishwasher.

The apartments include modern furnishings and many of them have a small balcony with views of the city. Each apartment has a private bathroom with a bathtub or a shower, and towels and bed linen are provided. A cot is available upon request.

There are bars and restaurant within a 10-minute walk of the apartments, and a 24-hour grocery shop is just around the corner. Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard, famous for its high-end boutiques and Gaudì’s buildings, can be reached in 7 minutes on foot.

Name: Lodging Apartments Almirall Beach B2
Description:
Located in Barcelona, 300 metres from Barceloneta Beach and 400 metres from Somorrostro Beach, Lodging Apartments Almirall Beach B2 offers free WiFi and air conditioning. This property is set a short distance from attractions such as Plaça Reial, Palau de la Musica Catalana, and Cathedral of Barcelona. The property is non-smoking and is situated 400 metres from Sant Miquel Beach.

The apartment is equipped with 1 bedroom, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a hair dryer and free toiletries. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment.

Popular points of interest near Lodging Apartments Almirall Beach B2 include Santa Maria del Mar, Picasso Museum and Port Olimpic. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 14 km away.

Name: Enjoybcn Fira Apartment
Description:
Situated in Barcelona, 700 metres from Sants Railway Station and 1.8 km from Magic Fountain of Montjuic, Enjoybcn Fira Apartment offers air conditioning. Among the facilities at this property are a lift and a concierge service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Staff on-site can arrange a shuttle service.

The spacious apartment has 3 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a washing machine, and 2 bathrooms with a shower. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. This apartment is non-smoking and soundproof.

Sightseeing tours are available within a reachable distance of the property.

Casa Batllo is 2.4 km from the apartment, while Passeig de Gracia is 2.8 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km away.

Name: Hostal Lausanne
Description:
Hostal Lausanne is on Barcelona’s popular shopping street, Portal de l’Angel. It is a 2-minute walk from the Rambla and Plaza Catalunya Metro Station, and offers a free Wi-Fi zone.

Rooms at the Hostal Lausanne are simple and functional. There is a choice between rooms with a private or shared bathroom, and some have a sink.

The sightseeing bus stops in nearby Plaza Catalunya. The Gothic Quarter and Paseo de Gracia Avenue are within a 5-minute walk.

Bicycle and car rental are available, and the Lausanne has a 24-hour front desk.

Name: Wilson Boutique Hotel
Description:
Wilson Boutique Hotel is situated on Barcelona’s Avinguda Diagonal, 12 minutes’ walk from La Pedrera in Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard. It offers free Wi-Fi, stylish décor and a rooftop terrace with impressive city views.

The Wilson Boutique Hotel has soundproofed rooms with chic, contemporary design. All rooms are bright with large windows. Each has a flat-screen TV and air conditioning.

The hotel is within walking distance of Plaza de Catalunya which features a range of shops and restaurants.

The Wilson Boutique has excellent transport links. Many buses, including the sightseeing bus, stop opposite the hotel.

The hotel offers free use of the PC and printer in the lobby. There is also a tour desk, where guests can receive information on Barcelona’s tourist attractions, including Gaudí’s Casa Batlló which is around 20 minutes’ walk from the Wilson. Diagonal Metro Station is 750 metres away.

Name: Bed&Bcn Sant Andreu
Description:
Bed&Bcn Sant Andreu is set in the Sant Andreu district of Barcelona, 4.7 km from Sagrada Familia, 6.2 km from Passeig de Gracia and 6.3 km from La Pedrera. Among the facilities at this property are a lift and a shared kitchen, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The apartment also offers facilities for disabled guests.

The spacious apartment has 3 bedrooms, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a TV, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a balcony with city views. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Casa Batllo is 6.3 km from the apartment, while Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 6.8 km away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 19 km from the property, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: Wonderful 2-bd apart with balcony Plaza Cataluña
Description:
Featuring air-conditioned accommodation with a patio, Wonderful 2-bd apart with balcony Plaza Cataluña is set in Barcelona. It is situated 2.6 km from Sant Miquel Beach and features a lift. The property is 200 metres from the city centre and 2.6 km from Somorrostro Beach.

With free WiFi, this 2-bedroom apartment offers a TV, a washing machine and a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and oven. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Passeig de Gracia, Tivoli Theatre and Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km away.

Name: Perfectly located 4bed 4bath apartment in Barcelona 1 2
Description:
Situated in Barcelona, 700 metres from Casa Batllo, 1.2 km from Plaça Catalunya and 1 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Perfectly located 4bed 4bath apartment in Barcelona 1 2 features accommodation with a patio and free WiFi. It is located 1.3 km from Tivoli Theatre and provides a lift. The property is 700 metres from Passeig de Gracia, and within 1.1 km of the city centre.

The spacious apartment has 4 bedrooms, a TV and a fully equipped kitchen that provides guests with a dishwasher, an oven, a washing machine, a microwave and a fridge. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include La Pedrera, Portal de l'Angel and Boqueria Market. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km from the property.

Name: BacHome Terrace B&B
Description:
BacHome Terrace B&B is located in central Barcelona, 500 metres from Plaza Catalunya and Passeig de Gràcia. This modern bed and breakfast has a spacious decked terrace with sofas and offers free coffee and tea 24h.

The air-conditioned rooms at BacHome Terrace B&B feature modern décor and free WiFi. Each one comes with a desk, a private bathroom and views of the street or the terrace area. Their bathrooms include a hairdryer and free toiletries.

BacHome Terrace B&B. Located 500 metres away, Portal de l’Àngel Street is full of shops, and there are numerous charming cafes and restaurants in the Gothic Quarter, 5 minutes’ walk away. The beautiful Palau de la Música Auditorium is also 400 metres away.

Located 150 metres away, Urquinaona Metro Station connects you with the rest of the city with ease. Airport buses leave from Plaza Catalunya, 7 minutes’ walk away.

Name: Ola Living MACBA
Description:
Centrally located in Barcelona’s Raval District, just 300 metres from Universitat Metro Station, Ola Living MACBA offers modern accommodation with free WiFi and a balcony. Plaza Catalunya is 8 minutes’ walk away.

These apartments feature exposed brick walls and some come with vaulted ceilings or exposed wooden beams. They come with a kitchenette equipped with a dishwasher, oven and coffee machine. Their living areas include a flat-screen TV with cable channels, DVD player and sofa.

You will find bars, restaurants and supermarkets in the surrounding streets.

Sant Antoni is a 5-minute walk away and Barceloneta Beach is 2.5 km from the property. Sagrada Familia is 10 minutes’ metro ride from Ola Living MACBA and Barcelona Airport is 15 km away.

Name: Ferienwohnung für 2 Personen ca 38 qm in Barcelona-Gràcia, Costa Brava Costa del Maresme
Description:
Ferienwohnung für 2 Personen ca 38 qm in Barcelona-Gràcia, Costa Brava Costa del Maresme features a balcony and is set in Barcelona, within just 200 metres of Passeig de Gracia and 400 metres of La Pedrera. The property is close to several well-known attractions, 1.9 km from Palau de la Musica Catalana, 1.7 km from Plaça Catalunya and 1.6 km from Sagrada Familia. Portal de l'Angel is 1.8 km away and Park Güell is 3.6 km from the apartment.

With free WiFi, this apartment offers a TV, a washing machine and a fully equipped kitchenette with an oven and microwave.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Casa Batllo, Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and Tivoli Theatre. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 14 km away.

Name: Safestay Barcelona Passeig de Gràcia
Description:
Safestay Barcelona Passeig de Gràcia is located on Barcelona’s Passeig de Gràcia, 500 metres from Plaça de Catalunya. This well-equipped hostel offers breakfast and free WiFi in common areas

The dorms and rooms are spacious and air-conditioned. Bottom linen and pillow cases are provided and lockers are available.

Facilities include bar, common room and terrace. Guests can make use of the hostel’s tour desk and towel hire.

Safestay Barcelona Passeig de Gràcia is located within a few minutes’ walk of Gaudí’s Casa Batlló and La Pedrera. There are several restaurants, bars and shops on Passeig de Gràcia and in the surrounding area.

Passeig de Gràcia Metro station is less than 300 metres from the hostel and the famous Las Ramblas is a 10-minute walk away.

Name: Comfortable apartment, 3 bedrooms with AC Camp Nou
Description:
Featuring air-conditioned accommodation with a patio, Comfortable apartment, 3 bedrooms with AC Camp Nou is located in Barcelona. Among the facilities at this property are a lift and private check-in and check-out, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is non-smoking and is set 1.9 km from Camp Nou.

The spacious apartment features 3 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a bath. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment.

Sightseeing tours are available in the surroundings.

Sants Railway Station is 1.2 km from the apartment, while Magic Fountain of Montjuic is 2.9 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 11 km from Comfortable apartment, 3 bedrooms with AC Camp Nou.

Name: Aspasios Urquinaona Apartments
Description:
Aspasios Urquinaona Apartments is in a quiet area of Barcelona’s Eixample district, only 5 minutes' walk from Plaza Catalunya and Arc de Triomf. Each bright apartment has free Wi-Fi.

The Urquinaona Design Apartments have elegant, modern design. They are air-conditioned and bright, with an open-plan living area with flat-screen TV and kitchen.

The kitchen includes an oven, a Nespresso coffee maker and a juicer. There is also a dishwasher, a washing machine and a tumble dryer.

All apartments have access to the furnished roof terrace.

The apartments are just a short walk from the historic city centre. Ciutadella Park, the Cathedral and the Picasso Museum are all nearby. Urquinaona Metro Station is only 300 metres away.

Name: InterContinental Barcelona, an IHG Hotel
Description:
Situated 200 metres from Barcelona’s Magic Fountain, the elegant InterContinental Barcelona, an IHG Hotel offers spacious rooms with a flat-screen TV and hydromassage shower.

Offering fantastic views over Barcelona, the hotel’s 173 Rooftop Terrace features an outdoor pool, sun loungers, and a dining area where guests can enjoy Mediterranean cuisine and a selection of drinks and cocktails.

Arrel Restaurant pays homage to the land and the produce it provides throughout all seasons of the year. The restaurant features an open kitchen serving small portions to share, buffet breakfasts and lunch and dinner service.

Quirat Restaurant is an exclusive space that will offer an interpretation of the land and its products through a menu of dishes that responds to the different seasons, designed exclusively for the restaurant by a Chef with 1 Michelin Star. Enjoy an unforgettable dinner in the most exclusive of our restaurants.

Gebre Cocktails and More and, in addition to the cocktail classics, it will offer a menu of artisan signature cocktails that will try to convey a very specific sensory experience connected to the world of the land that surrounds us.

There is free WiFi available in public areas and in rooms and the lobby area at InterContinental Barcelona, an IHG Hotel features a free internet point.

The spa has a water circuit, a dry sauna, a hammam, hot tub, gym, and 6 treatment cabins.

From the hotel, Barcelona’s historic centre can be easily reached by bus or metro. Poble Sec and Espanya Metro Stations are both 500 metres away. Poble Espanyol and the Joan Miró Foundation are 200 metres away.

Name: ApartEasy - Private Terrace, 3-Bedroom Apartment
Description:
ApartEasy - Private Terrace, 3-Bedroom Apartment has a terrace and is situated in Barcelona, within just 700 metres of Sants Railway Station and 1.8 km of Magic Fountain of Montjuic. Guests staying at this apartment have access to a balcony. Free WiFi is available and private parking can be arranged at an extra charge.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 3 bedrooms, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. The property has an outdoor dining area.

Passeig de Gracia is 3.1 km from the apartment, while Casa Batllo is 3.1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 11 km from ApartEasy - Private Terrace, 3-Bedroom Apartment.

Name: Room Mate Anna
Description:
Featuring a seasonal rooftop plunge pool with views and a solarium, Room Mate Anna is set in Barcelona City Centre. The hotel features cutting-edge and modern design as well as personalized service. The hotel serves a daily hot and cold buffet breakfast until midday.

Each stylish, air-conditioned room comes with free WiFi and a flat-screen TV. Some rooms have a seating area to relax in after a busy day as well as a balcony with views over Casa Batlló. Extras include a wide variety of free toiletries, a hairdryer and safe box.

Other facilities include a portable WiFi and meeting and conference rooms.

On the eigth floor of the hotel the bar Terraza de Anna by Vida Mona offers views over the city, cocktails and mediterranean tapas.
 The restaurant Vibra Speakeasy, inspired by the style of 1920, offers live music, food and cocktails from that time.

The Room Mate Anna is set in the heart of L'Eixample, just 100 metres from Casa Batlló. You will find a wide range of shops, restaurants, and cultural spots. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km from the property.

Name: Cozy and bright 3BD apartment by Gran Via
Description:
Located in Barcelona, less than 1 km from Magic Fountain of Montjuic and 1.8 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Cozy and bright 3BD apartment by Gran Via provides air-conditioned accommodation with a patio and free WiFi. It is situated 1.6 km from Sants Railway Station and offers a lift. The property is non-smoking and is set 1.9 km from Tivoli Theatre.

The apartment features 3 bedrooms, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a washing machine and 2 bathrooms with a hair dryer. A TV is provided. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Dining options are available close to Cozy and bright 3BD apartment by Gran Via.

Plaça Catalunya is 1.7 km from the accommodation, while Portal de l'Angel is 2.2 km away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 11 km from the property.

Name: BBarcelona Clot Apartments
Description:
Located in Barcelona, BBarcelona Clot Apartments is a recently renovated accommodation, 3 km from Mar Bella Beach and 1.3 km from Sagrada Familia. The air-conditioned accommodation is 2.8 km from La Pedrera. The apartment features family rooms.

With a private bathroom, units at the apartment complex also offer free WiFi, while some rooms are equipped with a balcony.

Casa Batllo is 3.1 km from the apartment, while Passeig de Gracia is 3.4 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat, 16 km from BBarcelona Clot Apartments, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: Ferienwohnung für 4 Personen ca 75 qm in Barcelona-Eixample, Costa Brava Costa del Maresme
Description:
Ferienwohnung für 4 Personen ca 75 qm in Barcelona-Eixample, Costa Brava Costa del Maresme features a terrace and is set in Barcelona, within just 700 metres of Sagrada Familia and 1.5 km of Casa Batllo. This property is situated a short distance from attractions such as Passeig de Gracia, Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, and Plaça Catalunya. Nova Icaria Beach is 2.7 km from the apartment and Somorrostro Beach is 2.8 km away.

With free WiFi, this apartment offers a TV, a washing machine and a fully equipped kitchenette with a dishwasher and oven.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include La Pedrera, Palau de la Musica Catalana and Tivoli Theatre. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 15 km away.

Name: Hotel Neri – Relais & Chateaux
Description:
This chic, exclusive hotel is set in an 18th-century aristocratic house overlooking a secluded square in the heart of the Gothic Quarter. Its contemporary style contrasts with the impressive historic surroundings.

Set right beside the city’s Cathedral, the Hotel Neri lies just a short distance from the bustling Las Ramblas. The building’s original period charm has been preserved and enhanced by the hotel’s sophisticated interior design. This design blends with relaxing music and sensual aromas to create a unique setting in this ancient, atmospheric area of central Barcelona.

Dine on delicious specialities in the hotel restaurant or enjoy a drink at the terrace bar. You can also spend a relaxing moment in the tranquil library or on the pretty rooftop garden terrace.

Hotel Neri Relais & Châteaux preserves its impressive façade to Sant Felip Neri square as well as a 17th-century stone wall, which separates the lounge bar area of the restaurant. It has the status of Specialty Monument.

Hotel Neri also offers apartments housed in a restored classic building located few metres away. Please see the individual apartment description for more details.

Name: Hotel Market
Description:
Hotel Market is located next to Barcelona’s San Antonio Market, 10 minutes' walk from MACBA Gallery. Its chic rooms have rain showers and free Wi-Fi, and there is a popular restaurant.

The Market Hotel’s modern rooms have dark wood beams, white walls and large windows. Each one has a private bathroom. Some rooms have a balcony or terrace.

The hotel is 15 minutes’ walk from both Plaza Espanya and Plaza Catalunya. Sant Antoni Metro Station is about 200 metres away, and an airport shuttle bus stop can be found 2 minutes’ away.

The Market Hotel’s elegant restaurant offers a range of modern Catalan dishes, and specializes in rice.

Name: Hostal Goya
Description:
Hostal Goya has an ideal setting, 5 minutes’ walk from Plaza de Catalunya and Las Ramblas. It features stylish rooms and apartments with free Wi-Fi access.

The Goya offers comfortable accommodation with contemporary décor and wooden floors. Each room has air conditioning and heating. Some rooms also have a balcony.

Apartments are bright and feature chic design. Each has a kitchen, dining area and a spacious living room with a balcony.

Hostal Goya has a lounge with a computer which has internet access, as well as free tea and coffee making facilities.

The guest house is 200 metres from Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard, where there are a range of shops, cafés and restaurants. Gaudí’s Casa Batlló and La Pedrera are within 15 minutes’ walk of the property.

Name: Stay U-nique Apartments Passeig de Gracia II
Description:
In the Eixample district of Barcelona, close to Passeig de Gracia, Stay U-nique Apartments Passeig de Gracia II features free WiFi and a washing machine. It is located 400 metres from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and provides a lift. The property is 100 metres from Casa Batllo, and within 800 metres of the city centre.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 1 bedroom, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a bidet and a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Tivoli Theatre, La Pedrera and Plaça Catalunya. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from Stay U-nique Apartments Passeig de Gracia II.

Name: Romantic apartment for couples with Jacuzzi
Description:
Romantic apartment for couples with Jacuzzi is set in the Horta-Guinardó district of Barcelona, 1.1 km from Park Güell, 3.1 km from Passeig de Gracia and 3.2 km from La Pedrera. It is located 1.9 km from Sagrada Familia and provides a lift. Providing free WiFi throughout the property, the non-smoking apartment features a hot tub.

The apartment is composed of 1 separate bedroom, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen, and 1 bathroom.

Casa Batllo is 3.7 km from the apartment, while Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 4.2 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 16 km away, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: Tendency Apartments Sagrada Familia Penthouse
Description:
Set in Barcelona, 700 metres from Sagrada Familia and 1.7 km from Passeig de Gracia, Tendency Apartments Sagrada Familia Penthouse offers air-conditioned accommodation with a terrace and free WiFi. This apartment provides accommodation with a balcony. The property is non-smoking and is located 1.9 km from La Pedrera.

The spacious apartment is fitted with 3 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV and a fully equipped kitchen that provides guests with a dishwasher, an oven, a washing machine, a microwave and a fridge. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment.

Casa Batllo is 2.4 km from the apartment, while Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 2.9 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from Tendency Apartments Sagrada Familia Penthouse.

Name: Tendency Apartments 12 Penthouse
Description:
Situated in Barcelona in the Catalonia region, Tendency Apartments 12 Penthouse has a terrace. This apartment features accommodation with a balcony. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Sants Railway Station is 600 metres away.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 3 bedrooms, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a coffee machine, and 2 bathrooms with a bath and a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. The property has an outdoor dining area.

Dining options are available close to the apartment.

Magic Fountain of Montjuic is 1.3 km from Tendency Apartments 12 Penthouse, while Casa Batllo is 2.5 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 11 km from the accommodation.

Name: Penthouse with terrace in Poblenou
Description:
Penthouse with terrace in Poblenou is located in the Sant Martí district of Barcelona, 1.4 km from Mar Bella Beach, 1.6 km from Nova Mar Bella Beach and 1.6 km from Bogatell Beach. Among the facilities at this property are a lift and private check-in and check-out, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The apartment also offers facilities for disabled guests.

The spacious apartment is equipped with 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a terrace with city views. The air-conditioned unit at the property features a bidet and a dressing room. This apartment is allergy-free and non-smoking.

Sightseeing tours are available in the vicinity.

Sagrada Familia is 2.9 km from the apartment, while Port Olimpic is 3.2 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 16 km away, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: The MO House
Description:
Located in Barcelona, 2.3 km from Somorrostro Beach, The MO House provides express check-in and check-out and free WiFi throughout the property. Popular points of interest nearby include Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Cathedral of Barcelona and Plaça Catalunya. The property is 800 metres from the city centre and 2.3 km from Barceloneta Beach.

All rooms in the hotel are fitted with a kettle. Complete with a private bathroom equipped with a shower and free toiletries, guest rooms at The MO House have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and some rooms are equipped with a balcony. The rooms will provide guests with a wardrobe and a coffee machine.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Passeig de Gracia, Palau de la Musica Catalana and Tivoli Theatre. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km away, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: Historic apartment with private terrace in Example
Description:
Set in Barcelona, 1.3 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and 1.5 km from Tivoli Theatre, Historic apartment with private terrace in Example offers air-conditioned accommodation with a patio and free WiFi. It is located 1.5 km from Casa Batllo and features a lift. The property is non-smoking and is situated 1.6 km from Magic Fountain of Montjuic.

The apartment features 2 bedrooms, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a washing machine and 1 bathroom with a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Popular points of interest near Historic apartment with private terrace in Example include Passeig de Gracia, Sants Railway Station and Plaça Catalunya. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km away.

Name: Eco Boutique Hostal Grau
Description:
This family-run hotel is within 200 metres of Las Ramblas and Plaza Catalunya. All rooms are made of natural, organic materials and painted with PVC-free paint.
All rooms at Hostal Grau have a private bathroom with free toiletries made from natural sources such as lavender. Some rooms have a balcony; while others face a vertical garden.
The whole building features energy efficient lighting and a water recycling system, as well as using renewable or clean energy.
Free natural teas and infusions, are available from the on-site lounge.
The MACBA Modern Art Museum is just 350 metres from the guest house, and Port Vell Harbour is a 15-minute walk away. Direct buses to Barcelona Airport stop in nearby Plaza Universitat.

Name: AB Passeig de Gràcia Plaça Catalunya II
Description:
In the Eixample district of Barcelona, close to Passeig de Gracia, AB Passeig de Gràcia Plaça Catalunya II has free WiFi and a washing machine. It is set 500 metres from Tivoli Theatre and offers a lift. The property is 200 metres from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, and within 500 metres of the city centre.

The spacious apartment has 1 separate bedroom, 1 bathroom, a fully equipped kitchen with a dining area and dishwasher, and a living room with a TV. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Plaça Catalunya, Casa Batllo and Portal de l'Angel. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km from the property.

Name: Stay U-nique Apartments Sant Eudald II
Description:
Located in Barcelona, 1.3 km from Park Güell and 3.1 km from Passeig de Gracia, Stay U-nique Apartments Sant Eudald II provides air-conditioned accommodation with a terrace and free WiFi. It is set 3.5 km from Casa Batllo and features a lift. The property is non-smoking and is situated 3.3 km from La Pedrera.

The spacious apartment features 2 bedrooms, a TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a washing machine, and 2 bathrooms with a bath. Guests can take in the ambience of the surroundings from an outdoor dining area.

Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 4 km from the apartment, while Tivoli Theatre is 4.1 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 16 km from Stay U-nique Apartments Sant Eudald II.

Name: Stay U-nique Apartments Sant Antoni
Description:
Stay U-nique Apartments Sant Antoni has a balcony and is situated in Barcelona, within just 1.4 km of Plaça Catalunya and 1.6 km of Portal de l'Angel. It is located 1.6 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and features a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Passeig de Gracia is 1.5 km away.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 4 bedrooms, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a coffee machine, and 2 bathrooms with a bidet and a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Tivoli Theatre, Boqueria Market and Magic Fountain of Montjuic. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 12 km from Stay U-nique Apartments Sant Antoni.

Name: Bright and modern 3BD in Eixample
Description:
In the heart of Barcelona, set within a short distance of Casa Batllo and Passeig de Gracia, Bright and modern 3BD in Eixample offers free WiFi, air conditioning and household amenities such as kitchenware and kettle. Guests staying at this apartment have access to a patio. The property is non-smoking and is situated 1.4 km from Plaça Catalunya.

The spacious apartment is fitted with 4 bedrooms, a TV and a fully equipped kitchen that provides guests with an oven, a microwave, a washing machine, a fridge and a stovetop. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Tivoli Theatre and La Pedrera. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km away.

Name: Gran Via modern and bright 3BD with terrace
Description:
Situated in Barcelona, 1.3 km from Magic Fountain of Montjuic and 1.7 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Gran Via modern and bright 3BD with terrace features air-conditioned accommodation with a patio and free WiFi. It is set 1.8 km from Passeig de Gracia and provides a lift. The property is non-smoking and is located 1.8 km from Tivoli Theatre.

The spacious apartment features 3 bedrooms, a TV and a fully equipped kitchen that provides guests with a dishwasher, an oven, a washing machine, a microwave and a fridge. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Guests can relax in the garden at the property.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Sants Railway Station, Plaça Catalunya and Portal de l'Angel. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 11 km from the property.

Name: Acevi Villarroel
Description:
Acevi Villarroel offers free high-speed Wi-Fi, a spa and a rooftop pool, open in summer. Located 400 metres from Urgell Metro Station, it is a 15-minute walk from Barcelona’s Plaza Catalunya.

Rooms at the Acevi have elegant décor and hardwood floors. All have a satellite TV.

Hotel Acevi Villarroel’s spa is available free of charge. It includes a steam bath, sauna, Hammam and gym. Massages are available on request. You can also relax on a lounger on the sun terrace.

Acevi Villarroel is within a 10-minute walk of Barcelona University and the lively Raval district. Hospital Clinic Metro Station is 600 metres away, and offers direct access to the Sagrada Familia and FC Barcelona’s Camp Nou Stadium.

Name: Monument Hotel
Description:
Located on the fashionable Paseo de Gracia, within 5 minutes’ walk from both Gaudi’s masterpieces Casa Battló and La Pedrera, Monument Hotel offers luxury services including a gourmet restaurant and a spa.

Elegantly decorated, all soundproofed rooms have a flat-screen TV with pay-per-view channels, Bluetooth sound system, and a safe deposit box with plug for charging laptop devices. Most of the room types have a private bathroom with a free-standing bath, velour bathrobe and luxury toiletries. Most of the rooms have a balcony with city views.

The 3 Michelin-starred restaurant, Lasarte, offers a range of options designed by the chef Martin Berasategui; while the on-site bistro-style restaurant, Oria, serves fresh cuisine following the Mediterranean gastronomy.

Monument Hotel is a 10-minute walk from Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas; regular trains to Barcelona El Prat Airport leave from Paseo de Gracia Train Station, located 300 metres away. Free high-speed WiFi is provided.

The hotel is housed on Enric Batllo’s house, an architectural jewel of 19th century that constitutes one of the characteristic works of the Eixample Quadrat d'Or and which gives it the Specialty Monument status.

Name: 4- Bedroom Apartment in Gracia Village
Description:
Set in Barcelona, 2.6 km from Passeig de Gracia and 2.6 km from La Pedrera, 4- Bedroom Apartment in Gracia Village offers air conditioning. The property is around 3.1 km from Casa Batllo, 3.1 km from Park Güell and 3.6 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Sagrada Familia is less than 1 km away.

The spacious apartment is fitted with 4 bedrooms, a TV and a fully equipped kitchen that provides guests with an oven, a microwave, a washing machine, a fridge and a stovetop. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Tivoli Theatre is 3.7 km from the apartment, while Palau de la Musica Catalana is 3.9 km away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 16 km from the property.

Name: Hotel Barcelona Universal
Description:
Barcelona Universal offers free Wi-Fi, a gym and a rooftop pool with city ciews. Situated next to next to Parallel Metro Station, the hotel is just 600 metres from Las Ramblas.

The spacious, functional rooms at the Barcelona Universal Hotel feature wooden floors and air conditioning. Bathrooms include toiletries and heated towel rails.

The Barcelona Universal’s Medea serves a hot and cold buffet breakfast, including plenty of healthy options.

The hotel is situated a 20-minute walk from the Magic Fountain and MNAC Art Museum, in Montjuïc. Plaça Catalunya is just 3 Metro stops away, and the lively bars of the Raval district are just 500 metres away.

Name: 022 Center Barca 1,1
Description:
Set in the centre of Barcelona, 2 km from Barceloneta Beach and 2 km from Somorrostro Beach, 022 Center Barca 1,1 offers free WiFi and air conditioning. The property is situated less than 1 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, a 6-minute walk from Cathedral of Barcelona and less than 1 km from Plaça Catalunya. The property is non-smoking and is located 2.1 km from Sant Miquel Beach.

The apartment features 2 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen, and 1 bathroom with a hot tub.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Passeig de Gracia, Palau de la Musica Catalana and Tivoli Theatre. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km away.

Name: Private terrace Attico 3BD in Gran de Gracia
Description:
Situated in Barcelona, 1.4 km from Park Güell and 1.1 km from Passeig de Gracia, Private terrace Attico 3BD in Gran de Gracia features spacious air-conditioned accommodation with a patio and free WiFi. The property is around 2 km from Casa Batllo, 3.3 km from Sagrada Familia and 3.7 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. The property is non-smoking and is set 1.5 km from La Pedrera.

The 3-bedroom apartment features a living room with a TV, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a fridge, and 1 bathroom with a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Dining options are available close to the apartment.

Guests can relax in the garden at the property.

Tivoli Theatre is 3.8 km from Private terrace Attico 3BD in Gran de Gracia, while Plaça Catalunya is 3.9 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 15 km away.

Name: R&B Mila
Description:
Set in Barcelona, 600 metres from Passeig de Gracia and less than 1 km from La Pedrera, R&B Mila offers air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. The property is located 2.3 km from Palau de la Musica Catalana, 2.7 km from Plaça Catalunya and 2.9 km from Portal de l'Angel. The property is non-smoking and is situated 1.4 km from Casa Batllo.

This apartment has 1 bedroom, a kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a flat-screen TV, a seating area and 1 bathroom fitted with a shower. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Tivoli Theatre and Sagrada Familia. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from R&B Mila.

Name: The One Barcelona GL
Description:
The One Barcelona GL has a fitness centre, terrace, a restaurant and bar in Barcelona. With free WiFi, this 5-star hotel offers room service and a concierge service. The property is 1.2 km from the city centre and 200 metres from La Pedrera.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. The rooms are fitted with a kettle, while some rooms also boast a kitchen with a fridge, a dishwasher and a microwave. At The One Barcelona GL all rooms come with bed linen and towels.

A continental, Full English/Irish or American breakfast can be enjoyed at the property.

At the accommodation guests will find facilities including a sauna and a spa and wellness centre.

Speaking Arabic, Catalan, Czech and German at the reception, staff are always on hand to help.

Popular points of interest near The One Barcelona GL include Casa Batllo, Passeig de Gracia and Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat, 13 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: Hotel SERHS Rivoli Rambla
Description:
Situated on the famous Ramblas, Hotel SERHS Rivoli Rambla has a beautiful interior courtyard and a terrace from where you can enjoy views over the Gothic Quarter while you sip an espresso.

 Return here for lunch and enjoy views over the urban gardens which date back to the Romantic era.

The Hotel SERHS Rivoli Rambla is a celebration of the Art Deco style which has become a signature of this Catalan city. Enjoy theatrical interiors which combine classic style with avant garde features such as clever lighting and contemporary furniture. Sit in the interior patio of the Rivoli Ramblas where you can enjoy the cool surroundings and murals painted on the walls.

The 128 Rambla Restaurant serves a wide selection of Mediterranean and international cuisine. The varied and appealing buffet breakfast is a great way to help prepare you for the day ahead.

Name: Ferienwohnung für 3 Personen ca 50 qm in Barcelona-Eixample, Costa Brava Costa del Maresme
Description:
Ferienwohnung für 3 Personen ca 50 qm in Barcelona-Eixample, Costa Brava Costa del Maresme has a balcony and is situated in Barcelona, within just 1.2 km of Magic Fountain of Montjuic and 1.7 km of Plaça Catalunya. The property is close to Boqueria Market, Cathedral of Barcelona and Palau Sant Jordi. Montjuïc is 1.9 km from the apartment and Plaça Reial is 1.5 km away.

With free WiFi, this apartment features a TV, a washing machine and a fully equipped kitchenette with an oven and microwave.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Portal de l'Angel, Tivoli Theatre and Passeig de Gracia. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km from the property.

Name: Vincci Bit
Description:
Vincci Bit is located just 10 minutes walk from Mar Bella beach. Situated a 7-minute walk from El Maresme Forum Metro Station, it features a sauna, a gym and a rooftop swimming pool with city views.

The restaurant serves a buffet breakfast and à la carte meals, including gluten-free products. There is also a lounge, bar and room service available.

The air-conditioned rooms at Vincci Bit are bright and comfortable and feature a flat-screen TV, a pillow menu and a minibar. The private bathrooms include a shower, hairdryer and free toiletries. Free Wi-Fi is also available.

There are a number of bars, restaurants and shops within a few minutes walk from the hotel. Diagonal Mar Shopping Centre is just 300 metres away.

The International Convention Centre (CCIB) is a 9-minute walk from Vincci Bit. The historic centre of Barcelona can be reached in just 15-minutes by metro or tram.

Name: Enjoybcn Miro Apartments
Description:
Enjoybcn Miro Apartments are located centrally in Barcelona, just 100 metres from Universitat Metro Station. The apartments boast a rooftop terrace with a swimming pool, providing spectacular views of Barcelona.

Equipped with free WiFi and air conditioning, the stylish apartments feature stone walls and parquet floors. The living room has a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a DVD player.

Complete with a dishwasher, the kitchen provides an oven, Nespresso coffee machine and dining area. An iron and a safety deposit box are also available at the apartments.

Bedrooms come with double or single beds. Each private bathroom features a shower, and towels and linen are provided.

Enjoybcn Miro Apartments are located within a 10-minute walk of Las Ramblas. Barceloneta Beach is 10 minutes’ by car and the Sagrada Familia is a 10-minutes metro ride. Shops and restaurants are 5 minutes’ away on foot.

Name: MIQUEL ANGEL - Apartments with community terrace
Description:
Conveniently situated in the Sants-Montjuïc district of Barcelona, MIQUEL ANGEL - Apartments with community terrace is located 1.1 km from Sants Railway Station, 2 km from Magic Fountain of Montjuic and 1.9 km from Camp Nou. The property is around 4 km from Passeig de Gracia, 4.1 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and 4.2 km from La Pedrera. In good weather, guests are welcome to sit outside.

All units are air-conditioned and some of them include a seating area with a flat-screen TV, and a fully equipped kitchen with a dining area. Featuring a private bathroom with a hair dryer, units at the apartment complex also offer free WiFi, while some rooms are equipped with a terrace. The units are equipped with heating facilities.

Casa Batllo is 4.3 km from the apartment, while Plaça Catalunya is 4.7 km away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 11 km from the property.

Name: Villa Modernista
Description:
Featuring air-conditioned accommodation with a private pool, garden view and a patio, Villa Modernista is located in Barcelona. 2.9 km from Sagrada Familia and 3.7 km from Park Güell, the property provides a garden and barbecue facilities. Providing free WiFi throughout the property, the non-smoking villa features a solarium.

The villa is equipped with 4 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a terrace with pool views. Guests can take in the ambience of the surroundings from an outdoor dining area. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Passeig de Gracia is 4.1 km from the villa, while La Pedrera is 4.2 km away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 17 km from the property.

Name: LeMar by Aspasios
Description:
Located in Barcelona’s chic Eixample district, just 600 metres from Gaudi's La Pedrera, LeMar by Aspasios offers comfortable rooms with free Wi-Fi, 5 minutes’ walk from Passeig de Gracia Boulevard.

LeMar by Aspasios bright rooms feature stylish, modern décor. Each has a 22-inch plasma TV and a safe, while bathrooms feature hairdryer, shower and free toiletries.

The property is 300 metres from Diagonal Avenue and Gaudí’s La Pedrera and Casa Batlló are around 600 metres away. Tourist information and a ticket reservation service are offered at Forget Me Not.

Provença FGC train Station is 150 metres away and buses around the city pass 30 metres away. You can catch a direct bus to Barcelona El Prat Airport from Plaza Catalunya Square, 10 minutes’ walk away.

Name: My Space Barcelona Brand New Apartments in City Center
Description:
Set 1.3 km from Passeig de Gracia and 1.6 km from La Pedrera, My Space Barcelona Brand New Apartments in City Center in Barcelona offers air-conditioned accommodation with views of the quiet street and free WiFi. It is located 2.3 km from Casa Batllo and provides a lift. Featuring family rooms, this property also provides guests with a terrace.

The accommodation comes with a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer, while the kitchen features a dishwasher, an oven and a microwave. A toaster, a fridge and stovetop are also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, each unit comes with bed linen and towels.

Sants Railway Station is 2.4 km from the apartment, while Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 2.8 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km away, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: G74 AVENIDA GAUDI nice 4 bedrooms apartment with balcony- Sagrada Familia
Description:
Located in Barcelona, 400 metres from Sagrada Familia, G74 AVENIDA GAUDI nice 4 bedrooms apartment with balcony- Sagrada Familia provides recently renovated accommodation with free WiFi and a terrace. The air-conditioned accommodation is 1.8 km from La Pedrera. The property is non-smoking and is set 2.7 km from Casa Batllo.

The spacious apartment with a balcony and city views features 4 bedrooms, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a microwave, and 1 bathroom with a shower.

Passeig de Gracia is 2 km from the apartment, while Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 3.2 km away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 15 km from the property.

Name: 4bedroom apart with balcony in Las Ramblas 3-2
Description:
Situated in the centre of Barcelona, 2.4 km from Sant Sebastian Beach and 2.4 km from Sant Miquel Beach, 4bedroom apart with balcony in Las Ramblas 3-2 offers free WiFi and air conditioning. Guests staying at this apartment have access to a patio. The property is non-smoking and is set 2.5 km from Somorrostro Beach.

The spacious apartment features 4 bedrooms, a TV and a fully equipped kitchen that provides guests with a dishwasher, an oven, a washing machine, a microwave and a fridge. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Boqueria Market, Santa Maria del Mar and Picasso Museum. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km from the property.

Name: AinB Picasso-Corders Apartments
Description:
These studio apartments are located next to the Picasso Museum, Santa Caterina Market and in the heart of the bohemian Born and Gothic Quarter. They offer free Wi-Fi.

Apartments in Barcelona Corders are housed in a refurbished building, with a private lift to each apartment. Each stylish studio is decorated in light colours, using traditional materials such as stone and wood. Each studio has a small kitchen corner with a fridge and a hob or microwave.

The local district of the Born has a wealth of bars, restaurants and nightlife from which to choose. From the Corders apartments you can also walk to Las Ramblas, Barcelona Port and Barcelona Beach.

Name: Stay U-nique Apartments Travessera II
Description:
Stay U-nique Apartments Travessera II has a terrace and is situated in Barcelona, within just less than 1 km of La Pedrera and a 18-minute walk of Casa Batllo. Guests staying at this apartment have access to a balcony. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Passeig de Gracia is 600 metres away.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 1 bedroom, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. The property has an outdoor dining area.

Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 1.8 km from the apartment, while Tivoli Theatre is 2.5 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from Stay U-nique Apartments Travessera II.

Name: Bright and modern Duplex with terrace in Eixample district P1
Description:
Bright and modern Duplex with terrace in Eixample district P1 has a patio and is set in Barcelona, within just 1.2 km of Magic Fountain of Montjuic and 2 km of Casa Batllo. It is located 2.6 km from Plaça Catalunya and offers a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Sants Railway Station is 1.1 km away.

The spacious apartment has 2 bedrooms, a TV and a fully equipped kitchen that provides guests with an oven, a microwave, a washing machine, a fridge and a stovetop. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Guests can relax in the garden at the property.

Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 2.7 km from the apartment, while Tivoli Theatre is 2.8 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 11 km away.

Name: Breathtaking Penthouse in Eixample
Description:
Right in the heart of Barcelona, situated within a short distance of Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and Plaça Catalunya, Breathtaking Penthouse in Eixample offers free WiFi, air conditioning and household amenities such as kitchenware and kettle. This apartment features accommodation with a patio. The property is non-smoking and is set 1 km from Tivoli Theatre.

The spacious apartment features 1 bedroom, a TV and a fully equipped kitchen that provides guests with a dishwasher, a microwave, a washing machine, a fridge and a stovetop. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Portal de l'Angel, Boqueria Market and Casa Batllo. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km from the property.

Name: One bedroom flat in Sant Andreu with small terrace
Description:
One bedroom flat in Sant Andreu with small terrace is set in the Sant Andreu district of Barcelona, 5.6 km from Passeig de Gracia, 5.6 km from La Pedrera and 5.7 km from Casa Batllo. The property is around 6.2 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, 6.3 km from Tivoli Theatre and 6.5 km from Palau de la Musica Catalana. The Alma’s spa features an indoor pool, a Hammam and a sauna. There is a gym, and massage is also available.

Description:
Four Points by Sheraton Barcelona Diagonal is situated 350 metres from Glòries Shopping Centre, in the modern 22@ district of Barcelona. It offers an elegant restaurant and soundproofed rooms with free Wi-Fi and TV.

Rooms at the Four Points Barcelona Diagonal are bright and spacious, with wooden flooring. Each room has a stylish bathroom with a hairdryer and toiletries. Rooms on higher floors offer great views, some of the Sagrada Familia.

La Avenida Restaurant serves traditional Spanish cuisine. A varied buffet breakfast is offered daily, and free coffee is available from 05:00 until 07:00. Taste local crafted beers, snacks and enjoy the best sports projections at 4Taps Bar.

The Four Points Diagonal is 600 metres from the colourful Agbar Tower, designed by Jean Nouvel. There are many bars and restaurants on nearby Rambla del Poblenou, and Bogatell Beach is within a 15-minute walk. Poblenou Metro Station is only 500 metres away.

Description:
Vincci Marítimo is located 10 minutes’ walk from Barcelona’s Diagonal Mar Shopping Centre and the CCIB Convention Centre. It offers bright, stylish rooms with flat-screen satellite TV and free Wi-Fi throughout.

The air-conditioned rooms at the Hotel Marítimo feature modern décor, with parquet floors and relaxing images of the sea. They come with a pillow menu and the private bathrooms contain a hairdryer. Rooms offer views of the charming Japanese Zen garden or Diagonal Mar Park.

The hotel’s Jardí de Mar Restaurant serves Mediterranean food using fresh ingredients. The hotel's breakfast includes products for celiacs. The Ikebana Lounge Bar offers snacks, tapas and cocktails which can be enjoyed on the terrace.

The hotel’s reception is open 24 hours a day, allowing you greater flexibility during your stay. Laundry and car rental services are also available from the front desk.

The Vincci Marítimo is just 500 metres from Mar Bella Beach. Selva de Mar Metro Station is 2 minutes’ walk from the hotel, connecting you with the city centre in 15 minutes.

The Hotel Regina Barcelona’s spacious rooms come with air conditioning, central heating and satellite TV. There is free tea and coffee, a safe, work desk and minibar. The private bathroom includes ecological cosmetics and a hairdryer. Some rooms have a balcony.

A varied buffet breakfast with zero-kilometre and homemade products is served. There is also a bar and room service is offered all day from 07:00 to 00:00.

The Regina has a 24-hour front desk and a tour desk. Gaudí’s Casa Batlló and La Pedrera, on Passeig de Gràcia Avenue, are within a 10-minute walk away. Catalunya Metro and Train Station and the airport bus stop are within 5 minutes' walk.

There is a Nespresso Coffee Machine, and free capsules are provided. All have free Wi-Fi, a flat-screen and DVD player. Bed linen and towels are provided.

There are plenty of bars and restaurants within a 2-minute walk of the apartments.

Name: Grand Hyatt Barcelona
Description:
A five star iconic hotel located on the renowned Avenida Diagonal, in the heart of Barcelona's most exclusive residential, financial and shopping district: the Alta Barcelona.

Experience the ultimate luxury, and live where the best of Barcelona lives, where Grand Hyatt chooses to be: a captivating destination within another destination. Combining design with sophistication, it is the most exclusive gastronomical and vibrant destination, for an unparalleled experience.

With 465 rooms including 49 suites and a penthouse, 5 gastronomy spaces, a Wellness & Spa area and an outdoor area with terrace and pool, Grand Hyatt Barcelona is the perfect choice for a lavish and unforgettable getaway.

Designer rooms at Grand Hyatt Barcelona offer home automation technology, a 49-inch Smart TV, a safe, air conditioning and free WiFi. Their private bathroom includes Natura Bissé amenities, bathrobes and slippers. Guests have free access to a bright, modern 24-hour gym with a variety of equipment.

Oasis Spa by Natura Bissé houses more than 1000 m² space for well-being, including water circuits, saunas and steam baths. You can relax with one of the range of treatments available onsite and coordinated by expert therapists. Kindly be informed that the minimum age for entering the Spa is 18.

Grand Hyatt Barcelona is 5-minute walking from Football Club Barcelona’s Camp Nou Stadium, 400 metres from Maria Cristina Metro Station and the central Plaza España Square is 3 metro stops away. L’Illa Diagonal Shopping Centre is 15 minutes on foot.
