It is located 3 km from Plaça Catalunya and provides full-day security. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Magic Fountain of Montjuic is less than 1 km away.

The apartment features 2 bedrooms, a TV, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, a washing machine, and 2 bathrooms with a bath. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Boqueria Market, Montjuïc and Plaça Reial. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 12 km from Murillo 18.

Name: Rocafort in Eixample
Description:
Offering city views, Rocafort in Eixample is an accommodation located in Barcelona, 1.4 km from Sants Railway Station and 1.9 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. There is a private entrance at the apartment for the convenience of those who stay. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Magic Fountain of Montjuic is 1.2 km away.

All units include a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen, a dining area, and a private bathroom, while some feature a terrace or a balcony. An oven, a microwave and toaster are also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, every unit has bed linen and towels.

Casa Batllo is 2 km from the apartment, while Tivoli Theatre is 2.6 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 11 km away, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: Montaber Apartments - Sagrada Familia
Description:
Situated in Barcelona, 2.5 km from Nova Icaria Beach and 2.8 km from Bogatell Beach, Montaber Apartments - Sagrada Familia offers free WiFi and air conditioning. It is located 2.2 km from Casa Batllo and features a lift. The property offers soundproof units and is set 500 metres from Sagrada Familia.

All units comprise a seating area with a sofa bed, a dining area, and a fully equipped kitchen with various cooking facilities, including a dishwasher, an oven, a microwave and a toaster. A fridge, a stovetop and kitchenware are also offered, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, units are fitted with a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom.

La Pedrera is 2.5 km from the apartment, while Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 2.7 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from Montaber Apartments - Sagrada Familia.

Name: Stay U-nique Apartments Lope de Vega
Description:
Set in Barcelona, 1.2 km from Bogatell Beach and 1.2 km from Nova Mar Bella Beach, Stay U-nique Apartments Lope de Vega offers air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. It is located 3 km from Sagrada Familia and features a lift. The property is non-smoking and is situated 1.2 km from Mar Bella Beach.

The spacious apartment is fitted with 2 separate bedrooms, 1 bathroom, a fully equipped kitchen with a dining area and oven, and a living room with a TV. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. The property has an outdoor dining area.

Port Olimpic is 3.4 km from the apartment, while Passeig de Gracia is 4.3 km away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 16 km from the property.

Name: Laramond Barcelona Rooms
Description:
Located in Barcelona, 3.7 km from Sagrada Familia, Laramond Barcelona Rooms provides air-conditioned rooms. Located around 4.2 km from Park Güell, the guest house with free WiFi is also 5 km away from La Pedrera. The guest house features family rooms.

At the guest house, rooms are fitted with a wardrobe. At Laramond Barcelona Rooms every room has a desk, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom.

Passeig de Gracia is 5 km from the accommodation, while Casa Batllo is 6 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 20 km from Laramond Barcelona Rooms.

Name: Numa l Roca Rooms & Apartments
Description:
Just 600 metres from Passeig de Gràcia, Numa l Roca Rooms & Apartments offers spacious air-conditioned rooms with beautiful vintage décor, free Wi-Fi and tea and coffee-making facilities. Girona Metro Station is a 1-minute walk away.

Numa l Roca Rooms & Apartments´s individually decorated rooms offer interactive LED TVs with satellite channels. Some rooms have access to a patio or balcony. The stylish bathrooms feature a rain shower, hairdryer and toiletries.

Situated in the Eixample district, Numa l Roca Rooms & Apartments is a 10-minute walk from the famous Gaudi buildings of Casa Batlló and La Pedrera. The beach is just 4 Metro stops away.

Trains to Barcelona Airport stop at Passeig de Gracia Train Station, a 5-minute walk away.

Name: EasySleep Eixample
Description:
Situated just 5 minutes’ walk from Gaudí’s Sagrada Familia in the stylish Eixample District, EasySleep Eixample offers air conditioning and free WiFi.

EasySleep Eixample´s apartments include a kitchen equipped with a microwave, fridge and washing machine. There is also a tea and coffee maker.

The chic lounge in the Sicilia features a dining table and chairs as well as a large sofa. Each apartment also includes a private bathroom complete with a hairdryer.

Monumental Metro Station is just 200 metres from the apartments. Barcelona’s famous Diagonal Avenue is less than 5 minutes’ walk away with many shops, restaurants and bars.

Name: Piulet Hostel
Description:
Well set in the centre of Barcelona, Piulet Hostel provides air-conditioned rooms, a shared lounge, free WiFi and a terrace. The property is close to Tivoli Theatre, La Pedrera and Portal de l'Angel. The accommodation offers a shared kitchen, and organising tours for guests.

Popular points of interest near the hostel include Casa Batllo, Plaça Catalunya and Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km away.

Name: Aspasios Paseo de Gracia Apartments
Description:
Aspasios Paseo de Gracia Apartments is centrally located, just an 8-minute walk from Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas. It features air-conditioned apartments with free Wi-Fi and smart TV with internet connection.

Fitted with wooden flooring, each apartment boasts a modern and functional décor. Apartments have a pleasant lounge area with a sofa and floor-to-ceiling windows. Kitchens include a dishwasher, microwave and coffee machine. There is also a Smart TV with keyboard and internet access.

Paseo de Gracia Bas Apartments are surrounded by a wide range of bars, traditional Spanish restaurants, as well as shops and supermarkets. Las Ramblas, Plaza Catalunya Square, and the Gothic Quarter are all approximately a 10-minute walk away.

The apartments are just 3 minutes’ walk from the fashionable Paseo de Gracia Avenue. Gaudí's masterpiece Casa Batlló is 450 metres away. You can go to the beach by car or by public transport in less than 10 minutes from the apartments.

Regular airport buses to Barcelona El Prat Airport leave from a bus stop located in Plaza Catalunya. You can also catch a train to the airport from nearby Passeig de Gràcia Train Station.

Name: Ola Living Calabria
Description:
Conveniently located in the Eixample district of Barcelona, Ola Living Calabria is situated 1.7 km from Plaça Catalunya, 1.8 km from Portal de l'Angel and 2 km from Tivoli Theatre. It is set 1 km from Magic Fountain of Montjuic and offers a lift. Cathedral of Barcelona is 1.8 km away and Montjuïc is 1.9 km from the apartment.

Each unit is fitted with air conditioning, a private bathroom and a well-fitted kitchen including a dishwasher, oven, microwave and a toaster. The units have a coffee machine, a TV, a safety deposit box and free WiFi, while some rooms also offer a terrace. At the apartment complex, units come with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Passeig de Gracia, Boqueria Market and Palau Sant Jordi. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 11 km from the property.

Name: Stay U-nique Apartments Venecuela
Description:
In the Sant Martí district of Barcelona, close to Llevant, Stay U-nique Apartments Venecuela has an outdoor swimming pool, free WiFi and a washing machine. Guests staying at this apartment have access to a balcony. The property is non-smoking and is set 1.4 km from Nova Mar Bella Beach.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 1 bedroom, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a bidet and a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. The property has an outdoor dining area.

Guests can relax in the garden at the property.

Mar Bella Beach is 1.5 km from the apartment, while Sagrada Familia is 3 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 17 km from Stay U-nique Apartments Venecuela.

Name: Room Mate Carla
Description:
Room Mate Carla is set 200 metres from Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard, and 5-minutes’ walk from Gaudí’s La Pedrera in Barcelona’s Eixample District. It features free WiFi and colourful, stylish rooms.

Decorated with lively prints, the air-conditioned rooms include a flat-screen TV, minibar, safe and a private bathroom.

Room Mate Carla features a modern bar offering a range of cocktails. You will also find a terrace and meeting rooms on site.

The hotel is a 15-minute walk from the Sagrada Familia Cathedral. Verdaguer and Diagonal Metro Stations are 500 metres away and offer easy access to Las Ramblas and Sants Train Station.

Name: Limonaia
Description:
Boasting a garden and free WiFi, Limonaia is set in Barcelona, 100 metres from La Pedrera and 600 metres from Casa Batllo. Featuring family rooms, this property also provides guests with a terrace. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, a concierge service and organising tours for guests.

All rooms have a contemporary décor and come with air conditioning, free WiFi, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a kettle, a shower, a hairdryer and a wardrobe. At the hotel all rooms are fitted with a private bathroom with free toiletries.

Popular points of interest near Limonaia include Passeig de Gracia, Tivoli Theatre and Plaça Catalunya. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from the accommodation.

Name: Sunotel Junior
Description:
Offering panoramic views from its rooftop terrace, which has a seasonal hot tub and swimming pool, Sunotel Junior is set 300 metres from Francesc Macià Square. It offers free, high-speed WiFi.

All rooms at Sunotel Junior have air conditioning, a flat-screen TV, soundproofed windows and a fully equipped bathroom.

Guests can enjoy a varied buffet breakfast each morning. The hotel’s restaurant, Pa'l Caldero, offers a selection of dishes from around the world. There is also a range of cafés and restaurants nearby.

You will find a 24-hour reception that offers a luggage storage service and free pool towels. There are also several meeting rooms available.

The Sunotel is a 5-minute walk from Hospital Clinic Metro Station, and Sants Railway Station is just 2 metro stops away.

FC Barcelona’s famous Camp Nou Stadium can be reached in 15 minutes by public transport, and Plaza de Catalunya and Las Ramblas are also around 15 minutes away.

Name: Aparthotel Bertrán
Description:
Aparthotel Bertrán is located in a quiet part of Barcelona, 5 minutes’ walk from Avinguda Tibidabo FGC Station and Vallcarca Metro. It offers spacious accommodation, a gym and an outdoor pool.

Each air-conditioned Bertrán apartment has a living room with satellite TV and a sofa. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer, and there is a kitchenette with a fridge, microwave and coffee maker.

Some apartments have a private balcony with table and chairs. All apartments have free Wi-Fi.

A continental breakfast is available at the Bertrán, and you can have breakfast in your apartment. There is a supermarket 2 minutes’ walk away.

There is a 24-hour reception, and you can hire a car from the tour desk. On-site parking is available for an extra charge.

You can reach Barcelona city centre in 15 minutes by train, Metro or bus, and there is a night bus stop nearby. Parc Güell is just over 1 km away.

Name: Homenfun Barcelona Park Güell
Description:
Homenfun Barcelona Park Güell is set in the Gràcia district of Barcelona, 400 metres from Park Güell, 2 km from Passeig de Gracia and 3 km from La Pedrera. The property is situated 3.2 km from Sagrada Familia, 3.3 km from Casa Batllo and 3.8 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. Palau de la Musica Catalana is 4.3 km away and Tibidabo Amusement Park is 7.9 km from the apartment.

The units have a fully equipped kitchen with dining area, a microwave and a fridge. With a private bathroom fitted with a bath and free toiletries, units at the apartment complex also feature free WiFi. All units feature a wardrobe.

Tivoli Theatre is 3.9 km from the apartment, while Plaça Catalunya is 4 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from Homenfun Barcelona Park Güell.

Name: Apartments Sata Olimpic Village Area
Description:
Offering contemporary apartments with balconies and private parking, Apartments Sata Olimpic Village Area is a 10-minute walk from Vila Olimpica Beach. This stylish property is a 5-minute walk from Marina Metro Station.

Each air-conditioned apartment is decorated in simple, grey tones with modern finishes. All apartments have a well-equipped kitchenette with a microwave, fridge and hob.

ApartmentsSata Olimpic Village Area is a 15 minutes’ walk from the Olympic Marina and Barcelona’s seafront promenade. The centre of Barcelona can be reached in just 10 minutes, by Metro. An airport shuttle service is available for a surcharge.

Nord Bus Station is located within a 15-minute walk of the apartments and regular airport trains leave from Passeig de Gràcia Station, which is 5 stops from Bogatell Metro.

Name: Stay Barcelona Sagrada Familia
Description:
Located 10 minutes’ walk from Gaudí’s Sagrada Familia, Stay Barcelona Sagrada Familia offers modern apartments with free Wi-Fi and private balconies. Sagrada Familia Metro Station connects with the centre in 15 minutes.

Decorated in white tones with bright finishes, the apartments each have a lounge area with a flat-screen TV and DVD player. The kitchen comes with an oven, microwave and washing machine.

The pedestrianised Gaudí Avenue offers a wide range of restaurants and bars. Barcelona’s lively Gracia District is a 15-minute walk away and has many unique bars.

Trains to El Prat Airport leave from Sants Train Station, which is on the same line as Sagrada Familia.

Name: Elegant Eixample Apartment nicely decorated
Description:
Right in the heart of Barcelona, situated within a short distance of Passeig de Gracia and Casa Batllo, Elegant Eixample Apartment nicely decorated offers free WiFi, air conditioning and household amenities such as a microwave and coffee machine. It is located less than 1 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and features a lift. The property is non-smoking and is set 1.1 km from Plaça Catalunya.

The spacious apartment with a balcony and city views has 1 bedroom, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchenette with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with a shower. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Tivoli Theatre, La Pedrera and Portal de l'Angel. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 12 km from Elegant Eixample Apartment nicely decorated.

Name: Nobu Hotel Barcelona
Description:
Situated in Barcelona, 400 metres from Sants Railway Station, Nobu Hotel Barcelona features accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a fitness centre and a terrace. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, room service and a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The accommodation offers a concierge service, luggage storage space and currency exchange for guests.

The rooms at the hotel have air conditioning and a safety deposit box.

Nobu Hotel Barcelona offers a buffet or continental breakfast.

Magic Fountain of Montjuic is 1.4 km from the accommodation, while Casa Batllo is 2.7 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 11 km away.

Name: Park Guell Gaudi 2 bedroom Apartment
Description:
Park Guell Gaudi 2 bedroom Apartment is set in the Horta-Guinardó district of Barcelona, 1.4 km from Park Güell, 3.1 km from Passeig de Gracia and 3.1 km from La Pedrera. The property is around 3.6 km from Casa Batllo, 4.1 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and 4.2 km from Tivoli Theatre. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Sagrada Familia is 1.9 km away.

The air-conditioned apartment is composed of 2 separate bedrooms, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and microwave, and 1 bathroom. A TV is featured. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Palau de la Musica Catalana is 4.4 km from the apartment, while Plaça Catalunya is 4.8 km away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 16 km from the property.

Name: Yurbban Passage Hotel & Spa
Description:
Situated in Barcelona in the Catalonia Region, 400 metres from Portal de l'Angel, Yurbban Passage Hotel boasts an outdoor pool and spa centre. Guests can enjoy the on-site restaurant.

All rooms include a flat-screen TV. Certain rooms feature a seating area to relax in after a busy day. A terrace or balcony are featured in certain rooms. Each room includes a private bathroom. Extras include bathrobes and slippers. Yurbban Passage Hotel features free WiFi throughout the property.

Guests can enjoy an authentic Catalan breakfast each morning.

You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property.

The hotel also offers bike hire. Plaça Catalunya is 500 metres from Yurbban Passage Hotel, while La Seu, Cathedral of Barcelona is 500 metres from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km away.

Name: Stay U-nique Apartments Fontrodona
Description:
Stay U-nique Apartments Fontrodona features a balcony and is located in Barcelona, within just 1.9 km of Plaça Catalunya and 1.8 km of Portal de l'Angel. Among the facilities at this property are a lift and private check-in and check-out, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is non-smoking and is set 1.4 km from Magic Fountain of Montjuic.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 2 bedrooms, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. The property has an outdoor dining area.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Boqueria Market, Palau Sant Jordi and Montjuïc. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 11 km from Stay U-nique Apartments Fontrodona.

Name: Lodging Apartments Barceloneta Beach Studio 12
Description:
Set in Barcelona, 700 metres from Barceloneta Beach and 700 metres from Somorrostro Beach, Lodging Apartments Barceloneta Beach Studio 12 provides accommodation with amenities such as free WiFi and a flat-screen TV. The property is around 2.7 km from Mar Bella Beach, 1.3 km from Plaça Reial and 1.9 km from Passeig de Gracia. The property is non-smoking and is situated less than 1 km from Sant Miquel Beach.

The air-conditioned apartment is composed of 1 separate bedroom, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, and 1 bathroom. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Santa Maria del Mar, Picasso Museum and Port Olimpic. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from Lodging Apartments Barceloneta Beach Studio 12.

Name: Homenfun Barcelona Sagrada Familia Lepanto
Description:
Situated in Barcelona, 1 km from Sagrada Familia and 2.4 km from Passeig de Gracia, Homenfun Barcelona Sagrada Familia Lepanto features air-conditioned accommodation with a terrace and free WiFi. Guests staying at this apartment have access to a balcony. The property is non-smoking and is set 2.7 km from La Pedrera.

This apartment includes 1 bedroom, a living room and a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a dining area, and 1 bathroom with a bath and a washing machine. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment.

Park Güell is 1.8 km from the apartment, while Casa Batllo is 3.2 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 16 km from Homenfun Barcelona Sagrada Familia Lepanto.

Name: Stay U-nique Apartments Colom
Description:
Right in the heart of Barcelona, situated within a short distance of Sant Miquel Beach and Somorrostro Beach, Stay U-nique Apartments Colom offers free WiFi, air conditioning and household amenities such as a fridge and coffee machine. The property has sea views and is 1.4 km from Barceloneta Beach and 300 metres from Santa Maria del Mar. The property is non-smoking and is located 500 metres from Picasso Museum.

This apartment features 1 bedroom, a kitchen with a microwave and a toaster, a TV, a seating area and 1 bathroom. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Plaça Reial, Passeig de Gracia and Palau de la Musica Catalana. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 12 km from Stay U-nique Apartments Colom.

Name: AB Sagrada Familia Views
Description:
Attractively located in the Eixample district of Barcelona, AB Sagrada Familia Views is situated 2.4 km from Nova Icaria Beach, 2.7 km from Somorrostro Beach and 2.8 km from Bogatell Beach. Among the facilities at this property are a 24-hour front desk and a lift, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Palau de la Musica Catalana is 2.6 km away and Passeig de Gracia is 1.9 km from the apartment.

Each unit includes a private bathroom, while some rooms include a fully equipped kitchen with an oven.

Sightseeing tours are available within a reachable distance.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Sagrada Familia, Casa Batllo and La Pedrera. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 15 km from the property.

Name: Moderno Estudio en Eixample
Description:
Featuring air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony, Moderno Estudio en Eixample is set in Barcelona. The property is around 1.5 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, 1.8 km from Tivoli Theatre and 2.5 km from Portal de l'Angel. The property is 600 metres from Passeig de Gracia, and within 1.6 km of the city centre.

With free WiFi, this 1-bedroom apartment offers a flat-screen TV, a washing machine and a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and fridge. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include La Pedrera, Casa Batllo and Plaça Catalunya. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km away.

Name: Ako Suites Hotel
Description:
Ako Suites Hotel offers stylish apartments with free Wi-Fi and modern kitchenettes. It is located a 10-minute walk from Plaza Catalunya Square.

The Ako Suites have a sleek minimalist design and are decorated in light colours. A flat-screen TV and a double sofa bed can be found in each air-conditioned apartment.

Kitchenettes include a ceramic hob and a microwave. The elegant bathrooms have a bath or shower. Towels and amenities are also provided.

Ako Suites Hotel is located just 300 metres from Universitat Metro Station and a 5-minute walk from an airport bus stop. Staff at the 24-hour reception is happy to provide information about the city.

Name: Stay Barcelona Vila de Gracia
Description:
Stay Barcelona Vila de Gracia features a patio and is located in Barcelona, within just 700 metres of La Pedrera and 1.3 km of Casa Batllo. The property is around 2.1 km from Palau de la Musica Catalana, 2.5 km from Plaça Catalunya and 2.7 km from Portal de l'Angel. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Passeig de Gracia is 500 metres away.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 1 bedroom, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a bath and a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Tivoli Theatre and Sagrada Familia. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from Stay Barcelona Vila de Gracia.

Name: Two bedroom flat in PobleNou
Description:
Situated in Barcelona, less than 1 km from Nova Icaria Beach and a 14-minute walk from Mar Bella Beach, Two bedroom flat in PobleNou offers air conditioning. The property is around 1.5 km from Port Olimpic, 2.8 km from Sagrada Familia and 3.1 km from Santa Maria del Mar. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Bogatell Beach is 800 metres away.

The apartment features 2 bedrooms, a fully equipped kitchen with a fridge and a stovetop, a washing machine and 1 bathroom with a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Passeig de Gracia is 3.2 km from Two bedroom flat in PobleNou, while Picasso Museum is 3.3 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from the accommodation.

Name: Ikonik Ramblas
Description:
This ultra-modern hotel is located right on central Barcelona’s Ramblas, just 300 metres from the seafront promenade. It offers stylish, air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi and flat-screen satellite TV.

The rooms at the Ikonik Ramblas feature parquet floors and chic décor. Each one comes with a minibar and a private bathroom with a hairdryer.

Staff at the 24-hour reception can provide information about what Barcelona has to offer. They can also help booking tickets for guided tours, live shows and other events.

Many famous sites are within easy walking distance. The Liceu Theatre is 400 metres away, while Plaza Real is a 3-minute walk away. Barcelona Cathedral is less 800 metres away.

You can walk to Barcelona’s famous Boquería Market in 7 minutes from the hotel. Airport buses leave from Plaza Catalunya, located 15 minutes’ walk away.

Name: Stay U-nique Apartments GranDeGracia
Description:
Stay U-nique Apartments GranDeGracia offers apartments set in Barcelona's Gràcia district, within 5 minutes’ walk from Diagonal Metro Station and Passeig de Gràcia. It offers stylish studios and apartments with free Wi-Fi.

All accommodation at Stay U-nique Apartments GranDeGracia has contemporary décor finished in white and grey tones. There is a living area with a sofa and a flat-screen TV, while kitchen facilities include a microwave, fridge, toaster, coffee maker, oven and an electric hob.

Shops, bars and cafés can be found along Gran de Gràcia and in the district's charming squares  Plaza de Catalunya and Las Ramblas are just 2 stops from Diagonal Metro Station.

Name: TSA La Mare
Description:
Set within a 10-minute walk of La Pedrera in Barcelona, No 23 - The Streets Apartments Barcelona offers apartments in a same building with free WiFi.

Every unit has a well-equipped kitchen or kitchenette completed with an oven; while the bathroom has a shower. There is a washing machine, and bed linen and towels are provided.

Fresh produces can be found at the market located 700 metres away; and trendy bars, restaurants and shops are on the many surrounding public squares.

A 10-minute metro ride will take you to Plaza Catalunya and Ramblas.

Name: Alcam Baro
Description:
In a prime location in the Horta-Guinardó district of Barcelona, Alcam Baro is located 1.3 km from Park Güell, 4 km from Passeig de Gracia and 4.1 km from La Pedrera. It is set 1.9 km from Sagrada Familia and offers a lift. Casa Batllo is 4.6 km from the apartment and Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 5.1 km away.

With a private bathroom, units at the apartment complex also provide guests with free WiFi.

Tivoli Theatre is 5.2 km from the apartment, while Palau de la Musica Catalana is 5.4 km away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 16 km from the property.

Name: Gran Via SDB
Description:
Located 1.3 km from Montjuïc and 1.3 km from Palau Sant Jordi, Gran Via SDB offers accommodation in Barcelona. The apartment is 2.1 km from Camp Nou.

The unit equipped with a kitchen with a dishwasher and oven. A flat-screen TV and DVD player are offered.

Plaça Catalunya is 2.9 km from Gran Via SDB, while Plaza Reial is 2.9 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 10 km from Gran Via SDB.

Name: Stay U-nique Apartments Sagrada Familia III
Description:
Stay U-nique Apartments Sagrada Familia III features a balcony and is located in Barcelona, within just 300 metres of Sagrada Familia and 1.8 km of Casa Batllo. The property is set 3 km from Somorrostro Beach, 1.9 km from Passeig de Gracia and 1.7 km from La Pedrera. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Nova Icaria Beach is 2.7 km away.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 2 bedrooms, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 2.4 km from the apartment, while Tivoli Theatre is 2.5 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from Stay U-nique Apartments Sagrada Familia III.

Name: Stay U-nique Apartments Consell
Description:
Stay U-nique Apartments Consell features a balcony and is set in Barcelona, within just 1.3 km of Plaça Catalunya and 1.5 km of Tivoli Theatre. It is located 1.6 km from Portal de l'Angel and offers a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 1.3 km away.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 2 bedrooms, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Boqueria Market, Casa Batllo and Passeig de Gracia. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 12 km from Stay U-nique Apartments Consell.

Name: 41COB1019- Charming rustic apartment
Description:
Set in Barcelona, 1.5 km from Plaça Catalunya and 1.6 km from Portal de l'Angel, 41COB1019- Charming rustic apartment offers air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. It is situated 1.7 km from Tivoli Theatre and provides a lift. The property is non-smoking and is located 1.7 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station.

The spacious apartment has 3 bedrooms, a TV, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, a washing machine, and 2 bathrooms with a shower. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Passeig de Gracia, Boqueria Market and Magic Fountain of Montjuic. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km from the property.

Name: Sagrada Familia Bliss
Description:
Sagrada Familia Bliss is located in the Eixample district of Barcelona, 1.7 km from La Pedrera, 2.2 km from Casa Batllo and 1.9 km from Passeig de Gracia. The property is set 2.7 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, 2.8 km from Tivoli Theatre and 3 km from Palau de la Musica Catalana. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Sagrada Familia is 200 metres away.

The air-conditioned apartment is composed of 2 separate bedrooms, a fully equipped kitchen, and 1 bathroom. A flat-screen TV is provided. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Plaça Catalunya is 3.3 km from the apartment, while Portal de l'Angel is 3.6 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from Sagrada Familia Bliss.

Name: Cozy studio in Sant Andreu
Description:
Cozy studio in Sant Andreu is situated in the Sant Andreu district of Barcelona, 5.6 km from Passeig de Gracia, 5.6 km from La Pedrera and 5.7 km from Casa Batllo. The property is around 6.2 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, 6.3 km from Tivoli Theatre and 6.5 km from Palau de la Musica Catalana. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Sagrada Familia is 4.1 km away.

The apartment features 1 bedroom, a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave and a fridge, a washing machine and 1 bathroom with a hair dryer. A flat-screen TV is available. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Park Güell is 6.6 km from Cozy studio in Sant Andreu, while Port Olimpic is 6.8 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 18 km away.

Name: Click&Flat Rizal
Description:
Set in Barcelona, 600 metres from La Pedrera and 1.1 km from Casa Batllo, Click&Flat Rizal offers air conditioning. The property is situated 2.1 km from Palau de la Musica Catalana, 2.4 km from Portal de l'Angel and 2.5 km from Sagrada Familia. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Passeig de Gracia is 200 metres away.

This apartment is fitted with 2 bedrooms, a kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a flat-screen TV, a seating area and 1 bathroom fitted with a shower. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Tivoli Theatre and Plaça Catalunya. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from Click&Flat Rizal.

Name: Casa Camper Barcelona
Description:
Boutique Hotel in Barcelona. Just off La Rambla, in the city centre’s vibrant, diverse and historic Raval quarter, our 40-room boutique hotel is in a converted 19th-century building near the MACBA, the bustling Boqueria market, and a 5-minute walk from Plaza Cataluña.

Rooms with a vibe. Functional and comfortable rooms for all preferences, from Twin to Suite with garden or city views. Whatever you choose, you'll be sure to enjoy big beds, open wardrobes, and clever design details.

Eat & Drink. Home is where the food is. Drinks and snacks at our 24-hour Tentempie buffet, not to mention Michelin-starred dining in Dos Palillos, followed by cocktails at our Dos Billares bar, Casa Camper Barcelona will always keep you happily fed.

Our neighbourhood. You're in the Raval, Ravaleja! Casa Camper Barcelona puts you in the middle of the authentic Barcelona neighborhood life, with countless bars, restaurants, and galleries, including MACBA and its skaters. Our location is perfect for you to explore the city and its most authentic essence, just steps from the iconic works of Gaudí and surrounded by streets full of art and culture. Immerse yourself in the unique fusion of history, design, and tradition. Tired of exploring? Retreat to our sunny rooftop terrace for a drink and panoramic views of the city.

Name: Stay U-nique Apartments Lepant
Description:
Stay U-nique Apartments Lepant has a balcony and is situated in Barcelona, within just 400 metres of Sagrada Familia and 1.8 km of Casa Batllo. It is set 2.9 km from Somorrostro Beach and features a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Nova Icaria Beach is 2.6 km away.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 2 bedrooms, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a bidet and a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Bogatell Beach is 2.9 km from the apartment, while La Pedrera is 1.8 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from Stay U-nique Apartments Lepant.

Name: Hotel Barcelona Condal Mar Affiliated by Meliá
Description:
The contemporary Hotel Barcelona Condal Mar, managed by Meliá is set in a circular building, 10 minutes’ walk from Mar Bella Beach. It offers a 24-hour gym, and the rooftop pool offers impressive views of Barcelona.

The bright soundproofed rooms at the Hotel Barcelona Condal Mar are spacious and feature air conditioning, satellite TV and free Wi-Fi. Each stylish room has a private bathroom and minibar. There are 2 phone lines.

The Barcelona Condal Mar lobby bar offers a range of cocktails. The bright snack lounge features modern armchairs. Guests can also enjoy a drink in the poolside bar. A buffet breakfast is served in the restaurant.

A special late check-out service, locker and transfer is available during the summer months for an extra cost.

The Barcelona Condal Mar is an 8-minute walk from Maresme Forum Metro Station and  a 2-minute walk from the nearest bus stop. The centre of Barcelona can be reached in around 15 minutes by Metro, Bus or Tram.

Name: Uma Suites Pau Claris
Description:
Located within 2.5 km of Sant Miquel Beach and 2.6 km of Barceloneta Beach, Uma Suites Pau Claris provides rooms with air conditioning and a private bathroom in Barcelona. The property features city and inner courtyard views, and is 200 metres from Passeig de Gracia. The property is 300 metres from the city centre and 2.5 km from Somorrostro Beach.

The units in the guest house are equipped with a flat-screen TV. Featuring a private bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer, units at the guest house also provide guests with free WiFi. All units will provide guests with a fridge.

Popular points of interest near the guest house include Palau de la Musica Catalana, Tivoli Theatre and Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km away, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Name: HelloBCN Youth Hostel Barcelona
Description:
Centrally located HelloBCN Hostel Barcelona is 200 metres from Paral.lel Metro Station on Barcelona’s Paral.lel Avenue. It offers budget dormitory accommodation with a free Wi-Fi zone and 24-hour reception.

Each bright dormitory has air conditioning and heating. Sheets and blankets are provided and there are large personal lockers. Bathroom facilities are shared. Towels can be hired.

Vending machines for drinks and snacks are available.

The spacious common room has a TV, table tennis and board games. Activities are organised by the hostel to encourage the interaction of guests. A free map and advice on what to do in Barcelona is offered.

Name: Colors
Description:
This modern hotel offers free wired internet access and colourful rooms with flat-screen satellite TV. The beautiful Laberint d’Horta Park is around a 15-minute walk away.

Colors is situated in a quiet residential area, just 350 metres from Valldaura Metro Station. Direct trains connect to Barcelona city centre in around 15 minutes. Free parking can also be found nearby.

Colors is located next to Can Cortada, one of Barcelona’s most popular restaurants. The hotel also has a coffee bar, where you can enjoy a breakfast buffet and light meals.

Rooms at the hotel offer a functional design and simple, stylish décor. Each room is air-conditioned and includes a safe.

Name: Fridays Flats Retro Chic In Poble Sec
Description:
Set in Barcelona, 1.1 km from Magic Fountain of Montjuic and 1.7 km from Plaça Catalunya, Fridays Flats Retro Chic In Poble Sec offers air conditioning. The property is close to Cathedral of Barcelona, Palau Sant Jordi and Montjuïc. The property is non-smoking and is located 1.7 km from Portal de l'Angel.

With free WiFi, this 2-bedroom apartment offers a TV, a washing machine and a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and oven. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Tivoli Theatre, Passeig de Gracia and Boqueria Market. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km away.

Name: Fira Guest House
Description:
Enzo Fira Guest House offers accommodation in Barcelona, 5 minutes from the convention center Fira de Barcelona Exhibition Centre and Plaza España. Free WiFi is provided.

Each modern, bright room is fitted with a TV.

You will find a shared fully equipped kitchen and a shared lounge area at the property. Bed linen and towels are provided.

The Gran Vía 2 shopping center is 1.1 km and the port of Barcelona 3.9 km.
Palau Sant Jordi is 1.6 km from Enzo Fira Guest House, while Camp Nou is 1.9 km from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 9 km away.

Name: Sweett - Urgell Eixample
Description:
Set within 1.3 km of Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and 1.2 km of Plaça Catalunya, Sweett - Urgell Eixample offers rooms with air conditioning and a private bathroom in Barcelona. It is located 1.5 km from Portal de l'Angel and provides a lift. Casa Batllo is 1.5 km from the apartment and Magic Fountain of Montjuic is 1.6 km away.

Each unit is fitted with a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a washing machine, and a private bathroom with shower and slippers. Free WiFi is accessible to all guests, while selected rooms also offer a terrace. At the apartment complex, the units include bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Tivoli Theatre, Passeig de Gracia and Boqueria Market. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km from the property.

Name: Alcam Anglesola
Description:
Featuring free Wi-Fi, Alcam Anglesola is an air-conditioned apartment with a private terrace. FC Barcelona’s Camp Nou Stadium and Sants Train Station are both 15 minutes from the apartment on foot.

This modern apartment has a living room with a sofa bed, dining table and flat-screen TV. The separate kitchen is equipped with an oven, microwave and fridge. There is a double bedroom and a bathroom with a shower.  Bed linen and towels are provided.

El Corte Ingles Department Store and La Illa Shopping Centre, with a range of restaurants, are both 100 metres from the property.

Plaza Catalunya is 3.5 km away and easily accessible by metro from Maria Cristina Metro Station, a 5-minute walk from Alcam Anglesola.

Name: ARCELON HOTEL - New from 2023
Description:
Set in Barcelona, 2.8 km from Nova Mar Bella Beach, ARCELON HOTEL - New from 2023 offers accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a garden and a terrace. This 4-star hotel offers a concierge service, a tour desk and free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is situated 2.9 km from Mar Bella Beach.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a kettle, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. The units feature a wardrobe.

Guests at ARCELON HOTEL - New from 2023 can enjoy a buffet or a continental breakfast.

Speaking Catalan, German, English and Spanish, staff at the reception can help you plan your stay.

Llevant is 3 km from the accommodation, while Sagrada Familia is 1.9 km away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 16 km from the property.

Name: Mercer House Bòria BCN
Description:
This chic boutique hotel blends a carefully preserved, 18th-century setting with the most modern and impressive interior design. It lies in the fashionable La Ribera district of central Barcelona.

The Mercer House Bòria BCN is set in amongst the narrow, atmospheric streets just to the north of the famous El Born district. Its original 18th-century façade has been well-preserved and adds to the hotel’s unique charm. Inside, each suite and room has a clean, contemporary style complemented by works of modern art by young local artists.

To get an idea of the Boria’s great location, head to its own rooftop sun terrace, where you can look out over the city’s Gothic cathedral, the beautiful nearby church of Santa María del Mar and the Old Port beyond.

Name: Cosmo Apartments Consell de Cent - Plaza Universitat
Description:
Located 700 metres from central Barcelona’s Universitat Square, this property offers stylish, well-equipped apartments. It is 300 metres from Urgell Metro Station, just 2 stops from Las Ramblas and Plaza de Catalunya.

Each air-conditioned apartment has chic, contemporary décor with chrome finishes and trendy furnishings. The living room has a sofa, a flat-screen TV and an iPod docking station.

The kitchen includes an electric hob, an oven, microwave, dishwasher and a kettle. There is also a dining area.

Shops, bars and cafés can be found in the streets surrounding the apartments and on Universitat Square, 10 minutes’ walk away.

The apartments are within 1.5 km of Barcelona’s Gothic Quarter, the Raval District and the CCCB Art Gallery. Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard and the famous Gaudí houses can be reached in just 10 minutes by Metro.

The airport bus stops 150 metres away, while Sants Railway Station and the AVE High-Speed Train are easily accessed by Metro from the nearby Catalunya Station.

Name: P1MAL1091- Fantastic 3bed steps away from Sagrada
Description:
Located in Barcelona, 2.7 km from Nova Icaria Beach and 3 km from Bogatell Beach, P1MAL1091- Fantastic 3bed steps away from Sagrada provides air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. It is situated 2 km from La Pedrera and offers a lift. The property is non-smoking and is set 400 metres from Sagrada Familia.

The spacious apartment comes with 3 bedrooms, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with a shower, a hair dryer and a washing machine.

Casa Batllo is 2.2 km from the apartment, while Passeig de Gracia is 2.5 km away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 15 km from the property.

Name: Stay U-nique Apartments Floridablanca II
Description:
Located in Barcelona, 1.5 km from Passeig de Gracia and 1.4 km from Plaça Catalunya, Stay U-nique Apartments Floridablanca II provides air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. It is situated 1.6 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and offers a lift. The property is non-smoking and is set 1.5 km from Portal de l'Angel.

The spacious apartment comes with 3 separate bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, a fully equipped kitchen with a dining area and dishwasher, and a living room with a TV. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Tivoli Theatre, Boqueria Market and Magic Fountain of Montjuic. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 12 km from Stay U-nique Apartments Floridablanca II.

Name: Stay U-nique Apartments Urgell
Description:
Stay U-nique Apartments Urgell features accommodation within less than 1 km of the centre of Barcelona, with free WiFi, and a kitchen with a dishwasher, an oven and a microwave. It is situated 1.1 km from Plaça Catalunya and offers a lift. The apartment has family rooms.

At the apartment complex, units are fitted with a desk, a TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. All units are air conditioned and include a seating and/or dining area. All units will provide guests with a wardrobe and a coffee machine.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Portal de l'Angel, Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and Tivoli Theatre. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km from the property.

Name: W Barcelona
Description:
W Barcelona is a striking sail-like structure next to Barceloneta Beach, offering breathtaking design and fantastic views over Barcelona. It features a spa, infinity pool, rooftop bar and luxurious rooms.

The W Hotel’s impressive rooms feature avant-garde design and views of the Mediterranean or the city. They all come with a chaise lounge, flat-screen TV, iPod docking station and rainfall shower.

The W has a stylish gourmet restaurant, FIRE; and you can enjoy a cocktail with panoramic views over the city and sea at NOXE rooftop bar, located on the 26th floor. Cocktails are also offered in the W Lounge. The SALT Beach Club & Restaurant has a menu of innovative burgers accompanied by specially designed cocktails to live the ultimate burger by the beach experience.

There are two pools, SUN Deck and WET Deck, which are surrounded by decking with loungers. The hotel also has direct beach access. Facilities at the W Spa include a hot tub, sauna and steam room, and a brand new relaxation area, GETAWAY, is available from 2018. A wide range of relaxation and beauty treatments is available.

The W is 20 minutes’ walk from Barceloneta Metro Station, and buses stop outside the hotel.

Name: Boutique Hostemplo Sagrada Familia
Description:
Offering free WiFi throughout the property, Hotel Boutique Hostemplo is located on a pedestrian street just 100 metres from Barcelona's Sagrada Familia. The hotel has a friendly and very peaceful atmosphere.

Each room comes with a flat-screen TV. Some rooms have a seating area to relax in after a busy day. You will find a kettle in the room. Every room comes with a private bathroom equipped with a shower. For your comfort, you will find a hairdryer and toiletries.

The surroundings are full of bars, restaurants and shops, like the F.C. Barcelona Museum. Las Glorias Shopping Centre is a 10-minute walk away. Gaudí’s Pedrera and Casa Batlló are 10 minutes' walk away. Sagrada Familia Metro Station, located 2 minutes' walk away, connects you with the city centre in 7 minutes, offering easy access to Plaza Catalunya, the Ramblas and the beach.

You can buy discounted tickets for the tourist bus, which stops 100 metres from the hotel.

The buffet breakfast with homemade pastries, local products and freshly squeezed natural orange juice is served daily in our café from 08:00 to 10:30.

Name: Aspasios Gracia Apartments
Description:
Located in Barcelona within less than 1 km of La Pedrera and a 4-minute walk of Passeig de Gracia, Aspasios Gracia Apartments provides accommodation with free WiFi, seating area and a kitchen. There is a private entrance at the apartment for the convenience of those who stay. The apartment features family rooms.

The apartment complex will provide guests with air-conditioned units offering a wardrobe, a coffee machine, a dishwasher, an oven, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also featured, as well as a kettle. At the apartment complex, all units include bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Casa Batllo, Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and Tivoli Theatre. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 15 km away.

Name: H10 Universitat
Description:
Ideally located just 100 metres off Barcelona’s central Plaça Catalunya and the exciting Las Ramblas, this new hotel blends a 19th-century façade with 21st-century decor and facilities.

The H10 Universitat lies in the cultural heart of this cosmopolitan city, allowing you to easily walk to many of the city’s unique sights. It is full of stylish, contemporary design and modern art. State-of-the-art amenities include free Wi-Fi available throughout the building.

Name: Stay U-nique Apartments Radas
Description:
Stay U-nique Apartments Radas features a balcony and is set in Barcelona, within just 1.7 km of Boqueria Market and 1.4 km of Palau Sant Jordi. It is located 2.5 km from Plaça Catalunya and offers a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Magic Fountain of Montjuic is less than 1 km away.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 2 bedrooms, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. The property has an outdoor dining area.

Portal de l'Angel is 2.6 km from the apartment, while Passeig de Gracia is 2.7 km away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 12 km from the property.

Name: Stay U-nique Apartments Casanova
Description:
Situated in Barcelona, 1.1 km from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and 1.1 km from Casa Batllo, Stay U-nique Apartments Casanova features air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. It is set 1 km from Passeig de Gracia and provides a lift. The property is non-smoking and is located 1.3 km from Tivoli Theatre.

The spacious apartment has 4 separate bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, a fully equipped kitchen with a dining area and oven, and a living room with a flat-screen TV. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Plaça Catalunya, La Pedrera and Portal de l'Angel. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 12 km from Stay U-nique Apartments Casanova.
